title: Aberchrombie & Fitch, Authentic Away Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: The journey is a trip, but the destination is a feeling. AWAY from Abercrombie & Fitch is an invitation to press pause and just be. AWAY is a floral fruity fragrance capturing an uninhibited moment. The fragrance opens with a restorative blend of Red Currant, Pear & Mandarin, the heart combines plush Muguet petals, Freesia & Jasmine creating a sensual feminine essence. The base envelops you in warm Amber, Musk & Praline creating a dreamy finish to the fragrance.

middle: Heart Notes: Plush Pink Freesia, Muguet and Jasmine

middle: A mouth-watering combination of Black Currant, Pink Pepper, and Pink Lady Apple creates an immediate refreshing first impression. A warm accord of beloved wood notes of Cedarwood and Sandalwood, with Patchouli lends a sense of freedom to the fragrance.

A distinguished aroma that articulately blends top floral fresh notes comprised of Rose and Sage with invigorating ingredients like Cedarwood and Jasmine that form the core of the fragrance. Blu Femme by Ajmal resonates with Cashmere wood, Vanilla and Moss at the base and this floral fresh Eau de Parfum caters to the contemporary tastes of energetic and spirited young women..

title: AJMAL, RAINDROPS EDP 50ML W
description: Combining uplifting Fruity and sensual Floral notes for the ultra-modern woman of today. With a unique mix of Floral, Fruity and Fresh notes, Raindrops is a modern scent, which exudes a sleek and simplistic elegance enveloping the wearer in a delicate weave of contemporary elements. The fragrance, with its clean, back to basics chic is designed to appeal to women who seek practical scents, reminiscent of outdoor freshness.

title: Ajmal, Sacrifice Ajmal Edp 50Ml W

title: ALEXANDRE J THE COLLECTOR, GOLDEN OUD EDP 100ML W
description: Make a statement with the luxurious fragrance of Golden Oud by Alexandre J.
top: With a woody top note blended with an earthy accord, this cologne has a subtle musky smell. Powdery and oud-based accords make up the middle notes, giving this fragrance a lightness that prevents it from becoming overwhelming. Patchouli and balsamic base notes round out the strong fragrance to enhance the earthiness and give this cologne a slight sharp edge to perfectly complete this scent.

title: Alexandre J The Collector, Iris Violet Edp 100Ml W
description: Iris violet is one of the beautiful fragrances from the collector line. The collector fragrances are the mix between the oriental desert and the French baroque architecture. Alexandre J introduces 10 fragrances under The Collector which evokes a timeless journey, the warmth of elements, and the change of scenery. It takes you to a magical place beyond everyone’s imagination. The collector fragrances are sensual and sophisticated. The collector line is an invitation to a journey of both the mind and the body.
top: Iris Violet is a fruity floral young and sophisticated fragrance. This is a tribute to the French royalty and celebration of the young and fresh Iris flower. Iris violet is a scent of energy and happiness that makes you cheerful throughout the day.
middle: Iris violet presents in a precious metallic purple bottle and decorated with golden emblems and chains. The outer box is an artistic assorted leather box. The Iris flower design makes this box more beautiful and elegant.
base: Violet is the color of self-respect and relax!

title: ALEXANDRE J THE COLLECTOR, MORNING MUSCS EDP 100ML W
Alexandre J The Collector, Rose Alba Edp 100Ml W
description: Rose Alba is the perfume that reminds you of ancient love stories. It’s an invitation to experience the whole art of love. It perpetuates the spirit of The Collector by combining Eastern and Western influences. Rose stands for desire and secrecy. Guided by the desire to work around the rose, Alexandre. J immersed himself in the origins and history of this mythical flower. An emblematic flower of Greek-Roman civilization, the Egyptian Queen Cleopatra used it to seduce Emperor Mark Antony. Alexandre. J then imagined a red bottle reminiscent of the rich curtains of the palace, adorned with the Egyptian sun-bearer: the beetle.
top: To the tribute of Cleopatra, Rose Alba is presenting in a most stylish and stunning red aluminum bottle with gold plated medallion. This gives a unique look and astonishingly proud in the matter of beauty. The outer box present in red color and leather material. The gorgeous color with a velvety outer box embeds with jewels replicating the fashion of Cleopatra. Alexandre J is always known for its quality aromatic ingredients and its handmade unique and beautiful perfume outer box. With the gorgeous colors and artistic style, each perfume bottle is unique and use as a home décor item even after use.
middle: The caress of Rose Alba is felt from the first notes of black pepper and fleshy plum. Wrapped in fluffy peach skin, the rose is combined with sandalwood to deliver an oriental, feminine, and velvety rose water.
base: Top notes:

After close to five months of aging, the quality of its signature notes – Rose, Spices, Frankincense and Woods – is accentuated by a deeper and more complex ambery construction, leaving a lasting impression on the senses.

A white floral fragrance inspired by the tragic predicament of Madame Butterfly. In honour of truth and beauty, her poetic love and sorrow echo eternally.

title: Amouage, Honour Edp 100Ml W 2023
description: A fleeting burst of Coriander, juiced up by a mere drop of tangy Rhubarb and iridescent Black Pepper, reveals a sensual white flowers bouquet.
top: In the light of a transparent Lily of the Valley, a narcotic Jasmine and the pearly corolla of a solar Gardenia crown the dramatic exuberance of a proud and creamy Tuberose, distilling its peach accents in a grove of spicy Carnations.
middle: A profusion of gleaming petals gives way to an intense Ambery base where Opoponax and Incense combine their balsamic warmth with a Leather and Vetiver accord.
base: A Venusian ode to the fate of Madame Butterfly, Honour Woman is a consecration of poetry, beauty and femininity.

title: Amouage, Interlude Edp 100Ml W
description: Over a wavering note of green, pungent and stemmy Tagete grows a sumptuous and exotic bouquet of succulent Grapefruit and Bergamot, spiced up by a freshly-grated Ginger.
top: Drenched in a stellar aura of Jasmine and Orange Blossom, they refresh an insanely luscious and lavish heart where syrupy Opoponax and Frankincense balsams elevate the fruitiness of Rose and Immortelle Absolutes.
middle: Overwhelming beauty of Amber, blazing red Benzoin and golden Tonka Bean, they fight against thick veil of smoked Oud, damp Oakmoss and an Animalic accord of Leather and Musk, before vanishing all under layers of sweet Vanilla.
base: A fruity and ambery chypre, Interlude Woman reveals, through never-ending contrasts of light and shade, of sweetness and greenness, an interlude moment peace and inner harmony

title: Amouage, Lilac Love Edp 100Ml W
description: Lilac love is the first fragrance in Amouage’s The Secret Garden Collection. As the scent of the Lilac flower cannot be extracted, Lilac Love harmoniously recreates the lilac accord to express animalic and powdery tones with a melodious balance of jasmine and rose. The accord is delicately blended with top notes of gardenia, peony, and heliotrope. The floral scent is then refined with a gourmand heart of orris, cocoa bean, and tonka bean. The warm tone of sandalwood also lends its charismatic sensuality in the base, along with the suave richness of patchouli and soft facets of vanilla, creating a timeless floral symphony with a romantic musky veil.

As with all Ariana Grande fragrances, this is fun, light, youthful and sweet. The scent is a wonderful one that can be worn all year round, but is certainly more well suited to the colder days of the year due to it’s over arching cosiness.

title: Armaf, Club De Nuit Edp 105Ml W
description: Club De Nuit Perfume by Armaf, This lovely, delicate scent has charming floral and fruity aromas dancing within its aromasphere.
top: Club De Nuit Perfume by Armaf is a refreshing blend of citrus scents, including grapefruit, orange, bergamot, and peach, followed by romantic heart notes of intoxicating flowers like rose, night-blooming jasmine, geranium, and lychee. These delicious fragrances are anchored by finishing notes of vanilla, musk, vetiver, and patchouli. This is a beautiful, seductive fragrance that will give everything you do a touch of grace.

title: Armaf, Club De Nuit Intense Edp 105Ml W
description: Club De Nuit Intense basks in an elegant rose fragrance that highlights the beauty of floral arrangement for sensual but powerful accords. It begins with a topping rose accord touched with geraniums and saffron. The heart blends together spicy elements of caraway with nutmeg, pepper and violet. The base concludes on amber, oud wood, vanilla and patchouli.

title: Armaf, Club De Nuit White Imperiale Edp 105Ml W
description: Bold, Fresh, Classy – stand out with this musky, fruity-rose fragrance that leaves a trail of elegance as you walk past. It opens with the sweetness of Litchi and fresh fruits, blooming into its main heart of jammy, soft Rose, as bold spices coat the sweetness with a mellow musk for a scent that lasts beyond dusk.
top: Top notes: Litchi, Bergamot & Nutmeg.Middle notes: Turkish Rose, Peony, Musk & Vanilla.Base notes: Cashmeran, Cedar, Incense & Vetiver.

title: Arteolfatto, Tuberose Vanilla Edp 100Ml W
description: Tuberose Vanilla is a sensual fragrance created with Tuberose. Powerful nocturnal flower with sweet and narcotic notes with a humid, earthy and magnetic background. The realization of this fragrance is represented by a hypnotic tuberose, masked by notes of vanilla and jasmine. A perfume with a bewitching and seductive trail to wear with the awareness of not going unnoticed

title: Attar Collection, Crystal Love For Her Edp 100Ml W
description: This fragrance is the elixir of love. It is like a union of two lovers. It was inspired by a famous Middle Eastern legend about the love between beautiful Leyla and Arab poet-bedouin Majnun. From the first notes, the perfume strikes you with its uniqueness and pure luxury. The fragrance is saturated with seductive notes of warm bourbon vanilla. In the heart of the scent, there is spicy nutmeg with a combination of a cloud of sensual white musk, which lies on a substrate of milk chocolate.

title: Attar Collection, The Queen Of Sheba Edp 100Ml W
description: The name “Queen of Sheba” evokes memories of this mysterious Oriental queen, reputed to hail from Ethiopia. Laden with treasures of gold and fragrant spices, she came to ancient Jerusalem to test the wisdom of King Solomon. She vanished from history but her memory remains, lingering in an exotic perfume that is “fit for a queen!” The queen of Sheeba, is a “Black Masterpiece” launched in 2015, featuring classic oriental fragrance in special luxury packaging. The Queen of sheba seduces you with its warm glamour and elegance. she is powerful, and captivated. The fragrance opens with sambac jasmine enhanced with osmanthus’s fruity, apricot-like effect. The floral heart combines May rose, tuberose and Egyptian narcissus. The woody trail is composed of cedar and vetiver.
top: Top note: Peach, Abricot, Vetiver, Narcissus
middle: Heart note: Jasmine, Rose, Cedarwood, Cashmeran
base: Base note: Osmanthus, White Musk, Patchouli, Sandal

title: Azzaro, Wanted Girl Edp 80Ml W
description: Make your presence known and be the talk of the town when you’re wearing Azzaro Wanted Girl, a tantalizing women’s fragrance. This enticing perfume blends floral, aromatic and spicy accords for a dazzling result that’s both highly feminine and endlessly alluring.
top: Top notes of juicy pomegranate seed, breezy orange blossom, light ginger flower and bold pink pepper open the scent with a powerful burst of intensity, while
middle: Heart notes of exotic datura and dulce de leche lend a sweet softness to the mix.
base: Helping to balance the entire concoction are base notes of creamy tonka bean, earthy patchouli and Haitian vetiver for a stunning and mystifying aroma that’s sure to catch the attention of anyone nearby.

title: Azzaro, Wanted Girl Edp 80Ml W Gift Set
description: Somewhere between heritage and modernity, Azzaro has envisioned a brilliant Eau de Parfum as an ode to this untamable beauty tinged with panache and overflowing with charm. The ultimate dose of dazzling femininity drenched with sun and advocating la bella vita: Wanted Girl. A radiant, explosive, and gourmand fragrance housed in a delicate flower-shaped bottle.
top: A Floral Oriental Gourmand fragrance with three all-new accords for three-dimensional florality:– At its dawn: Ginger flower– At its zenith: Dulce de leche*– At its dusk: Haitian vetiver*
middle: Set includes:– Azzaro Wanted Girl Eau de Parfum Spray 80ml– Azzaro Wanted Girl Eau de Parfum Spray 7.5ml– Azzaro Wanted Girl Body Lotion 100ml–

title: BURBERRY, HER EDT 100ML W
Burberry, Her Elixir De Parfum Edp 100Ml W
description: Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum: a bold and sensual fragrance for women. Moving beyond the adventurous spirit of the Burberry Her Eau de Parfum, the scent is the latest chapter in the intensifying story of Burberry Her. Designed for women who dare to explore the unknown, the Elixir is for the free-spirited woman seeking the excitement of her next adventure. Sensual, irresistible and not held back by boundaries, she possesses an addictive persona.

title: Burberry, Her London Dream Edp 100Ml W

Radiant and sparkling, the signature Her scent evolves into Her London Dream, with ripe top notes of lemon and fresh ginger – vibrant and memorable. With a romantic rose and peony heart.

title: Burberry, London Edp 100Ml W
description: This floral-fresh scent has gentle top notes of rose and honeysuckle.Deep heart notes of tiare flower, jasmine and peony and a hint of fresh clementine zest.Solar notes of sandalwood, musk and patchouli add a subtle warmth to create an inspiring fragrance.

title: Burberry, My Burberry Black Parfum 90Ml W

middle: The fragrance fuses the scent of sun-drenched jasmine flower and peach nectar with a touch of rose. This signature rose note at the heart of My Burberry is given a sweet and inviting candied twist, while rich amber patchouli rounds off the scent for a deep and captivating finish.
base: The rich, amber-coloured bottle is finished with a hand-tied black gabardine knot and set with a dark, elevated horn-look lid, inspired by the buttons of the Burberry trench coat.

title: Burberry, My Burberry Edp 90Ml W

base: Top notes: Bergamot, mandarin orange, sweet pea

Delicate rose petal notes are lifted with crisp apple, while a base of jasmine and wisteria round off the scent for an intensely feminine touch. The bottle is enlivened with a feminine and sophisticated pink hue, reflecting the confident and spirited character of the scent.

Like a carnival, the chypre accord delivers surprising yet sumptuous twists, including decadent red peach and a hint of addictive vanilla. Enveloping you in the wondrous opulence of the festivities, Fantasia Veneta leaves you with the thrill of having left your mark at a phenomenal fete. Wear this Eau de Parfum by itself or magnify it in numerous ways with one of the five exclusive Magnifying Essences to bring your fragrance experience to the next level. Delicate and unbridled, tasteful and intense, Fiori D’Amore gracefully elicits love’s wondrous, multiple facets and passion’s velvety soft touch.

title: Bvlgari, Allegra Rock N Rome Edp 100Ml W

Serving up the fun of incessant cocktails and free-flowing conversation, Rock’n’Rome exudes the warmth of close friendship and the glimmer of dusk. Wear this Eau de Parfum by itself or magnify it in numerous ways with one of the five exclusive Magnifying Essences to bring your fragrance experience to the next level. title: Cartier, La Panthere Edp 75Ml W
description: “Every woman has a feline aspect and every flower has a hidden animal essence” Mathilde Laurent, Cartier Perfumer Mathilde Laurent offers a unique new accord, combining a flower and a sensation: a feline floral fragrance. To express femininity, she chose to explore the glory of a radiant gardenia, sensual yet delicate. To add a touch of the wild, she created a soft velvety musk. In terms of design, Cartier has emphasized the curves of the panther’s head, in a more organic and primitive style. While staying faithful to the allure of the original, this new version softens the dynamic of the lines bringing a stronger link with the Maison’s jewelry emblem. Following a more responsible approach, the bottle is now refillable.

In terms of design, Cartier has emphasized the curves of the panther’s head, in a more organic and primitive style. middle: “A chance came up, I seized it.” Mademoiselle Chanel knew that her real chance was the one of her own creation, a state of mind, a way of being.
base: A floral fragrance that intertwines Pink Pepper, Jasmine and Amber Patchouli. Laced with White Musks and Vanilla, the eau de parfum is rounder and more enveloping.

title: Chanel, Gabrielle Edp 100Ml W
description: Before creating the House of CHANEL, Coco was Gabrielle. A rebel at heart, passionate and free. The inspiration behind this luminous floral fragrance is Gabrielle Chanel. Olivier Polge crafted this eau de parfum as an imaginary flower, a radiant and sparkling, purely feminine CHANEL blossom based on a bouquet of four white flowers. A rich, enveloping heart of exotic jasmine shimmers with the fruity green notes of ylang-ylang, while fresh and sparkling orange blossom shines through, offering a glimpse of Grasse tuberose captured at its finest.

title: Chanel, Gabrielle Essence Edp 100Ml W
description: Inspired by the free and passionate woman who became Coco Chanel, GABRIELLE CHANEL ESSENCE is a more voluptuous, intensely feminine interpretation of the original GABRIELLE CHANEL luminous floral fragrance. The striking square glass bottle is reimagined with bolder golden accents on the stopper and label.
top: Top notes are Citruses, Peach, Red Fruits, Black Currant and Petitgrain
middle: Middle notes are White Flowers, Tuberose, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Orange Blossom and Coconut
base: Base notes are Musk, Vanilla and Sandalwood.

title: CHANEL, NO. 1 L’EAU ROUGE EAU PARFUMEE EDP 100ML W
description: The red camellia is a flower unlike any other and the key ingredient in N°1 DE CHANEL. A flower with revitalising powers, whose extraordinary energy gives it perennial youth.CHANEL Research has harnessed its exceptional properties to create a new generation of beauty products, including skincare, makeup and a fragrance mist.At the core of the N°1 DE CHANEL beauty line, red camellia extract targets stage N°1 of the skin’s aging process, working to prevent and correct the appearance of the 5 signs of aging.
top: The red camellia is soft and delicate, yet extraordinarily strong and resilient. An exceptional source of vitality, for a youthful glow. Olivier Polge drew inspiration from both of its dimensions for L’Eau Rouge, the revitalising fragrance mist: one that is fresh, sparkling and dynamic, the other soft and delicate. The tone is set from the very first notes of the fragrance; it opens with a fruity (citrus and red berries) flourish of energy that unfurls into a jasmine-rose heart, the iconic hallmark of CHANEL Fragrance. The composition draws to a delicate close with comforting musk and iris notes.

title: Chanel, No. 5 Edp 100ml W
description: Since its creation in 1921, N°5 has exuded the very essence of femininity. The abstract, mysterious scent—alive with countless subtle facets—radiates an extravagant floral richness. In 1986, Jacques Polge reinterpreted his predecessor Ernest Beaux’s composition to create a fuller, more voluminous version of the now and forever fragrance: the Eau de Parfum.
top: composition
middle: With its unprecedented use of aldehydes and layers of complexity, N°5 was the world’s first abstract fragrance. The Eau de Parfum draws inspiration from the original Parfum. This floral bouquet, composed around May rose and jasmine, features bright citrus top notes. Aldehydes create a unique presence, while the smooth touch of bourbon vanilla yields an incredibly sensual sillage.

title: Chanel, Paris Edt 125Ml W
description: A woody-floral fragrance, inspired by relaxed Parisian elegance evoking the morning bustle of a Parisian café terrace.composition
top: PARIS – PARIS is a fragrance built around the Damask rose, a rose full of character that reveals a multitude of facets. Its sparkling freshness is heightened by lemon and mandarin, its spicy notes by pink peppercorn, and its woody heart by patchouli.

Combined with magnolias and generous peonies, the rose becomes both honey-like and powdery; its petals blossom on the skin. top: Top notes: Accentuated by the perfumer’s delicate sleight of hand, tinctures of Rhubarb and Peach mix with bold strains of Mandarin and Bergamot clean white expanses off-set against the deep azure of a Mediterranean sky.

description: Davidoff Sea Rose comes after the ever-popular Cool water for Women. While the former is a great performer – it is more on an aquatic and a rather neutral fragrance. With this new addition, it boasts a heart of rose, yet manages to maintain its oceanic and watery notes. An elegant, subtle and modern interpretation of a floral fragrance. Fret not! This fragrance is not a typical, over-the-top rosey scent.
top: Top Notes: Juicy Japenese Nashi Pear & Sea Water
middle: Heart Notes: Bouquet of roses & Pink Peony,
base: Base Notes: Sandalwood & White Musk

title: Diesel, Loverdose Edp 75Ml W
description: Seductive and spicy, Diesel Loverdose is a fragrance perfect for women who want to feel sexy in their own skin. In the mood for love? This heady scent is said to be made with molecules that stimulate lust and attraction… The popular women’s perfume strikes a balance between feminine floral tones like jasmine and gardenia and spicier aromas of star anise and liquorice. Diesel Loverdose perfume comes in a striking heart-shaped bottle featuring an arrow piercing the centre – the definitive symbol of passion and romance. Notes: star anise, mandarin, jasmine, liquorice, gardenia, vanilla, amber
top: Top notes – Star Anise, Mandarin.
middle: Middle notes – Liquorice, Jasmine, Gardenia.
base: Base notes – Ambrox*, Liquorice liqueur, Vanilla, Dry wood.

title: Dior, Addict Eau Fraiche 100Ml W
description: The Dior Addict Eau Fraîche composition opens with the sparkling citrus notes of sweet-and-sour Grapefruit heightened with the smoothness of Calabrian Bergamot.
top: Its diverse heart, at once tangy and floral, reveals a subtle bouquet of Freesia and Lily-of-the-Valley.
middle: A joyful signature that concludes with a powerful, structured base of woody notes blended with enveloping White Musks.
base: A fresh and vibrant trail that retains a radiant force.

title: Dior, Addict Edp 100Ml W
description: sophisticated oriental fragrance with a floral heart, for the passionate, intuitive woman who ignores dictates and follows her own rules. The Dior Addict attitude is best incarnated by its compelling heart note of the Jamaican ” Queen of the Night ” a rare and elusive flower that blooms only for a few hours and is considered the soul of enchantment. Intensely seductive.
top: All Mediterranean countries grow mandarin trees, but the best mandarins are produced in Sicily. The different colors of mandarin, yellow, green and red, correspond to the different stages of ripeness. Essence of mandarin is a citrus note, offering fragrances a fresh and fruity accent. Mandarin is the exotic top note of Dior Addict Eau de Parfum.
middle: The “Queen of the Night” flowers of the Selenicereus cactus open only at night. These large flowers with long, thin outer petals generally bloom in the summer. The flower only opens once, from nighttime to dawn, giving off a powerful fragrance. The exact origin of the Selenicereus is unknown but probably comes from Mexico, Brazil or the Greater Antilles.
base: The white vanilla flowers produce a fruit that ripens in 8 to 9 months. Vanilla beans are harvested just before they are ripe and undergo a ripening process for 34 months. Their fragrance develops and vanilla crystals form to unfold vanilla’s sweet and spicy accords. This serene, sensual scent is featured as a base note in Dior Addict Eau de Parfum.

title: Dior, Addict Edt 100Ml W
description: The Sicilian Mandarin top note unleashes with fruity citrus tones, tangy and full. White flowers, Jasmine Sambac and Tunisian Neroli blend together over a sensual and subtle woody base of Sandalwood Essence with a hint of Vanilla.
top: The sophisticated freshness of a woody floral.

title: Dior, Dior 30 Montaigne Perfume 5Pcs Miniature Set W
description: Dior, Dior 30 Montaigne Perfume 5Pcs Miniature Set W

title: Dior, Dior Addict Body Lotion W
description: BODY LOTION] The Dior Dior Addict Dior Addict body lotion is a perfect complement to the fragrance from the range with the same name. The lotion nourishes your skin and gives it the hydration it needs. With regular use, your skin will be velvety smooth and irresistibly soft.

title: Dior, Dolce Vita Edt 100Ml W
description: This is a sweet oriental fragrance with a spicy woody base. This perfume of joy and happiness reminds us of hot and sunny summer days-the scent of easy living.
top: Top notes include lily, magnolia and rose followed by peach, apricot and cinnamon in its heart while the drydown notes are sandal, heliotrope and vanilla.

title: Dior, Dune Edt 100Ml W
description: An oceanic fragrance, created in harmony with nature, this radiant, fresh and subtle accord captures the landscape where the sky meets the sea in a warm, oceanic floral bouquet. Enveloping, serene and sensual.

title: Dior, Hypnotic Poison Body Lotion 200ml W
description: BODY LOTION] Formulated with mango butter and moisturizing agents, this body lotion provides long-lasting hydration to keep skin soft and supple, and leaves behind a subtle trace of the captivating and sensual notes of Hypnotic Poison.

title: Dior, Hypnotic Poison Edp 100Ml W
description: The lush charm of sambac jasmine absolute mingled with a welcoming orange blossom absolute is wrapped in smooth, intensely evocative tonka bean. The round licorice note behind the seductiveness of Hypnotic Poison is boosted to new, bolder heights. It creates irresistible appeal empowered by the vanilla, an immediate sign of gratitude. An atmosphere of total deliciousness reigns…
top: The bottle of Hypnotic Poison—fragrance of mystery—is an absolute icon. A sultry incarnation of the forbidden fruit. Tempting red apple. Its glass appears possessed with molten lava.
middle: Fragrance Notes
base: Top Notes – sambac jasmineHeart Notes – tonka beansBase Notes – vanilla

title: Dior, Hypnotic Poison Edt 100Ml W
description: The mystery of Dior’s legendary forbidden fruit lives on in a magical, modern philter that blends femininity with boldness. Four contrasting facets – intoxicating bitter almond and carvi, opulent Sambac jasmine, mysterious Jacarandra and sensuous vanilla and musk– make for a compelling, bewitching fragrance fusion. Intoxicating and extravagant.Indigenous to Sicily and southern Italy, almonds have been popular since the most ancient civilizations. Remains show that almonds were cultivated by the Assyrians and in ancient Persia.
top: The fruit brings a touch of bitterness to the top note of Hypnotic Poison Eau de Toilette.Indigenous to Sicily and southern Italy, almonds have been popular since the most ancient civilizations. Remains show that almonds were cultivated by the Assyrians and in ancient Persia.
middle: The fruit brings a touch of bitterness to the heart note of Hypnotic Poison Eau de Toilette.The white vanilla flowers produce a fruit that ripens in 8 to 9 months. Vanilla beans are harvested just before they are ripe and undergo a ripening process for 34 months.
base: Their fragrance develops and vanilla crystals form to unfold vanilla’s sweet and spicy accords. This serene, sensual scent is featured as a base note in Hypnotic Poison Eau de Toilette.

title: Dior, Jadore Edp 100Ml W
description: An iconic fragrance, J’adore Eau de Parfum is the grand feminine floral by the House of Dior.
top: Finely crafted down to the last detail, like a custom-made flower, J’adore is a bouquet of the most beautiful flowers from around the world. Essence of Ylang-Ylang with its floral and fruity notes and essence of Damascus Rose from Turkey blend with a rare duo of Jasmine Grandiflorum from Grasse and Indian Jasmine Sambac, with fruity and voluptuous sensuality.

title: Dior, Jadore Edp 100Ml W 2Pcs Gift Set
description: An elegant box that reveals the iconic Dior fragrance, J’adore, along with a travel bottle that is as chic as it is practical. A gift idea that is sure to delight its lucky recipient.
top: The J’adore gift set includes:
middle: – J’adore eau de parfum, 100 ml. Both its memorable trail and its recognizable amphora bottle will leave a lasting impression: J’adore is renowned as an emblematic Dior fragrance. Floral notes of Ylang-ylang, Rose and Jasmines.
base: – J’adore travel spray, 10 ml. Housed in a white leather case, the J’adore travel spray ensures the fragrance accompanies you wherever you go. A pre-filled and refillable practical travel format.

title: Dior, Jadore Edp 50Ml W
description: An iconic fragrance, J’adore Eau de Parfum is the grand feminine floral by the House of Dior.
top: Finely crafted down to the last detail, like a custom-made flower, J’adore is a bouquet of the most beautiful flowers from around the world. Essence of Ylang-Ylang with its floral and fruity notes and essence of Damascus Rose from Turkey blend with a rare duo of Jasmine Grandiflorum from Grasse and Indian Jasmine Sambac, with fruity and voluptuous sensuality.

title: Dior, Jadore Edp 50Ml W 2Pcs Gift Set
description: Surprise your loved ones by treating them to a generous and refined Dior gift. Nestled in a ready-to-gift box, two J’adore creations reveal themselves to delight the gift’s recipient.
top: The J’adore gift set includes:
middle: – J’adore eau de parfum, 50 ml. An iconic House of Dior creation, J’adore is its emblematic fragrance for both its floral trail and the curves of its amphora bottle. The voluptuously sensual Dior women’s fragrance.
base: – J’adore Lait Sublime beautifying body milk, 75 ml. The J’adore trail subtly unfurls in the soft texture of a moisturizing body milk.

title: Dior, Jadore Edp 5Ml W Mini Set
description: Christian Dior J’Adore La Collection.
top: 1x J’Adore L’Absolu de Parfum 5ml miniature1x J’Adore 5ml Eau de Parufm miniature1x J’Adore 5ml Eau de Toilette miniature1x J’Adore In Joy 5ml Eau de Toilette miniature

title: Dior, Jadore Infinissime Edp 100Ml W
description: J’adore eau de parfum infinissime, the flowers of J’adore are released and unfurl to form this sensual, powerful and enveloping fragrance.
top: The trail of J’adore eau de parfum infinissime is that of an endless flight of liberated flowers, that infinitely exhale their fragrance: Centifolia Rose, Jasmine Sambac and Ylang-Ylang are sculpted by the woody accents of a creamy Sandalwood, and shaken up by the luminous Tuberose of Pays de Grasse from estates in exclusive partnerships with the House of Dior.
middle: J’adore becomes “infinissime”, just like the trail with infinite character of this eau de parfum.

title: Dior, Jadore L’ Or Essence Parfum Edp 50Ml W
description: A full and voluptuous perfume by Francis Kurkdjian for Dior that masterfully balances notes of orange blossom, jasmine grandiflorum, and centifolia rose. A bouquet in full bloom, celebrating power and sensuality, these flowers are the true gold of J’adore.
top: Noble, sensual, J’adore L’Or is the fragrance quintessence of the J’adore floral bouquet.
middle: J’adore L’Or blends absolutes of Jasmine and May Rose from our exclusive estates in Grasse with the oriental charm of Vanilla and Tuberose. Jasmine Grandiflorum shines with an intense, enveloping and fruity floral quality. In this fragrance, May Rose wields a carnal power, an immediate beauty with almost spicy accents. Blended with these two absolutes, Vanilla cajoles while maintaining its slightly raw charm and Tuberose, that heady white beauty, drives you to distraction with its persistent character.
base: Key Notes

title: Dior, Jadore Parfum D’Eau Edp 50Ml W
description: The new fragrance, a concentration of water and flowers: J’adore Parfum d’eau reinvents the promise of pleasure that J’adore has upheld since 1999.
top: The pleasure of a reinvented J’adore bouquet with a strong natural focus: Neroli from Vallauris injects its full freshness into J’adore Parfum d’eau, while sunny notes of jasmine sambac meld with velvety notes of Chinese magnolia. A genuine ode to the white flowers of J’adore in a fresh and spontaneous interpretation.
middle: The pleasure of a patented alcohol-free formula exclusive to Dior with the same long-lasting intensity of an eau de parfum that stays true all day long.
base: The pleasure of a new approach to fragrance application: J’adore Parfum d’eau unveils itself with a generous mist, soft and enveloping on the skin.

title: Dior, Joy Edp 90Ml W
description: Dior, Joy Edp 90Ml W

title: Dior, Joy Intense Edp 90Ml W
description: JOY by Dior Eau de Parfum Intense is an olfactory burst, a scent of joy wherein flowers celebrate, exploding with all their faceted beauty. The dazzling light of juicy Citrus blends with the colorful shine of Rose and Grasse Jasmine, heightened by an enveloping woody echo of Sandalwood tinged with Vanilla. A fragrance like floral fireworks.

title: DIOR, MISS DIOR 200ML BODY MILK W
Dior, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming Edp 100Ml W
description: Bright and colorful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is an extravagant floral fragrance you return to again and again. Delectable tangy Red Berry notes are embroidered on a fresh Peony accord. Exalted by a sublime duo of Grasse Rose and Damascus Rose, this infinite blooming of fresh flowers is comforted in a base of White Musk notes. A positive, cheery olfactory harmony for a mischievous and irresistible Miss Dior.
top: Opening notes: Red Berry accord
middle: Middle notes: Grasse Rose absolute and Peony accord
base: Base notes: White Musk accord

title: Dior, Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Edt 100Ml W
description: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet is a fresh and sparkling eau de toilette fashioned like a dress embroidered with flowers.
top: The olfactory bouquet of this fragrance pays homage to Christian Dior’s legendary love of flowers. At the heart of Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet lies the tenderness of a Peony and Damascus Rose accord honed by a radiant Calabrian Bergamot. The poetic trail of this eau de toilette is adorned with a lacework of White Musks.
middle: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet leaves behind its springtime floral signature, the olfactory incarnation of a playful and charming Miss Dior.

title: Dior, Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Edt 100Ml W 2Pcs Travel Set
description: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Gift Set:
top: 1 Miss Dior Blooming Eau De Toilette 100ml
middle: 1 Miss Dior Blooming Eau De Toilette – Refillable Travel Spray 10ml
base: A chypre floral fragrance for young women Fresh, delicate, elegant, feminine & tempting. Top notes of essences of mandarin. Heart notes of peony. Base notes of white musk..

title: Dior, Miss Dior Edp 100Ml W
description: The new Miss Dior eau de parfum brings in a wave of optimism and brims with life—echoing Miss Dior’s very essence. Miss Dior’s fresh and floral notes are composed like a bouquet of countless flowers with endless sparkling colours. François Demachy, Perfumer-Creator of the House of Dior, wanted to create an iridescent Rose for this fragrance that is lit up by a myriad of fresh and floral notes.
top: The iconic Miss Dior couture bow harnesses an exceptional artisanal savoir-faire that transforms each embroidered ribbon into a unique piece, that of a true high fashion creation.
middle: TOP NOTES: FLORAL BOUQUETThe floral freshness of Lily-of-the-Valley notes, an expressive Peony accord, and caressing Iris notes are accompanied by a slightly dewy, verdant quality.
base: HEART NOTES: CENTIFOLIA ROSEA delectably creamy, lush, and velvety Rose, around which an armful of flowers resembling a “millefiori” come alive.

title: Dior, Miss Dior Edp 50Ml W Gift Set
description: Set Description:
top: This gift set features a Miss Dior Eau de Parfum, the pearly fresh and velvety sensual perfume for women, a travel-size of the fragrance for scenting on the go, and a Miss Dior Body Milk. It also comes in a limited-edition box designed by Pietro Ruffo.
middle: About the Fragrance:
base: An extravagance of pearly fresh and velvety sensual flowers, Miss Dior Eau de Parfum awakens the senses with a colorful floral bouquet of centifolia rose, peony, lily-of-the-valley, and tender woods.

title: Dior, Miss Dior Edp 5Ml W Mini Set
description: “Make me a perfume that smells of love” Christian Dior. Miss Dior is a hymn to love, emblematic of Dior’s femininity and Couture spirit. A tailor-made trail with a modern, rebellious and elegant character.
top: Set includes– Miss Dior Eau De Parfum 5ml– Miss Dior Eau De Toilette 5ml– Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming 5ml– Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet 5ml

title: Dior, Miss Dior Original Edt 100Ml W
description: Maison Dior introduces its Miss Dior original eau de toilette, a lightweight take on its iconic best-seller and the first perfume ever created by Christian Dior, Miss Dior.
top: Timelessly on trend, its blend of green chypre floral notes continues to embody the couture house’s innovative spirit throughout its different eras. Miss Dior original eau de toilette is a more lightweight version of Dior Parfums’ beloved, signature fragrance.
middle: Miss Dior original eau de toilette revels in generous, delicate Galbanum notes, which profoundly lighten its floral Jasmine core, while essence of patchouli adds complexity.

title: DIOR, MISS DIOR PARFUM 80ML W
description: Between strength and grace, boldness and elegance. Miss Dior Parfum is the breath of femininity and youth according to Dior. Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, reappropriates the initial olfactory inspiration of Miss Dior, infusing it with the spirit of contemporary youth.
top: The perfumer reinventes the legendary chypre fragrance of Miss Dior in a composition that blends floral and fruity accords with voluptuous notes of ambery woods. In homage to the jasmine of the original 1947 Miss Dior fragrance, a jasmine with rare facets, obtained through a special extraction process, was chosen by Francis Kurkdjian for Dior. It reveals a surprising rosy and fruity note that contrasts with the woody tones and is brightened by hints of mandarin.
middle: The Couturier’s fragrance, Miss Dior Parfum is adorned with a ‘poignard’ bow woven from Lurex threads, its silvery hue echoing the color of its new signature label. The emblematic Miss Dior houndstooth motif envelops around the bottle in shimmering pink tones.
base: An intense and luminous fragrance, at the heart of which shines the essence of Miss Dior.

title: Dior, Miss Dior Rose N Rose Edt 100Ml W
description: Miss Dior Rose N’Roses, the eau de toilette whose trail incarnates the floral abundance of fields of roses in Grasse.
top: The freshness of an armful of fresh, colorful petals, the vivifying energy of citrusy dew: Miss Dior Rose N’Roses is a sparkling floral fragrance, a profusion of Grasse Roses refreshed by a Bergamot zest and heightened by the intensity of a White Musk note.
middle: The vibrant Geranium essence refines Miss Dior Rose N’Roses eau de toilette with its lemony aromas to faithfully recreate the irresistible scent of an endless field of flowers: a bright pink hue becomes a fragrance that takes hold of you and never lets go.
base: OLFACTORY DESCRIPTION:

title: Dior, Poison (Green) Edt 100Ml W
description: Poison, the signature fragrance, dark and mysterious. This elegant fragrance, created by Edouard Fleischer, was launched in 1985. The base note of this fragrance is deep and fresh plum, which blends with the delicate sweetness and blend of berries. Then the scent turns into a floral scent, which are the romantic notes of cloves, jasmine, and incense that make up the heart of the fragrance, and the top notes of the fragrance highlight a pungent touch of cinnamon. The fragrance ends with a warm base note of amber, heliotrope, cedar, and vanilla. This fragrance is available in three different sizes of eau de toilette and comes in a dark colored bottle adorned with a crystal-like cap on the top of the bottle.
top: Ingredients:
middle: Italian bergamot, orange blossom essence, black pepper, petitgrain, cloves, jasmine, orange blossom, tuberose, gawish, incense, rose, honey, vetiver, rose, honey.
base: Top notes: coriander seed, plum, forest fruits, anise, Brazilian rosewood.

title: Dior, Poison Girl Body Lotion W
description: Dior, Poison Girl Body Lotion W

title: Dior, Poison Girl Edp 100Ml W
description: “I am not a girl, I am Poison.” Poison Girl is the fragrance of a modern-day girl, free and sexy. A delectable olfactory lure that instantly poisons and draws out the pleasure to the point of addiction. A bitter-sweet floral fragrance in which mouthwatering Orange envelops with delightful Venezuelan Tonka Bean before blossoming in the biting sensuality of Grasse Rose.

title: Dior, Pure Poison Edp 100Ml W
description: A voluptuous musky composition based on white flowers such as orange blossoms. Once upon a time, there was a fragrance that was innocent yet captivating, sincere yet mysterious… Dior Pure Poison Eau de Parfum incarnates seduction in its purest state by exploring its duality and irresistible alchemy.
top: Based on orange blossom, jasmine, gardenia, amber and sandalwood, this delicate yet generous modern potion reveals the seductress within. The fragrances of the Poison line take new directions with daring provocation. They are fragrances created to surprise and astonish, to let women assert their femininity with confidence.
middle: Key Notes:Top – bergamotsambac jasmineBase – vanilla

title: Diptyque, Do Son Edp 75Ml W
description: From Diptyque, an exotic tuberose perfume inspired by visits to Indochina in the 1930s. The tuberose is represented with other floral notes in a steamy and lush tropical environment with a persistent and sensual perfume.
top: Do Son blends the bitter-sweet notes of tuberose with orange tree leaves, berries and iris.

title: Diptyque, Do Son Edt 75Ml W
description: As a child, Yves Coueslant, one of diptyque’s founders, spent his summers in Do Son, in Ha Long Bay. The sea breeze carried the heady and spicy scent of tuberoses. Do Son has the delicateness and persistence of a memory from a childhood in Indochina – the memory of a flower, between lightness and delight.
top: Notes
middle: Tuberose, Orange blossom, Jasmine

title: DIPTYQUE, EAU ROSE EDT 100ML W
description: A new take on the Rose, the Eau Rose Eau de Parfum, reveals a fascinating dimension of the flower – more vibrant and exuberant.
top: In this composition, extracts and absolutes of damascena and centifolia roses amplify the flowers’ intensity. Firad rose essence is added to this duo, with its astonishing fruity accents of litchi, and unexpected, yet naturally present, notes: the honeyed accents of camomile, and a singular, green, vegetal accord of artichoke. After all, the perfumers say, “a good rose always smells of artichoke”. A surprising detour inspired by the fantasies of nature, for a rose with a playful and exhilarating character.

title: Diptyque, Olene Edt 100Ml W
description: Olene tells the story of Venetian gardens. In the evening, under the pergola, the sweet fragrance of wisteria and jasmine or sometimes honeysuckle, just as delicate. Cross bridges to lose yourself, and then stroll through the narrow streets to perceive the thousand and one scents of the flowers.

title: Dkny, Be Delicious Edp 100Ml W
description: A modern feast for the senses. Served in a sleek metal and glass apple bottle, this juicy fragrance combines the scent of apple with a sophisticated blend of exotic flowers and sensual woods. Like the city that inspired it, Be Delicious celebrates individuality with refreshing spirit.
top: Notes:American Apple, Cucumber, Grapefruit, Candid Magnolia, Tuberose, White Muguet, Rose, Violet, Sandalwood, Tender Skin Accord, Blonde Woods, White Amber.
middle: Style:Free-spirited. Refreshing. Unique.

title: Dkny, Be Delicious Fresh Blossom Edp 100Ml W
description: DKNY Be Delicious Fresh Blossom is inspired by the beauty of the Apple Blossom – known as a symbol of love, youth, beauty and happiness. Inspiring you to take on new challenges and make a fresh start.
top: Be Delicious Fresh Blossom marries freshness, vibrancy and femininity to create a scent that opens, blooms and lingers. Sparkling Grapefruit, Rose and Blonde Woods embody the top, heart and base notes of the scent.
middle: Fragrance Notes:• Top: Sparking Grapefruit• Heart: Rose• Base: Blonde woods

title: Dkny, Golden Delicious Edp 100Ml W
description: DKNY Golden Delicious celebrates luxury and splendor with its rich and accentuated aromas of juicy ‘Golden delices’ apple, accompanied by orange blossom and Mirabelle plum. An opulent floral heart offers a bouquet of white roses, surrounded with Casablanca lilies, lily of the valley and vanilla orchid, while base caresses with notes of musk followed by a sensual woody trail of sandalwood and teak.

title: Dkny, Pure Edp 100Ml W
description: Pure DKNY Verbena by Donna Karan is a citrus-floral-green fragrance that is refreshing and clean. It’s wonderful for those hot summer days when you need some refreshment. It opens with citrus and basil notes and then softens to a simple floral heart, drying down to a base of amber, sea moss and vetiver to keep you feeling and smelling wonderful and refreshed all day long!
top: Top Notes: Basil, Lemon Verbena.
middle: Middle Notes: Jasmine, Honeysuckle, Peony.
base: Base Notes: Vetiver, White Amber, Sea Moss.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Desire Edp 75Ml W
description: The One Desire is a deeply feminine fragrance that illuminates everyday moments into something special. A blend of luxurious ingredients as potent and captivating as the emotion of desire itself leads us on a journey of opulent seduction.
top: Top notes a citrusy blend of bergamot, mandarin, lychee and lily of the valley, emphasizing the glamour and glory of a woman. The heart blooms with seductive tuberose which is cleverly laid out on the base which is made of caramel, vanilla, sandalwood and musk.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Devotion Edp 100Ml W
description: The Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum fragrance is a sensory journey, seductive and reassuring, capable of evoking the positive values to which Dolce&Gabbana hold dear, symbolized by the Sacred Heart seal. An olfactory creation of exquisite contrasts, bright top notes, sensual base notes.Details
top: The fragrance opens with the tantalizing, gourmand notes of candied citrus.
middle: The luminous freshness of Orange Blossom at the heart.
base: The warm, sensual touch of Alluring Vanilla transports the senses to a sweet and sophisticated destination.

title: DOLCE & GABBANA, DEVOTION INTENSE EDP 100ML W
description: Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense is the latest Bright Gourmand fragrance joining the Devotion collection. The new olfactive creation revisits the original fragrance with its characteristic notes of Orange Blossom and Vanilla, featuring a new addition of distinctive Hazelnut.
top: Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense, the latest addition to the Dolce&Gabbana Devotion olfactory story, celebrates the brand’s unwavering dedication to Italian design and craftmanship.
middle: Notes
base: Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense revisits the original fragrance with deeper and more enveloping notes.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Dolce Edp 75Ml W
description: Feminine and fresh, Dolce Eau de Parfum embodies the delicate balance between timeless craftsmanship and innovation in the art of perfumed composition. Dolce is a personal touch, your signature scent. It epitomises the simplicity of a result obtained thanks to a complex process: the same one needed to create a finely-embroidered dress.
top: The fragrance opens with a brightly-coloured, sweet-smelling explosion of neroli leaves and papaya flower, dissipating into a floral bouquet as the core of the fragrance emerges.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Dolce Lily Edt 75Ml W
description: A luminous addition to the Dolce fragrance collection, this bright, fruity floral combines a delicate signature pink-lily accord with exotic passion fruit atop a base of soft, sensual musks.
top: Key Notes:
middle: Passion Fruit Accord, Pink Lily Accord, Musks

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Dolce Peony Edp 75Ml W
description: A burst of the irresistibly lavish and feminine peony, Dolce Peony sparkles with a new and unconventional energy, a new play on a fruity floral.
top: In the top notes, a hint of spicy pink pepper, fruity white bergamot and nashi pear, creating an exquisite crunchy freshness, delicately sublimated by cyclamen petals.The heart is all about the passion of the peony. Its breezy note encircles the fragrance, enriched by the natural sensuality of Bulgarian rose and the dewy freshness of freesia.In the dry down, a more mellow moment: the softness of yellow plum nectar envelops an intense woody amber note, underpinning this glorious floral fusion with a lingeringly bold and beautiful base.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Dolce Q Edp 100Ml W
description: Q by Dolce&Gabbana is a fragrance with fruity notes, enriched by a strong woody base. The fresh taste of Sicilian Lemons combined with the contrasting sweet and sour flavours of Cherry gives the perfume a refined yet bold scent.
top: Notes
middle: TOPThe fragrance opens with the sparkling citrus notes of Sicilian Lemon and red orange accompanied by delicate Jasmine petals.
base: HEARTAt the heart of the Q by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Parfum fragrance lies the sweet and crunchy note of Cherry that is seduced by the creamy heliotrope.

title: DOLCE & GABBANA, DOLCE Q INTENSE EDP 100ML W
Dolce & Gabbana, Dolce Rose Edt 75Ml W
description: Dolce & Gabbana, Dolce Rose Edt 75Ml W

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Dolce Shine Edp 75Ml W
description: Discover Dolce Shine Eau de Parfum, a joyful and irresistibly fresh fruity floral fragrance by Dolce&Gabbana.
top: Fragrance FamilyFloral
middle: Scent TypeSunny Floral Fruity
base: Key NotesMango, Grapefruit, Quince

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Garden Edp 75Ml W

Someday, her sparkle will turn into fire, and her gentle warmth will become passion. Oh, the sweet mystery of this precious child/woman! title: Giorgio Armani, Acqua Di Gioia Edp 100Ml W
description: Acqua di Gioia represents the joy of the Mediterranean Sea. This refreshing aquatic fragrance opens with a beautiful blend of jasmine and zesty lemon, warmed with woody cedar at the base.
top: Inspired by Italy’s Mediterranean coast, this Giorgio Armani perfume for women is a singular blend of serenity and exhilaration. Opening up with the playful notes of citrus, the aquatic fragrance reveals a heart of intoxicating jasmine and lingers with the warmth of cedarwood.

title: GIORGIO ARMANI, ACQUA DI GIOIA INTENSE EDP 100ML W
description: Discover Armani Acqua di Gioia Eau de Parfum Intense, a sparkling intensity blending vibrant citrus notes and luscious red fruits, capturing the everlasting mood of an Italian summer.
top: An enchanting invitation to immerse yourself in the boundless sunlight and turquoise seas of the Mediterranean, with the fresh citrus scent embodying the distinctive essence of this captivating region.
middle: A trio of bright, sparkling Italian citrus fruits open the perfume, which intertwine with a juicy red fruit accord, while a bouquet of delicate rose Damascena petals and aquatic jasmine grandiflorum bloom at the fragrance’s heart.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Code Edp 75Ml W

The floral fragrance opens with a sensual orange flower note intertwined with fresh ginger accents that give way to a slow honey-sandalwood caress. Addictive. Intoxicating. Passionate.
top: Top notes: Jasmine, OrangeHeart notes: Orange BlossomBase notes: Honey, Vanilla

title: Giorgio Armani, Emporio Armani Because It Is You Edp 100Ml W
description: The perfume by Emporio Armani, Because It’s You is a happy, delicious and sparkling perfume for women: simply irresistible like a ripe raspberry in its perfect and most elegant naturalness when combined with neroli notes.
top: This women’s fragrance is feminine, full, instinctive and passionate. It features the addictive and sophisticated rose absolute, which combines the notes of vanilla and musk, revealing a complex and incredibly deep sensuality.
middle: – Top Notes: Raspberry, Blackcurrant, Neroli essence.
base: – Heart Notes: Violet leaves accord, Rose Absolute, Jasmin Sambac Absolute.

title: Giorgio Armani, Emporio Armani In Love With You Edp 100Ml W
description: In Love With You is a bittersweet perfume for women. Tangy and tart top notes of raspberry, cherry, and black currant suggest an untamable free spirit. Wormwood brings a bitter, aromatic edge to middle notes of elegant, refined rose and piercingly sweet jasmine. The single base note of patchouli is dark, earthy, and exotic, adding a woody facet to the overall profile.

title: Giorgio Armani, Emporio Armani In Love With You Freeze Edp 100Ml W
description: Giorgio Armani, Emporio Armani In Love With You Freeze Edp 100Ml W

title: Giorgio Armani, My Way  Floral Edp 90Ml W
description: Discover My Way Floral, Giorgio Armani’s new feminine fragrance. A fresh and blooming bouquet, enhanced by bright citruses, encapsulating authentic encounters around the world. Live, as if it was the first time.
top: Top notes: Orange blossom from Egypt and green mandarin from Italy: The bright and citrusy start of the fragrance. The luminous orange blossom note, extracted from hand-picked bitter orange fruits in Egypt, is obtained through artisanal enfleurage extraction process, by infusing orange flowers in bitter orange. When blended with radiant green mandarin super essence, it unveils a zesty yet enduring florality.
middle: Hearth notes: Tuberose from India and neroli from Tunisia: Always more luminous, the heart of My Way Floral unveils a radiant white flowers bouquet. Handpicked in the Indian region of Mysore, the iconic tuberose heart absolute is magnified by the delicacy of the rich and suave neroli oil from Tunisia, hence revealing a new blooming floral trail.
base: Base notes: Vanilla from Madagascar and white musks: A sublimated sensual woody base trail revealed through the blend of carnal Vanilla Bourbon Infusion with enveloping white musks. The vanilla is sourced through a sustainable and responsible program designed to support local communities in Madagascar.

title: Giorgio Armani, My Way Edp 90Ml W
description: Discover My Way, the new feminine fragrance by Giorgio Armani. This elegant eau de parfum is for the woman who is ready to broaden her horizons and live meaningful encounters.
top: A sparkling floral fragrance, My Way is made with consciously sourced ingredients. Bergamot from Calabria and Egyptian Orange Blossom blend with a bright floral bouquet of Tuberose and Jasmine. Vibrant Cedarwood meets sensual Vanilla and comforting White Musks to sign the composition.

title: Giorgio Armani, My Way Edp 90Ml W 3Pcs Gift Set
description: MY WAY is a contemporary floral fragrance with a fusion of white flowers at its heart. The fragrance is composed of the finest natural ingredients: Vanilla & Tuberose. In creating the notes, craftsmanship meets innovation, as the Tuberose heart is extracted using molecular distillation, allowing the perfumers to select the creamy, velvety facets tailor-made for MY WAY. The Orange blossom note is extracted using an innovative, exclusive and entirely natural enfleurage process, whose cold extraction method infuses the Orange flowers in Orange essence. The artisanal approach finally translates in the manual weighing and blending of the fragrance’s concentrate in Grasse creates pure, highly-refined notes with enhanced radiance and naturality.
top: GIFT SET CONTENTS
middle: -Eau de Parfum Spray (90ml)-Eau de Parfum Spray (15ml)-Body lotion (50ml)

title: Giorgio Armani, My Way Intense Edp 90Ml W
description: Discover My Way Intense, Armani beauty’s new feminine fragrance. An amplified bright floral bouquet on an addictive woody trail, encapsulating intense experiences and authentic encounters around the world. Live your way, intensely.
top: My Way intense is an invitation to a journey of self-discovery, meaningful encounters and amplified experiences. An amplified florality on an addictive woody trail, made of consciously sourced ingredients. The scent opens with bright notes of orange blossom from Egypt. A new intense heart of tuberose from India unveils a creamy and velvety facet of the floral signature. At the base of the fragrance, the sandalwood from New Caledonia takes an addictive creamy turn, as it meets a voluptuous Vanilla from Madagascar.

title: Giorgio Armani, My Way Nacre Edp 90Ml W
description: A shimmering floral fragrance for women with Orange Blossom, Tuberose, and Vanilla.
top: My Way Nacre Eau De Parfum is an elegant, floral scent for women now in a sparkling, pearly shimmer. This limited edition scent turns the original My Way fragrance’s iconic and vibrant olfactory bouquet into a luminous, pearlescent cloud.
middle: Bergamot meets orange blossom from Egypt in a luminous, sparkling start, with an amplified bright floral bouquet of tuberose and the soft scent of jasmine from India as the beating heart. Finally, the vibrant and warm cedarwood scent from Virginia meets a sensual vanilla aroma from Madagascar and white musks to sign the composition. The blue and gold cap is a metaphor of the world. The blue is the universal color that unites everyone. The golden ring, stamped with the Giorgio Armani signature, is a symbol of a unique path that is illuminated by every encounter along the way. It is a talisman that encapsulates all encounters that matter.
base: TOP NOTEBERGAMOT FROM CALABRIA & ORANGE BLOSSOM FROM EGYPT.

title: Giorgio Armani, My Way Parfum 90Ml W
description: Giorgio Armani My Way Le Parfum is an enchanting fragrance that invites you to expand your horizons and embark on a journey of meaningful encounters around the world. This luminous fragrance captures the essence of a curious and authentic woman who seeks experiences that challenge preconceptions and create lasting connections.
top: The composition opens with a dazzling combination of bergamot and orange blossoms sourced from Egypt. This vibrant blend creates a brilliant luminosity, setting the stage for the captivating journey that lies ahead.
middle: At the heart of the fragrance, a radiant bouquet of tuberose and jasmine from India unfolds, enveloping you in an intoxicating floral embrace. These exquisite white flowers bring a sense of elegance and femininity to the composition, capturing the essence of beauty and grace.
base: In the base, a harmonious blend of premium bourbon vanilla from Madagascar, Virginia cedarwood, and delicate white musks creates a sensual and captivating trail. The vanilla adds a touch of sweetness and warmth, while the cedarwood and musks add depth and sophistication, leaving a lasting impression.

The top notes of blackcurrant and pink pepper, combined with the heart notes of rose and jasmine, create a bold and irresistible aroma that leaves a lasting impression.
