title: Giorgio Armani, Si Passione Intense Edp 100Ml W
description: Discover Sì Passione Intense Eau De Parfum, the floral and woody fragrance for women. With blackcurrant nectar and notes of jasmine, patchouli and vanilla, this lively perfume is designed for the passionate and seductive woman.
top: The feminine fragrance of Sì Passione Intense Eau De Parfum captures the emotions that arise from true passion. The black currant nectar, Si’s iconic signature, meets a decisive floral heart made up of a duo of jasmine: an absolute and powerful energy is created, enhanced by the essence of patchouli and vanilla extract. Hymn to a femininity full of vitality, Sì Passione Eau de Parfum Intense celebrates the contrast between the floral brightness and the intensity of passion.
middle: To use Giorgio Armani’s words, “The intensity does not need to be dark. Intensity is an ongoing movement, a continuous vibration “.

title: Giorgio Armani, Sky Di Gioia Edp 100Ml W
description: Sky di Gioia captures the pink sky of the Mediterranean at dawn, the start of a new day.
top: Sky di Gioia is a blend of fruity, floral notes opening with a petaly Rose that evokes a pink sky at dawn, combined with lychee accord make Sky a sweeter take on the marine Acqua di Gioia, made soft with white musk.

title: Giorgio Armani, Terra Di Gioia Edp 100Ml W
description: Discover Terra Di Gioia, the new Acqua Di Gioia perfume for women by Giorgio Armani. This fruity-floral fragrance with key notes of Almond Blossom, Jasmine, and Ambery Woods create a warm accord that embodies modern femininity with an ode to a joyful mindset.
top: It is a tribute to the warm, sensual and enveloping Mediterranean basin. This evocative fragrance captures the ever-enchanting mood of the Mediterranean lands, where voluptuous dunes mingle with amber rocks bordering on wide seas.
middle: Terra Di Gioia starts with a sparkling and tender pear accord, which fuses with fresh citrus notes. At its heart is fruity and velvety Jasmine grandiflorum from India, crafted exclusively for Armani. At the fragrance’s base are Musks and Ambery Woods, which create a soft and encompassing allure.
base: Top Notes: Almond Blossom Accord, Sparkling, Tender Pear Accord, Fresh Bergamot and Mandarin.

title: Gisada, Ambassadora Edp 100Ml W
description: Eau de Parfum for an intensely long-lasting fragrance experience – the ideal accompaniment from morning to evening, Floral nuances are combined to create a women’s perfume that focuses on the elegance of simplicity.
top: Top Note: mandarin, pink pepper, blueberry, violet leaves
middle: Heart-Note: orange blossom, freesia, jasmine, cashmere wood
base: Base-Note: vetiver, vanilla, sandalwood, musk, powdered sugar

title: Givenchy, Amarige Edt 100Ml W
description: The name of the perfume ‘Amarige’ is an anagram of the French word ‘Mariage.’ That is why this fragrance is as intensive as a strong feeling, merry, juicy and unforgettable as a moment of happy mariage. It is so opulent and floral that it seems like its composition includes all the beautiful flowers that exist in the world.
top: The Amarige woman is graceful, playful and charming, a real French woman in love. She radiates joy and gives a happy smile.
middle: The top notes are composed of fresh fruit: peach, plum, orange, mandarin, with the sweetness of rose wood and neroli. The floral bouquet, very intense and luscious, is created of mimosa, neroli, tuberose, gardenia and acacia with a gourmand hint of black currant. The warm woody base is composed of musk, sandalwood, vanilla, amber, Tonka bean and cedar.

title: Givenchy, Ange Ou Demon Edp 100Ml W
description: Ange ou Démon is an oriental floral fragrance centered around the noble lilly and magnified by the elegance of palissander and oak woods. A sensual and elegant fragrance with a high level of natural ingredients Ange ou démon is packaged in a precious bottle that symbolises luxury and femininity.
top: Top notes of white thyme essence, mandarin from Calabria and saffron essence.
middle: Heart notes of noble lilly, ylang-ylang and orchid maxillaria.
base: Base notes of tonka bean, vanilla, palissander wood and oak wood essence.

title: Givenchy, Ange Ou Demon Le Secret Edp 100Ml W
description: A provocative enigma that lies between shadow and light, where the captivating duality of seduction plays out. Now the mystery is enlightened, the luminous side of seduction is revealed in a fragrance as delicate as dawn. Dazzling.
top: Night surrenders to daybreak with the first beams of pure, pale sunlight.
middle: A fragrance as sensual as skin, full of grace, and elegance.
base: Feminine in the extreme. Ange ou Démon Le Secret Eau de Parfum is composed of “Jasmine Tea” accents, in watercolour-like nuances of pastel.The delicate, light-hearted top note is an exuberant burst of sharp Italian winter Lemon and Cranberry, underpinned by a Green Tea Leaf accord.A scent like a light-filled caress.

title: Givenchy, Dahlia Divin Edp 75Ml W
description: With an overall feel that is smooth and creamy, Dahlia Divin by Givenchy, is a feminine fragrance that is perfect for a night out on the town or for feeling special during a day at the office.
top: The top notes of plum give way quickly to the heart notes of Sambac jasmine and white flowers. This middle floral layer leaves the strongest impression with the woody base layer of sandalwood and vetiver just giving the fragrance enough depth to keep the floral notes from becoming too heady.

title: GIVENCHY, DAHLIA DIVIN NUDE EDP 75ML W
description: Dahlia Divin Nude from Givenchy is a fragrance designed to give a woman a fruity, floral scent that is not overpowering.
top: The fruity top notes include the pleasant combination of apricot and orange blossom to remind the wearer of bright sunny summer days. Supporting these light scents are middle notes of jasmine sambac, osmanthus and rose, which offer a pleasant compliment of floral to the fruity top notes. White musk and white wood make up the bottomnotes and give this soft fragrance a sensual natural-smelling undercurrent.

title: Givenchy, Hot Couture Edp 100Ml W
description: With this intimate fragrance, Givenchy composes an ode to vibrant, sensual, and passionate femininity. Blending sophisticated elegance with daring seductiveness, Hot Couture Eau de Parfum for woman is an elixir of pleasure, to be worn like a second skin.The fragrance opens with the sparkling fruity notes of a Raspberry Accord, melting into Indian Grandiflorum Jasmine Absolute at the perfume’s heart, and all enriched in the base notes by Vetiver Essence from Haiti.
top: Givenchy has reinvented its iconic fragrances, including Hot Couture Eau de Parfum, with a new refined bottle emblematic of the Maison’s style. Reminiscent of Hubert de Givenchy’s taste for purity, it evokes the authentic luxury born of the designer’s talent for Haute Couture.
middle: Les Mythiques—Givenchy’s iconic fragrances in a timeless heritage collection.
base: Floral Fruity Spicy– Head notes: Raspberry Accord– Heart notes: Grandiflorum Jasmine Absolute from India– Base notes: Vetiver Essence from Haiti

title: Givenchy, Irresistible Edp 80Ml W
description: Harvested at first light of day in Isparta Mountains in Turkey, the rose Essential dances with blond wood in harmonious tension. Twinkling with juicy and crisp tones of pear and ambrette, it then pulsates with powdery iris. The blend comes together deliciously with a tactile caress of musk to create an invigorating fruity-woody floral that is boldly uplifting.
top: The transparent and faceted glass of the prismatic bottle enhances the luminous fragrance within. A charming pink ribbon wraps around the collar of this resolutely Couture casing.
middle: Irresistible Givenchy, a fragrance that invites you to let go and be yourself.
base: Top : Pear Accord, Ambrette Absolute Ecuador & Perou

title: Givenchy, Irresistible Edp 80Ml W Gift Set
description: A limited-edition set featuring the floral scent of Irresistible Eau de Parfum, in full- and travel-size sprays and a body lotion.Fragrance story: This floral-woody scent balances notes of luscious rose with radiant blond wood, with ambrette and sparkling pear adding a touch of vibrancy. With a floral heart and a touch of musk at the base, this effervescent scent symbolizes the carefree woman with strong magnetic charm who captivates those around her.
top: Set includes:– Full-size Eau de Parfum 80ml– Hydrating Body Lotion 80ml– Shower gel 80ml
middle: Notes:– Top: sparkling pear, ambrette.– Middle: luscious rose.– Base: blond wood, musk.

title: Givenchy, Irresistible Edt 80Ml W
description: Givenchy Irresistible Eau de Toilette is bursting with fruity florals that meet soft musky woods. This perfume contains juicy notes of blackcurrant and bergamot combined with a light, airy heart of fresh rose. The sweetness of cedar wood softly blends with white musk at the base.
top: Key Notes
middle: Top – blackcurrant, white tearose, irisBase – virginia cedar wood, musk

title: Givenchy, Irresistible Rose Velvet Edp 80Ml W
description: Introducing Givenchy Irresistible Eau de Parfum Rose Velvet for women, the new floral addiction wrapping velvety Rose in delicate White Patchouli. An irresistible skin-to-skin attraction where tenderness is the new bold.
top: The women’s perfume opens with succulent Blackcurrant, enhancing the velvet femininity of Rose, Irresistible’s signature flower. Iris caresses this new rose facet with its powdery texture, blending into sensual White Patchouli and Tender Wood. For a captivatingly voluptuous women’s perfume embodying empowered grace.
middle: The desirable bottle is enveloped in a pink creamy lacquered finish in powder pink, evoking the tenderness of the fragrance within. The soft nude pink of the outer pack is adorned with a rose metal frame for the most elegant finishing touch.Irresistible Givenchy, a women’s perfume that invites you to let go and be yourself.
base: Head notes: Madagascar Pink Pepper Essence Burgundy Blackcurrant Buds Absolute, Tunisia Neroli Essence.

title: GIVENCHY, L’INTERDIT ABSOLU INTENSE EDP 80ML W
description: A fragrance for anyone who dares to express their individuality and surpass their own limits. Beyond desirability, beyond freedom, beyond the forbidden.
top: L’Interdit Absolu Eau de Parfum Intense reveals a floral woody ambery composition, a striking reinterpretation of an iconic scent. In this new signature, the white flower bouquet of L’Interdit Eau de Parfum is beautifully intertwined with Tobacco absolute to reveal a smoky and warm fragrance trail that captivates the senses.
middle: Similarly to all Givenchy fragrances, the NEW L’Interdit Absolu unveils a contrasted facet: the florality of Orange Blossom, rich Tuberose and pure Jasmine Absolute gives way to woody notes of vetiver and patchouli, bringing depth and elegance to the fragrance.
base: An invigorating aroma of lavender combines with the captivating essence of cardamom and unique touch of Neroli Essential, magnified by a smoky Tobacco absolute. A warm and woody signature, crafting an unforgettable fragrance experience that leaves a lasting impression.

title: Givenchy, L’Interdit Edition Couture Edp 50Ml W
description: The original eau de parfum sublime in a collector bottle dressed up in lace. An exclusive couture interpretation in tribute to the Maison’s creations.
top: OLFACTORY NOTES
middle: Floral Woody▪ Head: Bergamot, Pear▪ Heart: Orange Blossom, Jasmine, Tuberose▪ Base: Patchouli, Vetiver, Vanilla, Ambroxan

title: Givenchy, L’Interdit Edp 80Ml W
description: A white flower crossed by a dark woody accord.
top: L’Interdit Eau de Parfum for women — a fearless fragrance imbued with the frisson of freedom. Transgress your limits with audacity and feel empowered on the journey to self-discovery.
middle: With its forbidden blend of white flowers and a dark accord, L’Interdit Eau de Parfum is a resolutely underground flower. It unveils a sensual bouquet of orange blossom, jasmine, and tuberose. In contrast, earthy dark tones emanate from vetiver and patchouli to create a daringly addictive and sensual fragrance.
base: In homage to the design of Hubert de Givenchy’s first perfume, the bottle is truly timeless and terribly modern. With a round squareness and a soft strength, it dares you to break the rules with abandon.Experience the thrill of the forbidden with L’Interdit, a fragrance that invites you to defy convention and embrace your singularity.

title: Givenchy, L’Interdit Edp 80Ml W Gift Set
description: This fragrance set for women features an 80 ml bottle of the fragrance along with a 75 ml bath and shower oil and a 75 ml body lotion.
top: It’s a feminine vital fragrance from the floral family with a rich composition featuring notes of vetiver and patchouli with orange blossom, wrapped with soft jasmine and tuberose.
middle: The scents are carefully blended so you can enjoy an amazing night and happy moments.
base: The fragrance comes in a feminine collection with shower oil and a small body lotion with the same scent.

title: GIVENCHY, L’INTERDIT EDT 80ML W
description: Givenchy presents the next chapter on the path to L’Interdit. An impulsive breath that takes you to the edge of forbidden. Duality incarnated. Darkness meeting light. Colliding contrasts erupt in a burst of fearless femininity, for a scent that’s dressed to thrill. L’Interdit Eau de Toilette, the thrill of the forbidden.
top: White imbued with light. The shattering alliance of Orange Blossom & Tuberose is disrupted by an exciting floral paradox. A voluptuous white flower exposing a dark, hypnotic heart. The shock appeal of iridescent white provoked by deep woody undertones of Vetiver and Patchouli.
middle: Radiant, exalted. The underground flower emerges into light.

title: Givenchy, L’Interdit Intense Edp 80Ml W
description: Givenchy takes you deeper into the forbidden with L’Interdit Eau de Parfum Intense. A surrender to cravings obscured. Channel your inner thrill and fuel your deepest impulses. Leap into the unleashed, as the Underground Flower fades to black. Enthrallingly suave. Impulsively raw.
top: Radiant Orange Blossom, obscured with an overdose of Tuberose, clashes with the blackest, most voluptuous leathered-Vanilla and a dash of salty, roasted Sesame. A heady blend of Vetiver on Patchouli infuses notes of deep, dark wood for a refined hint of couture that lingers. Inebriating, Oriental opulence exalts in abandoned addiction. Radically subtle. Radically intense.
middle: Indulge the thrill of the forbidden.
base: Top Notes – Orange Blossom, Tuberose.

title: GIVENCHY, L’INTERDIT ROUGE EDP 80ML W
description: Givenchy introduces L’Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge by Givenchy, a spicy next chapter of the iconic forbidden fragrance.
top: Tuberose and jasmine are ignited with a fiery-red accord of pimento leaf, blood orange, and ginger, leaving the fragrance with a floral, spicy trail. Embrace the thrill with L’Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge, the sensual, incandescent perfume for women that unveils a white floral bouquet tinted in red.
middle: Key Notes: Sandalwood, Orange Blossom, and Tuberose.

title: GIVENCHY, L’INTERDIT ROUGE EDP 80ML W GIFT SET
description: Embrace the festive spirit of a winter escape at high altitude. This holiday season, give the gift of burning sensuality with a Givenchy fragrance gift set including L’Interdit Rouge Eau de Parfum, a hydrating body lotion, and Le Rouge Deep Velvet lipstick #37.
top: A carnal flower is inflamed with a spicy red accord, to create a provocative yet seductive fragrance. The sensual, incandescent perfume that unveils a white floral bouquet tinted in red.
middle: Set Includes:L’Interdit Rouge Eau de Parfum Spray, 80 ml
base: L’Interdit Body Lotion, 75 ml

title: GIVENCHY, L’INTERDIT ROUGE ULTIME EDP 80ML W
Givenchy, Organza Edp 100Ml W
description: Quintessence of timeless beauty, Organza by Givenchy is the perfect blend of refinement and sensuousness. Composed of white flowers enhanced with vanilla, this voluptuous fragrance reveals women’s sensuality with elegance
top: Head: Jasmine.Heart: Gardenia.Base: Vanilla

title: Givenchy, Very Irresistible Edp 75Ml W
description: Rose essence with star anise and elegant round, soft patchouli. French, sensual elegance with a deep, daring glamorous twist. Very Irrésistible, French style and elegance meets America spontaneity.
top: Surprising, stunning and spontaneous. At its heart, a deeply feminine floral. A unique mix of five roses and the star anise signature amplified in the eau de parfum with sensual, vanilla and patchouli. The art of elegance that makes the best of life inevitable.
middle: Very Irrésistible, French style and elegance meets America spontaneity.
base: Head: Star AniseHeart: Bouquet of RosesBase: Patchouli – Vanilla

title: GIVENCHY, VERY IRRESISTIBLE EDP 75ML W
Givenchy, Very Irresistible Edt 75Ml W
description: Inspired by the relationship between Hubert de Givenchy and his first muse, Audrey Hepburn, Very Irrésistible Givenchy blends the epitome of the French style and elegance with classic, Hollywood glamour. Feminine rose blossoms infused with the tangy edge of star anise and verbena leaf make this iconic scent a spirited alternative to the traditional floral fragrance.Surprising like rose blossoms with a fresh, tangy edge of star anise.
top: Rose Pivoine, Rose Centifolia, Rose Fantasia, Rose Passion, Rose Emotion.

title: Gritti, Duchessa Extrait De Parfum 100Ml W
description: A shadow: something is there. She determines fate as she walks along the spice road. As she passes, there’s magic in the air, as warm as the hues of fruits that announce her coming. Her cloak weaves gold and velvets, and she has a delicate yet steadfast stride. Amused, she turns to look at the effect it has. Aristocratic weakness.
top: Ripe black cherries enveloped by fresh marzipan and fine bitterness of red orange’s zest. The heart is a delight: a creamy mix of white flowers and powdery cocoa notes; Duchessa’s sillage is warm, balsamic, and intoxicating. Sweet as liquor. A “narcotic” one: cherries and sugar, the real obsession. The smell of a Gritti Woman, bold and decisive.
middle: OLFACTORY PYRAMIDHEADBlack cherry, bitter orange, saffron flowerHEARTJasmine, Cloves, CocoaBASEIris, Almond, Brown sugar

title: Gritti, Tutu Extrait De Parfum 100Ml W
description: Tutù, a tribute to feminine sensuality and to the dance as an expressive meaning of a never-ending freedom. White collection is the story of a seductive female meeting made of emotions and women’s secrets, a sacred legitimation of intimacy.
top: By perpetuating the sublime expressiveness of this sweet inspiration, a pink parenthesis is added to the story dreamed by Gritti Venetia, which features a ballet dancer: female emblem of the one who embraces the essence of being a woman, together with her wonderful destiny.
middle: Tutù is a symbol of a new way of life towards the awareness of sensuality, which doesn’t provides a future lived “on tiptoe”, as the common imaginary of dancing would suggest, but it is the presence of a momentum towards tomorrow, represented by the freedom of a naked foot. The mise en scène told by Tutù enhances the characteristics of a woman who looks for changing. Her perfume is able to bring out what resides in depth, up to join the expression of the self and the essence. Her evolution is an endless dance.
base: Oriental Fruity Floral

title: Gucci Guilty, Absolute Pour Femme Edp 90Ml W
description: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme is created using a particular blend with a structure that remains unchanged from the first time it is applied to the skin.
top: Goldenwood is complemented with a mysterious note of blackberry, creating a non-traditional chypre fruity fragrance for a contemporary woman. The fragrance’s composition is intensified with patchouli oils and Bulgarian rose.
middle: Top Notes: Blackberry, Cypress, Pink Pepper.
base: Heart Notes: Bulgarian Rose, Cypress, Woody Notes, Vetiver.

title: GUCCI GUILTY, ELIXIR EDP 60ML W
description: Gucci Guilty Elixir de Parfum Pour Femme is a powerful invitation to love and self-acceptance. The fragrance has an ambery floral scent that pulses with refreshing energy and charm, enhancing the signature notes of Gucci Guilty. The bouquet is presented in a brightly colored flacon, created to mirror its man’s counterpart in their sleek symmetry.
top: Key ingredients: Wisteria Accord, Vanilla Absolute, Tonka Beans
middle: A sophisticated Wisteria Accord and fruity Mandora merge seamlessly with the alluring Vanilla Absolute and Tonka Beans. Rose and Violet Accord elevate the scent, infusing its elegant sensuality with a radiant luminosity.

title: Gucci Guilty, Intense Edp 75Ml W
description: A floral oriental fragrance for contemporary women. Warm, classy, spicy, strong & inebriating.
top: Perfect for all occasions.
middle: Top notes of mandarin & pink pepper.
base: Heart notes of lilac, violet & heliotrope.

title: Gucci Guilty, Pour Femme Edp 90Ml W
description: The Gucci Guilty collection enters a new chapter, reintroducing the original Pour Femme scent as a rich eau de parfum, combining superior floral notes and enhanced natural fragrances. Individual, yet fusing together naturally, the men’s and women’s perfumes embody a declaration of self-expression and fearlessness, conjured up by the statement #ForeverGuilty.
top: Top notes of Mandora—a fruit found in the Mediterranean island of Cyprus—smoothed out by natural Bergamot and Pink Pepper.
middle: Heart notes of Lilac, contrasted with rosy and violet notes, and layered with Geranium Oil, resulting in a nuanced blend.
base: Base notes of Patchouli, combined with Ambery notes for an enduring sillage.

title: GUCCI GUILTY, POUR FEMME EDP 90ML W GIFT SET
Gucci, Bamboo Edp 75Ml W
description: The FragranceBamboo, strong yet graceful, one of Gucci’s most recognizable design signatures, has defined references in today’s multi-faceted woman, soft and intense at once.
top: The modern Gucci woman shares bamboo’s characteristics of strength and confidence with her innate femininity and poise. She is feminine and sensual yet strong and commanding. Emanating her femininity, her confidence and her natural strength, the fragrance represents the essence of her character.
middle: Mirroring the Gucci Woman’s confident persona, the perfume for women is soft and intense at once. The duality is expressed with strong notes that resonate through the heart and base. Deep Sandalwood, heady Tahitian Vanilla and unique grey Amber accords strike a complementary contrast with the inherent femininity found in exotic floral notes of sensual Casablanca Lily, feminine Orange Blossom and delicate Ylang Ylang.
base: Fragrance notes

title: Gucci, Bloom Ambrosia Di Fiori Edp 100Ml W
description: Gucci, Bloom Ambrosia Di Fiori Edp 100Ml W

title: GUCCI, BLOOM EDP 100ML W
description: Debuting the first fragrance developed wholly under Alessandro Michele’s creative vision: a scent designed to celebrate the authenticity, vitality and diversity of women—flourishing in a natural, expressive and individual way. Blended by master perfumer Alberto Morillas under the direction of the House’s Creative Director, Gucci Bloom is created to unfold like its name, capturing the rich scent of a thriving garden filled with an abundance of flowers. Tuberose and jasmine combine with Rangoon Creeper—a unique flower discovered in South India that is being used for the first time in perfumery to create a rich fragrance that transports the wearer to an imaginary garden. The scent is presented in a lacquered bottle, reminiscent of porcelain, in a vintage powder pink shade with a Gucci label appliqué.
top: In Bloom
middle: • Natural tuberose harvested from India
base: • Jasmine bud extract, obtained through an exclusive method of co-extraction to impart a fresh green and petal scent on the skin

title: Gucci, Bloom Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: Debuting the first fragrance developed wholly under Alessandro Michele’s creative vision: a scent designed to celebrate the authenticity, vitality and diversity of women—flourishing in a natural, expressive and individual way. Here, the scent is presented as a three-piece gift set including an Eau de Parfum, body lotion and rollerball.
top: Natural Tuberose and Jasmine bud extract are combined with the powers of the Rangoon Creeper—a flower discovered in South India that is being used for the first time in perfumery to create a fragrance that transports the wearer to an imaginary garden.
middle: Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum: 100mlGucci Bloom Body lotion: 100mlGucci Bloom Eau de Parfum Rollerball: 7.4ml
base: The items are presented in lacquered bottles, reminiscent of porcelain, in a vintage powder pink shade with a Gucci label appliqué.

title: Gucci, Bloom Edp Intense 100Ml W
description: Inspired by the magnetic forces of moonlight, Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum Intense is a potent fragrance that channels the creative spirit and encourages all to bloom into their most authentic selves. A radiant top note of Orange Blossom Absolute opens the incantation while its floral heart of Jasmine Sambac and Tuberose unfurls with Lady of the Night–a night-blooming flower that heightens the heady bouquet. Grounded in a base of Patchouli Essence and Crystal Moss Accord, its essence invokes deep perception and echoes with a sensuous sillage.
top: Top notes of Pear, Ginger Essence, Mandarin
middle: Heart notes of Sambac Jasmine Absolute, Orange Blossom Absolute, Lady of the Night​
base: Base notes of Patchouli Essence, Coconut, Crystal Moss​

title: Gucci, Flora Edp 75Ml W
description: Gucci Flora edp is a fresh, optimistic perfume for the classic young woman. Its light, feminine scent pairs beautifully with a warm day or a balmy evening.
top: Peony and notes of citrus open the scent, both sugary and sparkling.
middle: Rose and osmanthus form the romantic middle notes. Rich and velvety, with an undertone of spicy clove, they elicit a youthful enthusiasm for life. The base notes are sandalwood and patchouli, finishing the perfume with a smooth, cozy warmth. Glamourous and elegant, this perfume enchants all those lucky enough to experience its lovely aroma.

title: Gucci, Flora Emerald Gardenia Edt 50Ml W
description: This limited edition scent is from the Flora collection. Delicate, transparent in a green floral composition, the scent is full with fruity and floral notes layered on a soft woody base. Presented in a green painted bottle, the fragrance is delivered in limited edition packaging highlighting flora and fauna from the botanical Flora print, designed by artist Vittorio Accornero in the 1960s.
top: Top Notes: Lemon, Pear and Watermelon.
middle: Heart Notes: Gardenia, Lotus and Frangipani.
base: Base Notes: Sandalwood, Cedarwood and Musks.

title: Gucci, Flora Gorgeous Gardenia Edp 100Ml W
description: Encased within a new, elongated bottle, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia relaunches with a new Eau de Parfum. With a scent built around the Gardenia flower, the joyful floral signature has been admired since the dawn of time and said to be used in elixirs and magic potions. Taking cues from its believed mystical power, the gorgeous White Gardenia note is blended with solar Jasmine Grandiflorum Absolute. The modern floral signature is introduced by a lively Pear Blossom accord, while a touch of Brown Sugar accord adds a delicate sweetness to its sillage.
top: Top notes of Blossom Accord, Italian Mandarin and Red Berries.
middle: Heart notes of White Gardenia, Jasmine Absolute and Frangipani Flower.
base: Base notes of Patchouli and Brown Sugar Accord.

title: Gucci, Flora Gorgeous Gardenia Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: An intensely feminine perfume fragrance combining the lightness of the gardenia’s first blossom and the richness of its flower in full bloom, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia characterizes those women who are authentic and curiously compelling.
top: Opening with a sparkling prelude of Red Berries, the Gucci scent gives way to an opulent floral heart enhanced by the creamy warmth of Frangipani Flower and underlaid by a delectable aroma of Patchouli and Brown Sugar.
middle: This enchanting Gucci Flora Gift Set is a special gift idea for women.
base: GIFT SET INCLUDES:

title: GUCCI, FLORA GORGEOUS JASMINE EDP 100ML W
description: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine Eau de Parfum bursts with a radiant composition led by Grandiflorum Jasmine. Tender wreaths of noble Jasmine are transformed through extraction into the heart and spirit of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine, resulting in an enlightened expression of this precious flower. Blended with base notes of Sandalwood and Benzoin, its sensual notes create a skin imprint unique to the wearer. Its energy of inner joy is further lifted with notes of Mandarine Essence and Magnolia Accord, which infuse the scent with a joyful feeling. Reimagined in Alessandro Michele’s vision, the House’s distinctive Flora pattern seals the design with a magical touch, fortifying Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine as an object of inspiration.
top: Top notes of Mandarin Italy Essence, Bergamot Italy Essence, Black Pepper Essence.
middle: Heart notes of Jasmine Grandiflorum Absolute, Magnolia Accord, Jasmine Sambac Absolute, Rose Damascena Essence.
base: Base notes of Sandalwood Australia Essence, Benzoin Extract, Patchouli Indonesia Essence.

title: Gucci, Flora Gorgeous Jasmine Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine Eau de Parfum bursts with a radiant composition led by Grandiflorum Jasmine. Tender wreaths of noble Jasmine are transformed through extraction into the heart and spirit of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine, resulting in an enlightened expression of this precious flower. Blended with base notes of Sandalwood and Benzoin, its sensual notes create a skin imprint unique to the wearer. Its energy of inner joy is further lifted with notes of Mandarine Essence and Magnolia Accord, which infuse the scent with a joyful feeling.
top: Top notes of Mandarin Italy Essence, Bergamot Italy Essence, Black Pepper Essence
middle: Heart notes of Jasmine Grandiflorum Absolute, Magnolia Accord, Jasmine Sambac Absolute, Rose Damascena Essence
base: Base notes of Sandalwood Australia Essence, Benzoin Extract, Patchouli Indonesia Essence

title: Gucci, Flora Gorgeous Magnolia Edp 100Ml W
description: Flora Gorgeous Magnolia brings out inner strength, highlighting the radiant and powerful Magnolia. To enhance the sweetness of the Magnolia Essence, a Dewberries Accord is added for a fruity, juicy dimension. Patchouli Essence is then used to ground the scent by striking a balance between freshness and sensuality. The sillage also features Blond Woods which provides a gentle, sensual touch. At the same time, Coconut Accord delivers freshness that is both smooth and addictive—finally, the Jasmine Sambac Absolute lands green intensity and warmth that comes together with trails of Musk.
top: Top notes: Dewberries accord, Sweet Orange essence, Coconut accord
middle: Heart notes Magnolia essence, Jasmine Sambac absolute, Lily of the Valley, Ylang ylang essence.
base: Base notes: Patchouli essence, Musks, Blond woods

title: GUCCI, FLORA GORGEOUS ORCHID EDP 100ML W
description: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid is the first ozonic floral gourmand fragrance of the House, with an innovative approach that infuse this gourmand scent with a fresh perspective on vanilla. The creation weaves together the familiar sweetness of Vanilla with notes imparted through the Ozonic Accord. This unconventional fusion further highlights the luminous sensuality of Vanilla Orchid, elevating its gourmand richness to new heights. Thanks to its unique blend of notes, the creamy floral dimension that emerges from the fragrance is infused with airy brightness.
top: Top notes: Vanilla Duo
middle: Heart notes: Vanilla Orchid
base: Base notes: Ozonic accord

title: Gucci, Rush Edt 75Ml W
description: Gucci Rush, get the thrill from an exotic oriental blend of Jasmine and rose. The red cassette tape bottle design is very unusual but modern.
top: Top Notes: freesia, Peach, Gardenia,Heart Notes: Coriander, Rose, JasmineBase Notes: Vanilla, Patchouli

title: GUERLAIN, AQUA ALLEGORIA FORTE NEROLIA VETIVER EDT 125ML W
description: An intense neroli, enveloped in a smooth fig accord, warm vetiver and almond notes from the Tonka bean transport you to a sensory escape. This fragrance is refillable and made with sustainable beet root alcohol. The French beetroot alcohol used in the formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming without compromising the scent’s integrity.
top: Aqua Allegoria Forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: celebrating the beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a sunset.

title: Guerlain, Aqua Allegoria Mandarin Basilic Edt 75Ml W
description: Sparkling and luminous, this fragrance unfolds with notes of juicy, tangy mandarin orange pulp, aromatic basil, and energizing green tea on a bed of woody notes.
top: Key Notes: Mandarin, Basil, Green Tea

title: GUERLAIN, AQUA ALLEGORIA ROSA ROSSA EDT 125ML W
description: Part of the Aqua Allegoria collection, which celebrates the wonders of the world, the Aqua Allegoria Pera Granita fragrance is described as a dancing rose by the brand.
top: According to the brand’s Master Perfumer, Thierry Wasser, the Aqua Allegoria Rosa Rossa is “a dancing rose”. Combining its blooming namesake with a heart of fruity raspberry, blackcurrant and lychee accents, it’s finished with a creamy, powdery and musky bed of sandalwood.

title: Guerlain, Idylle Edp 100Ml W
description: Guerlain Idylle Eau De Parfum is light and airy, a tender, transient love affair – an impulse, an ecstasy, a hope of love in a time without hope. It is not passion, but an outpouring of the heart. Idylle is the fleeting and feminine eternity of the moment. Opening fruity notes of lychee and raspberry lead to a floral bouquet and a sensual woody base.
top: Top Notes: Lychee, Raspberry
middle: Heart Notes: Rose, Freesia, Jasmine, Lilac, Lily of the Valley, Peony
base: Base Notes: Patchouli, Musk

title: Guerlain, Insolence Edp 100Ml W
description: Insolence Perfume by Guerlain, is a bold, energetic scent designed to surprise and electrify with its youthful joie de vivre.
top: It opens with sweet top notes of violet and raspberry. At its heart is a tangy trio of orange blossom, rose, and more violet. Finally, the fragrance’s foundation combines balsam, raisin, iris, and tonka bean.

title: Guerlain, Insolence Edp 75Ml W
description: Insolence Perfume by Guerlain, is a bold, energetic scent designed to surprise and electrify with its youthful joie de vivre.
top: It opens with sweet top notes of violet and raspberry. At its heart is a tangy trio of orange blossom, rose, and more violet. Finally, the fragrance’s foundation combines balsam, raisin, iris, and tonka bean.

title: Guerlain, Jicky Edp 75Ml W
description: Jicky is part of Guerlain’s Patrimoine Collection. A collection made of emblematic fragrances, composed more than a century by 5 generations of Perfumers. These mythical pioneer perfumes compose a unique olfactive library, that the Maison Guerlain endeavors to preserve.
top: Jicky is a magical fragrance that blends sparkling top notes with warm and delicate base notes. At the time of its creation, women may have found Jicky puzzling, but men adopted it immediately. Today, this fresh and vigorous fragrance is the delight of women and men alike.
middle: Oriental Fougère. Contrasting, dynamic, surprising. The spicy notes that blossom with the warmth of the oriental facet also play skillfully with the fresh and aromatic notes of lemon and lavender at its heart. Underneath this audacious structure, one detects woody and vanilla notes for greater vibration and character.

title: GUERLAIN, L’INSTANT DE GUERLAIN EDP 100ML W
description: Life is full of wondrous moments, fleeting seconds of emotion that sear themselves into the memory to warm for years to come. Now, at long last, Guerlain pays tribute to these long unsung climaxes. L’Instant de Guerlain Pour Homme celebrates the moment a man takes the initiative, seizes his moment and changes everything.
top: This luminous woody fragrance was composed by Sylvaine Delacourte and Béatrice Piquet. It opens with fresh notes of jasmine, citrus and star anise, leading to notes of hibiscus, patchouli, sandalwood, lapsang tea and bitter cacao bean.

title: Guerlain, L’Instant De Guerlain Edp 75Ml W
description: L’Instant de Guerlain Eau de Parfum by Guerlain is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. L’Instant de Guerlain Eau de Parfum was launched in 2021. Top notes are Orange Honey, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Magnolia and Jasmine; base notes are Amber and Sandalwood.

title: GUERLAIN, LA PETIT ROBE NOIR EDP 100ML W
description: Chic and effortlessly glamorous, La Petit Robe Noire is a fragrance for women who exude confidence. It enhances your personal style and infuses your every movement with an air of sophistication.
top: Wear this lovely scent as your personal signature, or save it for occasions when you want to feel empowered and indulgent.
middle: This opulent scent features top notes of lemon, followed by luxurious notes of almond, anise and macaroons. Rich licorice notes complete the experience.

title: Guerlain, La Petit Robe Noir Edp 50Ml W Gift Set
description: A scented creation signed Guerlain: An Eau de parfum embroidered with the most beautiful “black” notes of perfumery: Black cherry, Black Rose, Patchouli, Black tea.The mythical “inverted heart” bottle is revisited with audacity and modernity. In its crystalline transparency, gradated from black to powder pink, an iconic little black dress is revealed.

title: GUERLAIN, LA PETIT ROBE NOIR INTENSE EDP 100ML W
description: The La Petite Robe Noire Intense edition is announced as a sweeter composition than its predecessors. The fragrance comes in a deep blue bottle of the distinctive La Petite Robe Noir design, with the drawing of a little black dress in Marilyn Monroe style.
top: Notes of cotton candy mix with fresh bergamot and the fruity character of blueberries in the top of the composition. Bulgarian rose is still present in the heart of the perfume, laid on the base of patchouli, white musk, sandalwood and vanilla.

title: Guerlain, Mon Guerlain Bloom Of Rose Edp 100Ml W
description: Mon Guerlain Bloom of Rose Eau de Parfum illustrates the essence of passion.A DARING RED ROSEWithin this floral and fruity version of the fragrance, the rose expresses itself via each and every one of its facets. As the queen of flowers and the jewel in the Guerlinade fragrance crown, its essence and absolute make it doubly powerful. While Sambac jasmine and lavender are still part of the composition, the bright orange flower that appeared in the Bloom of Rose Eau de Toilette has been toned down to showcase rose. Here, the iconic flower takes centre stage thanks to generous quantities and daring doses of Bulgarian rose and Turkish prose absolute. Meanwhile, cheerful hints of deliciously fruity pear bring a hint of playfulness, while vanilla lends a warmth which is boosted by captivating and passionate woody patchouli and sandalwood accents.

title: Guerlain, Mon Guerlain Bloom Of Rose Edt 100Ml W
description: Mon Guerlain is a tribute to today’s femininity. A strong, free and sensual femininity, inspired by Angelina Jolie.
top: With the Eau de Toilette Bloom of Rose, Mon Guerlain continues to explore the different facets of femininity, fulfillment and invites women to live each moment to the fullest. A composition that celebrates the joy of individuality and being yourself.
middle: This floral Eau de Toilette is created like a bouquet: the signature floral notes of Mon Guerlain – Sambac jasmine and Carla lavender – are combined with neroli and rose to form a radiant and lively fragrance.FRAGRANCE
base: Floral.Radiant. Lively. Delicate.

title: GUERLAIN, MON GUERLAIN EDP 100ML W
description: This fresh oriental fragrance is produced with exceptional raw materials such as lavender, jasmine, sandalwood, and vanilla. Mon Guerlain is a tribute to the modern woman and inspired by Angelina Jolie.
top: The perfumed lotion has a fluid, velvety texture that infuses skin with comforting moisture, leaving it to appear soft and supple, while subtly scented. The shower gel turns into a luscious foam in contact with water, leaving the skin to appear toned, soft, and also subtly scented. Layered alongside the perfume they create an even longer-lasting scent.
middle: The Quadrilobe bottle is crafted with strong lines and curves, expressing contemporary femininity. The Mon Guerlain EDP is attributed to its gold adornment. Packaged in a gold and white gift box adorned with a bee that symbolizes Guerlain’s heritage, inspiring its designs, and driving its commitment to protecting bees and sustainable development.
base: Top Notes: Bergamot, Mandarin, Pear

title: Guerlain, Mon Guerlain Edp 100Ml W Gift Set

title: Guerlain, Mon Guerlain Edp Intense 100Ml W
description: With the Eau de Parfum Intense, Mon Guerlain continues to explore the many facets of femininity and invites women to affirm their differences and individuality. A true invitation to explore and reveal their personality.So noble and so dear to the House, vanilla is given more prominence in this Eau de Parfum Intense, offering an addictive intensity to the overall fragrance and heightening its sensuality.Your Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense fragrance is shown off to perfection in its “quadrilobé” bottle: created in 1908, the bottle established itself as one of Guerlain’s iconic bottles. Simple and graphic, it echoes an alchemist’s bottle and owes its name to its stopper, which is crafted from one piece to obtain a shape resembling four lobes. A century later, beautifully enhanced by a luxurious glass weight and a deep copper gold, this bottle offers a contrast between strong taut lines and sensual curves, expressing contemporary femininity.
top: Top notes – Bergamot, Mandarine, Lavender.
middle: Heart notes – Sambac Jasmine, Vanilla tincture, Tahitensis vanilla.
base: Base notes – White Muscs, Patchouli, Sandalwood.

title: Guerlain, Mon Guerlain Florale Edp 100Ml W
description: Surround yourself with a scent that celebrates femininity. Guerlain Mon Guerlain Florale Eau de Parfum is full of floral freshness with a drop of oriental sensuality and perfectly embodies the essence of a modern woman. It will inspire your desire to reveal her true, utterly impressive nature. It’s no surprise that Angelina Jolie’s advertising face. Throughout these years, with its many organizations and charities, she has earned respect. It shows that behind every fragile and vulnerable woman there is power and energy. This is the message of the perfume.
top: About the fragrance: From the first moment, you’ll be captivated by the intense oriental notes of Arabian jasmine, freshened up by lavender from the South of France. They’re followed by a bouquet of delicate peonies grown in the sunshine. Their warmth is later enhanced by a vanilla note which comes forth especially in the final drydown, its sweetness and sensuality perfectly complementing this strong and unique composition.

title: Guerlain, Mon Sparkling Bouquet Edp 100Ml W

It will be a significant piece of your perfume collection.

title: GUERLAIN, NAHEMA EDP 75ML W
description: Nahema is part of Guerlain’s Legendary Fragrances collection. A collection made up of emblematic fragrances, composed for over a century by 5 generations of Perfumers. Mythical perfumes, deeply innovative for their time, which compose a unique olfactory library, an incomparable and unequalled treasure, that the House of Guerlain strives to keep alive.
top: Inspired by an intoxicatingly charming oriental rose, Nahema is a truly enigmatic elixir. Its main olfactory note gradually transforms into a haunting presence. A rich and sumptuous fragrance, it took its creator four years of work.
middle: Designed by George Chevalier, its mythical \”inverted heart\” bottle is highlighted by graceful Art Nouveau volutes. A true technical feat, its avant-garde cap in the shape of a hollowed-out heart evokes the delicate romanticism of this monument to perfumery.
base: OLFACTIF FAMILY :

description: Rose Barbare by Guerlain is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. Rose Barbare was launched in 2005. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian.

middle: Middle notes: Rose and Fenugreek;
base: Base notes: Honey, Patchouli and Woody Notes.

title: GUERLAIN, SAMSARA EDP 75ML W
description: Deemed as a pioneering fragrance for the Maison and part of the Legendary collection, Guerlain’s Samsara scent is an elixir of seduction that remains as alluring today as it was in 1853. Designed by Pierre-François-Pascal Guerlain for the Empress Eugénie, wife of Napoléon III, this classic fragrance conveys its allure by fusing sensual base notes of sandalwood with rich jasmine and ylang ylang flower.
top: Top note is Citruses;
middle: Middle notes are Ylang-Ylang and Jasmine;
base: Base notes are Sandalwood, Iris, Vanilla and Tonka Bean.

title: Guerlain, Shalimar Edp 90Ml W
description: Shalimar is the first oriental perfume in history.
top: L’Eau de Parfum Shalimar is a mythic fragrance with bergamot, iris and vanilla notes ; an intense wake with a touch of impertinence, always glowing which embodies skin-caressing sensuality with a hint of the forbidden.
middle: Inspired by the passionate love story between an emperor and an Indian princess, Shalimar, which means “temple of love” in Sanskrit, symbolises the promise of eternal love forevermore. It is a fragrance of desire.
base: In 1925, the Shalimar bottle designed by Raymond Guerlain won first prize at the Paris Decorative Arts Exhibition. Its curves were inspired by the basins of the famous Shalimar gardens. The fan stopper with its sapphire transparency recalls the garden’s eternally gushing water.

title: GUERLAIN, SHALIMAR SOUFFLE DE PARFUM EDP 90ML W
description: Shalimar Souffle de Parfum is like a perfumed caress.A light and enchanting Eau de Parfum with citrus fruits, jasmine, white musks and vanilla notes, revisiting the mythic Shalimar in a modern way.
top: Once upon a time, four centuries ago, in India, there was a love that knew no bounds. For his beloved wife, the princess Mumtaz Mahal, the emperor Shah Jahan ordered the creation of the most luxurious gardens of Shalimar as a setting for their love. Later, he erected the Taj Mahal, a marvel admired by the entire world. This fabulous story inspired Jacques Guerlain to create an exquisitely seductive scent, the world’s very first ambery fragrance: Shalimar.

title: Guerlain, Terracotta Le Parfum Edt 100Ml W
description: As a 30th anniversary tribute to Terracotta, and for the very first time, Guerlain’s in-house perfumer Thierry Wasser interprets the legendary powder as a fragrance – a sun-soaked invitation to explore faraway lands. An irresistibly sensual composition, exotic and luminous, inspired by the radiant realm of Terracotta.
top: Top Note: Bergamot, Coconut Milk Accord
middle: Heart Note: Ylang Ylang, Fasmine, Tiare Flower Accord, Orange Blossom
base: Base Note: Woody Notes, Vanilla, White Musks, Benzoin

description: Barénia is a sensual fragrance of rare, unforgettable elegance. Barenia is a skin perfume, bringing together strength and softness. It expresses the instinctive, captivating facets of a woman. An unstoppable woman. The living embodiment of freedom.

Eau D’Orange Verte Hermes for women and men was devised as a burst of citrus touches, with orange to the fore, amidst zests and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant buds. Its complexity is revealed in a unique vapour composed of oakmoss and patchouli.

Conceived as an explosion of citrus notes, orange plays the principal role supported by zest and leaves, lemon, mandarin, mint and blackcurrant bud. The fragrance reveals its complexity in a unique sillage composed of oak moss and patchouli.

Graceful rose and violet notes entwine to create a natural, delicate sweetness that pairs perfectly with hints of mimosa. Accents of vanilla add complexity and depth, creating harmony with distinctive leather notes that evoke a sense of timelessness and refinement.

Three new materials make up its sensuality: the vibrant and abundant heat of pink peppercorn, the teenage freshness of tender rose and the captivating enchantment of patchouli. Their essences intertwine, weaving the invisible web that connects the Hermès girls to each other.

Inspired by an ephemeral adventure, this rich and sumptuous scent represents the universal demand to live life and recreate all of its unforgettable moments.  Notes - Top Notes: Saffron, Raspberry - Heart Notes: Caramel, Amyris Oil - Base Notes: Oud, Liatrix Absolute

title: Hugo Boss, Mavie Edp 75Ml W
description: Hugo Boss Ma Vie Pour Femme was inspired by the independent spirit of a woman as she pauses to indulge in the simple moments in life; a walk home at dawn, the sun on her skin, the touch of a flower. It is in these moments, when truly treasuring life, that the Boss Ma Vie Pour Femme woman is her most captivating, exuding a glow of femininity and confidence.”

middle: Modernity is featured in top notes of cactus flower and its green freshness.Femininity is depicted with the heart of pink freesia, jasmine and delicate rose buds.The base of warm woods and cedar embodies confidence.

title: Hugo Boss, The Scent For Her Edp 100Ml W

top: BOSS The Scent for Her is the realisation of BOSS Women – powerful and at the same time uniquely feminine. Mirroring the the story of seduction from attraction to seduction to addiction, BOSS The Scent for Her features an irresistibly potent combination of ingredients. Attraction: Honeyed peach and freesia top notes meet in an exquisite, head-turning combination, making him want to discover more.
middle: As they get closer, warm and sophisticated heart notes of the amber flower osmanthus start to reveal themselves and a hidden power beneath. The initially light, delicate allure evolves into a darker, heady quality, driving the innately seductive power of the scent. Addiction: Locked in and powerless to resist, the perfume unleashes an irresistible base note of roasted cocoa that offers an addictive boost, arousing the senses even further and expressing chemistry that sees both the woman who wears it and the one she is seducing, succumb to the power of BOSS THE SCENT for her.

title: Hugo Boss, The Scent Private Accord Edp 100Ml W

An addictive oriental gourmand fragrance, this intoxicating women’s Eau de Parfum resonates with the sensuality and self-confidence of the BOSS woman, making her irresistible to the BOSS man.

The dark, addictive appeal of this aphrodisiac perfume is enriched with exquisitely fresh sweet mandarin and captivating notes of Osmanthus flower. The perfume’s sophisticated charm lingers long on the skin, as the fragrance dries down to a finish of roasted tonka bean, a warm echo of the addictive cocoa accord. Created by perfumer Louise Turner, BOSS The Scent Private Accord for Her Eau de Parfum is presented in a refined faceted luxury perfume flacon of gradient amber glass, finished with a warm golden cap.

description: L’Eau d’Issey Eau & Magnolia Eau de Toilette Intense is a simple, radiant and delicate fragrance. The freshness of the bergamot brings a touch of sparkle to the top notes. While the heart of the fragrance boasts a floral bouquet bursting with water, where notes of magnolia are enhanced by an aquatic freshness. A precious wood base brings the olfactory trail to its conclusion.

title: Issey Miyake, L’Eau D’Issey Edt 100Ml W Gift Set

description: Show the world what true beauty and sophistication looks like when you’re wearing Jean Paul Gaultier La Belle, a stunning women’s fragrance. The top note of ripe, juicy pear opens the aroma with a sugary glow, awakening the senses and dousing those around you in blissful sweetness. Meanwhile, the inclusion of vetiver at the heart creates a more earthy, green atmosphere that’s refreshing and enticing. Completing the perfume is the base note of creamy vanilla, a delightful end that wraps you in warmth and tranquility for hours on end. Overall, this alluring essence has a decadent presence given its few components, making it a perfect accessory for any occasion
