top: An unconventional fragrance that reinvents women with its many facets.
middle: In the top notes, this fragrance plays on the duality of Raspberry and Redcurrant. The Redcurrant highlights the juicy aspect of the fruit, its purple hue and its freshness. When illuminated by the wild herbal facet of Raspberry Leaf, it reveals an addictive perfume without ever being sweet.
base: The floral heart tenderly brings together Blackberry Blossom and Violet Petals, with their notes highlighting extreme femininity.

title: Karl Lagerfield, Fleur De Pecher Edp 100Ml W
description: Pure and clean, this fresh eau de parfum combines citrusy notes of yuzu fruit, nashi pear, peach blossom, jasmine tea and cotton musk. Inspired by the delicate touch of velvet, the heart of the fragrance is airy and light, like a peachy silk veil on the skin.
top: Sleek, translucent peach-tone bottleElegant white and pink packaging

title: Karl Lagerfield, Fleur De The Edp 100Ml W
description: Named after a key ingredient of selective perfumery, Fleur de Thé is a luminous fragrance defined by floral freshness and green tea notes on a base of refined amber, musk and wood notes and finished with citrus top notes.

title: KAYALI, EDEN SPARKLING LYCHEE/23 EDP 100ML W
KAYALI, LOVEFEST BURNING CHERRY/48 EDP 100ML W
KAYALI, MUSK /12  EDP 100ML W
description: Emanating power and confidence, Kayali Musk | 12 begins with magnificent notes of Lotus Flower, Freesia and Sheer Jasmine. Laced with exquisite Musk, the scent shines a light on one of the world’s most mysterious ingredients.
top: A voluptuous blend of Vanilla and creamy Sandalwood gives this distinguished fragrance an enchanting and tempered soul.
middle: Key Notes: Lotus Flower, Sheer Jasmine, Musks, Vanilla, Creamy Sandalwood

title: KAYALI, THE WEDDING VELVET SANTAL 35 EDP 50ML W
KAYALI, VANILLA CANDY ROCK SUGAR 42 EDP 100ML W
description: Fragrance Description: Inspired by Mona’s love for candy and mouthwatering notes, Vanilla Candy celebrates one of the most desired notes in fragrance with its delicious blend of sweet ingredients. Notes of glazed candied pear and bubble gum playfully enhance the fruity, candy-like sweetness with a tempting vanillic explosion at the heart, magnified by warm and woody notes of tonka bean, sandalwood, and patchouli.
top: THE NOTES:
middle: Top Notes: Candied Pear, Violet Leaves, Rum, Ylang-Ylang, Marshmallow, Vanilla Cream
base: Middle Notes: Jasmine, Labdanum, White Caramel, Bubble Gum, Jellybean

title: Kayali, Vanilla Royale Edp 100Ml W
description: Kayali, Vanilla Royale Edp 100Ml W

title: KAYALI, VANILLA/28 EDP 100ML W
description: Captivate the senses with Kayali Vanilla | 28, a masterpiece of refined and cultivated nuance. A time-honored union of creamy Jasmine and rich Madagascan Vanilla Orchid draws out the sweet softness of Brazilian Tonka.
top: Beautifully balanced oriental notes of Musk, Amber, Patchouli and Brown Sugar form the distinguished wood base of this utterly sublime scent.
middle: Key Notes: Vanilla Orchid, Tonka Absolute, Amber Woods, Musk, Brown Sugar.

title: KENNETH COLE, BLACK FOR HER EDP 100ML
description: Create an air of intrigue with a dash of Black eau de parfum spray for women. Introduced by Kenneth Cole in 2004, this elegant fragrance expertly blends floral and citrus accords to create a feminine yet dynamic bouquet.
top: Top notes of powdery violet gently mingle with luscious white flowers, tuberose and jasmine notes for a warm, lingering aroma. Delicate and alluring, Black is ideal for evening wear, so spray some on to add a finishing touch to your favorite little black dress.

title: KENNETH COLE, BLUSH FOR HER EDP 100ML
description: Kenneth Cole Blush For Her EDP Spray is a floral gourmand fragrance that celebrates all things feminine, radiating optimism, allure and romance for the confident and flirtatious woman.
top: Top notes are Sugar, Raspberry, Orange and Pear Blossom.
middle: Middle notes are Peony, Jasmine and Tuberose.
base: Base notes are Vanilla, Patchouli and White Musk.

title: Kenneth Cole, White For Her Edp 100Ml W
description: Inspired by warm sun-kissed skin, WHITE FOR HER is a decadent burst of seduction. From the taste of sweet fruit to the ever-lasting warmth of vanilla, it’s sure to be a fragrance that captures attention.
top: Its a woman’s fragrance meant to evoke the alluring smell of clean, sun-kissed skin Light, fresh, and wearable anywhere Featuring fruits and florals with a touch of grounding musk.

title: Kenzo, Amour Edp 100Ml W
description: Kenzo Amour is a sensual and fragrant experience that invites the user on a tour of Asia. Drawing from the native flora of China and Japan, this perfume captures the exotic and alluring essence of the Far East.
top: The top notes begin with a calming mixture Chinese white tea and rice. From there, the heart of the fragrance opens with Japanese cherry blossom, heliotrope and frangipani. The base draws to a smoldering conclusion with musk, vanilla, incense and woody notes.

title: Kenzo, Flower Edp 100Ml W
description: FLOWER BY KENZO Eau de Parfum, an icon in the world of perfumes. KENZO has created the fragrance of the naturally scentless poppy: a unique powdery floral fragrance. A vibrant hint of Pink Pepper presents the sensuality of Bulgarian Rose, swathed in Vanilla and White Musk. A timeless eau de parfum.

title: Kenzo, Flower Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: Flower by Kenzo Eau de Parfum, the emblematic fragrance by Maison Kenzo. Kenzo creates the fragrance of the naturally scentless poppy a unique signature created by master-perfumer Alberto Morillas. The potent vanilla and white musks, pink pepper and Bulgarian rose give this feminine fragrance its powerful sensuality.
top: Give the gift of Flower by Kenzo.
middle: Fragrance Family: Powdery Poppy
base: Key Notes: Pink Pepper Essence, Blackcurrant, Bulgarian Rose Essence, Violet, White Musks, Vanilla

title: Kenzo, Flower L Absolue Edp 100ml W
description: With FLOWER BY KENZO L’Absolue, KENZO is celebrating its favourite flower: the poppy. Among its lush petals, a powdery heart bursts with liveliness. In a gust of air, the flower casts its powder to the wind, sprinkling the world with thousands of unfurling buds. Saffron, the precious ingredient in this new perfume for women, blends with a bouquet of Orange Blossom and Damascena Rose Absolute. In the base notes, the fragrance distills sensual Vanilla Musks.
top: This more intense addition to the FLOWER BY KENZO range reveals every aspect of the FLOWER BY KENZO woman: a poetic activist. KENZO stands with Masami Charlotte Lavault, an activist flower farmer and founder of the first flower farm in Paris, and supports her cause to: “make ecology irresistible!”

title: KENZO, JUNGLE L’ELEPHANT EDP 100ML W
description: For KENZO, the king of the jungle is not the lion, but the elephant. A golden elephant, which represents a good omen in an imaginary nature.
top: A stylish spicy floral fragrance, lit up by zesty Mandarin and fresh Cardamom. Next, Heliotrope, Clove and Mango unfurl into a luscious heart. Finally, Ylang-ylang, Liquorice, Patchouli and Vanilla wrap you in a soft and sensual embrace. Created by Dominique Roupion.

title: Kenzo, Madly Edp 80Ml W
description: Madly Kenzo! by Kenzo is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.
top: Fragrance Notes:
middle: The fragrance has a strong personality, and an extremely sensual, distinctive trail. Its original structure does not fall into a classic three-tiered olfactory pyramid made of top-heart-base notes. It unfolds into a potent heart of Heliotrope flower, madly dosed and combined with three natural raw ingredients: orange blossom, Bulgarian rose and vanilla. A unique composition, an addictive fragrance, sensual and delicate, intimate and potent.

title: Kenzo, World Edp 75Ml W
description: Unleash your wild side with Kenzo World Eau de Parfum Spray, a woody-floral fragrance for exuberant women with amber facets.
top: This creative and animated scent is for a woman who loves to walk on the wild side. Unafraid, imaginative and surprising, her inquisitive nature takes her on a spontaneous trip of pure self discovery with each spritz.
middle: Fragrance Notes:
base: Kenzo World inspires thoughts of playfulness and freedom, whilst taking on a provocative persona that can’t help but turn heads. As the fragrance opens, a glowing aura of amber shines through from the base, shining light on the juicy red berry top notes. Sharp yet sweet, sticky drips of berry sap stick to the blooming peony petals in the core, creating a flourishing feminine romance between elegant jasmine and the dark, crystallized ambroxan base.

title: Kilian, Can’T Stop Loving You Edp 50Ml W
description: Kilian Hennessy crafts in Can’t stop loving You a true love declaration: a perfume celebrating love. This floral perfume enters the Narcotics olfactive family with, at the centerpiece, Orange Blossom, a symbol of eternal love. Both luminous and somber, Can’t stop loving You is a narcotic floral fragrance that puts peace in danger.
top: The Perfume: The fragrance opens with the Orange Blossom flower, alongside with Paradisone, an ethereal jasmine compound suggests pure paradise. Its heart is incredibly suave, featuring Honey from Provence, a new ingredient in the KILIAN Paris repertoire, for a delicious French touch. Vanilla absolute from Madagascar adds a doubly gourmand incitement to pleasure, while notes of Oak Moss bring an earthy intensity. Incense extract from Somalia lends sensuality, volume and endless mystery.
middle: The Perfume notes: Orange flower, Labdanum Cistus, Honey

title: KILIAN, GOOD GIRL GONE BAD EAU FRAICHE EDP 50ML W
Kim Kardashian, Edp 100Ml W
description: Kim Kardashian is a fragrance constructed of luminous, sweet opening notes, intoxicating, floral middle notes and sensual, sexy aromas in a base. An opening includes refreshing notes of mandarin surrounded with floral-lemon honeysuckle and orange blossom, while a heart blooms with pink jasmine, tuberose, gardenia and spices. A base is created of warm, gentle Tonka, jacaranda wood, vanilla orchid, sexy musk and creamy sandalwood.

title: Kim Kardashian, Fleur Fatale Edp 100Ml W
description: Keep up with the Kardashians and get your paws on Kim’s new fragrance, Fleur Fatale! Feminine and sensual, it features top notes of blackcurrant, violet and bergamot, middle notes of rose, peony and iris, and base notes of amber, sandalwood and white musk.
top: Top notes of blackcurrant, violet and bergamot
middle: Middle notes of rose, peony and iris
base: Base notes of amber, sandalwood and white musk

title: Kim Kardashian, Gold Edp 100Ml W
description: Kim Kardashian Gold is a luxurious update to the reality television celebrity’s original namesake fragrance from 2009. The scent’s tagline is “Transcend Ordinary,” and its richly opulent aroma aims to do that through adding a touch of the gilded glamour to your everyday. The scent calls to mind a beautiful piece of classic gold jewelry, and is perfect for spritzing on during hot summer days. The top notes of the women’s perfume are an invigorating combination of citrusy bergamot, tangy grapefruit and rosy-tinged pink pepper. The heart of the fragrance contains a luscious floral bouquet of airy jasmine, feminine rose and powdery violet. Warming musk, the milky softness of sandalwood, dark and exotic patchouli, sensual amber and the vanilla-like nuance of benzoin round out the base of the scent.

title: Lacoste, Eau De Lacoste Pour Femme Edp 90Ml W
description: Eau De Lacoste by Lacoste is a modern, delightfully elegant scent for women.
top: The top note of pineapple opens the scent with crisp juiciness, along with hints of mandarin orange and the subtle freshness of bergamot.
middle: The heart offers the simple sensuality of delicate white flowers coming from jasmine sambac and orange blossom. Fun-loving jasmine energizes and rejuvenates with orange blossom lending a clean, slightly sweet freshness.
base: The fragrance rests on a soothing and slightly woodybase of vanilla, sandalwood, vetiver and Peru balsam.

title: Lacoste, Eau De Lacoste Pour Femme Elixir Edp 90Ml W
description: Lacoste pour Femme Elixir a new fragrance design and tailor-made for hedonistic women who dare to live their life to its fullest. A generous white flowers bouquet sublimated with sensual woody notes for a bold, inimitable and instantly identifiable fragrance as the Lacoste wardrobe.
top: Top Notes: Pink Pepper, Mandarin.
middle: Heart notes: Brazilian Gardenia, Heliotrope Flower, Sambac Jasmine.
base: Base notes: Tuberose, Wood Elixir Accord.

title: Lacoste, Touch Of Pink Edt 90Ml W
description: Lacoste Touch of Pink for women is the feminine expression of an authentic and carefree sensuality. A fragrance for independent and spontaneous women with the magnetism of vitality. Fashioned in vibrant pink and white, the Lacoste Touch of Pink bottle embodies the scent’s effortless charm.
top: Olfactory family: Floral
middle: Top notes: Orange, Coriander leaves, Cardamom seeds.
base: Heart notes: Jasmine, Violet leaves.

title: Lalique, Amethyst Edp 100Ml W
description: AMETHYST is inspired by the collection of ‘Épines’ bathroom accessories originally designed by René Lalique in 1920. Its name, design, colour and fragrance are the result of a meeting between a brilliant jewel and the natural world.
top: A Fruity top note of Blackberry complements the crispness and tanginess of Blackcurrant. At its heart, Lily Ylang is enhanced by the delicacy of Eglantine Rose and Purple Peony. At its base, the smoothness of the Musks expresses an elegant femininity enhanced with the richness of Sensual Wood and the sophistication of Vanilla.

title: Lalique, L’Amour Edp 100Ml W
description: Discover the romantic woman inside you. Lalique L’Amour Eau de Parfum for women was inspired by eternal love. Just like love itself, this fragrance is sweet, enchanting, and addictive.
top: irresistible floral-woody fragrancefor a romantic, elegant womanparticularly suitable for everyday wear
middle: Right from the opening of this Eau de Parfum, you’ll be enchanted with the citrus scent of bergamot, the floral notes of rosebuds, and the slightly bitter neroli. The heart of the composition contains the sweet gardenia accompanied by delicate jasmine and sensual tuberose. Finally, warm cedar wood and velvety sandalwood provide a perfect sensory experience.
base: Top notesBergamot, Rosebud, Neroli

title: Lalique, Le Parfum Edp 100Ml W
description: LALIQUE LE PARFUM, is an unforgettable oriental olfactive trail for an initiated woman, who is caring and charming.
top: Top Note Bergamot, Bay Leaves, Red Pepper.Heart Note Jasmine, Heliotrope.Dry Down Note Vanilla, Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood.

title: Lalique, Satine Edp 100Ml W
description: Satine by Lalique adds the perfect finishing touch to your beauty routine, with a refreshingly sweet composition that draws in attention while remaining light and subtle enough for everyday wear. This lovely eau de parfum for women opens with aromatic jasmine notes that descend into a bouquet of warm vanilla and crisp pink pepper. Beachy sandalwood and soft vetiver bring this delightful scent to a close with an inviting dry down that lasts throughout your day.

title: Lalique, Soleil Edp 100Ml W
description: Opening your shutters and letting the light flood in, the Lalique Soleil Lalique eau de parfum celebrates the sunshine. Injecting a dose of free spirit into your fragrance edit, it emits tingling aromas of creamy coffee and bitter almonds.
top: It’s a floral fruity gourmand fragrance for women. Sweet, spicy, creamy, warm, elegant & scrumptious.
middle: Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Bitter Almond & Cardamom.
base: Middle notes are Pear, Candied Almond, Jasmine, Caramel, Milk & Coffee.

title: Lancome, Hypnose Edp 75Ml W
description: Sensual. Seductive. Captivating. Hypnôse will draw you into a world of seduction with its captivating notes. It’s a helix of sensuality whose notes are intimately blended. Passion Flower embodies sublime femininity and makes an extraordinary radiant, bright, and youthful impression. Vanilla clings to skin to tempt and entangle with creamy softness and mouth-watering seduction. Warm Vetiver is surrounded by Passion Flower—to create a deep and lingering sensuality.
top: Notes
middle: Top Note: Passion FlowerHeart Note: VanillaBase Note: Vetiver

title: Lancome, Idole Aura Edp 100Ml W
description: Idôle Aura Eau de Parfum, the first sun-kissed scent by Lancôme, teleports you to those late summer nights. This comforting and energizing fragrance eludes the essence of rose and dazzling jasmine, accented by a refreshing aroma of salted vanilla.
top: As unique and unstoppable as the energy that radiates from within every Idôle – share the light of success with Idôle Aura as its ambience transfers from one Idôle to another. From Idôle Aura to you and the Idôle’s who surround you.
middle: Together, there is no limit to our future and what we are capable of.
base: Together we are unstoppable, together we are all Idôles.

title: Lancome, Idole L’Intense Edp 75Ml W
description: Idôle L’Intense by Lancome is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Idôle L’Intense was launched in 2020. Idôle L’Intense was created by Shyamala Maisondieu, Adriana Medina-Baez and Nadege le Garlantezec. Top notes are Bitter Orange and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Turkish Rose, Grasse Rose, Egyptian Jasmine, Jasmine Sambac, Jasmine and Musk; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Patchouli, Acácia, Madagascar Vanilla, Cedar and Sandalwood.

title: Lancome, Idole Le Grand Parfum 100Ml W
description: Here’s to the women who dare to dream. The women who defy expectations. Here’s to the leaders and innovators of tomorrow. Strong. Outspoken. Empowered. The women who look to themselves for the inspiration they need to rewrite the future. Here’s to a new generation of icons. The time is now. Be your own Idôle.
top: POWERFUL AND BEAUTIFUL With its alluring scent and sharp thorns, the rose symbolises the complexity of femininity. The perfect marriage of beauty and strength, a sustainably sourced Rose Accord can be found in the heart of Idôle.
middle: PURE AND SENSUAL Oil of Jasmine Absolutes acts as a gentle yet generous accompaniment to Idôle’s heart. Radiant and sensual, it is an invitation to draw closer.
base: DELICATE AND LONG LASTING An abundance of radiant petals blended with musks form a sophisticated Clean Chypre Accord, which recalls the airy freshness of just-washed linens. Despite its breezy subtlety, the note lingers on the skin to create a lasting enveloping sensation

title: Lancome, Idole Le Grand Parfum Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: To the generation with high dreams: strong, independent women who speak up. To the leaders of tomorrow: be bold, seek out new opportunities, and forge a fresh route. This gift set includes:-Idole EDP 100 ml-Idole EDP 10 ml-Body Cream 50 ml-Mascara

title: Lancome, Idole Le Parfum Edp 75Ml W
description: Idôle by Lancome is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Idôle was launched in 2019. Idôle was created by Shyamala Maisondieu, Adriana Medina-Baez and Nadege le Garlantezec. Top notes are Pear and Bergamot; middle notes are Turkish Rose, Rose de Mai and Indian Jasmine; base notes are White Musk and Vanilla.

title: Lancome, Idole Le Parfum Edp 75Ml W 2Pcs Travel Set
description: Idôle Le Parfum Christmas Set 75ml
top: The perfect duo for Idôle lovers: a large size for home and a small size on-the-go! A premium and giftable set thanks to an eco conscious coffret. Feel empowered by Idôle, a luminous floral fragrance made for generous & committed woman. A Clean & glowy addiction composed of a radical Rose, a spotless Jasmine & a Clean Chypre accord.

title: Lancome, Idole Nectar L’Eau De Parfum 100Ml W
description: Idôle L’Eau de Parfum Nectar is an olfactory treat, a reinvention of the sweet and floral fragrance. A unique, avant-garde scent which marries a faceted rose bouquet with a sweet blast of popcorn deliciousness, Idôle Nectar cannot be ignored, and rather is meant to stand out. With sustainably sourced ingredients like the Isparta Rose and Bourbon Vanilla, this attention grabbing fragrance stands for the future of perfumery and of our planet.
top: FRAGRANCE NOTES
middle: THE ROSE SOUFFLÉFrom hand-harvested Isparta Rose, to the essence of our Centifolia Roses from Grasse, to Rose water and Rose absolue…Idôle is the queen of roses. Layered with sweet puffed popcorn, our perfumers created a unique, faceted, floral bouquet, with a blast of deliciousness.
base: THE MOUTH-WATERING POPCORN ACCORDWith its one of a kind caramel popcorn notes, Idôle L’Eau de Parfum Nectar is a fragrance like you have never experienced. A treat that will keep you coming back for more.

title: Lancome, Idole Now Edp 100Ml W
description: Idôle Now, a unique florality inspired by nature, merging natural original ingredients with science. At the heart of this new fragrance, a powerful trio of iconic ingredients: The uplifted Rose, a once uncapturable Orchid accord and the natural Vanilla infusion from Madagascar. A richer, bolder, more caring fragrance pushing the fragrance boundaries further in a more alluring way through fluffy vanilla facets.
top: The uplifted rose: The Idôle Rose is upcycled through the use of discarded Rose water and then reinfused in the final formula.
middle: The natural print orchid accord: A unique natural scent translated into a musky orchid accord adding a touch of warm elegance to Idôle Now powerful trail while preserving the flower. Using biotechnology, Idole Vanilla Bourbon infusion is now augmented with natural Vanillin made of repurposed ingredients. A new irresistible facet, blooming with an even more alluring and powerful trail.

title: LANCOME, LA NUIT TRESOR EDP 100ML W
description: Every 100 years, there is an encounter between two stars that are irresistibly attracted to each other until they collide. The impact generates the treasured black diamond. La Nuit Tresor is the Black Diamond of Lancome.
top: Like a radiant, scintillating gemstone, the art of the bottle is created with 2 star colors. The mystery of the Black meets the delicacy of the Pink, giving contrast and tension to the new vision of love expressed by Lancome, the Love of the 21st Century.Top: Lychee, RaspberryMiddle: Rose Damascena Essence, IncenseBottom: Absolute Vanilla Orchid Tahitensis, Praline, Patchouli, PapyrusThe Black Rose, a symbol of absolute love, and the vanilla Tahitensis Orchid, perfumery’s very own secret gem, combine with the sharpest green notes to create La Nuit Tresor’s alluring character that is reminiscent of an electric night.

title: LANCOME, LA NUIT TRESOR EDP 75ML W
description: Discover La Nuit Trésor, a sultry, smouldering perfume for women with notes of fresh raspberry, frankincense, and vanilla, with a bewitching heart of Black Rose essence.Its Lancôme’s first ‘Gourmand Woody Floriental’ perfume, a scent of passionate love – as showcased in the new advert featuring the beautiful Penelope Cruz.
top: The La Nuit Trésor bottle is shaped like a black diamond, the most mysterious and precious of all diamonds, and adorned with a black rose choker as a symbol of elegance.
middle: This rich and exquisite women’s perfume was crafted by two master perfumers who combined their craftsmanship to create La Nuit Trésor Eau de Parfum. Beginning with a burst of delicious raspberry, the notes of a Damascena rose have then been enhanced to give the fragrance a deep and mysterious scent. Vanilla, grown on the petals of an orchid in Tahiti, gives the fragrance a solar and radiant note.
base: Top Notes: Raspberry, Lychee & Bergamot.

title: LANCOME, LA NUIT TRESOR INTENSE EDP 100ML W
description: Are you ready to live an intense love story? Feel  scent of La Nuit Trésor Intense.
top: – AN ADDICTIVE FLORAL AMBERY SCENT
middle: – AN EXQUISITE RUBY BOTTLE
base: – A SUSTAINABLY SOURCED ROSE DAMASCENA

title: LANCOME, LA NUIT TRESOR L’EAU DE PARFUM CARESSE EDP 50ML W
description: Close your eyes, feel romance blossom and prepare to be mesmerised by the most blooming and sensual love. Dare to enter La Nuit Trésor’s unique secret night garden. An enchanting place where only the most beautiful flowers thrive and the most precious love stories bloom. This floral ambery update on the legendary fragrance of love seduces the heart with an irresistible mystery.
top: TOP NOTES Damask rose
middle: HEART NOTES Jasmine, Tuberose, Mirabilis
base: BASE NOTES Macchiato, Whipped cream, Patchouli

title: LANCOME, LA NUIT TRESOR LA FOLIE EDP 75ML W
description: La Nuit Trésor embodies the one and only moment when true love is at its climax. A unique moment of “lâcher prise”, when time is suspended. Lovers are transcended beyond themselves and experience the thrill of love: an indescribable feeling that makes you forget everything and lose control.
top: Based on the combination of notes Lancome La Nuit Tresor a La Folie is classified as Oriental Vanilla fragrance to the nose. The fragrance composition is a creation of Christophe Raynaud, Honorine Blanc, Amandine Clerc Marie. The emanation of flavors and scent notes for La Nuit Tresor a La Folie unfurl in a whiff of fruity and citrus opening top notes including bergamot, pear, red currant and pink pepper. The floral and white flowers heart center notes blend in with jasmine, peony, rose and violet while the deep spice and woody base notes leave an impression of woody and ambroxan.

title: LANCOME, LA NUIT TRESOR PARFUM 100ML W
description: LA NUIT TRESOR LE PARFUM, A NEW PRECIOUS MOMENT LIKE A VELVET CRUSH La Nuit Trésor’s unique signature is taken to a further level of sensuality and passion with La Nuit Trésor Le Parfum, the collection’s most intense.
top: The new fragrance is an elixir of absolute rose envelopped with bitter cocoa extracts and blackcurrant notes. La Nuit Trésor Le Parfum is a subtle encounter between the clash of a surprise and the tenderness of a desired love.
middle: Le Parfum becomes women’s most precious accomplice, with whom to delight dearest hours and secrets of the night, as an elixir of absolute rose with embittered cocoa notes.
base: A new touch of blackcurrant accord lying between green and red fruit scents, adding light and woody notes to rose and cocoa. Our new fragrance comes in a diamond-shaped glass bottle revealing sharp cuts and powerful reflections of light through a purple veil, embraced in a velvet ribbon stiffening an elegant desire.

title: LANCOME, LA VIE EST BELLE EDP 100ML W
description: “La vie est belle,” a French expression meaning “life is beautiful,” is about choosing your own path to happiness and inspiring others. Joyous femininity is expressed through this energizing women’s perfume.
top: La Vie Est Belle has fragrance notes of iris spring flowers and the intoxicating earthiness of patchouli. These are layered alongside perfume notes of delicious spun sugar and sensual warm vanilla. Plus, like a bright blooming bouquet, it also has other flowery hints of exotic Arabian jasmine sambac and sparkling Tunisian orange blossom.
middle: Complex and modern, it is a unique take on a warm and spicy fragrance with a twist of florals, and sweet gourmand.
base: Top Notes: Iris.

title: Lancome, La Vie Est Belle Edp 100Ml W + 200Ml Lotion Gift Set
description: The fragrance of happiness. “La vie est belle”, a French expression meaning “Life is beautiful”.La Vie Est Belle introduces a new olfactive story, an Iris Gourmand. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an amber fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of Iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend, for an incredible scent with depth and complexity. Made in France.
top: THREE-PIECE SET INCLUDES
middle: 100ml La Vie Est Belle L’Eau de Parfum
base: 200ml La Vie Est Belle Nourishing Fragranced Body Lotion.

title: Lancome, La Vie Est Belle Edp 100Ml W +50Ml Lotion Gift Set
description: This giftset includes:
top: 100ml La Vie Est Belle L’Eau de Parfum
middle: 10ml La Vie Est Belle L’Eau de Parfum Purse Spray
base: 50ml La Vie Est Belle Scented Body Lotion

title: Lancome, La Vie Est Belle Edp 50Ml W 2Pcs Travel Set
description: La Vie Est Belle is a conviction, a declaration to the world written with grace, luminosity and freedom: a vivid and vibrant idea, like the inner conviction that life is beautiful if we choose our own path to happiness.
top: Lancôme’s iconic fragrance is focused on sharing happiness. It is a conviction, an open declaration of freedom and happiness by self-confident women who follow their own path to happiness.
middle: Set include
base: Eau de Parfum spray 75 ml

title: Lancome, La Vie Est Belle En Rose Edt 100Ml W
description: “La vie en rose” is a French expression that translates to life seen through pink tinted glasses. La vie est belle En Rose paints your world in pink hues, inviting you to always see the brighter side of life, its pink side, cultivating happiness. This colourful fragrance spreads optimism with every spritz, allowing those it reaches to experience “la vie en rose” in all its fullness.
top: Top Note: Red fruits bring a colourful, juicy, and slightly acidic effect to the zesty bergamot.
middle: Middle (Heart) Note: Peony and roses from Grasse compliment this iris gourmand to create a floral, rose blooming heart.
base: Base Note: Sandalwood oil and patchouli add creaminess and sensuality to the dry down, and the addition of musk gives a soft, second-skin effect.

title: LANCOME, LA VIE EST BELLE EN ROSE EXTRAORDINAIRE EDP 100ML W
description: La vie est belle Rose Extraordinaire is a warm floral perfume that has modernized Lancôme’s iconic rose for an alluring feminine & floral trail, enclosed in a new blooming interpretation of our iconic crystal smile bottle.
top: La vie est belle Rose Extraordinaire is a tribute to the most iconic flowers of perfumery. The heart of this warm floral perfume is composed of our signature iris and three precious rose extracts: fresh rose water, rose accord, and rose damascena absolue. Its floral heart is enhanced by enveloping woody musk undertones.
middle: THE EXTRAORDINARY ROSEfresh rose water – rose accord – rose damascena absolueA synergy of three different roses, united, to create the perfect one. Each accord highlights a different facet of the rose, from freshness to sensual opulence.
base: IRISThe iconic signature of La vie est belle, the Iris heightens La vie est belle Rose Extraordinaire with it’s rich, floral and noble powdery note.

title: Lancome, La Vie Est Belle Intensement Edp 100Ml W
description: La Vie est Belle Intensément olfactive story is composed of a powerful and sensual heart (Iris Concrete, Vanilla Bean, Sambac Jasmine Absolute, Patchouli Heart) brightened by a smile of delicious delicacies. The first Intense Red-Iris-Vanilla Accord exclusively created for Lancôme by one of France’s leading perfumers, in an iconic perfume bottle.
top: Happiness is a vibration that lives within all of us. It’s fleeting, but intense. Quick, but strong. It’s here and now. Beating inside the new eau de parfum La Vie Est Belle Intensément. Live to the fullest here and now. Feel the happiness urgency in every moment.

base: Top: Bergamot Oil, Pink Pepper Oil & Raspberry Accord

description: A new intense and alluring interpretation of La Vie Est Belle embodied by our iconic Iris Pallida in our most concentrated form, diffusing an irresistible floral heart. Encapsulated in a reinvented bottle with an infinite crystal smile.
top: A celebration of infinite, intense happinessA more concentrated and alluring Iris signatureA radiating new bottle with an infinite crystal smileWhat makes it different: The green and juicy accents of Fig Accord and Blackcurrant blend with Jasmine Sambac and an overdose of Iris, ten times more concentrated, enhanced by deep notes of patchouli and a gourmand accord.

title: Lancome, La vie est belle L’Eclat Edp 75ml W
description: You see it in the sparkle of an eye, in the vibration of a smile. Something that French people call L’Eclat. L’Eclat is the fragrance of a luminous and never ending emotion, an invitation to share the light of happiness. Can be worn all day. It is radiant, luminous, fresh.

title: LANCOME, LA VIE EST BELLE L’ELIXIR EDP 100ML W
description: A velvety floral elixir perfume with an indulgent, long-lasting trail, featuring notes of raspberry, violet leaf and a warm cocoa base.
top: Fragrance story: The L’Elixir Eau de Parfum is a warm floral elixir perfume for women that opens with sparkling raspberry and luminous violet leaf notes beautifully blending with a warm cocoa butter base. It creates a long-lasting scent that evokes the liberation found in radical self-love. Happiness starts with you. It’s a commitment to yourself. It’s a belief embodied by those who dare to trust their intuition and defy expectations. The scent of happiness is reinvented by two renowned French perfumers, Christophe Raynaud and Antoine Maisondieu. The result? A head-turning, uplifting scent trail that embraces the most noble ingredients.
middle: Style: Warm, fruity floral.
base: Notes:

title: LANCOME, LA VIE EST BELLE L’EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML W
description: Discover La vie est belle: L’Extrait, the new exquisitely irresistible Extrait de Parfum.
top: The voluptuous floral heart of Damascena Rose blends with our signature Iris Pallida. This powerful yet delicate duet is heightened by the depth of the Oud Wood Accord.
middle: L’Extrait’s enigmatic scent is a sophisticated and sensual reinterpretation of our iconic Eau de Parfum, La vie est belle.
base: La vie est belle L’Extrait is an invitation to find happiness. Chase it, while following your dreams and cherishing it at every moment.

title: Lancome, La Vie Est Belle Oui D’Exception Edp 100Ml W
description: Oui La vie est Belle, the first sweet Iris enhanced by rose for LancômeDiscover La vie est Belle’s signature gourmand trail now wrapped in an exceptional & luminous floral bouquet.
top: – The fragrance for women with an empowering message of joy inviting you to celebrate every moment and say yes to every opportunity.– Starifying Rose & Iris, the most exceptional flowers of perfumery– A luxurious fragrance bottle adorned with a golden firework of happiness
middle: This new chapter of La vie est Belle keeps a zesty and colorful top of fruity notes. Bergamot sparkles under the fusing notes of Pink Pepper and combines with the raspberry accord for an explosion of juicy freshness. In the heart, the petal-like floral bouquet, generous and faceted, is sublimated by the rich notes of Damascena rose and sunny ylang ylang. In the base, patchouli, gourmand accord and iris are used in overdose to intensify the addictive and sensual signature of La vie est Belle.
base: INGREDIENTS

title: Lancome, La Vie Est Belle Soleil Cristal Edp 100Ml W

Happiness is more than a feeling, it is an aura of light that radiates around you. La vie est belle Soleil Cristal Eau de Parfum invites you to illuminate the world of happiness and turn the ordinary into extraordinary moments. Presenting the brightest facet of happiness in the fragrance line.
top: La vie est belle Soleil Cristal is the new solar addiction that shines with a warm floral heart. The new Eau de Parfum consists of bright tangerine outlets, a heart of white flowers and a tanned vanilla steed (Madagascar) combined with patchouli (Bali).
middle: La vie est belle Soleil Cristal, Eau de Parfum consists of: A floral and solar heart, Sambac Jasmine Absolute, Orange Blossom Absolute, Ylang-Ylang Essence and illuminated by a dazzling smile of fine delights.

title: Lancome, Miracle Edp 100Ml W

This sensual, spicy floral fragrance is bursting with the zest of brilliant Freesia, peppered with Ginger and serenely balanced by warm Amber notes. A vibrant, sparkling fragrance that opens like the dawning of a new day with fresh, dewy notes of Lychee and Freesia. Its spicy heart echoes with notes of Magnolia, Jasmine, Ginger and Pepper as its warm base notes envelop you in the sensual splendour of Amber and Musk.

title: Lancome, Tresor In Love Edp 75Ml W
description: Youthful. Modern. Flirty. Discover Lancôme’s newest fragrance sensation that captures the spirit of the first moment of love. Fall head over heels with the luminosity of ripe fruits, the radiance of rose and jasmine, and the vibrant warmth of cedar wood and musk.
top: Notes

title: Lancome, Tresor Midnight Rose Edp 75Ml W

title: Lanvin, A Girl In Capri Edt 90Ml W
description: A GIRL IN CAPRI by Lanvin is a feminine Eau De Toilette belonging to the Citrus olfactory family.
top: Inspired by the Amalfi coast and a warm Mediterranean summer, it represents a young girl with a bright smile and sparkling eyes, radiating confidence and freedom. A delicious combination of sunshine, fresh flowers and typical Capri citrus.
middle: Its olfactory pyramid focuses on the essence of Primafiore lemon, a variety with a lively and intense aroma that joins bergamot. At its heart the white flowers dance happily with the grapefruit and a marine accord. All on a background of white musk, driftwood and amber.

title: Lanvin, Eclat D Arpege Edp 100Ml W
description: Lanvin Eclat d’Arpege Eau De Parfum is a floral fragrance with fruity nuances. It is a simple and light uplifting perfume featuring florals, fresh green notes, amber, and musks.

middle: Heart notes: Osmanthus, Peach blossom, Peony (red), Wisteria, Tea (Green).

title: Lanvin, Eclat D Arpege Edp 50Ml W Gift Set
description: Eclat d’Arpège is classified as fruity-floral. Lanvin revives the musical theme of his legendary Arpège perfume. The composition is delicate, fragile and angelic. Eclat d’Arpège’s first accords are green lilac and Sicilian lemon leaves which transports us to the first day of spring. Summer’s near , flowers are in full bloom, the scent is more intense, it’s a wisteria blossom that blooms at perfume’s heart, accentuated by lush peach blossom and sensual red peony. Airy green tea leaves are refreshing. The base’s white cedar of Lebanon, gentle musk and precious amber are like an enveloping caress.
top: This set contains:
middle: 50 ml Eau De Parfum100 ml Body Lotion

title: Lanvin, Eclat De Nuit Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: This set is between shade and light, mystery and gleam, sensuality, and freshness. Its perfume comes with a bottle that is adorned with a luminescent intense pink lacquering and the cap is magnified by a white stone. The emblematic Plexiglas outer box seems to be enlightened from inside by the intense pink color. The perfume composed this fruity floral starting from its middle notes accord, and by adding blackcurrant, a nod to the sparkle of youth. Finally, a praline note combined with vanilla and sandalwood which he crafted gives a sexy and addictive effect.
top: Top NotesRed Apple, Black Currant, LemonMiddle Notes.
middle: Orange flowers, freesia, jasmine, lady of the night flowers.
base: Base NotesPraline, Vanilla, Sandalwood

title: LANVIN, JEANNE LANVIN EDP 100ML W

It does not over-complicate with complex notes, but rather brings a uplifting spirit with its fragrance and the design of the bottle and packaging – in soft shades of pink, and a glass bottle wrapped with a mesh ribbon. Think delicate, and feminine.

middle: Heart Notes: Peony, Freesia, Raspberry & Rose

middle: Middle notes are Jasmine, Magnolia and Rose
base: Base notes are Musk, Virginia Cedar and Amber.

title: Lanvin, Modern Princess Edp 90Ml W
description: Modern Princess Fruity Floral scent is a fruity floral perfume for women. Launched in 2016, this Lanvin fragrance features notes of red currant and red apple. The heart is intense and sensual with notes of jasmine and freesia. The heart it’s addictive with hints of White Musk, White Woods and Vanilla Orchid.

title: Le Labo, Lys 41 Edp 100Ml W
description: LYS 41 is an overwhelming white floral – a blend of jasmine, tuberose absolute, and lily, bewitching in its noble, warm, and sunny approach – yet treacherous once caught in its web of noble woods, vanilla Madagascar, and musks.
top: LYS 41 rewards those looking for a statement with an addictive floral buzz that is as potent as its wake and as insistent as the people following you around. Good luck.

title: Lolita Lempicka, Edp 100Ml W
description: Lolita Lempicka Mon Premier Parfum EdP resembles a juicy forbidden fruit from the heart of an enchanted forest – equally addictive and hypnotic.floral-fruity gourmand scent for women with a strong personality and a unique charmparticularly suited for evenings and special occasions.
top: Composition of the fragranceFrom the first notes to the grand finale, Mon Premier Parfum is a perfect harmony of contrasts.
middle: While the opening will surprise you with a sweet and fresh combination of ivy, star anise and cherry, the heart presents aromatic liquorice paired with a delicate essence of violets, amaryllis and iris. The gourmand base of the fragrance will then enchant you with notes of vanilla, chocolate truffles, musk, vetiver and tonka bean.

title: Louis Vuitton, Attrape Reves Edp 100Ml W
description: Available exclusively on louisvuitton.com and in selected Louis Vuitton stores.
top: Order your Louis Vuitton fragrance and receive a complimentary sample so you can discover the fragrance before wearing or gifting it. That way, should you wish to, you can return your unopened bottle for reimbursement.
middle: A festive fragrance in celebration of wonderment.
base: Cocoa as airy-light as a wondrous journey somewhere between dream and realityLike the Northern Lights appearing out of nowhere, Attrape-Rêves is the fragrant embodiment of supernatural phenomena forever embedded in the memory of some far-flung exploration. Inspired by such waking dreams, the Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud imagines a trail like a shower of shooting stars, where raw cocoa powder mingles with a bouquet of peonies. Then comes the patchouli heart, enlivened by litchi’s fresh and sparkling notes.

title: Louis Vuitton, Coeur Battant Edp 100Ml W
description: Like a wave of emotion sweeping through you, Cœur Battant is an invitation to listen to your heart and live every moment with passion. The Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud gives body to this instinctive and passionate perfume with a luscious bite of sparkling pear inciting you to enjoy life to the full. Then comes the perfume’s beating heart of sunny Egyptian jasmine and sensual ylang-ylang bringing a sensation of delectable opulence. Highlighting this floral heart, patchouli adds depth to the composition. A perfume with a compelling character, suspended somewhere between freshness and sensuality.
top: The bottle is refillable in stores equipped with a perfume fountain.
middle: Key notes:Pear accordJasmine from EgyptYlang-ylangPatchouli heartAmbretteNarcissus

title: Louis Vuitton, Matiere Noire Edp 100Ml W
description: Exploring the universe is the ultimate travel fantasy and most thrilling adventure. Matière Noire plumbs intangible depths with a journey through the darkest, most precious woods, namely patchouli and agarwood. The agarwood’s animal notes are intensified by blackcurrant and contrasted with the whiteness of narcissus and jasmine, a floral vibration that cuts the darkness like a comet. Plumes of sacred notes unfurl on the skin. The disruption is total, almost mystical.
top: Key notes:AgarwoodSambac jasmineNarcissusRose centifoliaCyclamenPatchouliIncense

The gold flakes floating in the formula are actually the least precious of all the materials used in this creation – they are just a bit of fun and are a reference to my sense of humour and how I don’t take anything too seriously…” -Roja Dove

title: Maison Lancome, Pivoines Printemps Edp 100Ml W

title: Maison Lancome, Roses Berberanza Edp 100Ml W
description: Created by Julien Rasquinet in 2017, Lancome Rôses Berberanza, is composed of two extracts of damask rose. The rose in absolute, with its herbaceous accents, softens the fresh notes of the rose in essence. The now-magnified damask rose finds nuances in the saffron accord, and the luminous, sparkling essence of mandarin brightens it. In the signature, a spice and pistachio accord accentuates the addictive vanilla bourbon, raspberry accord and elegant smoky oud. Opulent and generous, this spicy, gourmand floriental draws you into daydreams..It is an eau de parfum, edp.
top: Notes: Damask Rose, Saffron, mandarin, pistachio, Vanilla, Raspberry, Spices, Oud,

title: Maison Margiela, Replica Beach Walk Edt 100Ml W
description: Wrap yourself in memories of sunny summer days at the beach: rays of the sun warming your skin, hot sand beneath your feet and the fresh and salty breeze of the ocean.Listen to the lapping of the waves and inhale the warm, salty breeze. Beach Walk makes you relive the vibrant and sunny of a walk along a sandy beach.This sunny and invigorating Eau de Toilette is part of the Replica collection by Maison Margiela. A fragrance that reminds you the scent of sunscreen, the salty taste of the ocean, and feel the hot sand under your feet.

title: MAISON MARGIELA, REPLICA COFFEE BREAK EDP 100ML U
description: Coffee Break evokes the memory of a break from a bustling city at a warm coffee shop at a freezing winter day. A comforting and cozy break over a creamy coffee, savoring hot pastries. The sensation of milk froth on your lips, the soft sound of the coffee machine are encapsulated in this new REPLICA fragrance
top: Coffee Break is composed of addictive notes of coffee soflty blended with the tenderness of aromatic lavender. A unique milky and hot addiction to recall a moment of pure cozyness.

middle: A delightful spring breeze gives off a sensation of peace.

title: Maison Margiela, Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Body Lotion W
description: [BODY LOTION] A hydrating lotion that brings the relaxing feeling of cozy a Sunday morning to your self-care routine.

title: Maison Margiela, Replica Music Festival Edt 100Ml W
description: Remember an endless verdant lanscape, the brightness of sunshine and the throbbing melodies with Music Festival.
top: Come back to the vibrations of sound and free your mind with this hypnotic Eau de Toilette. Music Festival is a true invitation to escape reality with notes of fresh bud, combined to incense oil and leather accord.The intensity of patchouli, cedarwood and cypress essence recalls an hypnotic daydream.

title: Maison Margiela, Replica When The Rain Stops Edt 100Ml W
description: This eau de toilette from Maison Margiela is inspired by the joyful nature of Spring and conjures the nostalgia-riddled scent of a sudden downpour spiked by sun rays. The aquatic accord signals the last remaining raindrops evaporating from the tips of the pine needle trees into the fresh air. Luminous isparta rose and vibrant pink pepper notes blend blissfully and provide the heart to this perfume while the wet freshness of nature after the rain is created by the combination of the fresh and marine aquatic accord and patchouli essence.
top: Fragrance notes:
middle: Bergamot oil, vegetal accord, pink pepper essence, aquatic accord, pine needle oil, patchouli bali essence and moss accord.

title: Maison Margiela, Replica Whispers In The Library Edt 100Ml W
description: Whispers in the library evokes the memory of a mysterious library made of antique woodwork perfectly waxed. The slowing down of time between books and the whispers of turning pages.
top: Inspired by the scent of wax wood and paper, the combination of pepper notes with woody and warm notes of cedar and vanilla recreates the atmosphere of an ancestral library.
middle: This oriental woody Eau de Toilette is part of the REPLICA Collection.
base: Key Notes: Pepper Essence, Tonka Bean Asolute, Cedarwood.

title: MANCERA, AOUD VIOLET EDP 120ML W
description: Violet, bergamot and oakmoss in a patchouli base. Freshness and timeless elegance.
top: HEAD NOTESBergamot, Spices & Fresh Herbs.
middle: HEART NOTESViolet, Leaves of Patchouli, Subtle Oud.
base: BASE NOTESVetiver, Amber & White Musk.

title: Mancera, Black Gold Edp 120Ml W
description: Bold, fresh, luxurious and sensual, Black Gold is a versatile masculine leather fragrance for today’s renaissance man, the rare example of a scent equally comfortable on the beach, at the bar, or in the boardroom.
top: Jump-started with an electric crackle of citrus and spice set against a smooth, compelling lavender, Black Gold soon develops a rich floral heart, kept masculine with the refreshing saltiness of oceanic notes and a perfectly balanced patchouli. And as it dries further, the leather- not too smoky, nor too soft, but with a quiet, confident ruggedness- takes control, lingering for untold hours at just the right volume to carry you from morning to evening, no matter the setting. A signature scent must balance versatility, sophistication, and that so-hard-to-define Wow Factor that can turn heads and make a special someone weak in the knees. After smelling Black Gold, we get the feeling more than a few modern men have just found a signature.
middle: Black Gold Fragrance Notes
base: Citrus, oud, lavender, cinnamon, nutmeg, jasmine, violet, rose, sea notes, patchouli, vetiver, woody notes, leather, amber, white musk.

title: Mancera, Coco Vanille Edp 120Ml W
description: Sweet and innocent, yet dangerous and seductive. Addiction never smelled so gorgeous.

middle: HEART NOTESYlang-Ylang, Tiare Flowers & Egyptian Jasmine.

middle: HEART NOTESViolet, Jasmine, Lily of the Valley, Heliotrope.

title: Mancera, Pearl Edp 120Ml W
description: Spritz the pure beauty of a pearl onto your skin with Mancera Pearl Eau De Parfum.

The fragrance opens with juicy notes of rhubarb and bright daffodil that reveal a comforting heart of almond milk. The fragrance finishes with a soft dry down of cedarwood and cashmeran.

title: MASQUE MILANO, DOLCE AQUA 100ML W
description: Masque Milano Dolceacqua Eau de Parfum is a women’s floral perfume. I have a feeling that tonight you are going to see one of the Riviera’s most fascinating sights. Nice, eight o’clock in the morning. Clear skies and light traffic on the Promenade des Anglais. She has arrived before you, waiting for you with the roof of her convertible lowered and a cloud of colours trapped in her scarf. She looks at you, laughs, and throws you a sprig of lily of the valley. You climb aboard and off you go
top: Head Notes: Coastal Breeze accord, Muguet, Ivy Leaves, Mediterranean Marjoram

description: Madeleine Le Donne di Masque by Masque Milano is a Amber Floral fragrance for women. Like a charming girl, sipping hot chocolate in Rue de Rivoli. Stopping at the legendary tearoom ‚ like famous artists and fashion designers did since the turn of the XX Century ‚ means turning back time, bringing back sweet memories that the talented Fanny Bal (the nose behind the creation of Madeleine) skilfully managed to capture in a sweet floral creation that will not pass unnoticed.
top: Head Notes: Chestnut Accord, Chantilly Accord, Cumin Seed Oil.

title: Mdci Parfums, Nuit Andalouse Edp 75Ml W
description: A warm summer’s night in Spain… tender air, cicadas, and a potpurri of different scents, flowers and fruits, surround us… we hear quiet singing and the rhythmic staccato of dancers… nothing disturbs the harmony and brightness of this night… life is beautiful. The magic of southern nights has been capturing humans for a long time – songs were written about them, they have inspired painters and writers, and, over and over again, fragrances. Among all the wonderful olfactoric hommages to the south, Nuit Andalouse is a timless treasure: Not only hesperides and green notes as well as gardenia and sandalwood lead us to Mediterranean worlds, also violets and ylang ylang make this composition round which is carried by a warm basis of vanilla, sandalwood and musk.
top: Head NotesOrange, Green Notes, Violet

It also features a musky undertone, which makes its sweetness more subtle while adding a touch of sensuality. Spray it on before heading to the beach, a pool party, a picnic, or any outdoor event to immerse yourself in a blend of reinvigorating scents.

title: Mizensir, Edition De Veronique Edp 100Ml W
description: Véronique, the first name of his daughter. At the start, it’s a story of white musks, as Alberto Morillas loves them so much, tender but sensual, discreet but present. And then came the flowers, considered as they were used in the past, in infusion, this traditional process that only the very large perfume houses still use. These were the centifolia rose and the sambac jasmine, which is more orange and less animal than the grandiflorum jasmine. A duo to which he added a beautiful iris and an astonishing smoky woody note via the essence of cade. To prolong the magic of this floral profusion and give it its tenderly musky touch, he offered it the softest musks and amber woods.
top: Top notes are Rose de Mai and Jasmine Sambac;
middle: Middle notes are Juniper and iris;
base: Base notes are Amberwood and White Musk.

The sweet and spicy fragrance of the perfume makes it perfect for any season and any time of the day. The light pink color of the flacon gives a few hints to the ingredients that make up the perfume. The top notes are composed of red currant, pink pepper, and bay leaf. The heart of the perfume consists of the floral notes of rose and lotus, and the base notes are formed of vanilla, musk, patchouli, and amber.

title: Mont Blanc, Lady Emblem Edp 75Ml W
description: Lady Emblem is a floral fragrance born out of the essence of rose, the universal synonym of elegance and femininity.

middle: The heart is a bouquet faceted around floral voluptuous jasmine notes and the precious fresh petal Rose Essential with sparks of pomegranate for a bittersweet fruity touch.
base: The drydown features creamy elegant sandalwood and warm amber notes illuminated by musk crystals for a dazzling signature.

title: Mont Blanc, Lady Emblem Elixir Edp 75Ml W
description: Lady Emblem Elixir is created for the unique, sophisticated and strong woman.
top: Top notes of damask rose diffused by a wave of honey and spices embody this new definition of femininity. The base of the fragrance reveals an intense woody signature with patchouli and vanilla. The Lady Emblem Elixir jewel bottle is partially coated with a precious pink gold metalization, expressing a world of luxury and sophistication.

title: Mont Blanc, Signature Absolue Edp 90Ml W

title: Mont Blanc, Signature Edp 90Ml W

top: Top notes of sparkling clementine ease into an enchanting floral heart of magnolia and ylang-ylang, which dry down to a sensual base of vanilla accented by musk and creamy benzoin life.

title: MONT BLANC, SIGNATURE EDP 90ML W GIFT SET
Montale, Candy Rose Edp 100Ml  W
description: Montale Candy Rose is a fruity floral fragrance for women which is full of freshness and sweetness.This Eau de Parfum from a French perfume brand which is noted for its love of fragrances from the Orient and Arabia and for its interest in their enchanting history offers the richness of exotic fruit in combination with the popular fragrance of the rose.
top: Candy Rose Eau de Parfum presents intense red fruit, lychees and juicy red (sometimes also called blood) orange delicately veiled in the sensuality of roses, lily of the valley and patchouli on a sweet base of musk and vanilla. The rich aromatic composition, which also includes mandarin, blackcurrant, raspberry and orange blossom, is a juicy cocktail which literally dances on the skin in the introduction. This is followed by a delicate wonderful floral blend and a sensuous base which is slightly warm thanks to the vanilla, which has been uniquely combined with musk and orange blossoms.

title: MONTALE, CRAZY IN LOVE EDP 100ML W
description: Inspired by the wondrous Kingdom of Montale emotions, this fragrance opens itself to mystery and wonder with wild roses, violet leaves, saffron and intense amber. Recalling the nostalgic goodness of brown sugar infused with the sensual warmth of a vanilla bean – that kind of «signature» scent that we love to create, will warm your soul. Rich with contrast, dreamlike in its serenity, Crazy in Love will brings you subtle energies and passion in your life. A Montale talisman full of luck.

title: MONTALE, LUCKY CANDY EDP 100ML W
description: Wearing Lucky candy is like drawing a tarot card that continually unveils a delicious surprise. When the marshmallow pops up, you know you’re in for a treat .. your wheel of fortune has appeared. Bergamot and honey commence this sweet celebration, joined by a dollop of coconut cream. Then enters frangipani flower, which raises this scent to another level of delectation. Follow this with a creamy caramel wave of amber and musk kissed by vanilla and sweet toffee. Say hello to your new lucky charm.

title: Montale, Roses Musk Edp 100Ml W
description: The name sounds so simple, but it says it all. Roses. Musk. Exquisite, dew-kissed roses in full, breathtaking bloom. Soft, clean skin-loving musk that caresses the senses. Blended together with a hint of sweetness to create a rose scent that is absolutely divine and astonishingly airy and light. Like a flawless diamond in a solitaire setting, sometimes it’s best to leave perfection uncluttered. Simply lovely.
top: Roses Musk Fragrance Notes
middle: Rose essence, rose absolute, jasmine, musk, amber

title: Montale, Starry Nights Edp 100Ml W
description: Shining like a star, Bergamot from Calabria lights the way to a floral heart of Bulgarian Rose and Egyptian Jasmine empowered by oriental notes of Patchouli from Sumatra, and leaves a warm sillage of Sensual White Musk and Powdery Notes.

title: Montale, Sweet Peony Edp 100Ml W
description: The ravishing scent of Peony, emphasized by a very round and suave combination of Jasmine, Rose, Peach and Coconut, intertwines the richness of Coffee and Clove from Java with Sandalwood and Vanilla.
top: Close your eyes and picture a garden full of the most gorgeous flowers. That is the scent of Montale Sweet Peony Eau de Parfum for women that will brighten up your day with its beautiful floral notes.

base: Middle notesRose, Coconut, Peach, Jasmine

title: Montale, Vanille Absolu Edp 100Ml W
description: Smooth and sweet, Vanille Absolu is everything you could ever desire in an upscale Vanilla: swirly folds of boozy Vanilla are set off and enhanced by sweet Cherry and Plum Notes. A refined Vanilla without being snooty with a little touch of Caramel.
top: The must-have Vanilla of our collection.

title: Moschino, Cheap & Chic I Love Love Edt 100Ml W
description: Moschino Cheap & Chic I Love Love Eau de Toilette is a bright and optimistic scent that blends sparkling notes of citrus with the softness and florals and musk.

title: Moschino, Fresh Edt 100Ml W
description: Italian fashion house Moschino is best known for their eccentric exaggerations of pop culture, famously drawing on everything from McDonald’s to Barbie in order to create high end, wearable designs.
top: Fresh Couture, a quirky take on household cleaning products, debuted at Moschino SS16 show in Milan September 2015 (accompanied at the time by a range of t-shirts, dresses and a phone case). But the fragrance itself surely stole the show: hidden within a beautiful white and gold box, the flacon takes the shape of a spray bottle that wouldn’t look out of place under the kitchen sink.
middle: But just wait till you discover what’s inside… Playful top notes of of mandarin and bergamot are enriched with intense ylang ylang. The floral heart of peony and osmanthus are contrasted by touches of raspberry and a woody base of white patchouli and ambrox. Fresh Couture plays on the idea of freshness in a truly feminine way and will not only put a smile on your face but utterly delight your senses, we believe.
base: Top notes: bergamot, mandarin, ylang ylang

title: Moschino, Funny Edt 100Ml W
description: Counter every downers of life with a light heart and laughter. Always look for the amusing side of things and you don’t have to worry about getting worn out. Alleviate your mood with Moshino Funny! Eau de Toilette for Women.
top: A fresh and citrusy scent, the Moschino Funny! Eau de Toilette for Women brings out mischief and playfulness in you. It opens up with a teasing cocktail of bitter orange, red currant, and pink pepper. In its heart lies flirty bouquet of blooms like jasmine, violet, peony, and green tea. Everything sits in a seductive lingering base of amber, oakmoss, cedar, and musk.
middle: Spritz on the Moschino Funny! Eau de Toilette for Women and revel in a girlish euphoria as you can face the day with a smile.

title: Moschino, Gold Fresh Couture Edp 100Ml W
description: Moschino brings a touch of the unexpected with the fruity floral fragrance Gold Fresh Couture.
top: Inspired by Moschino’s runway looks under the direction of Creative Director Jeremy Scott the story of the now world-famous ‘cleaning spray’ bottle moves on to the next chapter, with the captivating irony of the design continuing to cause a stir.This fragrance is totally intoxicating with top notes of zingy fruit with a feminine floral heart before a sensual dry down of woods.
middle: Top notes: Grapefruit, Mandarin Orange, Pear, White Peach, Mango, Rhubarb Leaf.
base: Middle notes: Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley, Orchid.

title: Moschino, So Seal Cheap & Chic Edt 50Ml W Gift Set
description: Not one for fashion rules, Moschino’s Cheap & Chic is a fun and witty fragrance, both formal and informal, both young and mature but always sensuous. A woman of style, Olive Oyl is the inspiration behind the Cheap and Chic bottle.
top: The original recipe brings together fresh sparkling top notes of bergamot, yuzu, Brazilian rosewood and Paraguayan petit grain, followed by a luminous heart that is a magical floral bouquet of living Baghdad nymphea, peony, cyclamen, water flowers, violet flowers, jasmin and wild rose. Rounding out the Floral fragrance is a mystical base of rich sandalwood, orris, vetiver, tonka bean, grey amber and musk, with a vaporous spiral of vanilla and white orchid as an act of final seduction.
middle: Top notesBergamot, Yuzu, Rosewood, Paraguayan Petit Grain.
base: Heart notesBaghdad Nymphea, Cyclamen, Peony, Water Flowers, Wild Rose, Violet, Jasmine.

title: MOSCHINO, TOY 2 BUBBLE GUM EDT 100ML W
description: Toy 2 Bubblegum, is still encased in the iconic shape of a teddy bear but this time with a transparent glass body and a cap offering a hint of perfectly pink elegance. It displays impeccable attention to detail with cool silver accents for an ultra-modern, enchanting tone. Fun, outgoing and playful notes explore the nuances of her majesty the rose, creating a delicate scent of bubble gum, from which the fragrance takes its name, and relieves the spirit of negative thoughts whilst enveloping the body and stimulating the mind. Candied citrus fruits, Italian lemon essence and orange essence combine with a bubblegum accord at the top before giving way to a heart of cinnamon, blackcurrant, ginger, Bulgarian rose essence, peach flowers and vine peach. A dry-down of cedarwood essence, ambrofix and a musk cocktail rounds out this Floral-Fruity-Oriental eau de toilette that is suitable for vegans.NotesTop Notes: Candied Citrus Fruits, Italian Lemon Essence, Orange Essence, Bubblegum Accord.Heart Notes: Cinnamon, Blackcurrant, Ginger, Bulgarian Rose Essence, Peach Flowers, Vine Peach.Base Notes: Cedarwood Essence, Ambrofix, Musk Cocktail

title: Moschino, Toy 2 Edp 100Ml W
description: Play up your flirty and feminine nature by splashing on some Moschino Toy 2, a whimsical women’s fragrance. This luminous perfume boasts fruity, floral and woody accords for a sweet and romantic scent that enhances any killer ensemble.
top: Top notes of fresh magnolia, crisp green apple and juicy mandarin orange create an opening atmosphere that’s intriguing and endlessly inviting, while heart notes of rich jasmine, white currant and delicate peony interlace the aroma with a masterful, chic bouquet. Completing the concoction are base notes of white musk, amberwood and creamy sandalwood for a seductive finish that transcends a cute, bubbly aroma and becomes a mature, tantalizing elixir that’s suitable for any modern woman of today.

title: Narciso Rodriguez, All Of Me Edp 100Ml W
description: All of me by Narciso Rodriguez. The one-of-a-kind essence of me, all of me…
top: All of me is the new perfume for women by Narciso Rodriguez Parfums – a daring and prismatic floral fragrance, created for a new generation of women who are confident to show their true colours and embrace all that makes them unique.
middle: A perfume of many facetsA celebration of individuality and self-expression, all of me reinvents floral perfume by fusing precious rose centifolia with bold geranium bourbon, a note usually found only in men’s fragrances. Together with this distinctive duet of rose and geranium, an accord of delicate milky-white muscs reinvents the iconic Narciso rodriguez signature. Six different musc notes are blended together to create an addictive, second-skin quality, each one bringing a new dimension to the multi-faceted blend of florals.

title: NARCISO RODRIGUEZ, ALL OF ME INTENSE EDP 100ML W
description: All of me eau de parfum intense is the daring new women’s perfume by Narciso Rodriguez Parfums. A bold floral fragrance for the empowered woman who embraces every facet of herself, unapologetically. Self-love is her power, every step of the way. She is all of me, intensely.

title: Narciso Rodriguez, Fleur Musc Edp 100Ml W
description: The for her FLEUR MUSC eau de parfum is a vibrant reinterpretation of a floral bouquet. This perfume blends pink flowers and pink berries with the patented heart of musc found in all for her fragrances. The result is a fragrance that is sublime, dazzling, and unique.
top: Born of simplicity and essentiality; guided by femininity and elegance. The for her line is Narciso Rodriguez’s gift to women and an homage to their inner beauty. The patented heart of musc infused in every for her perfume takes its wearer on a sensorial journey.
middle: Top notesBouquet of roses and pink Peppercorns
base: Heart notesHeart of Musc

title: NARCISO RODRIGUEZ, FLEUR MUSC FLORALE EDT 100ML W
description: Narciso Rodriguez for her Fleur Musc Eau de Toilette Florale is a vibrant and dazzling reinterpretation of a floral bouquet. Tender rose and punchy pink peppercorn illuminate the musk heart, wrapped in sensual amber and patchouli base notes.

title: Narciso Rodriguez, Musc Noir Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: When you want to make someone really happy, a luxury fragrance is always the right choice. And Narciso Rodriguez For Her Musc Noir perfume set for women in a gorgeous packaging will bring even more joy. Trust the magic of a perfect matching set that will enchant any woman.
top: Set contains:
middle: For Her Musc Noir Eau de Parfum, 100mlFor Her Musc Noir Eau de Parfum, Purse Spray, 10mlFor Her Body Lotion, 50ml

title: Narciso Rodriguez, Musc Noir Rose Edp 100Ml W
description: The Fragrance inspiration for For Her Musc Noir Rose Eau de Parfum marks a new chapter in For Her’s story of modern femininity. With this fragrance, the For Her woman lays herself bare, unveiling her true self and revealing the most personal side of her femininity. More sensual and less deep than For Her Musc Noir, the amber floral fragrance Musc Noir Rose blooms with a new voluptuous bouquet of tuberose.
top: The Fragrance notes:
middle: Top notes of Italian bergamot oil, highlighted with pink peppercorn, bring a sweet fruitinessSolar notes fuse with the signature.

The musc is enhanced with elegant woody and amber facets of sensuous cedarwood and cashmeran, giving the fragrance a mysterious, diffusive trail. description: This Parfums de Marly body cream is encapsulated in the poetic floral scent of Delina. Soft and light in its disposition, the Delina Body Cream has a delicate texture that nurtures the skin. With a vibrant radiance and a stirring floral composition, Delina is a sparkling scent that encompasses the softness and sensuality of what it is to be a woman. It is the perfect touch of modern femininity and sensorial delight capturing the beauty of its wearer with a heart of rose.

title: Parfums De Marly, Delina Edp 75Ml W
description: Composed by Guerlain-trained perfumer Quentin Bisch, Delina is a floral bouquet, a fragrant tribute to feminity and sensuality. Housed in a gorgeously soft pink bottle with pink tassels to boot, the polished, delicate character is apparent from the beginning. It opens brightly with sweet, juicy lychee and softly tangy rhubarb, but these tart fruits aren’t sharp in the least, and serve only to provide lift with a wink. It is the posh lily of the valley, regal Turkish rose, and fresh peony that form the beautiful feminine heart. Creamy and undulating with vanilla and white musk, Delina is flawlessly blended to soft, sumptuous delight.

title: PENHALIGON’S, LADY BLANCHE EDP 75ML W
description: What are the secrets of the British aristocracy? Are they as well behaved, courteous and polite as they seem to be? “Portraits” is a tribute to the English spirit; between establishment, humour and provocation. The family portrait starts with one of its main character: Lady Blanche (chapter I).
top: Wife of Lord Geroge, she is a social butterfly y with a dangerous bite one might say. Shakespeare did try to warn us “hell hath no fury like a woman scorned”. Indeed, a woman does always know. Refined and delicate but without ever being bland. This is a fragrance with an impeccable education. A fragrance that announces only its discretion but that makes you sit up and take note. Modestly uplifting. Timelessly present.

description: Each Infusion fragrance in the Prada collection, is a poetic interpretation of a single, natural ingredient.

title: Prada, Les Infusions D’Iris Edp 100Ml  W Gift Set
description: INFUSION IRIS by Prada is an “Eau de Parfum” for women with floral and woody notes. This perfume makes a nod to the traditions of the past so that they let us understand the place we occupy in the present, and at the same time, it seeks a perfect harmonious balance in a chaotic world, transporting us to an isolated place and in full calm.
top: This fragrance was created in 2007 by the perfumer Daniela (Roche) Andrier, and belongs to the Les Infusions de Prada collection, fragrances that initially we could only buy in the official stores of the firm. Its essence is a total evocation of the scent of freshly ironed sheets and clean, naked skin, smells that transport us to our childhood and remain always intact in our memory.
middle: Its delicate and elaborate trail begins with the flower of the African orange tree, orange, mandarin and neroli, citrus fruits with a certain point of sweetness, which create a soft mattress on which the floral notes, its protagonists, such as iris, mastic resin of the mastic and galbanum, finally ending with a soft woody background.
base: IRIS INFUSION. The name of this fragrance is due to the process that the iris is subjected to in order to extract its essence. This is subjected to a constant infusion for 6 months, to extract all its olfactory properties.

title: Prada, Paradoxe Edp 90Ml W
description: A floral ambery fragrance that embraces the paradoxes of iconic ingredients to reveal new scented sensations. Reinventing freshness with the first Neroli bud extraction for Prada, to capture the flower’s fresh dimension. Reinventing sensuality with Ambrofix™, a bio-converted amber, revealing a vibrant warmth. Reinventing intensity through a new revolutionary musk molecule: the Serenolide™, for an intense yet subtle and comfortable trail noticeable right from the top.
top: Top Notes: Calabrian Bergamot Heart, Tangerine Essence, Pear Accord
middle: Heart Notes: Neroli Essence and Neroli Bud Essence, Tunisian Orange Flower Heart Absolute Blossom, Jasmine Sambac Absolute
base: Base Notes: Amber Accord (Ambrofix™), Laos Benzoin Resinoid, Madagascar Premium Bourbon Vanilla Infusion, White Musk Accord (Serenolide)

title: RAMON MOLVIZER, QUEEN GOLDSKIN EDP 75ML W
description: The story behind the scent is about women..A woman who is strong, courageous and a natural born leader who sometimes needs to be reminded of just how amazing they are. And this new fragrance will help you to honor your mother, sisters, wife, or the daughters in your life.
top: Despite the sacrifices women make to ensure our emotional and physical well being, we take it for granted because we assume it’s their duty. It’s time we treated all women with the respect that queens deserve. They play a variety of integral roles in our day-to-day lives.
middle: This incredible perfume will have you adjusting your crown, ladies!
base: If you’re a woman, you have a royal highness in you, so let these queen fragrance inspire you to keep your head held high and make others take notice. Let these scent remind you of the huge role you play in shaping the world.

top: The inspiration for this scent, from the perfumer Ramon Monegal: “OLE! … my favorite exclamation! A fusion between folklore and Spanish art. My manifesto Olé!Olé to art! Olé to freedom! Olé to passion! Olé to disinhibition! Olé to the provocation! Olé to the imagination! Olé to originality! Olé to emotion! Olé to the joy! And Olé to life!
middle: Top Notes:
base: Dates, Pineapple, Raspberry

title: Ramon Monegal, Pure Mariposa Edp 100Ml W
description: One of the most exciting moments in this new stage has been to discover a new source of inspiration in art. Mariposa, Alexander Calder’s mobile sculpture and the first in the extraordinary collection that Stanley Marcus brought to his fashion houses, has been my inspiration, grounded in the values of elegance and freedom to celebrate the exclusivity that only art allows.”“The butterfly is an extraordinary creature that embodies many of the values that motivate me when I look for inspiration to fashion an olfactory tale in the form of a perfume”.Memorable, feminine, resplendent, light and persistent. A harmonious, colorful, and elegant floral nectar accord with a festive tone, dressed in a dew covered green forest , pure and vital, surrounded by a rejuvenating breeze of ozonic air on a majestic and rich bottom accord of a noble amber and silky musk.

title: RASASI, LA YUQAWAM JASMINE WISP EDP 100ML W
description: Jasmine Wisp, women fragrance of LaYuqawam edition III, true to the DNA of the series celebrates confidence, irresistibility and timeless elegance through a highly distinguishing olfactory signature. The perfume pays homage to the famed Middle Eastern tradition of elegant intoxicating fragrant trail; a la scent signature that announces a weaver much before the arrival while leaving behind a mysteriously lingering aura. A distinctive white floral vanilla scent laced with generous ambry pear juice and hints of citrus along with appetizing notes of Bourbon vanilla, coumarin and maltol giving the scent a gourmand touch. The accentuated note of amber with strawberry imparts it an irresistible young, vivacious and feisty signature while the sweetness of Anjou infused with overwhelming floral scent of the Starkrimson pear gives it a sensuous appeal. The Jasmine Wisp woman is a young, modern, cosmopolitan dreamer with a love for discovery. The lovely trail of the fragrance heightens her inner confidence while enveloping her in an aura of sensuous mystery. The long lasting fruity floral fragrance brimming with happiness and promise is ideal for woman with a vivacious personality, one who is always at the center of attention.
top: Top Notes: Lemon, Mandarin & Grapefruit

title: RASASI, LA YUQAWAM POUR FEMME EDP 100ML W
Rihanna, Nude Edp 100Ml W
description: Nude’ by Rihanna is sensual and provocative. It is an uninhibited scent that captures a stripped down essence. The fragrance allows her fans to experience something very personal, a true embodiment of the singer.
top: The scent’s prominent top notes give fans a glimpse into her native Barbados with layers of guava nectar, mandarin and pear. The centre of the fragrance opens into a sultry softness with a blend of orange blossom, gardenia petals and velvet jasmine sambac. The seductive, milky gourmand base weaves together sandalwood and second skin musk with the fresh and feminine hints of vanilla orchid rounding out a fragrance that is at once daring, yet accessible.

title: Rihanna, Reb’L Fleur Edp 100Ml 4 Pcs Gift Set W
description: Rihanna, Reb’l Fleur Edp 100ml 4 Pcs Gift Set
top: Rihanna’s newest fragrance, Rebelle, is a gorgeous Gourmand Chypre and smells almost good enough to eat. It instills images of Caribbean sunsets and lazy days with your lover in a tropical paradise while unleashing a femininity that beguiles all in its wake. Rihanna said, “My new fragrance is about taking control but still being a lady. There’s a feminine, romantic element to the fragrance – but there’s also a defiant quality in it. I love its duality.” Delectable top notes of Strawberries, Ripe Purple Plum and Ginger blend delightfully with heart notes of Cacao Absolute, Vanilla Orchid and Heliotrope before melting into a sumptuous and sensual base of Patchouli, Coffee Beans, Creamy Musk and Amber
middle: Gift set contains
base: Shower gel
