title: Roberto Cavalli, Edp 75Ml W
description: Described as a floral and oriental perfume, Roberto Cavalli eau de parfum spray for women opens with top notes of pink pepper, fusing with a heart of African orange flower, all of which is rounded off with a smooth base of benzoin, Tonka bean and vanilla.

title: Roberto Cavalli, Florence Blossom Edp 75Ml W
description: Roberto Cavalli Florence Blossom brings a new luminosity to the iconic Florence fragrance line. The zesty, opening notes celebrate the richness of a luscious Tuscan garden, mingling bergamont with sweet blackcurrant and tangy mandarin. Contrasting notes comprise a fresh bouquet, a delicate rose infusion and subtle jasmine and orange blossom. Sophisticated base notes of patchouli essence, sandalwood and iris accord, combined with ambrox, complete a well-rounded, floral scent that celebrates the collection’s authenticity and the wearer’s freedom of spirit.

title: Roberto Cavalli, Florence Edp 75Ml W
description: A luminous ode to the most refined arts, from sculpture to painting, architecture or landscaping, Florence is also known for its fabulous flowers. It is a city of light and delight that harmoniously balances nature and culture, past and present, splendor and joie de vivre.
top: The Roberto Cavalli Florence woman reflects this perfect combination of audacity, beauty, and sensuality. Naturally elegant, effortlessly sophisticated, she radiates with charm and unassuming confidence. In every circumstance, she’s magnetic, seductive, without even noticing it.
middle: Top Note: Orange Blossom.
base: Heart Note: Patchouli.

title: ROBERTO CAVALLI, GEMMA DI PARADISO EDP 75ML W
description: Blending the refreshing citrus zing of mandarin with warming vanilla and the addition of sweet wild jasmine, this sophisticated fragrance recalls the scent of an exotic garden. Addictive, rich and sensual, its floral oriental aroma seduces with the irresistible allure of a highly sought-after precious gem. Demanding attention with its feminine and romantic notes, Gemma Di Paradiso will leave an unforgettable impression.

title: Roberto Cavalli, Nero Assoluto Edp 75Ml W
description: Back in the art of seduction with Roberto Cavalli Nero Assoluto Eau de Parfum Spray. This bold and glamorous perfume is designed for the everyday woman who wants to stand out from the crowd. Nero Assoluto opens with top notes of orchid accord which later blend with sumptuous heart notes of dark vanilla and ebony wood to create a sultry cocktail of desire and intrigue.
top: Robert Cavalli Nero Assoluto EDP is housed in a glamorous and extravagant black bottle, which is adorned with a precious gold emblem, helping to sum up this sophisticated and primal fragrance, perfect for everyday wear.

title: ROBERTO CAVALLI, OUD AL QASR EDP 75ML W
description: Roberto Cavalli Oud Al Qasr is an oriental fragrance for contemporary women.Oud is blended with saffron, which introduces a leather theme in the top notes along with shimmering mandarin and the honeyed trail of orange blossom.These heady white flowers are combined with lush addictive vanilla.

middle: Heart notes: orange blossom and leather.
base: Base notes: oud, amber, incense and vanilla.

title: Roberto Cavalli, Paradiso Assoluto Edp 75Ml W
description: Paradiso Assoluto by Roberto Cavalli is a chypre floral fragrance for women.
top: Paradiso Assoluto feels like Spring and Summer time and represents aromas of a heavenly garden, its generous nature and intense flowers. It is announced as a sensual and alluring scent that starts floral and spicy with accords of red pepper and wisteria. A wild jasmine note, signature to the Paradiso line, is mixed with red lily in the heart of the perfume. The base is described as sensual and creamy, with accords of patchouli, sandalwood and vanilla.
middle: Top notes: Wisteria, Pink Pepper, Grapefruit, Bergamot, Lemon
base: Middle notes: Wild Jasmine, Red Lily, Passionfruit

title: Roberto Cavalli, Paradiso Azzuro Edp 75Ml W
description: Paradiso Azzurro is a sparkling celebration of the beauty of the Mediterranean coast. A mix of soft and delicate dewy floral notes, with intense aromatic hints of a crisp and embracing sea breeze.
top: The initial accord evokes a subtle Mediterranean breeze: a touch of citrus with a zesty note of bergamot blends with the top notes of lavender. This breeze softly blends with the aroma of the jasmine petals. The captivating floral middle note creates the most sublime almost carnal balance between the jasmine and the fragile innocence of its dew covered petals. The intense woody base notes of cypress and musky cashmeran create a warm and embracing aroma with a hypnotic and lingering perfume.

title: Roberto Cavalli, Paradiso Edp 100Ml W

title: Roberto Cavalli, Paradiso Edp 75Ml W
description: Paradiso is the key to a parallel world embraced by a secret garden in a magnificent villa nestled on the coast of the Mediterranean Sea. A tantalising prelude of crisp citrus notes blend with those of warm exotic bergamot and sweet mandarin. A fresh and sparkling head gives way to a subtle heart of wild jasmine. The base note of the fragrance boasts a rich and delicate accord of cypress, oleander and Mediterranean pine trees. A refined accord of Italian aromas extend and intensify the hypnotic effect of the jasmine generating a persistent woody base note.

title: Roja, Dove Elixir Edp 100Ml W
description: A bright and effervescent creation which brings together of the Floral and Ambrée styles, Elixir is a Rose and Raspberry-based perfume of perfectly-balanced beauty. With a powdery hint of Violet and the Cherry-like sweetness of Heliotrope, a floral heart of seven different flowers each lend their varied personalities as they push the elegance of the Rose to centre-stage. The mouth-watering qualities of a prominent trio of Peach, Raspberry and Vanilla transform Elixir into an addictively sweet scent, which is underscored by a captivating Ambrée base built around the warmth of Woods and Amber. A scent with a sensual weightlessness, Elixir has the unusual ability to let this quality linger on the skin throughout the day.

This enchanting scent opens with a burst of fruity notes of Green apple and bergamot, leading into a floral heart of jasmine and Neroli. The base notes of vanilla and cedarwood add a touch of warmth and sensuality, creating a captivating and unforgettable aura. Embrace your pride and femininity with this luxurious and empowering fragrance.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Amo Edp 100Ml W
description: Amo Ferragamo is a bright and glamorous perfume for women. Literally translated, Amo means “I love” in Italian, and the unique sensuality of this floral oriental fragrance is a bold declaration of passion and lust for life.
top: Representing the younger generation, the Amo Ferragamo woman is a free-spirit who is ready to seize any opportunity that the world offers her. Full of explosive personality, the fragrance opens with tempting notes of Campari, black currant and rosemary before giving way to a heart of light and feminine jasmine sambac, rhubarb and mate absolute. In the dry-down, a feminine veil of creamy sandalwood, sweet Tahitian vanilla and delicate ambroxan emerges to round out this unconventional and daring perfume.
middle: Top Notes: Blackcurrant, Campari, Rosemary.
base: Heart Notes: Jasmine Sambac, Mate, Rhubarb Leaf.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Amo Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: Amo edp gift set
top: Amo Ferragamo by Salvatore Ferragamo is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.
middle: Top notes are campari, black currant and rosemary

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Amo Flowerful Edt 100Ml W
description: Amo Flowerful highlights an abundance of floral notes within the embrace of fresh fruits. Promising an innocent expression of optimism, Amo Flowerful encourages a positive and revitalising energy.
top: Top notes of campari, blackcurrant and yuzu enable a tart sweetness. The heart of plum blossom, jasmine and peony creates a refreshing and sensual floral accord. Base notes of wood, vanilla orchid and musk settle the scent.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Amo Per Lei Edp 100Ml W
description: Amo Ferragamo per Lei Eau de Parfum is a radiant, sophisticated woody floral musky blend that explores all the facets of modern, mindful femininity. A blend of fruity accents, green accords and woody nuances. The fragrance opens with the natural simplicity of fruity Pear and Raspberry Juice notes that segue into an intoxicating, romantic heart of Osmanthus and transparent Magnolia. The dry down is a unique, sensual combination of Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Cashmere and Musk, where time is suspended in a warm, enveloping embrace.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Emozione Edp 92Ml W
description: This multifaceted fragrance blends feminine floral bouquets, precious woody textures and sensual, glamorous chypre notes. The luminous gleam of the juicy bergamot’s freshness is softened by powdery iris and white peach notes for a velvety sensation. The heart expresses glamorous femininity through a bouquet of delicate peonies, sensual Bulgarian roses and addictive heliotrope.A harmonious embrace, between the mysterious patchouli and intense suede notes, enhances the scent’s richness that is exalted by a veil of white musk, creating a sumptuous dry down.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Signorina Edp 100Ml W
description: Enter into a world of chic femininity with the Salvatore Ferragamo Signorina Eau de Parfum, a pretty fragrance with a hint of audacity.
top: The Signorina woman is timeless, modern and creative, with a subtly cheeky character. Her zest for life and graceful sensuality are mirrored in her beautiful fragrance.
middle: Fragrance Notes:
base: Signorina captures the elegance and charm of Italian style in a cascade of floriental and fruity notes. The bright fizzy notes of currant spiced by fresh pink pepper bring their joyful, cheeky character to green notes. A generous dewy floral heart is composed of elegant jasmine, pink peony and rose. Spontaneous and delicate sweetness of pannacotta together with soft musks and intriguing woody patchouli notes offer a racy Italian elegance and an unexpected addictiveness.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Signorina Eleganza Edp 100Ml W
description: Signorina Eleganza Perfume by Salvatore Ferragamo is a tribute to luxury, elegance, and beauty.
top: It opens with top notes of grapefruit and pear.
middle: That exhilarating start is followed by a heart that features golden osmanthus petals and almond powder.
base: This sophisticated scent’s foundation is a combination of white leather and patchouli that creates a lasting dry-down effect.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Signorina Misteriosa Edp 100Ml W
description: Signorina Misteriosa Perfume by Salvatore Ferragamo made its debut in 2016. It’s the perfect scent for a spontaneous night on the town, full of passion, mystery, and following one’s instincts.
top: It opens with top notes of wild blackberries and neroli. Its heart is a blend of orange blossom and tuberose. At its base sits an inviting, eclectic blend of patchouli, black vanilla husk, and milk mousse.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Signorina Misteriosa Edp 100Ml W Gift Set
description: Salvatore Ferragamo frees the unpredictable facet of the Signorina woman with a mysteriously daring fragrance, Signorina Misteriosa. With distinctive top notes of wild blackberry and neroli, this chic fragrance is both unexpected and mysterious.

The scent envelops the senses with its floral notes and delightful Italian accents. It speaks to a new generation of free spirits, celebrating the distinct essence of the cosmopolitan woman—a soul who approaches life with curiosity, authenticity, and an open-minded attitude.

title: Sean John, Unforgivable Woman Edp 125Ml W
description: Sean John Unforgivable Woman is a highly exceptional floral fragrance. Floral notes are mixed with fresh but also warm fragrant essences. The perfume is ideal to wear all year round, it can please in any weather.
top: Unforgivable Woman opens with a flood of freshness. A gentle floral scent of neroli is accompanied by a scent of unrestrained fruit, especially bergamot. The heart of the perfume belongs to elegant and refined flowers. Rose, jasmine and violet essences are the most dominant. This slightly powdery floral composition is based on a warm and deep base. It consists of sensual musk, amber and warming wood notes.
middle: Unforgivable Woman is unbelievably seductive and sexy. It is a teasing combination of gentle and brittle tenderness. The perfume is powdery and supple. At the same time, it contains pure attraction and seduction. This is a combination that no man can resist and every man longs for.
base: This perfume is perfect for elegant and self-confident women who have their own style. Such women have a sexy side concealed within them but primarily, they are gently and tenderly beautiful. Unforgivable Woman will also suit ambitious women who like to try what they can do and explore opportunities of the world they live in.

title: Shiseido, Ginza Edp 50Ml W
description: GINZA Eau de Parfum by Shiseido . Fragrance with a floral bouquet emphasized by different woods.

middle: Uniquely designed bottle that symbolizes both femininity with undulating shapes and the inner strength of a woman with a black dagger.

The heart includes a liberal flower bouquet made of freesia, gardenia, violet, lily-of-the-valley, Chinese rose, red apple and lotus bloom. The warm and arousing trail mixes patchouli, cedar wood, musk and white musk, golden and frankincense.

When they gather, the butterflies become one and remind us of the happiness and joy of giving. This collage, illuminated by the deep black of the box, echoes the intensity of Eau du Soir.

Enjoy the sensuous experience of wearing S.T. Dupont, and indulge in its rich, romantic aromatic formula.
top: “The full bouquet though is so complex that you’ll probably forget the top notes by the time you get down to base. And I swear that’s how it wears. Changing every 15 minutes it gives you the opportunity to enjoy a little bit af everything.Dry, earthy and pretty herbal with a pinch af fruits and flowers it creates a truly unique Chypre perfume.”

description: Stella Pop perfume, by Stella McCartney, is a freewheeling, olfactory carnival meant to embody the spirit of the unbound modern woman.
top: This uplifting floral woody looks to a blend of white blooms and warm resins to create an aroma that’s both clean and sparkling.
middle: Top notes of orange, violet and tomato leaves form a powerful and unexpected open. Notes of creamy tuberose and rich sandalwood anchor the heart of this scent, which seductively melts into a base of cedar and alluring, powdery musk.

title: THE MERCHANT OF VENICE, IMPERIAL EMERALD EDP 100ML W
THE MERCHANT OF VENICE, QUEEN OF THE NIGHT EDP 100ML W
THIERRY MUGLER, ALIEN BODY CREAM 200ML W
description: embodying a solar goddess, radiant and sensual, alien by mugler diffuses peace and magic in its wake, thanks to its talisman fragrance. alien is a talisman capable of revealing the light and creative force of every woman. it illuminates the wearer with an extraordinary halo. the rich and sensual notes of the alien perfume reflect the feminine force: a powerful floral scent of jasmine linked to woody and amber notes.
top: the radiant essence of alien eau de parfum is available as a body cream with alien beautyfying body cream. alien beautifying body cream is a creamy treatment that instantly beautifies and shines the skin. its radiance enhancer complex leaves your body intensely hydrated and delicately scented. the bewitching and mysterious notes of alien eau de parfum illuminate your body with soothing softness.
middle: alien eau de parfum body cream meets the requirements of the most sensitive skin. it can be used in a daily ritual all over the body, after a shower or bath.

title: Thierry Mugler, Alien Edp 90Ml W
description: Alien Perfume by Thierry Mugler, is captivating in its unusual composition . It’s one of the most simplistic and also one of the most unique perfumes available for women, and it’s many fragrance fans’ favorite for nighttime wear.
top: Alien perfume contains Indian jasmine top notes, woody scents for the middle notes, and white amber in the base notes. One can also catch green notes and a hint of vanilla. This heady combination makes it almost untraceable, similar to how one would imagine the soil of a foreign planet to smell.
middle: Alien fragrance is meant to mesmerize and make the wearer feel out of this world. For fashionable, stylish women everywhere, this perfume is know for its ability to turn.

title: Thierry Mugler, Alien Fusion Edp 60Ml W
description: In the heart of the desert, when the sun meets the moon and day and night come together, an eclipse occurs. Within this raging blaze, a new talisman is born: the Alien Fusion fragrance.
top: Mystical and remarkable, the Alien Fusion perfume is the result of a unique encounter between sensual notes of vanilla and spicier notes of cinnamon. With Alien Fusion, MUGLER has reinvented Alien as a warm and feminine Eau de Parfum.
middle: Alien Fusion, a fiery and terrifically sensual Eau de Parfum, belongs to the Spicy Floral Ambery fragrance family and unfolds in three successive notes:– Dazzling Revelation: Ginger, Cinnamon– Lavish Revelation: Tuberose, Orange Blossom– Soft Revelation: Vanilla, White Amber

title: Thierry Mugler, Alien Goddess Edp 60Ml W
description: Thierry Mugler, Alien Goddess Edp 60Ml W

title: Thierry Mugler, Alien Goddess Edp 90Ml W
description: An incandescent and generous solar embrace.” Marie Salamagne & Nathalie Lorson, ALIEN GODDESS perfumers. This floral, solar, woody creation leaves behind a trail facetted by the most glorious ingredients in the perfumer’s palette that will mesmerize your senses. A solar floral bouquet sparkling with luminosity faceted around 3 revelations.
top: Radiant revelation: The fragrance opens with the radiant revelation of a sparkling Italian Bergamot essence, recalling the first rays of sunlight. An intense burst of light that crosses the fragrance, similar to the positive energy of the solar goddess.
middle: Miraculous revelation: An intense solar flower propels ALIEN GODDESS Eau de Parfum straight to the heights, giving all of its strength to its benevolent message. Performing like a dazzling floral prism, it gives pride of place to a supreme flower: Jasmine Grandiflorum, a truly golden flower, symbol of femininity and sensuality. In the heart of ALIEN GODDESS Eau de Parfum radiates a magnificent Superinfusion of Jasmine Grandiflorum crafted for MUGLER. The Superinfusion process gives the Jasmine petals a modern facet, both fruity and petal-like, as well as a creamy texture. More radiating and modern than ever, spreading the ideals of the solar goddess.
base: Mindful revelation: The conclusion to ALIEN GODDESS’s message of peace and hope, the Mindful revelation unveils the addictive fullness of a Bourbon Vanilla. Crafted for MUGLER, this Premium Infusion is both smooth and enveloping like a veil of comforting silk. This consciously sourced premium extract is obtained through an extraction technology allowing to seize the complete organoleptic profile at the heart of the raw material. Unveiling a delicious Vanilla note with balsamic tonalities, it will delight your senses with deep mysterious warm vibrations.

title: Thierry Mugler, Alien Goddess Intense Edp 90Ml W
description: A year after Alien Goddess’ inspiring release, MUGLER celebrates its aniversary with the introduction of the Alien Goddess Intense Eau de Parfum.The extraordinary steps into a new dimension.
top: Fueled by an incandescent light, Alien Goddess’ inner strength is limitless.
middle: The olfactory signature and new deep amber bottle push Alien Goddess Intense Eau de Parfum into a universal call for all women to embrace the extraordinary!
base: The new scent for women amplifies the magnetic notes of Calabrian Bergamot, Jasmine Grandiflorum Superinfusion and Vanilla Bourbon Infusion – signature notes of the original iconic scent – to deliver sensuality and audacity.

title: Thierry Mugler, Angel Edp 100Ml W
description: Angel is the fragrance of a woman who dares to live up her dreams with her blue star as her guide. Confident and seductive, she fascinates those who cross her path. Between power and pleasure, she uses her ultra-femininity as a signature. Between heaven and earth, she makes her dreams a reality. Angel Eau de Parfum is the first Gourmand perfume in the world of fragrance.
top: In 1992, MUGLER revolutionized the world of perfumery by offering a pioneering fragrance, never felt before: without flowers but with addictive raw materials, played in overdose for an assertive sensuality. Carnal and sensual, Angel is a reinterpretation of oriental wakes which initiates a new genre, the Gourmand.
middle: Angel Eau de Parfum combines the power of patchouli with the sensuality of notes of praline, red fruits and vanilla absolute.
base: Celestial Facet: Calabrian BergamotThe smell of the wind, the sky, the great outdoors, the infinite: Calabrian bergamot stings the senses like a breath of fresh air.

title: Thierry Mugler, Angel Edp 50Ml W 2Pcs Gift Set

Discover new ways to unleash your perfume’s unrivaled power of seduction that, in addition to its bottle, comes in a perfuming brush and body lotion. Angel, the first gourmand fragrance in the history of perfumery, blends the power of patchouli with the sweet sensuality of praline, red berries, and vanilla notes. A sensual and irresistible gift set.

Its middle notes reveal the deepest rose scent, achieved through the sustainable process of upcycling, or double distilling rose petals. The Akigalawood at the base transforms this fragrance for a long-lasting scent of cosmic power.

title: Thierry Mugler, Aura Edp 90Ml W
description: Aura MUGLER is an invitation to reconnect with your instinct, your deep nature and your senses. Each woman discovers in her an unsuspected power and lets all her femininity explode. Her aura shines with force. Aura MUGLER is a powerful and instinctive fragrance that embodies the meeting of the animal world and the plant world by fusing floral freshness and feline sensuality. An Eau de Parfum with an assertive character that diffuses vibrant and sensual notes.
top: A unique creation with instinctive notes, Aura MUGLER Eau de Parfum is aimed at women in search of authenticity, ready to explore their deep nature and to express a new, instinctive and powerful femininity. For those looking for a sensual, vibrant and powerful fragrance with a strong character.

title: Thomas Kosmala, No. 4 Candy Edp 100Ml U
Tiffany & Company, Edp 75Ml W
description: Tiffany & Co. Eau de Parfum is a radiant and modern scent that opens with vibrant top notes of vert de mandarin. At its heart, the precious iris flower, this signature ingredient adds strength and femininity that grounds the composition with refinement and sophistication. Tiffany & Co. dries down to a sensual finish on the skin with warm nuances of patchouli wrapped in gentle musky notes.
top: Master Perfumer Daniela Andrier was inspired by her love for gemstones and jewellery to create this contemporary take on the most precious ingredients of traditional haute perfumery.
middle: This sparkling floral musk fragrance is designed around the noble iris, a flower long associated with Tiffany as a recurring motif in its jewellery designs.

It also has a woodsy, spicy element that compliments the citrus while still remaining feminine.

description: Enticing. Exotic. Seductive.

middle: Three precious rose essences dance with exotic spices and dark coffee. Saffron and black pepper entice the tight blossoms of rose de mai to unfurl.

title: Tomford, Velvet Orchid Edp 100Ml W
description: Find yourself bedazzled by the refreshing and illuminating Tom Ford Velvet Orchid, a mesmerizing women’s fragrance. This intriguing perfume combines citrus, gourmand and woody accords with a litany of floral notes that revitalize the mind and body with every spritz.
top: Top notes of sparkling bergamot, sweet mandarin orange, sweet smooth honey and sugary rum extract introduce the aroma with a burst of zesty goodness that winds down into the rich and sultry gourmand flavors.
middle: Meanwhile, middle notes of orange blossom, orchid, jasmine, black orchid, heliotrope, narcissus, hyacinth, magnolia and decadent rose oil infuse the elixir with their vibrant and exhilarating bouquet, sure to awaken the senses and make any woman feel feminine and pretty.
base: Finally, base notes of suede, myrrh, sandalwood, vanilla, Peru Balsam and French labdanum complete the scent with their exotic, Oriental atmosphere for a truly stunning result that’s impossible to ignore.

title: Tomford, White Suede Edp 100Ml W
description: A warm and spicy eau de parfum that channels the addictive pull of leather and suede through an elegant musk-derived composition.
top: Fragrance story:
middle: Musk’s primal intensity is harmonized with saffron and thyme, heightened with velvety rose and warm amber. Warm, supple and sensual, it is a perfume with an irresistible expression of raw desired.
base: Style: Warm, spicy.

title: Tommy Hillfiger, Tommy Girl Edt 100Ml W
description: Tommy Hilfiger women’s fragrance. A refreshing and energetic scent with top notes of black currant, mandarin orange and apple tree blossom; middle notes include honeysuckle, lily, violet, mint, grapefruit, lemon and rose; base notes are magnolia, leather, sandalwood, jasmine and cedar.

title: Trussardi, Donna Edp 100Ml W
description: Emininity of its bright white bottle featuring golden accents. This scent will take your senses on a journey from purity to passion. On the first inhale, you catch fruity hints created by the vibrant notes of yuzu, slightly unripe citron and the freshness of water fruit. The middle notes unfold through the light hints of white flowers, the sunny character of orange blossoms and the sophistication of jasmine tea, finishing off with delicate water lily. The base notes envelope the nose with their intense woody nuances. Trussardi Donna pulls the veil back on an irresistibly seductive fragrance.

title: TRUSSARDI, THE BLACK  ROSE EDP 100ML U
description: The sythesis of Trussardi The Black Rose is worked around the core of Taif roses. A pink pepper note is set at the opening, while the base completions in a work of art, warm, oriental way, with notes of vanilla, patchouli, musk and golden.
top: Fragrance Notes
middle: Top Note: pink pepper
base: Heart Note:taif rose

title: VALENTINO, BORN IN ROMA CORAL FANTASY EDP 100ML W
description: With BORN IN ROMA CORAL FANTASY, Valentino invites you to a new Roman sunset. As coral light floods the skyline, it’s time for a new expression of fantasy:– A COLOR TOP NOTE: A juicy, refreshing kiwi accord tinted with radiant and sparkling Orange essence creates a colorful boldness.– A COUTURE HEART NOTE: a super infusion of Jasmine flowers creates a modern twist with a haute couture bouquet accord echoing the floral femininity.– A COOL BASE NOTE: An Ambrette seeds note which brings textural warmth and softness to the fragrance, combined with woody Musks accord.

title: Valentino, Donna Born In Roma Edp 100Ml W

Three qualities of jasmine bring a luxurious femininity that is blended with vanilla bourbon, the most expensive extract in the world. This is twisted with radiant trio of modern wood, giving an edgy touch reminiscent of Rome street culture.
top: blackcurrant
middle: jasmine grandiflorum absolute
base: bourbon vanilla

title: Valentino, Donna Born In Roma Edp 100Ml W Gift Set

title: VALENTINO, DONNA BORN IN ROMA GREEN STRAVAGANZA EDP 100ML W
description: As the sun rises and shines over the eternal city, Born in Roma Green Stravaganza takes you on a bold adventure to the cool gardens of Roma where you are free to live and express your unique ways.
top: Born from the abundant gardens of Roma, this floral-ambery woody fragrance opens the door to an extravagant world created by distinctive lapsang souchong tea accord and radiant jasmine absolute with a captivating touch from vanilla extract. Born in Roma Green Stravaganza leads a way into the extravagance of Roma, allowing cool kids to feel the energy, unleash their personalities, and live excessively, because there are many vibrant ways to be you.
middle: A Color Top Note: Opening with smoky tea leaves scent, this fragrance draws you into a sensual garden with Lapsang Souchong tea accord.
base: A Couture Heart Note: Delicate jasmine absolute illuminates the heart of the mix with its solar and floral facets, unveiling modern feminity of this note.

title: VALENTINO, DONNA BORN IN ROMA INTENSE EDP 100ML W
description: BORN IN ROMA INTENSE ignites the spark of celebration, reminiscent of the eternal city by night. This fragrance takes the bold tone of the original scent towards a warmer, more sensual expression:
top: – The first provocation comes from VANILLA BOURBON, infusing the fragrance with warm, honey-like tones.
middle: – The central note is imbued with a TRIO OF JASMINE FLOWERS, giving the fragrance a powerful, fruity twist.
base: – The base note comes from BENZOIN RESIN, which further enhances the vanilla notes, and heightens the intensity of the fragrance.

title: Valentino, Donna Born In Roma Yellow Dream Edp 100Ml W
description: Valentino Born In Roma Yellow Dream Eau de Parfum is a long-lasting floral, musky perfume twisted with floral notes of Turkish Rose and Peony Accord balanced by sensual white musk that creates this luminous, fresh fragrance.
top: FeaturesValentino Donna Born in Roma Yellow Dream Eau de Parfum is a fresh, citrus, floral perfume for women that paints a scented picture of Rome: a romantic golden light clashes with a neon attitude.A bright women’s perfume of a thousand rose petals, Donna Yellow Dream twists Italian Lemon, Damascan Rose, and sensual White Musk to create a vivid and luminous women’s fragrance that captivates with a neon yellow signature.The Born in Roma creation started with a dialogue with Valentino’s native city: Rome. The streets of Rome are filled with memories of the past. A symbol of free thought, Rome is a city where cultures and aesthetics layer on the walls. Reverence and irreverence collide.Born in Roma pays a tribute to both haute couture and street culture that coexists in Maison Valentino designs. It is about an attitude towards life: I claim my heritage and I create my own rules.
middle: ”Dream is the language of the soul.” – Pierpaolo Piccioli, Maison Valentino Creative Director
base: Key NotesTop – Italian primofiore lemon essence, bergamot essence, litchi accord

title: VALENTINO, DONNA EDP 100ML W

top: Key Notes
middle: Rose AbsolutePeach AccordIris ConcreteVanilla Accord

title: VALENTINO, DONNA ROSA VERDE EDT 125ML W

title: Valentino, Valentina Edp 80Ml W
description: Valentino Valentina Eau de Parfum 80ml. Inspired by our young Italian heiress who lives life to the full, Valentina is a daring and addictive fragrance. A true feminine classic twisted with the pure insolence of Italian ingredients.

middle: The irreverence of Amalfi orange blossom, touched by wild strawberry in the heart.
base: And the captivating sensuality of Cedar woods and amber in the base notes.

title: VALENTINO, VALENTINA MYRRH ASSOLUTO EDP 80ML W
description: One of perfumery’s most precious and ancient ingredients is fused with the contemporary spirit of Valentino Parfums in Valentina Myrrh Assoluto. Luxurious as gold, Myrrh liberates, vibrating with sensuality, pleasure and warmth.
top: Perfumers Olivier Cresp & Hamid Merati-Kasha transport this most exceptional note across the ages and into the future with a contemporary sensibility and beauty.
middle: An irreverent evocation that layers Indian Jasmine, Myrrh and Leather gives Valentina Myrrh Assoluto an impression of mysterious familiarity. A diagonal approach to perfume blending, with notes of Vanilla, Ylang Ylang and Musks creates a rich and intuitive modernity.
base: Notes: Indian jasmine, myrrh, leather, vanilla, ylang ylang and musks

title: Valentino, Voce Viva Edp 100Ml W

middle: – A COUTURE NOTE: an opulent bouquet of orange blossom absolute and golden gardenia accord.
base: – A COOL NOTE: an unexpected crystal moss brings a modern intensity to the base, becoming wholly addictive by the addition of enveloping vanilla infusion.

title: Valentino, Voce Viva Edp 100Ml W Gift Set

The harmony of a radiant floral bouquet made addictive and powerful through an unexpected crystal moss accord. Celebrating every woman’s voice in one declaration: My voice, My strength

title: VALENTINO, VOCE VIVA INTENSA EDP 100ML W

At its base, vanilla perfume is twisted with a cool crystal moss accord bringing a blend of freshness and strength.
top: An ode to multifaceted femininity, this intense floral perfume celebrates every woman’s unique voice, presenting an invitation to declare your dreams and live them. My voice, my strength.
middle: Bergamot, Jasmine Absolute, Vanilla Bourbon Extract

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Ambre Imperial Edp 75Ml U
description: Van Cleef & Arpels’ ‘Collection Extraordinaire’ is an exquisite collection of rare and luxurious fragrances. Inspired by a dreamlike journey through the Orient, Ambre Impérial is a celebration of one of the most luxurious ingredients in perfumery.
top: Sensual amber is glorified by the precious aromas of vanilla, benzoin and roasted tonka bean whilst pink pepper and bergamot add a charismatic freshness. Like a jewel, the bottle is signed with a stamp on the bottom and topped with a black lacquered cap.

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Bois D’Iris Edp 75Ml W
description: Whether you’re going to a business meeting or a romantic date at a fancy restaurant, make sure you smell the very best you can. The Van Cleef & Arpels Collection Extraordinaire Bois d’Iris Eau de Parfum for women ensures you’ll get noticed. This luxurious Eau de Parfum accentuates your charm and envelops you in a cloud of fragrance that you (and others) will want to remember forever.
top: For the woman who likes to be elegantsuitable for day and evening wear all year roundComposition of the fragrance
middle: This Edp, like all the others from the Collection Extraordinaire range, has truly exceptional ingredients. Look forward to the perfect interplay of iris, myrrh, sensual incense, smoky driftwood, vetiver, amber, soft vanilla and sweet sugar accords. This makes the overall aroma utterly enchanting and unforgettable.
base: The Eau de Parfum is part of the luxurious Collection Extraordinaire range, with the composition of the fragrance designed by the renowned perfumer Emilie Coppermann. The fragrance is an interpretation of the stunning and unmistakable scent of iris. The elegant, clean design of the bottle also means it looks great on the shelf. The brand, founded back in 1896, also deals in luxury jewellery and watches as well as high-end fragrances.Ingredients

title: VAN CLEEF & ARPELS, ORCHIDEE VANILLE EDP 75ML W
description: The House of Van Cleef & Arpel’s couture perfumery collection ‘Collection Extraordinaire’ is an exquisite collection of rare and luxurious fragrances. The beauty of nature, which is always a major source of inspiration for Van Cleef & Arpels High Jewellery, is elementary to these compositions.
top: In Asia, exotic orchids are often associated with the idea of beauty. The luscious bean of one of these orchids, the vanilla planifolia, is suave and intoxicating. The perfumer wanted vanilla that was not too sugary, but sweet like candied almond. Joyous fruity harmonies magnify the floral heart and melt within multi-faceted vanilla, tender and warm, cradled in dreamy musk. Feminine and sensual, absolute and bewitching: Orchidée Vanille.

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Precious Oud Edp 75Ml W
description: Van Cleef & Arpels Haute Parfumerie stepped out with a range sublimating emblematic essences. That is how Collection Extraordinaire, a range of monofloral compositions and a cologne, came about. Today, a new chapter has been added to this wonderful story. Following on from the great classics, the timeless foundations of the collection, a “free form” piece glorifying Oud essence has been created.
top: The new opus, Precious Oud, pays homage to a mythical essence. The aquilaria, an Asian or Indian tree, actually only reveals its powerful scent via the infection of the wood by a fungus. A magi-like essence alongside frankincense and myrrh, the fragrant Oud resin, woody and balsamic, adds earthy and leathery accents.
middle: The perfumer Amandine Marie has chosen to interpret Oud essence and associate it with flowers. The top note is bright and sparkling bergamot set off with pink peppercorn whilst already hinting at the tonality of the perfume with the scent of opulent incense. The heart note is a vibrant bouquet of the most beautiful flowers – sensual jasmine accompanied by tuberose. If not the queen of perfumery, then the tuberose could very well be the empress with its bewitching, divinely heady scent. There is a woody note of patchouli, and the base notes open up, opulent, rich and precious, surrounding the mythical Oud with the woody notes of sandalwood and vetiver and enveloping it in accents of amber.
base: With its warm and sensual sillage, Precious Oud embodies the new opus of Collection Extraordinaire. A perfume with character, it has paved the way for new inspiration, totally free art where only the most noble, precious materials are given pride of place and the guiding principle is excellence.

title: VAN CLEEF & ARPELS, ROSE ROUGE EDP 75ML U
description: Van Cleef & Arpels has drawn inspiration from an exceptional flower, the Rose and created a Chypre Floral Gourmand.
top: The bloom that is also known as the Queen of Flowers has been the centre of attention for centuries, and an endless source of inspiration for poets and writers, painters and perfumers.
middle: Notes: pink pepper, blackcurrant absolute, Turkish rose, cocoa absolute, patchouli, vetiver

The heart is enriched with inviting and velvety accents of raspberry, accented by the elegance of peony along with refined notes of magnolia and lotus flowers. The trail evokes an intense and voluptuous sensuality with precious vegetal amber, deep acajou wood, and bright vibrant musk.

Unapologetic and bright pink in color, the transparent glass and essential lines reveal an enchanting and extraordinary preciousness. The elegant jewel-inspired cap with its bright facets remains a distinctive element for the Versace crystal collection—an emblem of the purity and authentic bouquet it encapsulates.

base: Style:Intense. Vibrant. Luxurious.

The gardenia is sensual, luminous, rich and almost creamy. Blending it with warm, strong amber creates a wonderful contradiction, like two sides of every woman:

As the top notes start to fade, the heart notes of tuberose, frangipani, and jasmine come to the forefront. This combination adds a deep, rich floral tone to the scent, making it incredibly seductive and alluring.
middle: As the perfume dries down, the base notes of sandalwood, cashmeran, vanilla pod, and heliotropine come into play. The overall result is a scent that is alluring, sophisticated, and utterly irresistible.

description: Infinite beauty reflects itself in the transparency of a diamond and radiates all around in beams of crystalline light. An uninhibited tangle of creamy woods and sweet Vanilla Orchid.

title: Viktor&Rolf, Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid Edp 100Ml W
description: Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid is a women’s perfume inspired by the theatrical tradition of burlesque, where life is a stage. Be the star of the show, express yourself, and embrace your sensuality. When you spray the eau de parfum, you release a magnetic and flowery perfume that pervades every step you take.

title: VIKTOR&ROLF, FLOWERBOMB TIGER LILY EDP 100ML W
description: The fragrance opens with a solar burst of coconut milk accord. At the heart lies a solar floral bouquet cantered around the exotic Tiger Lily Accord introducing a wild facet to the fragrance. An addictive Mango Accord envelops the warm Benzoin base for a burning hot sensuality.
top: Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum, the NEW Flowerbomb fragrance, is a warm solar fragrance that transports you to a summer wilderness. The perfect scent for the wild and fierce woman. A woman who roars in all her glory, fully embracing her sensual femininity. With the Flowerbomb Collection, your Flower is your Power. With Flowerbomb Tiger Lily, unleash the power of the wild Tiger lily, a symbol of confidence, to let your sensuality roar.

title: VIKTOR&ROLF, GOOD FORTUNE EDP 90ML W
description: Destiny is not a matter of chance, it’s a matter of choice.
top: Good Fortune is the embodiment of a new positive lifestyle, an olfactive manifesto for spirituality and self-potential, bringing you the power to create your own destiny.
middle: Good Fortune is the charming fragrance for a new generation of women looking for purpose and united by a strong and unwavering feeling of sisterhood. Good Fortune is embodied by the multi-talented artist and visionary performer, FKA Twigs.
base: Bewitching and powerful, the fragrance opens with the secret alchemy of the fennel & gentian flower co-distillated as an enlivening magnetic top. A Jasmine Superinfusion then takes center stage at the heart of the fragrance blooming with its velvety solar notes, while a creamy and captivating Bourbon Vanilla, ethically sourced in Madagascar, quietly sits at the base. And to be aligned with the long-term eco-conscious commitment of Viktor&Rolf, this refillable fragrance is also a vegan fragrance*.

Blazing and modern, this luminous floral, fruity, woody perfume brings haute floralcy with pops of petals and glowing fruits that light up the room. Exuding a beaming sensuality, this bright, bold fragrance opens with zesty pink grapefruit on top of an orange blossom heart that leads to a warm tonka finish.

description: The intoxicating floral scent of Damarose has a seductive power like no other.Opening with fresh lemon and bergamot, the true star of this scent lies at the heart, with an exquisite blend of Damascus rose absolute and Bulgarian rose dancing across the skin.A base of sandalwood, patchouli and vetiver offers a comforting warmth that grounds the floral notes.The XJ 17/17 collection is inspired by the minerals and semi-precious stones on display at the Natural History Museum in London.

title: Ysl, Black Opium Edp 90Ml W

title: Ysl, Black Opium Extreme Edp 90Ml W
description: Black Opium with no limits. Extra-black coffee, ultra-white flowers, and an abundance of patchouli. Exhilarating and excessive.Experience YSL Black Opium, the rock couture fragrance for women by Yves Saint Laurent.  Addictive, unparalleled in provocation, deliberatively seductive.
top: The Eau de Parfum Extreme takes Black Opium’s original captivating floral gourmand scent to a new level – no holds barred. Uncompromising energy and boundless sensuality married with the unique YSL edge. A shot of adrenaline from extra black coffee is paired with luminous ultra-white flowers, set against a base of sweet, earthy patchouli and heady vanilla.This exhilarating amalgamation of ingredients makes for an intense and long-lasting women’s scent that challenges gender stereotypes in fragrances.
middle: * Top notes: pear accord, mandarin essence, cherry accord* Heart notes: orange blossom absolute, jasmine absolute* Base notes: black coffee accord, vanilla accord, patchouli essence, tonka bean.*

title: Ysl, Black Opium Illicit Green Edp 75Ml W
description: Introducing new YSL Black Opium Illicit Green Eau de Parfum, a fresh, vibrant take on the iconic, best-selling Black Opium. Inspired by the world of mixology, Illicit Green has key notes of zesty green mandarin, creamy fig and the signature Black Opium coffee base. Energizing, loud and fresh.
top: Experience YSL Black Opium, the rock couture fragrance for women by Yves Saint Laurent.Captivating, unparalleled in provocation, deliberatively seductive.
middle: Black Opium Illicit Green takes inspiration from the sensorial world of mixology, reinventing the ever-iconic Black Opium with an energising and refreshing twist.
base: Black Opium Illicit Green Eau de Parfum is a bold and unique collaboration between Black Opium Master Perfumer Nathalie Lorson, and award-winning Parisian mixologist Margot Lecarpentier. Together, they twisted Black Opium’s original captivating floral gourmand scent with juicy green mandarin and creamy fig accord, making for a vibrant mocktail-inspired fragrance that invigorates all the senses. Energizingly fresh, just as captivating, and always with the unique YSL edge.A dark, roasted coffee base, with warm balsamic notes from vanilla bourbon, is contrasted with the fruity and tangy qualities of green mandarin. Add in the green floral facets of jasmine and the sweetness of fig, and this electrifying combination of ingredients makes for a scent that is at once zesty, sparkling, creamy and sensual, and challenges gender stereotypes in fragrances.

title: Ysl, Black Opium Intense Edp 90Ml W
description: BRING ON THE NIGHT: BLACK OPIUM EAU DE PARFUM INTENSE
top: Seductive. Magnetic. Mysterious.
middle: YSL Beauty introduces its latest addition to the Black Opium family: new Black Opium Eau de Parfum Intense, embodied by YSL global ambassadress Zoë Kravitz. The intensity of the night takes over. Like a blue aura, cloaking her in mystery, evoking a powerful energy.
base: The iconic darkness of black coffee is paired with the magnetic aura of blue absinthe. The thrill of a new overpowering desire. An invitation to feel sensuality to the fullest.

title: Ysl, Black Opium Le Parfum 90Ml W
description: Ysl, Black Opium Le Parfum 90Ml W

title: Ysl, Black Opium Neon Edp 75Ml W
description: Black Opium Neon by Yves Saint Laurent 75ml Eau De Parfum Spray for Women
top: Dive into the spellbinding seduction of Black Opium Eau de Parfum Neon, an indulgent and vibrant twist on the classic Eau de Parfum.The opening notes of adrenaline-rich coffee are softened by an orange blossom heart and brightened by mesmerizing Dragon Fruit Accord.
middle: Fragrance Notes:
base: Like a vibrant shot of neon light, Black Opium Neon Eau de Parfum makes you feel the speed of light and glow till the end of night. When the signature dark coffee collides with the unexpected and audacious dragon fruit, a vibrant and luminous addiction is created that flashes through the night. Black Opium Neon opens with juicy bites of pear and luminescent dragon fruit, before a heart of heady jasmine, orange blossom and its signature electrifying coffee note, which gives the fragrance its classic punk attitude. As it warms on the skin a familiar base of creamy vanilla and white musk reveals a sophisticated trail that will win the heart of any Black Opium lover.

title: YSL, BLACK OPIUM OVER RED EDP 90ML W
Ysl, Cinema Edp 90Ml W
description: Cinema can make every woman feel like a star. It is a fragrance for glamorous women who live under the spotlights, self-confident and elegant, women who know how to draw attention. A seductive flavour reminds of Hollywood beauties from the romantic love movies, glamourous evening gowns, Hollywood hairstyles, high heels, black seamed stockings
top: A flamboyant bouquet of glamour and femininity glistens in gold and light. A dazzling fragrance for a divine woman who glides through life as if under the spotlight, elegant and sure of herself.
middle: Glamorous, seductive, startling. Cinéma, a floral sophisticated and original enough for a starring role. Morning blooms open in a fresh accord, shimmering with cyclamen, almond and Clementine. Middle notes of amaryllis and Sambac jasmine then lead the way to depth and mystery, where amber, white musk and vanilla take a brilliant turn. Set-lighting-inspired crystal flacon with gold stopper.

description: A new clash of desirability, bringing together the two most precious materials in the world, gold and platinum, into a jewel-like bottle, encapsulating the highest concentration ever on Libre. The burning sensuality of an orange blossom from Morocco and the boldness of a Diva lavender from France perfectly blend with a new exclusive and addictive sensual white lavender accord to create a warm, floral fragrance. The ultimate sensual and long-lasting fragrance crafted with captivating tension that harmonizes fire and ice when it graces the skin.

title: Ysl, Libre Body Oil 150Ml W
description: The Sublimating Body Oil delicately perfumes the skin and magnifies the iconic scent of LIBRE EAU DE PARFUM with boldness and sensuality.An eminently feminine, free and sensorial gesture, for an intimate moment of perfuming that is sufficient in itself or as the highlight of the complete LIBRE EAU DE PARFUM ritual.Its formula with a generous and nourishing texture, enriched with Cactus flower from the Ourika Gardens*, leaves the skin sublimated and softer.LIBRE Sublimating Body Oil is encapsulated in a generous, fashionable 150ml bottle for daily use.

middle: Top – lavender essence

title: YSL, LIBRE EDP 90ML W GIFT SET
description: Libre Eau De Parfum, the statement floral perfume for those who live by their own rules. Lavender essence from France combines with the sensuality of Moroccan orange blossom and a daring woody musk for a unique long-lasting fragrance.

title: Ysl, Libre Edt 90Ml W
description: LIBRE Eau de Toilette is a bright and floral women’s fragrance. A fresh interpretation of the iconic Eau de Parfum, this feminine perfume has bursts of French Lavender Essence and Moroccan Orange Blossom that combine with an icy White Tea Accord to create a modern and youthful scent.
top: The Libre Eau de Toilette is a bright and fresh interpretation of the iconic Eau de Parfum.
middle: Notes: Lavender Essence, Orange Blossom Absolute, White-Tea Accord

title: YSL, LIBRE FLOWERS & FLAMES EDP 90ML W
description: Building on the success and glamour of Yves Saint Laurent Libre, the Flowers and Flames Eau de Parfum Spray offers a vibrant, fiery twist on the beloved original. The blazing fusion settles with an intensified warmth, emboldening she who wears it.
top: Bold in both scent and elegance, bergamot essence opens the fragrance with a zesty start to awaken the senses. At the heart, Libre’s signature orange blossom inspires sensuality and seduction, set ablaze by spiced desert lily in a flaming twist. Creamy vanilla interrupts for a sweet taste of gourmand accords, met with hints of coconut and ylang-ylang to lure those who cross her path.

title: YSL, LIBRE INTENSE EDP 90ML W
description: The iconic structure of Libre, a tension between French lavender and Moroccan orange blossom, reinterpreted in a suave and sensual way. The intensity of a melting floral core, where orange blossom flower absolute and blazing orchid accord fuse.
top: The iconic Libre it-bottle reflects a tension between masculinity and femininity, like a straight geometric silhouette embedded in the smoking jacket. The couture extravagance of the oversized Cassandre bent & nailed into the glass, breaking all the codes.
middle: Libre Intense encapsulates a new fragrance shade, between fire and gold. An audaciously masculine signature twisted in its most feminine way by the desirability of the emblematic Libre bottle. A fragrance like a shout of freedom – the freedom to live everything with excess.
base: The orchid accord in Libre EDP Intense offers floral, creamy, vanilla and spicy notes with slighty smoky facets. It naturally found its place in a fragrance that expresses a burning, contrasted sensuality.

title: YSL, LIBRE LE PARFUM EDP 90ML W
description: Libre Le Parfum is a luxurious, warm, and spicy interpretation of the classic Eau de Parfum with an endless floral trail. This women’s fragrance is a bold and long-lasting floral perfume enriched with fresh lavender, orange blossom, and rare warm saffron accord from the Yves Saint Laurent Ourika Community Garden.
top: Key Notes:
middle: Saffron Accord from Ourika Community Gardens, Orange Flower, Absolute Diva Lavender Heart

title: YSL, MANIFESTO EDP 90ML W
description: The manifesto of femininity by YSL, for women who invent their lives at every moment.
top: Audacious, down to their contradictions and excesses. Above conventions, they create their own personal codes. For her, nothing important is lived without passion. For women who say YES to style, beauty and mystery, to the vertiginous heights of excess and passion.
middle: Manifesto, the expression of audacity, excess, and desire. The perfume is described as spontaneous, free spirited and courageous; a scent full of passion and emotion. A bouquet of jasmine punctuated by green notes and a bold trail combining wood, vanilla, and tonka beans are the signature of this new declaration of femininity. In a flacon reminiscent of the silhouette of a woman.
base: Fragrance notes

title: YSL, MON PARIS COUTURE EDP 90ML W
description: Feel the rush of a passionate love story with Mon Paris Couture, a new sparkling, citrus interpretation of the iconic Mon Paris floral signature. The citrus fruity opening combines raspberry and strawberry from the signature Mon Paris Eau de Parfum with notes of grapefruit and mandarin for a sweetness that is engaging and inviting. Giving way to a sparkling heart, the signature notes of white flowers are now infused with rosebud that is fresh, yet romantic. The warmth of patchouli highlights the delicate white musks.

title: Ysl, Mon Paris Edp 50Ml W 2Pcs Travel Set
description: The Set includes: 50ml Eau de Parfum + 50ml body lotion.
top: With its inexhaustible ideas for the modern and different, Yves Saint Laurent inspired to fill her collection of perfumes with Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris. The code name for his new campaign is love. Love inspired by the most romantic city in the world Paris – where all feelings and emotions have no boundaries.
middle: Fragrances that blend in and leave the feeling of finesse and sophistication are fruit-flower. At the first smell, you will feel the notes of raspberry, blackberry and peony. This will awaken a desire for something beautiful and real. The taste of cashmere and jasmine will create a lightness and tenderness. A blend of fragrances that will make all your senses desire for a strong, real and unforgettable love.

title: Ysl, Mon Paris Edp 90Ml W
description: Mon Paris is announced as a dazzling fragrance that represents a modern olfactory interpretation of love, free from all the obstacles, dedicated and intense.
top: The composition has a fruity start, intoxicating floral heart and a dark chypre base. It opens with a juicy and sweet blend of Calabria bergamot, strawberry, raspberry and pear.
middle: The heart is dominated by datura flower accompanied by a bouquet of peony, Chinese and Sambac jasmine and orange blossom.
base: Airy crystal white musk (three types of it), ambroxan and an intense patchouli duo (from Indonesian and Guatemala) provide the provocative classic chypre signature base.

title: Ysl, Mon Paris Intensement Edp 90Ml W
description: Mon Paris Intensément is the new daring take on the classic Eau de Parfum. The heart of the perfume, a sensual and elegant rose, combines with bold black currant and white musk for an intense fragrance that evokes a passionate love story in Paris. The new Mon Paris bottle features an elegant Lavalliere bow covered in an intense fuchsia veil, inspired by the latest designs of Saint .
top: Top notes are Raspberry, Black Currant, Pear, Orange and Bergamot;
middle: Middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, May Rose, Peony, Datura and Freesia;
base: Base notes are Vanilla, White Musk, Patchouli, Cashmeran and Benzoin.Laurent couture.

title: Ysl, Opium Edp 90Ml W
description: Experience the heady seduction of Opium by YSL. The timeless decadence of Opium has mesmerised for over thirty years with its enchantment, mystery, magic and exoticism.
top: Opium symbolizes Yves Saint Laurent’s fascination with the Orient, and the unique understanding of a woman’s hidden emotions and inexplicable passions.
middle: Fragrance Notes:
base: The opulent decadence of the Eau de Parfum captures the overtly sensual spirit of the original parfum designed by Yves Saint Laurent. Striking notes of mandarin and bergamot are made mystical with middle notes myrrh and jasmine. A final accord of deep amber laced with Opoponaux imbues the scent with its celebrated rapture.

title: Ysl, Paris Edt 125Ml W
description: Created by Yves Saint Laurent to reflect a contemporary Parisian attitude, this gorgeous fragrance contains a decadent bouquet and a big dash of fun. Fruity, floral harmonies create a light-hearted scent that will put a happy spring back into your step.Romantic, ultra feminine, exquisitely refined, the parfum of YSL Paris… in the lighter Eau de Toilette form. In creating the original parfum, Yves Saint Laurent gave to the world the glamour and allure of the city he loved above all.
top: A rose accord blooms at fragrance’s heart, highlighted by violet with hints of bergamot. Light powdery accents of may rose and iris meet in the middle, set free by a base of sandalwood, vetiver and vanilla. In a tempered crystal flacon.
middle: Fragrance Notes:
base: Top: Mimosa, Orange Blossom, Bergamot, Rose & Green Notes.

title: YSL, PARISIENNE EDP 90ML W
description: This fragrance by Yves Saint Laurent is a sensuous bouquet to the woman whose heart belongs to Paris…even if home is elsewhere. A voluptuous floral accord of violet, damask rose and blackberry seems to tell the whole story, but then comes the fullness of sandalwood, deepened by musk and brightened by peonies, tying the endnotes to the ones beginning.

title: Ysl, Supreme Bouquet Edp 75Ml W
description: Ysl, Supreme Bouquet Edp 75Ml W

title: Zadig & Voltaire, This Is Her Edp 100Ml W
description: This is Her! by Zadig & Voltaire is an oriental floral Eau de Parfum for women. The essence of a free, carefree and somewhat rebellious woman, an aroma full of sweetness and creamy nuances, which invites us to a place where there are no rules or restrictions, a kingdom of daring, modern and transgressive girls.
top: This fragrance was launched in 2016 by perfumers Sidonie Lancesseur and Michel Almairac. With this perfume, and its feminine version, the French fashion brand Zadig & Voltaire started in the world of perfumery, creating a revolution among the younger public. It is a fragrance that vindicates the freedom to be oneself and one’s own lifestyle, without limitations or borders, an ode to spontaneity and independence.
middle: Its olfactory pyramid, captivating for its sweetness and creaminess. It begins with floral notes like jasmine sambac and silk tree flower, bathed in a spicy, pink peppery veil, thus starting from the beginning, breaking the rules. Next, an edible and sweetheart’s heart opens up, thanks to the combination of chestnut, whipped cream and vanilla, creating a sphere of sensuality and addiction. Finally, woody sparkles full of mystery put an end to its wake.
base: ROCK ’N’ ROLL. In this perfume, we can observe Zadig & Voltaire’s passion for rock’n’ roll. They draw a rebellious and rocking silhouette on it, as well as in their fashion designs, with leather and studs. A fragrance that reflects the most daring trends of the moment.

title: Zadig & Voltaire, This Is Her Undressed Edp 100Ml W
description: Experience the delicate and sensual scent of This is Her! with the new vegan fragrance of Zadig&Voltaire This is Her! Undressed.
top: Its sensual and sunny orange blossom and ylang-ylang tones combine to create a signature scent enhanced by notes of sandalwood. Its notes of ginger provide an explosion of brightness delightfully underlined by an addictive ‘salty skin’ blend.
middle: A sensual and luminous fragrance.
base: Fresh and sparkling notes of ginger and orange blossom. A sensation of sunniness and vibrancy enveloped in ylang-ylang and brought out by the ‘salty skin’ scent. Addictive and sensual memories left by the intimate signature blend of musk and sandalwood accords.

title: Zadig & Voltaire, This Is Her Vibes Of Freedom Edp 100Ml W
description: The new Eau de Parfum for women by Zadig&Voltaire is a fresh & floral shot of positivity, bringing good vibes!Freedom is an instinct that vibes deep down inside us and resonates with nature. It’s a vibe to reconnect with.
top: The Vibes of Freedom woman is at first sight solar and sexy. Deep down, a modern and sparkling woman, releasing lots of positive vibes. Deep inside, we feel the vibe.
middle: A floral and fruity shot conveyed by a blooming Peony and a juicy Pear. A radiant and vibrant sensation offered by the sun exposure of Jasmine and Rose. Smooth and addictive memories left by an everlasting signature of sensual Chestnut cream.

title: ZADIG & VOLTAIRE, THIS IS REALLY HER EDP 100ML W
description: This Is Really Her! The new women’s perfume by ZADIG&VOLTAIRE.
top: Discover This Is Really Her! — the intense new women’s fragrance by ZADIG&VOLTAIRE. A daring new chapter in the iconic This Is! love story, it tells the story of two soul mates bounding through the streets of Paris, embarking on an audacious new adventure. A game for two in which desires are unleashed, impulses run wild, rules are broken, and cravings are satisfied. Like a metallic leather jacket, this is a perfume that takes you from day to night and night to day — to excess and without limits, wherever life leads you.
middle: The floral amber fragrance that breaks the rules
base: For this captivating new ZADIG&VOLTAIRE women’s eau de parfum intense, Sidonie Lancesseur — the perfumer behind the This Is Her! collection of fragrances — has created a daring new floral amber scent with an addictive intensity.

The sharp spice of ginger, the savory nature of sage and calming lavender come together to form the heart of the scent. Earthy clearwood and the slight bitterness of moss lend a touch of masculinity to the base.

In the heart, aromatic coriander blends with amyris wood, with added agarwood essential oil well known for its charismatic warmth. In the base, sandalwood, cedar and patchouli make themselves known, accented with the transparent seduction of musk.

title: Antonio Banderas, The Secret Edt 100Ml M
description: The Secret is all about seduction. The initial citrusy grapefruit blends into spicy cinnamon and masculine leather. The remaining accords are mint, pepper, apple liqueur, tonka bean, and woodsy notes. The overall effect is warm and spicy, with a subtle sweetness.
top: This fragrance is addictive enough for daily wear but intriguing enough for special occasions.

title: Aramis, Brown Edt 110Ml M
description: For the man of distinction, Aramis fragrance for men is an elegant option to consider. Chosen by generations of men since its creation by the house of Aramis in 1966, this sultry masculine scent features opening notes of artemisia and gardenia. A spicy heart of bergamot mixed with clover for a botanical touch dries down to thyme for a finishing jolt of excitement that makes this scent one that will help people remember you by the trail of robust mannish notes you leave behind.

title: ARGOS, FALL OF PHAETON EDP 100ML M
description: FALL OF PHAETON fragrance, a captivating addition to the Argos Fragrances Artist Series, draws inspiration from the dramatic and dynamic style of Flemish Baroque painter Peter Paul Rubens. Known for his emphasis on movement, color, and sensuality, Rubens’ influence is intricately woven into this aromatic creation.
top: When Phaeton, the son of Helios, stepped into the sun god’s chariot, he lost control. The horses, driven wild, scorched and froze the earth. Zeus responded by striking Phaeton with a devastating thunderbolt. Rubens depicts Phaeton cast down from Helios’ golden chariot, his hair on fire, mirroring a blazing earth, surrounded by terrified horses and deities of the seasons responsible for the laws and order of time.
middle: This bold fragrance pays homage to the tragedy of Phaeton, who, although he greatly failed, more greatly he dared. Opening with Lightning Bursts of Bergamot and Lemon, Spicy Cardamom, Pink Peppercorn and Ginger, Argos FALL OF PHAETON transitions into its Smoldering heart notes of Labdanum, Lavender, and Agarwood. Base notes of Rich Musk, Animalic Leather, Sweet Tonka Bean, and Vanilla bring this provocative and chaotic event to life.

title: Armaf, Club De Nuit Blue Iconic Man Edp 105Ml M

As you tread to the end, the forest grounds leave you wrapped in the warmth of its musky-earthy base.

Three olfactory notes bring this intensely fresh fragrance to life, drawing us into unexplored depths for a feeling of absolute fulfillmentAn invigoratingly masculine Eau de Parfum which looks stunning in the iconic Chrome bottle in an unfathomably deep shade of blue, evoking unsuspected depths.

Whether night or day, he attracts and arouses desire… For him, it’s an endless night; and for them, it’s a one-on-one moment that they will never forget…”It is announced as an explosive woody and spicy oriental of unabashed sensuality, a “blend of temptation and masculinity.” The composition mixes exotic woods and spices, and highlights the three main accords: cinnamon, red cedar and tobacco.

Whether night or day, he attracts others and arouses desire. His secret? Azzaro Wanted by Night. An explosive woody-oriental-spicy Eau de Parfum and an impossibly unforgettable bottle.

Whether night or day, he attracts and arouses desire… For him, it’s an endless night; and for them, it’s a one-on-one moment that they will never forget…”It is announced as an explosive woody and spicy oriental of unabashed sensuality, a “blend of temptation and masculinity.” The composition mixes exotic woods and spices, and highlights the three main accords: cinnamon, red cedar and tobacco.

title: Azzaro, Wanted Edp 100Ml M
description: Azzaro Wanted Eau de Parfum is a new fragrance for men launched in 2023 under Azzaro Wanted collection.
top: “The Azzaro Wanted saga continues with the new Wanted Eau de Parfum. This new fragrance immerses you in the thrill of the game and its immersive universe. WANTED EDP is the smell of adrenaline, the scent of brave men who have the courage to take risks and play to get their way.
middle: It is a sensual, extremely addictive fragrance that immediately takes you into a world of strong sensations. Wanted EDP returns to its emblematic bottle and offers a new version in silver metal with a touch of gold for a very elegant fragrance.
base: This spicy-woody fragrance is a real mix of warm and cold sensations. An addictive concentrate of aromatic ingredients composed of juniper berries, a heart of fresh sage intensified by warm and strong vetiver.”

title: Azzaro, Wanted Edt 100Ml M
description: Azzaro Wanted is a masculine Eau de Toilette for exuberant, pleasure-seeking men who take chances and defy destiny. It combined the freshness of cardamom notes, the woody elegance of vetiver and the smooth warmth of Tonka bean within a sophisticated and unique barrel-shaped bottle… Like a symbol of liberty.

title: Bentley, Absolute Edp 100Ml M
description: An irresistible combination of spicy, woody and smoky tones, the Bentley for Men Absolute Eau de Parfum Spray is an ultra-masculine fragrance offering unmatched freshness.
top: Opening with invigorating notes of spicy Ginger and rosy Pink Pepper at the top, the perfume becomes woody and arresting in the middle with scents of Papyrus, Sandalwood, and Olibanum. With warm and woody base notes of Atlas Cedar, Agarwood, Amber, and Moss.

title: Bentley, Azure Edt 100Ml M
description: Refresh yourself with a scent that’s crisp and invigorating with Bentley Azure. This aromatic and citrusy sweet concoction can inspire visions of a great adventure outdoors, preparing you with a sensual aroma all day and into the night.
top: Top notes of citrusy bergamot, tangerine and pineapple awaken the senses while delicate violet leaf brings them down for a lighter caress.
middle: Middle notes of clary sage, rejuvenating tea and lavender continue to soothe the mind and body, though the inclusion of paprika adds a bit of spicy flair.
base: Base notes of sweet tonka bean and cashmere wood balance the bold ingredients with their moderate yet enticing aromas.

title: Bentley, Infinite Intense Edp 100Ml M
description: Bentley Infinite Intense provides a long-lasting and stronger composition with a higher percentage of aromas (15%).Tart black pepper leaves stronger impressions in the opening of the composition, combined with geranium, lavender and violet. The heart abounds in spicy flavors by combining nutmeg with warm resins of Siamese benzoin, elemi resins and ambergris which ensures a modern masculine scent.The base develops warmth and precious shades of woody chords, patchouli extract, Haiti vetiver and Moroccan cedar, enveloped by the sensual scent of musk.

title: BENTLEY, INTENSE EDP 100ML M
description: Bentley for Men Intense by Bentley is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men.
top: Top notes are bergamot, black pepper and bay leaf; middle notes are clary sage, african geranium, cinnamon, rum and woody notes; base notes are leather, benzoin, incense, cedar and patchouli.

title: Bentley, Momentum Edt 100Ml M
description: Experience our vibrant, modern scent, which boldly combines aromatic freshness with rich woods, delivering wonderful notes of aquatic accord, jasmine and moss.
top: Top notes of aquatic accord, green violet and clary sage.
middle: Heart notes: ambergris, cashmere wood and jasmine petals.
base: Base notes: musks, tonka bean and sandalwood

title: Bentley, Momentum Intense Edp 100Ml M
description: Propel yourself into an atmosphere of lush and powerful accords with Bentley Momentum Intense, an enigmatic men’s cologne. This spicy and aromatic blend works to instill confidence and represent your charismatic personality with its feast of divine ingredients.
top: Top notes of elemi, relaxing lavender and energizing bergamot lend their aromas for a delightful mix of tones, while heart notes of geranium, tonka bean and marine ambergris work to balance their intensity with sweet and earthy scents. Base notes of amber wood, sandalwood and white musk finish the fragrance with a seductive edge that’s robust and mesmerizing. Perfect for any late night ensemble and staying close to someone special.

title: Bentley, Momentum Unlimited Edt 100Ml M
description: A fresher interpretation of Bentley’s bracing Momentum line, this vibrant fragrance condenses the thrill of travelling into a pool of fresh and sensuous accords. It’s undeniably an eau de toilette that’s reserved for the refined gentleman, introducing itself with a fruit-forward blend of grapefruit, green apple and cardamom. As it settles, it slowly uncovers a woody heart, consisting of cedarwood, leather and vetiver.

title: Bentley, Silverlake  Edp 100Ml M
description: The scent opens with a rush of ice-cool notes, as lemon and peppermint essences create the effect of a gust of invigorating mountain air. Accents of violet leaf absolute evoke an alpine forest and the cool sheen of lavender hints at the silver water of a lake. A blend of ambery woods and pure white musk give the scent its crisp, modern, long-lasting trail.

title: Bois 1920, Vento Nel Vento Edp 100Ml M
description: A memorable and impacting debut; a wrapping swirl of mellow petals of Peony in which explosive spicy notes, Elemi and Pink Pepper, insert themselves. The top slips impetuous in the refined heart, an hypnotic vortex of surprising nuances of Incense and Liquorice, on which blows a cloud of White Musk. The seal at this jus is given by a dark and hefty dry down, solid woods like Patchouli, Sandalwood and Oud intertwine themselves to liqueur and amber touches of Benzoin and to black spots of Labdanum.
top: Top: Pink Pepper, Elemi, Peony.
middle: Heart: Incense, White Musk, Liquorice.
base: Dry down: Sandalwood, Patchouly, Benzoin, Labdanum, Oud.

title: Bond No 9, The Scent Of Peace Edp 100Ml M
description: Woody and aromatic eau de parfum that offers a new interpretation of modern masculinity.
top: This intense and sophisticated perfume interwines aromatic, salty and floral elements with contrasting notes of radiance and seduction. Salvatore Ferragamo Intense Leather Eau de Parfum gives you the freedom to unleash your most passionate feelings and aspirations.
middle: Notes:
base: – Top: mandarin, pink peppercorn, clary sage absolute.

title: Bottega Veneta, Edt 90Ml M
description: Bottega Veneta Pour Homme Eau de Toilette 90ml. Bottega Veneta Pour Homme is a fresh, intriguing and understated fragrance, one where distinctive Bottega Veneta notes of precious Labdanum, Fir Balsam and Bergamot blend into a sensuous leathery signature with the power to enchant. Woven with rare and noble materials, the fragrance, a woody, aromatic leathery scent, takes us on an inspiring journey in time and place.
top: The structure of the fragrance is unique, a combination of refined ingredients that are woven together to create an unforgettable, lingering, masterpiece.
middle: Top notes; Calabrian Bergamot, Siberian Pine and Juniper from the Balkans.
base: Middle notes; Warm heart notes of Jamaican Pimento, Canadian Fir Balsam and Mediterranean Clary Sage.

The heart mixes notes of Sambac jasmine and rose, while the base captures predominantly woody tones of cedar and cashmere together with a trace of musk.

title: BURBERRY, BRIT EDT 100ML M
Burberry, Edt 100Ml M

top: The scent starts with an invigorating pop of bergamot and fresh mint, while rich, vibrant heart notes of sandalwood and moss bring a subtle complexity. The scent dries down to classic cedar notes that surround you with a sense of warm, comforting masculinity.

title: BURBERRY, HERO EDP 100ML M
description: Burberry Hero Eau de Parfum explores an enticing new side of heroism: the courage to embrace who you truly are. It presents a man on a journey to self discovery. Anexplorative spirit, with a centred sensibility. His energy exudes tender soulfulness, expressed by the presence of the horse, a powerful creature that represents ourhero’s strength. This fragrance for men features a trio of warm cedarwood oils as its signature base, culminating in a fresh and luminous crescendo. The vibrant opening of pine needle blends with benzoin and incense, creating an intense fusion of profound sensuality.

middle: Top notes: Pine NeedleHeart notes: BenzoinBase notes: Cedarwood Trio

title: Burberry, Hero Edt 100Ml M
description: Burberry introduces Hero Eau de Toilette, Riccardo Tisci’s first scent for Burberry. A new masculine fragrance with a vision of modern heroism challenging the traditional stereotypes of masculinity and empowering man to transform to find the courage to embrace who you truly are, to become extraordinary.A fresh, luminous, and bold for men with an enthralling marriage of strength and freshness, signifying the modern man’s duality of power and sensibility.

title: Burberry, London Edt 100Ml M

top: Artfully balanced heart notes of mimosa flower and rich leather

title: Burberry, Mr Burberry Edp 100Ml M
description: A warm, sensual and woody scent with fresh and aromatic top notes of tarragon and comforting, spicy cinnamon, layered delicately on rich patchouli with a base of amber and smokey vetiver. The bottle honours the black Heritage Trench Coat and its signature design details. Bold and masculine, the weighted cap references horn-look buttons, while a hand-tied knot in English-woven gabardine sits around the neck, celebrating the innovative fabric invented by Thomas Burberry more than 100 years ago. The dark lacquer bottle conveys the sensuality and warmth of the scent and the accompanying campaign.

title: Burberry, Mr Burberry Edt 100Ml M
description: Mr. Burberry is a structure of a classic aromatic fougère that has inspired so many famous fragrances, but this has been totally remodeled and remastered to introduce a radically contemporary creation in its proportions and ingredients.”

middle: It opens with zesty accords of grapefruit, cardamom and tarragon. The heart notes include birch leaf, nutmeg oil and cedar, followed by the base of sandalwood, vetiver and guaiac wood.

title: Burberry, Mr Burberry Edt 100Ml M Gift Set
description: Mr. Burberry. Classic yet contemporary; sophisticated and sensual. The signature Eau de Toilette captures the essence of London and its moments, fusing classic scents of British perfumery with unexpected ingredients. The Set includes:
top: • Eau de Toilette 100ml
middle: • Deodorant Stick 75g

title: Burberry, Mr Burberry Indigo Edt 100Ml M
description: A man of contrasts. Classic, yet contemporary, sophisticated and sensual. Style with a rebellious attitude. Authentic and British. He makes an impromptu escape from the city. Seeking freedom. Refreshed and invigorated. A contrast to his busy London life.
top: Mr. Burberry Indigo Eau de Toilette is a fresh and energetic citrus woody, reminiscent of crispy air along the British coast. Aromatic violet-leaf and spearmint oil invigorate notes of lemon and rosemary. Amber and oak moss bring depth. A veritable breath of fresh air. This bottle honors the iconic navy trench coat. Bold and masculine, the weighted cap references horn-look buttons, while a hand-tied knot in English-woven gabardine sits around the neck. The lacquer bottle, in shades of blue from navy to indigo, conveys the invigorating freshness of the scent.

Its top notes include accords of Calabrian bergamot, Sicilian lemon and a “vital water” accord”. The base ends with woody tones of vetiver, patchouli, sandalwood and benzoin.

title: Bvlgari, Aqva Edt 100Ml M
