top: The creamy heart has notes of green tea and cedar, which boost your elegance and charming musculinity.
middle: The classic base has notes of leather, woods and honeysuckle, adding irresistible elegance.The fragrance is your perfect choice on all

title: Bvlgari, Le Gemme Falkar Edp 100Ml M
description: Dive into the splendour and natural richness of the Brazilian forest, the impressive realm of the Falcon’s Eye. A green shimmering gemstone dotted with golden shards providing deeper insight and focused vision. The opulence of an exceptional oud, imbued with deep woody black musks, captures the majestic presence of the Falcon’s Eye.

title: Bvlgari, Le Gemme Garanat Edp 100Ml M
description: Inspired by the deep Red Garnet from Bosphorus, the fragrance conveys masculine strength and forerightness. The crimson gemstone shines in the darkness, bringing its wearer the impassioned courage and vision of Suleyman the Magnificent, the most seducing Sultan of the Ottoman Empire.
top: Notes
middle: Cinnamon Essence, Rose Absolute, Smoked Incense.

title: BVLGARI, LE GEMME KOBRAA EDP 100ML M
Bvlgari, Le Gemme Malakeos Edp 100Ml M
description: MALAKEOS – Malachite from the UralEmblem of the grandeur and opulence of Czarist Russia, ruled by the Romanovs, the infinite green of Malachite gemstone exudes the healing and well-being of nature, set in the profuse coniferous green of the Ural forests.The Perfumer honors a legendary thematic in men’s perfumery, Fougère, in a contemporary reinterpretation.
top: This deeply invigorating scent has a cold, clean, vegetal freshness derived from men’s barbering classics. Minty Geranium, Lavender, and Oakmoss are vividly paired with gentle Musk and Guaiac Wood for an immensely restoring, sensual green fragrance.

title: Bvlgari, Le Gemme Opalon Edp 100Ml M
description: An expression of sensual, clean and confident masculinity, Le Gemme Opalon s profoundly Roman in its elegant, unabashedly virile character. A tribute to the lustrous white opal from Australia, the fragrance celebrates this symbol of purity, wisdom and good fortune that once adorned the crowns of kings and emperors.

title: Bvlgari, Le Gemme Tygar Edp 100Ml M
description: Known as the stone that sees all, the shimmering golden-brown tiger’s eye draws its energy from the vibrations of the Earth and the Sun and infuses the Eau de Parfum with power and force. Like the name of the fragrance, this bright stone is inspired by the majestic feline and conveys the fiery courage, action and mental power of the great Indian warrior Shivaji.
top: Notes: Grapefruit, wood, ambroxan

title: Bvlgari, Le Gemme Yasep Edp 100ml M
description: Le Gemme Yasep is inspired by Red Jasper from Madagascar, considered a stone of vitality and physical strength, it is revered for its supposed ability to stimulate endurance, willpower and courage. The scent is formulated with a vibrant accord of woody musks, used to add warmth and create a spark of sensuality. These also prolong the dimension of other notes including Sichuan Pepper, Sicilian Mandarin, Sandalwood and Vetiver. This intriguing mix of notes and accords delivers an incandescent and intriguing fragrance to the wearer and those near him.
top: The masculine flacon is a modern representation of ancient Roman obelisks, or stone pillars, that guided great conquerors throughout their journeys. A brick gemstone-colored cap offsets the interplay of gold and light enhancing the engraved Bvlgari insignia. Wrapped in matte black, the design provokes power and strength. An elegant token of friendship or love for the man in your life, a gift for everyday or any special occasion.
middle: Top Notes: Sichuan Pepper, Sicilian MandarinHeart Notes: Sandalwood, CedarBase Notes: Woody Musks, Haitian Amyris,Vetiver

title: Bvlgari, Man Edt 100ml
description: Exude an air of confidence and sophistication wherever you go with Bvlgari Man, a fragrance for men by the design house of Bvlgari.
top: This masculine fragrance features top notes of lotus and violet leaf, and its middle and bottom notes include white pear, vetyver and bergamot, which blend to create an aroma that’s bold, romantic and perfect for day or evening wear. Spray it on before spending a day with your buddies or a night with someone special.

title: Bvlgari, Man Glacial Essence Edp 100Ml M
description: BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE enriches the Bvlgari Man collection dedicated to the power of natural elements. After fire and wood, Bvlgari Man explores air. BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE captures the unbridled magnitude of the frozen mountains and the unstoppable masculinity of a man on a constant quest for greatness.

title: Bvlgari, Man Glacial Essence Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE captures the unbridled magnitude of the frozen mountains, the unstoppable masculinity of a man in constant quest for greatness. BVLGARI MAN GLACIAL ESSENCE Eau de Parfum, a frosty, liberating breath of air awakening an unexpected woody and vigorous heart, culminating in the intense and ambitious tones of the crystallized dry down.

This neo-oriental Eau de Parfum is a perfect blend of contrasts. Top notes of rum, cardamom and cinnamon provide a vibrant addictive quality, whilst the leathery floral heart of tuberose contributes to the sophistication of the fragrance. Sealed by black amber and a leather accord, a warm and distinctive scent is formed.

title: Bvlgari, Man Wood Essence Edp 100Ml M

title: Bvlgari, Man Wood Neroli Edp 100Ml M
description: With Bvlgari Man Wood Neroli, Bvlgari continues its tribute to nature and its elements, creating a new link between urban energy and regenerative nature. Inspired by the power of the Meditteranean sun, the fragrance celebrates the power of light, embodied by the bitter orange tree, the sunniest of all.

title: Bvlgari, Pour Homme Edt 100Ml M
description: Bvlgari Pour Homme is comfortable and refreshing. Designed for men who are looking for a fragrance that subtly accentuates their personality.
top: Understated and elegant just like the bottle it’s presented in, the Bulgari Pour Homme eau de toilette is an uncompromisingly masculine fragrance.
middle: Notes of cardamom, Darjeeling and musk amalgamate into a simple yet powerful result, perfect for any gentleman looking for a timeless signature scent to carry him through the day with confidence.

title: Bvlgari, Terrae Essence Edp 100Ml M
description: Bvlgari Man Terrae Essence enriches the Bvlgari Man collection, dedicated to the power of the natural elements. After fire, wood and air, Bvlgari Man explores the Earth. Bvlgari Man Terrae Essence pays tribute to the power of the Earth, its authentic richness and diverse fertility. An abundance impeccably translated through a contemporary and original vetiver interpretation, combined with an exclusive masculine smoky Terrae accord.

title: Calvin Klein, Ck Be Edt 200Ml M
description: One of the world’s leading lifestyle brands, Calvin Klein is synonymous with authentic modern minimalist style. Everything it creates —clothing, accessories, home design—becomes a timeless classic. The label’s award-winning fragrances are no exception. Calvin Klein’s portfolio of bold and iconic scents continues to redefine the world of perfume for men and women.
top: ck be is as distinct as the person who wears it because ck be is about the freedom to be yourself.
middle: This unique tonic musk is clean and fresh, with a simple blend of herbs, citruses and florals. Launched in 1996, ck be is a sensual unisex fragrance for men and women that invites us to close our eyes and open our minds.
base: This intimate scent, ideal for daytime wear, uniquely blends tonic freshness into warm, sensuous white musks for a fragrance that invites you to get closer.

title: CALVIN KLEIN, CK IN 2 U HIM EDT 100ML

middle: Middle note is Cacao Pod

title: CALVIN KLEIN, CK ONE SHOCK FOR HIM EDT 100ML
description: Leave them guessing when you wear this CK One Shock eau de toilette for men, launched in 1994 by the house of Calvin Klein. This commanding, virile scent features an alluring blend of accords chosen to get you the attention you deserve. Clementine and cucumber come together on the open to create a botanical vibe that cascades into a heart of pepper and basil to give the scent a spicy kick. Tobacco on the dry down lends the fragrance a smoky finish that’s masculine to the core.

title: Calvin Klein, Ck One Summer Edt 100Ml U
description: This unisex fragrance delivers fun and refreshment. Opening notes of tart lemon and lime mojito complement each other, preparing to introduce an exotic heart featuring juicy guava and the sweet gardenia scent of Tahitian tiare flower. Woody base notes including cedar bring jungle images to mind as this eau de toilette dries down. Escape from theordinary all summer wearing this carefree fragrance.

title: CALVIN KLEIN, CONTRADICTION EDT 100ML M

title: Calvin Klein, Defy Edt 100Ml M
description: Calvin Klein Defy is a daring contrast of invigorating freshness and powerful woods. For the modern man who breaks boundaries while exploring his authentic truths and the contrasts within.
top: The scent opens with an addictive citrus blend highlighting crisp bergamot and fresh lavender absolute. Rugged and earthy vetiver oil—responsibly sourced from Haiti—is the heart of the fragrance, connecting the vibrant textural elements with a rich and alluring base of amber notes.
middle: Top notes: Bergamot oil, mandarin oil, cedar leaf oil.
base: Mid notes: Lavender absolute, sage clary oil, notes of violet leaf.

title: Calvin Klein, Escape Edt 100Ml M
description: Complement your natural scent with Escape, an eau de toilette spray for men created in 1993. This everyday fragrance features top notes of eucalyptus, melon and juniper, giving it a minty, floral and slightly sweet aroma that helps invigorate your senses each morning. Bottom notes of amber and sandalwood provide the perfect balance and lend warmth to this scent. This versatile fragrance doesn’t overpower, so spray it on before heading to work or out for a day of fun with friends.

title: CALVIN KLEIN, ETERNITY AIR EDT 100ML M
description: Eternity Air for Men is an eau de toilette inspired by contrasts, celebrating the vibrancy and sensuality of the natural elements. Like the purity of a new day, it brings to mind the striking clarity of bright blue skies. Energizing and exhilarating, Eternity Air is a bright, bold fragrance.
top: Sky of the sky accord opens up the scent with sophisticated, airy notes. The fragrance is further layered with fresh mandarin oil, lavender oil, and violet leaves. Dry patchouli oil and sea moss complete the base notes of this complex scent.
middle: An expression of modern sophistication and sensuality, Eternity Air is composed of contrasting forces that gradually build like the bright sun against gentle summer rain. Exploring uninhibited elegance and airy masculinity.

title: Calvin Klein, Eternity Aqua Edt 100Ml M
description: Eternity Aqua for Men opens with accords of cold cucumbers, citruses, lotus and green leaves. A heart blooms with a union of Sichuan pepper, Mirabelle plum, lavender and cedar, while a base finishes with sandalwood, Guaiac wood, patchouli and musk.

title: CALVIN KLEIN, ETERNITY EDP 200ML M
description: Refined and sophisticated, ETERNITY Calvin Klein Eau de Parfum celebrates the concepts of forever and modern, multifaceted masculinity. The sophisticated fragrance reinterprets the original fougère scent by introducing a new woody note. A powerful and elegant base of suede and vetiver is layered with a heart of warm geranium and cypress. Top notes of alluring sage and apple impart crisp freshness to the lingering and compelling scent. A vibrant emerald juice shines from within the iconic bottle, radiating freshness and power.

title: Calvin Klein, Eternity Edt 100Ml M

title: CLIVE CHRISTIAN, 1872 EDP 100ML M
Clive Christian, 1872 X Edp 50Ml M
description: A very exclusive perfume with the finest ingredients: Sicilian bergamot, oil of cedars from Virginia …
top: An extremely fashionable London perfume, the creation “X” by Clive Christian is an exhilarating and unorthodox fragrance. Once referred to as the ‘grains of paradise’, cardamon oil is distilled from the seeds of ceylon cardamons (elettoria cardamomum), and combined with Sicillian bergamot, pink pepper and bay cinnamon, create the basis for “X” for men. Also combined in the fragrance is the oil of ‘Juniperus Virginiana’, the cedar, a wood highly valued in Egyptian times, and tonka beans, the seeds of the ‘Dipeteryx Oppositifolia’ tree which grows in very small groups around the Orinoco river in Brazil.

title: Clive Christian, Noble Vii Rock Rose Perfume Edp 50Ml M
description: The powerful Rock Rose perfume is a modern interpretation of a classic Leather Fougere. Citrus, Black Pepper and the classic cologne touches of Spearmint and Neroli create a fresh and balanced first impression. A lavender infused heart blended with violet and fresh herbs brings out the rich, resinous character of the Rock Rose flower, whilst Saffron, Cedarwood and Amber forms a sophisticated base resulting in a fresh and versatile fragrance.
top: Fragrance Family: Fougere, Leather
middle: Fragrance Notes
base: Top: Bergamot, black pepper, neroli

top: The perfume opens with flowery and aquatic top notes of cyclamen, lotus, rose water and freesia. The floral sensation continues with heart notes of white lily, carnation and peony. The base notes consist of sandalwood, musk, tuberose, amber seed, cedarwood and osmanthus.

title: Coach, Platinum Edp 90Ml M
description: Coach Platinum by Coach is a Amber Woody fragrance for men.
top: Top notes are Pineapple, Juniper Berries and Black Pepper;
middle: Middle notes are Cashmeran, Sage and Geranium;
base: Base notes are Vanilla, Leather, Sandalwood and Patchouli.

title: COMME DES GARCONS, WONDERWOOD EDP 100ML M
description: An Evocation of Exuberance. A positive overdose of woods, woody notes and synthetic wood constructions (Wood gone mad).
top: Madagascan Pepper, Bergamot, Somalian Incense, Nutmeg, Cristalon, Cashmeran, Gaïac wood, Cedarwood, Carvi graines, Javanol, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Oud (Agarwood)

title: Costume, National Intense  Edp 100Ml M
description: Attractive and carnal, Scent Intense reveals itself gently and elegantly with a top note of hibiscus flower and jasmine tea, then quickly changes to a more amber and woody rock base. An eternal and mysterious energy will surround you with the deep natural warmth. Amazing, unique and addictive, it is an inimitable statement of individuality and seduction.
top: Head notes : Tea
middle: Heart notes : Hibiscus, jasmine
base: Base notes : Amber, leather, woody notes

title: Creed, Aventus Absolu Edp 75Ml M
description: The fragrance incorporates the vivifying energy of zesty grapefruit and evocative pineapple with smoky Haitian vetiver for a dazzling exploration of freshness and intensity through bright citrus and the restrained sophistication of wood. This one-of-a-kind masterpiece introduces a burst of citrus energy through exquisitely fresh grapefruit that beckons to the sophisticated woods of Haitian vetiver, adding an elegant dimension of smoke to the pineapple and patchouli heart and deepening a richly layered longevity. The limited-edition Absolu Aventus fragrance is a striking interpretation of the iconic fragrance and is destined to become an unforgettably unique experience for true connoisseurs.
top: Style: Dry woods, fresh, citrus, fruity.
middle: Notes:
base: – Top: bergamot, lemon, blackcurrant, grapefruit, ginger

title: Creed, Aventus Cologne Edp 100Ml M
description: A modern eau de parfum that is inspired by a classic uplifting cologne to revitalize the wearer with alluring fresh vigor.
top: Aventus Cologne opens with a fruity yet aromatic burst of ginger, mandarin and pink peppercorn, that is then complemented by a sumptuous heart of patchouli, sandalwood and vetiver. A leathery balsamic base of styrax, birch, musk and tonka provide the final touch to the vibrant fragrance. This cult-classic scent with a rebellious modern twist embodies vitality, success, true grit and style.
middle: Notes:
base: – Top: ginger, mandarin, pink peppercorn.

title: CREED, BOIS DU PORTUGAL EDP 100ML M
description: This masculine fragrance takes it cue from the word bois, meaning woods in French. Recalling a hike in the Portuguese highlands, master perfumer Olivier Creed showcases the mysterious side of lavender. A favorite scent of a certain Rat Pack legend, this powerful blend is known for it smooth refinement and is the epitome of a classic.
top: Style: Woody, spicy.
middle: Notes:
base: – Top: bergamot, lavender.

title: CREED, EROLFA EDP 100ML M
Creed, Himalaya Edp 100Ml M
description: Fusing the power of man and nature, Himalaya was created to commemorate Olivier Creed’s daring climb in the beautiful but treacherous Himalayan Mountains. A seductive scent of citrus mixes with warmer notes of sandalwood and cedarwood to recreate the snowcapped Tibetan landscape. Presented in an attractive metallic bottle, this fragrance is the embodiment of pure confidence and rugged masculinity, resembling a climber’s canteen and the silvery look of alpine ice.

title: Creed, Tabarome Millesime Edp 100Ml M
description: Capturing the aroma of a luxurious smokey cigar, the rich spices of a fine British brandy, and the leather upholstery of a classic British gentleman’s club, Tabarome Millésime Eau de Parfum blends warm and woody notes to create a sophisticated and seductive fragrance for men. Top notes of spicy ginger evolve with gusto thanks to a blend of sandalwood and vetiver. A rich and assertive base, made up of musk and tobacco, offer a lasting masculinity and leathery dry down to this powerhouse perfume. An ideal choice for the leaders of the pack.
top: Top NotesGinger, Pink Berries & Grapefruit
middle: Heart NotesTea, Coffee, Rum & Blackcurrant
base: Base NotesSandalwood & Tobacco

title: Creed, Viking Edp 100Ml M
description: Viking is a fiery men’s fragrance from Creed that bottles the fearless spirit of the modern man. Inspired by the incredibly crafted longships, a centrepiece of the Viking Age. A symbol of voyage and perseverance, longships were carefully designed for the skilled seaman who embodied unbridled determination to conquer. This woody citrus fragrance is a natural composite featuring peppercorn, Indian sandalwood and Haitian vetiver.
top: Top notes: Calabrian bergamot, Sicilian lemon, pink peppercorn.
middle: Middle notes: Bulgarian Rose, peppercorn, peppermint.
base: Base notes: Indian sandalwood, Haitian vetiver, Indian patchouli, lavandin absolute.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo, Cr7 Edt 100Ml M
description: CR7 by Cristiano Ronaldo is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. CR7 was launched in 2017.
top: Top notes are Lavender, Cardamom, Artemisia and Bergamot;
middle: Middle notes are Tobacco, Cinnamon, Cedar and iris;
base: Base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Amber.

title: Davidoff, Cool Water Edt 125Ml M
description: Davidoff, Cool Water Edt 125Ml M

title: DAVIDOFF, COOL WATER EDT 75ML M GIFT SET
Davidoff, Cool Water Intense Edp 125Ml M
description: Cool Water Intense Cologne by Davidoff, Make it feel like a day at the beach without ever leaving your office when you’re wearing Cool Water Intense, a revitalizing men’s fragrance.
top: This charismatic cologne blends citrus, gourmand and aromatic accords together for a bright and luminous result that’s bound to leave you spirits high from morning until night.
middle: The top note of sparkling and sweet green mandarin starts off the concoction with some bold, energetic flair, while the middle note of lush coconut nectar at the heart plays up the tropical angle in spades. Completing the aroma is the balancing agent of warm, golden amber that helps set the tone for a soothing and refreshing atmosphere that lingers in the air for hour after it’s sprayed.

title: Davidoff, Hot Water Edt 110Ml M
description: Hot Water is the blend of innate power and instincts that reveals a natural and ingenuous sex appeal. Feel the burning, latent heat. Reach out, caress this skin, pulses racing, cross the line.
top: Top notes are Wormwood and Basil;
middle: Middle notes are Paprika and Patchouli;
base: Base notes are Benzoin and Styrax.

title: DAVIDOFF, THE GAME EDT 100ML M
Davidoff, Zino Edt 125Ml M
description: Give in to your own dreams and imagination. Davidoff Zino Eau de Toilette is a fragrance for a passionate man pursuing the harmony of body and soul. Its oriental scent with woody notes perfectly underscores your unique charisma and gives you confidence every single day.
top: very masculine, oriental woody fragrancefor men who want to feel confidentespecially suitable for evening occasions and colder weather
middle: The opening will draw your attention with an exotic combination of lavender, refreshing bergamot and sage which invigorate your mind. They’re later joined by floral notes of jasmine, lily of the valley and elegant rose. The drydown boasts a lasting aroma of cedar wood and sandalwood along with vanilla and seductive patchouli.
base: Top notesBergamot, Lavender, Rosewood, Sage.

title: Diesel, Only The Brave Edt 125Ml M
description: Diesel Only the Brave Eau de Toilette. A fragrance that leaves the mark of a distinctive attitude. An explosive cocktail that bears witness to a man with an identity as strong as it is present, almost magnetic. A fresh and leathery fragrance with notes of citrus, amber and leather.
top: Top: Lemon & Mandarin Orange.
middle: Heart: Cedar, Coriander & Violet.
base: Base: Amber, Leather, Styrax & Benzoin.

title: Diesel, Only The Brave Street Edt 75Ml M Gift Set
description: Perfume set for men containing eau de toilette 75 ml and shower gel 100 ml
top: The set comes in an elegant package to present as a gift to everyone you love on special occasions
middle: The composition of the fresh fragrance is an expression of bold decisions and enthusiastic beginnings in your different days
base: The fragrance notes of cardamom and licorice mixed with the warmth of patchouli and cedar reflect the details of your attractive personality

title: Diesel, Only The Brave Tattoo Edt 125Ml M
description: Only The Brave Tattoo by Diesel, is designed to champion men that live proudly and courageously, heralding the wearer with a zesty, masculine fragrance featuring fresh fruit and warm spices.
top: Red apple, with a touch of mandarin orange, opens the cologne with bright, crisp spirit that soon leads into the heart of sage and Bourbon pepper. The woodsy drydown uses benzoin, patchouli and tobacco as accents to its enduring warmth and energy.

title: Diesel, Only The Brave Wild Edt 75Ml M Gift Set
description: Diesel Only The Brave Wild Gift Set 75ml EDT
top: 50ml Aftershave Balm
middle: 50ml Shower Gel
base: Only The Brave Wild by Diesel is a woody and spicy fragrance for men.

title: DIOR, EAU SAUVAGE FORTE PARFUM 100ML M
description: Sauvage Eau Forte Parfum embodies an emblematic freshness that is amplified and prolonged by the power of water. An intensity made possible by an innovative alcohol-free formula exclusive to Dior.
top: Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Parfum Creative Director, imagined Sauvage Eau Forte Parfum as a perfume for men that blends the freshness of an eau de toilette and the intensity of a parfum. This singular creation explores the uncharted territory of a fresh and spicy fougère with an unexpected combination of cool spices, bleached lavender and musky wood.
middle: An exhilarating composition, Sauvage Eau Forte Parfum embodies both a cool freshness and a breathtaking power through an unprecedented concentration that is 100% alcohol-free.
base: Strengthened by the freshness of water, the blend of cool spices, bleached lavender and musky woods attains its ultimate expression.

title: Dior, Eau Sauvage Parfum Edp 100Ml M
description: François Demachy revisits the trail of Eau Sauvage in its Parfum interpretation with a refreshed aromatic power. As powerful and sensual as ever, the composition is invigorated with a unique freshness warmed by the Grasse sun.
top: Top notes bursting with citrus revive a woody heart of pure vetiver. This light wood stirs the warm and powerful elemi note to unfurl in a spicy, oriental base.
middle: Deep and full, vibrant and fresh, the new Eau Sauvage Parfum enhances the solar signature of Eau Sauvage with warm and radiant accents.

title: Dior, Fahrenheit Edt 100Ml M
description: Alone in the face of the majestic elements, the Fahrenheit man incarnates a thirst for the absolute. Timeless and universal, Fahrenheit is a fragrance that transcends time and trends to forge its own territory. A unique,* contrasting olfactory signature with a powerful, lingering trail. The fragrance is structured around fresh notes of Sicilian Mandarin, a surprising blend of masculine Wood and Leather notes, and a unique* Violet accord.

title: Dior, Fahrenheit Parfum 75Ml M
description: Fahrenheit Parfum invents a power of attraction. An immediately addictive trail that highlights the harmony of extraordinary olfactory accords. A scented script that blends extremes, where flower meets leather and woods. The legendary signature of the Fahrenheit fragrance is wrapped in a vibrant, sensual accord with accents of Violet and Leather, enhanced by Bourbon Vanilla absolute. The irresistible attraction of a fragrance exalted by rare ingredients.

title: Dior, Homme Cologne Edc 125Ml M
description: Pure and demanding, the Dior Homme Cologne fragrance reflects a quest for fine, quality ingredients. Its enveloping trail has all the casual charm of a timeless white shirt: Dior Homme eau de Cologne represents the elegance of simplicity. It’s an intimate scent, just for you.
top: For this fragrance, the Dior Perfumer-Creator revisits the freshness of eau de Cologne around Grapefruit Blossom, refining and imbuing it with a musky sensuality.
middle: Style without ostentation. As expressive as an eau de parfum and yet incredibly light and airy. Dior Homme Cologne defies the laws of perfumery.
base: Notes include: bergamot, Moroccan grapefruit blossom, musk

title: Dior, Homme Edt 100Ml M
description: Dior Homme Eau de Toilette is intriguingly powerful and appealingly fresh.
top: Dior Homme redefines a new, masculine sensuality in a polyphony of smooth and raw wood. A heart of tender wood, in which the virility of Atlas Cedar embraces the enveloping warmth of Haitian Vetiver tinged with spice. Wood hand-chiseled by Dior.
middle: Dior Homme conveys all the facets of modern masculinity. A man, yes, but a man of many nuances: confident in both his strength and his tenderness.
base: Dior Homme Eau de Toilette is a fragrance with a bold trail that leaves a sensual imprint.

title: Dior, Homme Edt 100Ml M Gift Set
description: The definition of masculine sensuality, Dior Homme is the Dior eau de toilette with an intriguing strength and a seductive freshness.
top: The Dior Homme set includes:– A 100 ml bottle of Dior Homme eau de toilette. The olfactory translation of a modern masculinity for a man of many nuances. An eau de toilette with the woody notes of Atlas Cedar, Patchouli Heart and Vetiver.– A 10 ml Dior Homme travel spray. The elegant, travel-friendly fragrance accessory. Pre-filled and refillable with Dior Homme eau de toilette, the travel spray becomes the essential travel companion for every journey.– A 50 ml bottle of Dior Homme shower gel. A scented shower gel that cultivates the trail of Dior Homme for a cleansed skin.

title: Dior, Homme Intense Edp 100Ml M
description: Dior Homme Intense Cologne by Christian Dior, You will fall in love with this scent from the moment you smell it. It may even become your signature fragrance.
top: This long lasting cologne opens with lavender. The middle notes follow with ambrette, pear liquor, iris and powder. The bottom notes are vetiver and virginia cedar wood.

title: Dior, Homme Parfum Edp 100Ml M
description: Level up to the new 2020 Dior Homme Parfum, the quintessence of Dior Homme. This scent reveals an unusual concentration for a smooth and intense leather fragrance. The nobility of its ingredients is expressed differently on each person’s skin.
top: An iris with a passionate trail in the noblest concentration. An intensely floral nectar with woody aromas that keep it from falling into a caricature. A distinguished signature with an immediate carnal attraction.

title: DIOR, HOMME SPORT EDT 100ML M
description: Dior creates Dior Homme Sport, the new lively and sensual eau de toilette, the explosive combination of fresh and enveloping notes, the fragrance of a man with a tender and magnetic virility.
top: Reggio di Calabria Bergamot and Lemon are a genuine appeal to freshness. Their juicy and zesty notes immediately identify the confident trail of the new Dior Homme Sport. These top notes are enriched with resinous and lemony Elemi. Vibrant and spicy, Pink Pepper accompanies the warm and ambery notes of the fragrance. Frankincense is invited for the first time to the heart of Dior Homme Sport: enveloping, it brings a new intensity and melds with the woods and amber, emblematic signatures of Dior Homme.

title: DIOR, HOMME SPORT EDT 125ML M
description: Dior creates Dior Homme Sport, the new lively and sensual eau de toilette, the explosive combination of fresh and enveloping notes, the fragrance of a man with a tender and magnetic virility.
top: Reggio di Calabria Bergamot and Lemon are a genuine appeal to freshness. Their juicy and zesty notes immediately identify the confident trail of the new Dior Homme Sport. These top notes are enriched with resinous and lemony Elemi. Vibrant and spicy, Pink Pepper accompanies the warm and ambery notes of the fragrance. Frankincense is invited for the first time to the heart of Dior Homme Sport: enveloping, it brings a new intensity and melds with the woods and amber, emblematic signatures of Dior Homme.

title: Dior, Sauvage Edp 100Ml M
description: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes new sensual and mysterious facets, amply renewing itself with the signature of an ingenious composition.
top: Calabrian bergamot, as juicy and spirited as ever, invites new spicy notes to add fullness and sensuality, as the woody ambery trail of Ambroxan® is wrapped in the smoky accents of Papua New Guinean vanilla absolute for greater virility.
middle: François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, drew inspiration from the desert in the magical hour of twilight. Mixed with the coolness of the night, the burning desert air exudes profound fragrances. In the hour when the wolves come out and the sky is set ablaze, a new magic unfolds.

title: Dior, Sauvage Edp 200Ml M
description: Dior, Sauvage Edp 200Ml M

title: Dior, Sauvage Edt 100Ml M
description: The strong gust of citrus in Sauvage Eau de Toilette is powerfully anchored by the ambery nobleness of ambroxan, resinous elemi and woods.
top: Instantly recognizable, it has become a genuine signature scent, unique* in its confident virility.
middle: Like a deep breath of fresh air, Sauvage Eau de Toilette is a bold composition for a man who is authentic and true.
base: Top notes are Calabrian bergamot and Pepper;

title: Dior, Sauvage Elixir Parfum 100Ml M
description: Sauvage Elixir is the Dior fragrance with a unique and extreme concentration, like the quintessence of Sauvage. This fragrance for men unleashes an unexpected and surprising scent trail with notes of grapefruit, spices, organic AOP lavender and rich woods. It is an olfactory composition with astonishing strength that explores uncharted territory.
top: The Sauvage Elixir fragrance boldly reinterprets the iconic freshness of Sauvage by embracing a trail with new custom-crafted facets. Woody, fresh or spicy: each olfactory note of the fragrance exults, explodes, grips and engulfs.
middle: Top Notes: Grapefruit note and heart of spices
base: Top notes burst with a lively grapefruit and spices. Some, like the essences of cinnamon and nutmeg, play with warmth and sensuality, whilst others are refreshing, like the zesty and aromatic cardamom.

title: Dior, Sauvage Elixir Parfum 60Ml M

It is an olfactory composition with astonishing strength that explores uncharted territory.

description: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes new sensual and mysterious facets, amply renewing itself with the signature of an ingenious composition.
top: Calabrian bergamot, as juicy and spirited as ever, invites new spicy notes to add fullness and sensuality, as the woody ambery trail of Ambroxan® is wrapped in the smoky accents of Papua New Guinean vanilla absolute for greater virility.
middle: François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, drew inspiration from the desert in the magical hour of twilight. Mixed with the coolness of the night, the burning desert air exudes profound fragrances. In the hour when the wolves come out and the sky is set ablaze, a new magic unfolds.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Intenso Edp 200Ml M
description: Dolce & Gabbana Intenso is an aromatic woody fragrance that exudes elegance representing a contrast between clean, fresh and rich, warm aromas. Announced as the scent of pure instinct and emotion that is express freely; the fragrance is the force of a determined man, with a heart that is rooted in tradition, yet revels in the modern world.
top: The composition opens with fresh aquatic notes and green nuances of basil and lavender. The new chord in the world of fragrance Moepel wood from South Africa makes the heart with its luxurious floral, balsamic and honey accents. Tobacco is deepened by dry notes of hay absolute and bran. The intensity and strength of the composition come from the base of labdanum, sandalwood and cypress.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, K Edp 100Ml M
description: Built on the legacy of K by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Toilette, K by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Parfum is a sensual new scent that embodies the spirit of a man who chooses his destiny with passion and confidence. Inspired by the earthy, rugged landscape of Tuscany, the original fragrance is reinterpreted to evoke the intense and magnetic sides of this king of everyday life.
top: As well as the Eau de Toilette, K by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Parfum opens with an invigorating fusion of zesty citruses, sparkling blood orange mingling with lemon torchio essence to create an effervescent opening accord. Sharpened by the fresh tang of juniper berry, these citruses are enlivened by a new spicy note of cardamom.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, K Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: Built on the legacy of the Eau de Toilette, K by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Parfum unveils a sensual scent that embodies the spirit of a man who chooses his destiny with passion and confidence. Inspired by the earthy, rugged landscape of Tuscany, this fragrance is the intense, fascinating version that unfolds a peppery enchanting heart and a stronger woody base.
top: This set contains:– K By DG EDP100ml– After Shave Balm 50ml– Shower Gel 50ml

title: Dolce & Gabbana, K Edt 100Ml M
description: K by Dolce&Gabbana embodies the charismatic and generous spirit. It means respecting traditions while embracing modernity. The Mediterranean citrus freshness of blood orange and Sicilian lemon scent embrace the senses. Heart notes ignite the citruses with the amber accents of clary sage, married with crisp geranium and energizing lavandin. An unexpected spark of fiery pimento essence gives to K by Dolce&Gabbana a strong personality. Then comes the sensuality of cedarwood, blended with two elegant and masculine ingredients: green vetiver and patchouli. K by Dolce&Gabbana is a blazing, charismatic trail of lingering seduction.
top: Fragrance Notes:Top notes – Blood orange & Sicilian Lemon
middle: Heart notes – Clary sage, geranium, lavandin & Pimento essence
base: Base notes – Cedarwood, green vetiver & patchouli

title: Dolce & Gabbana, K Edt 100Ml M Gift Set
description: K by Dolce&Gabbana is a perfume which celebrates a new era of masculinity. It conjures the Italian countryside and the Mediterranean midday sun with a combination of citrus freshness, blood orange and Sicilian lemon. This crisp and masculine scent is edged by the fresh bite of juniper berry. Then comes the sensual pulse of noble cedarwood. It blends with green vetiver and patchouli. And to give K by Dolce&Gabbana a unique and assertive personality, an unexpected spark of fiery pimiento essence adds a red-hot touch of heat. K by Dolce&Gabbana is a pour homme fragrance that invigorates and inspires.

description: A more intense escape into the Mediterranean blue.
top: A chilled citrus cocktail of refreshing mandarin and frozen grapefruit gives the top notes a cool, elegant twist.
middle: Aromatic juniper dives into the heart of salty, aquatic accord, conjuring the translucent blue water of the Mediterranean sea.
base: An abundance of vibrant amber woods wrapped in musks extends the radiance and staying power of this masculine blend, leaving a potent trail that captures the innate sensuality of the Light Blue man.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Light Blue Intense Edp 100Ml M Gift Set

Aromatic juniper dives into the heart of salty, aquatic accord, conjuring the translucent blue water of the Mediterranean Sea. description: The limited edition Light Blue Italian Love Pour Femme Eau de Toilette by Dolce&Gabbana is a sensual fruity floral with a new woody dimension, capturing the essence of profound passion and summer intensity.

middle: Top – italian lemon, granny smith apple
base: Middle – ambrette, jasmine sambac, white rose

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Light Blue Summer Vibes Edt 125Ml M
description: The Italian holiday dream. The energy of summer by the sea. Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Summer Vibes is a limited edition that reinvents two iconic fragrances and wraps them in the distinctive majolica print. The fragrance Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Summer Vibes Pour Homme Eau de Toilette captures the fresh energy of Italian holidays through an invigorating blend of Mediterranean citrus and woody notes. The design of Light Blue Summer Vibes Pour Homme Eau de Toilette reflects the joy of summer in a trapezoidal bottle with soft lines, wrapped in the iconic majolica print, and embellished with a white cap. Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Summer Vibes Pour Homme Eau de Toilette: a sunny and charismatic fragrance. The fragrance was created by Alberto Morillas exclusively for Dolce & Gabbana. Top: Retaining the citrus base of the iconic Light Blue Pour Homme fragrance, the limited edition boasts an additional hint of Sicilian Lemon that adds vibrancy to the bouquet Heart: An infusion of Cypress enhances the fragrance’s masculine charisma Base: To crown it all, the pleasant warmth of Amber Wood

title: Dolce & Gabbana, The One Edp 100Ml M
description: Dolce & Gabbana launched The One for Men in 2008 as the fragrance intended to become a masculine classics. In 2015, The One for Men Eau de Parfum appears as an enhanced, denser version of the scent.The elegant top notes of coriander, basil and grapefruit are leading to the heart where there is a warm blend of ginger, orange blossom and cardamom.
top: Tobacco, sensual amber and cedar leave their mark at the base of the perfume.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, The One Edp 150Ml M
description: Dolce & Gabbana launched The One for Men in 2008 as the fragrance intended to become a masculine classics.
top: In 2015, The One for Men Eau de Parfum appears as an enhanced, denser version of the scent.The elegant top notes of coriander, basil and grapefruit are leading to the heart where there is a warm blend of ginger, orange blossom and cardamom.
middle: Tobacco, sensual amber and cedar leave their mark at the base of the perfume.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, The One Edt 100Ml M
description: The One by Dolce & Gabbana is a unique blend of amber and spicy accords. Introduced in 2008, this fragrance was created to be a classic men’s fragrance, and designed to be attractive to women as well as men. The cologne opens with notes of crisp bergamot, peppery basil and warm coriander. These scents give way to the middle notes of cardamom, ginger, and neroli, giving a warm and lightly floral heart. The fragrance closes with scents of cedar, ambergris and tobacco, striking a distinctly masculine note.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, The One Edt 150Ml M

title: Etat Libre, D’Orange Tom Of Finland Edp 100Ml M
description: Tom of Finland feels clean, like a shaving from a cake of soap. It is an ode to the beauty of the male body and to the radiance of the natural self.
top: For this man, clothing becomes a jewel-case that serves to reveal the true erotic power of the flesh. Tom of Finland is a breath of fresh air, offering unrestricted access to the immense outdoors, the depths of the forest, with notes of birch leaves, cypress, galbanum and pine at its heart. Straight, gay… These words are irrelevant here. Tom of Finland is beyond sexuality — he is sex, in all its fullness and magnitude, open and erect. Fantasy clings to him like his leather jacket, with suede, musk, and ambergray in the base notes. His belt is fastened with an accord of pepper and spicy-fresh saffron, tangled with a blond suede sensuality on a vanilla bed of tonka bean and iris. This is a man who wants to play, to love, to die and be reborn, again and again. Tom of Finland is a tribute to tomorrow’s glorious possibilities.

The striking sensation of an icy breeze is juxtaposed with the generosity of the woody, mineral notes characteristic of Terre d’Hermès.
base: THE OBJECTAs if cut from ice, the object is sleek and limpid. Frosted glass and brushed aluminium evoke the notion of frost covering the earth. The H on its base is a subtle reference to the ancestry of a now-cult object.

description: Terre d’Hermès tells a story of the mythic elements of the ancient and natural world—a story of transformation from earth to bloom told through the sensorial pleasure of the eau. Mineral notes give root to woody tones and warm resins flow behind rich green notes and clear dewy water to bloom into the air with the vivacity and sparkle of citrus scents enhanced by a note of shiso. Experience this bold and ancient alchemy as the perfumer transforms material, from earth through air and water. “Feeling the earth, lying on the ground, gazing at the sky.”—Jean-Claude Ellena, Master Parfumeur Notes: Grapefruit, Woody Notes, Mineral Notes, Green Notes. The scents base is pure animal magnetism: precious oud laced with smoky cypriol and gaiac wood, rich in leather, resting on the deepest and driest woods. The result is sumptuous, sensual, utterly compelling.

With its rich amber color and hefty, robust flacon, this fragrance is a masterful orchestration for all the senses, brought to you by perfumers Bruno Jovanovic & Pascal Gaurin. It certainly won’t go unnoticed. Read more about Hugo Boss Boss The Scent Eau de Toilette here.

middle: The interplay of contrasts between the intense freshness of the deep currents and the heat of magma is here pushed to extremes. The fresh aspect comes from spicy notes of cardamom combined with the zesty scent of bergamot. Between strength and balance, the aroma of peppermint mingles with the verticality of the profound mineral solar accord that is the signature of Fusion dIssey. Underlying this, the unique union of sandalwood and patchouli essences.

title: ISSEY MIYAKE, L’EAU D’ISSEY  EDT 125ML M
description: Discover a timeless fragrance, the first masculine signature of Issey Miyake.With discretion, L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme has established itself as an elegant and unique reference in the world of men’s perfumery. A massive, stable and recognizable line: here is the iconic bottle of L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme. Very contemporary, the glass rectangle widened at the base stands out with strength and stability, and contrasts with a light gray metal tapered hood.
top: L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme offers the right balance of strength sparkling notes.
middle: A freshness that lasts and surprises with an unexpected burst of tangerine and yuzu, Japanese lemon accord with a deep and vibrant aroma like a memory. At the heart, the Water Lily note gives an aquatic facet of L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme, subtly warmed by spicy notes. The base notes provide a marked masculine presence, with the assertive character of sandalwood, vetiver and tobacco amber accord.

title: Issey Miyake, L’Eau D’Issey Eau & Cedre Edt 100Ml M
description: 30 years after the launch of the iconic L’Eau d’Issey, Issey Miyake have added a woody and vibrant vegan Eau de Toilette to their collection for men. Designed to celebrate water’s fluidity, the fragrance takes Issey Miyake’s traditional freshness and perfectly balances it with innovative notes of raw and intense woods.
top: An ode to captivating masculinity, the fragrance follows the purest water as it flows through rugged, brutal wilderness. Discover a clash of water and wood that’s vibrantly fresh and undeniably ‘Issey Miyake’ with L’Eau d’Issey Eau & Cedre…
middle: Issey Miyake Eau & Cedre is infused with cardamom, which opens the fragrance with its spicy intensity. The signature aquatic Issey Miyake calone note puts out the fiery opening as it clashes with rough yet comforting cedarwood. To finish, vetiver and patchouli come together to add an elegant smoky, woody tone that is reminiscent of a dusky forest, adding a layer of seduction to the base.

title: Issey Miyake, L’Eau D’Issey Edt 125Ml M Gift Set
description: Discover L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme, a truly timeless fragrance. As Issey Miyake’s first perfume for men, L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme has established itself as a signature reference in the world of men’s perfumery and aftershave.
top: Strength and balance – these are the two qualities that unite the fragrance. Upon first spritz, you’re greeted with the vibrant freshness of yuzu, the iconic Japanese citrus, and tangerine. In the heart, water lily creates the aquatic facet of L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme, balanced by warm spicy notes. Tobacco, vetiver, and sandalwood channel an energy which evokes that of a powerful waterfall, making the fragrance assertive and masculine.
middle: The iconic bottle of L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme has transcended time as well. Inspired by waterfalls as well, the slender, contemporary glass widens at the base and stands in contrast with the light grey hood.
base: Set contains L’Eau d’Issey pour Homme Eau de Toilette (125ml), shower gel (50ml) and after shave (50ml).

top: Abundant and translucent, water carries invisible, unseizable salt. As water changes state and evaporates, the salt crystalizes, leaving its distinctive scent on the skin. The senses are awakened, the pulse quickens, motion propels you forward. The essence of salt brings flavor to life.
middle: Feel alive, feel the energy. Le Sel d’Issey. The power of salt. The woody marine perfume for men.
base: This fresh new fragrance, created by perfumer Quentin Bisch, reveals a vigorous salt accord enhanced by intense masculine notes. Made with 95% natural origin ingredients, and 100% natural origin French alcohol, Le Sel d’Issey Eau de Toilette is a vegan-certified perfume.

title: ISSEY MIYAKE, NUIT D’ISSEY EDT 125ML M
description: Dive into the night, nature and sky will become one. Under the influence of the moon, nature is magnified, senses are enhanced, emotions deepened, ‘Nuit D’Issey’ draws its strength from the powerful and mysterious nature and empowers the man that wears it with a powerful force of natural attraction.
top: In the heart of nature with all its power and mystery, under the watchful eye of the moon, the senses are awakened, emotions are amplified. Nuit D’issey captures this force and bestows natural powers of attraction on the wearer.
middle: Fragrance Notes:Top notes: Bergamot, Grapefruit
base: Heart notes: Leather, Black Pepper, Woody, Vetiver, Spices

title: ISSEY MIYAKE, NUIT D’ISSEY PARFUM 125ML M
description: A magnetic, mysterious, and vivid composition that evokes a dark night opens with accords of grapefruit and pink pepper. Leather and vanilla in the heart give an elegant touch to the composition. The rich and textured base consists of tonka bean absolute and patchouli.

title: Issey Miyake, Wood And Wood Edp 100Ml M
description: Wood & Wood focuses on a blend of two woods, specifically Virginia cedar essence and sandal essence. These two rich and complex wood accords come together to create an effortlessly smooth masculine fragrance that boasts an unexpected twist of citrus.
top: Top Note: Grapefruit Essence.
middle: Heart Notes: Virginia Cedar Essence, Sandal Essence.
base: Base Note: Patchouli Essence.

title: Jaguar, Classic Black Edt 100Ml M
description: Jaguar Classic Black Cologne by Jaguar, Named for the penultimate luxury automobile, this is a luxourious and racy aromatic fragrance for men . Sensual and modern with citrus top notes, blended with heart notes of orange and lotus flower, and spicy ginger. Notes notes of sandalwood, benzoin and white musk create a daring woody base.

title: Jaguar, Classic Blue Edt 100ml
description: The refreshing note perceived at first contact comes from the refined blend of mandarin, bergamot and orange. This pleasing prelude flows immediately into the aromatic accord of lavender, juniper berry, basil and anise star. It evolves into a fine heart note in which the delicacy of lotus flowers and orange blossom blends seductively with the spiciness of ginger. It is the subtle woody and balsamic notes, accompanied by luxurious sandalwood, sumptuous benzoin and white musk, which are responsible for the lasting sensuousness of this fragrance.

title: JAGUAR, CLASSIC RED EDT 100ML M
description: An expressive and dynamic fragrance. At first, it offers a powerful boost with aromas of Sicilian bergamot, blackcurrant and raspberry. The ozonic accord in the heart note provides freshness followed by a floral scent and the spiciness of bay and hot pepper oil. Woody notes of cedarwood and patchouli atomize a warm and sensual touch to the base – a dynamic combination of ingredients with an extraordinary personality.

title: Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Beau Edt 125Ml M
description: When Jean Paul Gaultier created this perfect new nude, Le Beau Le Parfum, it wasn’t to keep it covered up! In this Garden of Eden amidst abundant nature, a simple gold vine leaf plucked from the iconic green box is more than enough to clothe the muscled black and green lacquered torso bottle. And if the seductive powers of Gaultier’s new intense eau de parfum are extra sensual, so much the better as nothing is off limits here. All you have to do is take a bite of the forbidden fruit with its fresh and addictive amber woodiness.
top: FRAGRANCE FAMILY
middle: TOP NOTES
base: COCONUT WOOD

title: Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Beau Edt 125Ml M Gift Set
description: Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Beau Edt 125Ml M Gift Set

title: Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Beau Le Parfum Intense Edp 125Ml M
description: Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Beau Le Parfum Intense Edp 125Ml M

title: JEAN PAUL GAULTIER, LE BEAU PARADISE GARDEN EDP 125ML M
description: Enter the realm of temptation and discover Jean Paul Gaultier’s garden. A sumptuous paradise with exotic creatures and luxuriant vegetation, home to Le Beau Paradise Garden.
top: Drawn in by a blazing passion, the first man shows off his unerring sense of style with glistening embroidery on his sculpted torso – inspired by the 2010/11 Autumn-Winter ready-to-wear collection. You can’t help but notice his tropical green bottle, captivating and natural, and his woody fragrance with heavenly scents. Get swept up in this euphoric odyssey and succumb to the irresistible.

title: JEAN PAUL GAULTIER, LE MALE EDT 125ML M
description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male for Men is sexy and seductive. A powerful masculine aroma of fresh citrus with a woody base.
top: Top Notes: Lavender, Mint, Bergamot, Cardamom
middle: Heart Notes: Caraway, Orange Blossom, Cinnamon.
base: Base Notes: Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Amber

title: Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Male Edt 125Ml M Gift Set
description: This EDT is an oriental fragrance for men. This aftershave begins with the scent of Lavender, Mint, Cardamom, Bergamot and Artemisia. The middle is a bouquet of Cinnamon, Orange Blossom and Caraway. Its finishing notes are a sweet and musky mélange of Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Amber, Sandalwood and Cedar.
top: Top notes: Lavender, Mint, Cardamom, Bergamot and Artemisia
middle: Middle notes: Cinnamon, Orange Blossom and Caraway
base: Base notes: Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Amber, Sandalwood and Cedar.

title: JEAN PAUL GAULTIER, LE MALE ELIXIR PARFUM 125ML M
description: Le Male Elixir sailor triggers a heatwave when he steps aboard! On deck, this Gaultier fragrance is so intense that gold melts in flaming streaks across his torrid torso and metal can. Talk about sex appeal when this woody aromatic amber and totally addictive fragrance envelops his body! The horizon starts rocking and rolling. The senses are out of control. Burning with desire for this sensual elixir that works its magic beneath his translucent brown sailor top.
top: Woody aromatic amber notes define this intense fragrance. Just one torrid spritz of this woody aromatic amber elixir is enough to set the senses on fire to the point of addiction. Ablaze with sensuality. Intense on the skin. Sunny tropical Tonka bean gravitates towards legendary lavender. The animal magnetism of seductive benzoin. A blast of fresh mint and bergamot. Now, you’re ready! You’re melting with desire.

title: JEAN PAUL GAULTIER, LE MALE ELIXIR PARFUM 125MLS SPRAY+75ML SHOWER GEL+10ML SPRAY GIFT SET M
JEAN PAUL GAULTIER, LE MALE LE PARFUM INTENSE EDP 125ML
description: Dressed in a black and gold officer’s jacket, this intense Eau de Parfum is taking leadership of the Le Male range with great style and strength. An elegant woody oriental trail capturing the charisma and power of a leader. Attention sailors! The captain has arrived and we’re about to set sail.
top: Drawing on the potency of cardamom in its top notes and the freshness of lavender and iris at its heart, this intense Eau De Parfum ultimately promises to immerse you in its wonderfully addictive and prominent vanilla base note. An olfactory odyssey full of contrasts to disorient and delight the senses, its masculine trail revealing the charisma of an officer

title: JEAN PAUL GAULTIER, LE MALE LE PARFUM INTENSE EDP 200ML M
description: Dressed in a black and gold officer’s jacket, this intense Eau de Parfum is taking leadership of the Le Male range with great style and strength. An elegant woody oriental trail capturing the charisma and power of a leader. Attention sailors! The captain has arrived and we’re about to set sail.

title: Jean Paul Gaultier, Scandal Edt 100Ml M
description: The new SCANDAL POUR HOMME eau de toilette by Jean Paul Gaultier is making a grand entrance into the ring.q
top: Its bottle of muscular elegance, adorned with a boxing glove, contains an oriental woody fragrance for men with addictive accents. Wrap yourself in a virile and magnetic fragrance and reveal the victorious athlete within you. Jean Paul Gaultier’s new fragrance for men leaves no room for failure. Put all of Paris at your feet with the new SCANDAL POUR HOMME Eau de Toilette by Jean Paul Gaultier, available now.
middle: NOTESRevisiting caramel with chic in his eau de toilette: how dare he? In harmony with the tonka bean, this unusual note mingles with clary sage and vetiver with a Jean Paul Gaultier madness that seduces the senses by surprise. Its very addictive and sensual blue-gray juice attracts all victories to itself. A punchy fragrance that causes scandal.

title: Jean Paul Gaultier, Scandal Le Parfum 100Ml M
description: Things are hotting up in the ring! More addictive than ever, this Eau de Parfum Intense promises even more sensations. And what’s on the programme? High-quality geranium. Super delicious tonka bean. An explosion of warm woods including a sandalwood of an absolutely breathtaking enveloping sensuality. It creates a real scandal as soon as hits your skin.

title: Jean Paul Gaultier, Ultra Male Intense Edt 125Ml M
description: Ultra Male is a fragrance built upon contrasts, moving from deeply seductive facets to casual freshness like the rolling of the tides. In this voyage, the sailor is well travelled and thoroughly modern, with a fresh outlook and a streak of rebellion.
top: The fragrance opens with the torrid sensuousness of black lavender accented with mint and juicy pear. In the heart, a frisson of cool spices create contrast, before a dry down of black vanilla, amber and woods create an unforgettable trail.
middle: Top Notes: Bergamot, Juicy Pear, Black Lavender, Mint
base: Heart Notes: Cinnamon, Clary Sage

title: Jeroboam, Vespero Extrait De Parfum 30Ml M
description: A resolutely masculine extract dedicated to urban night owls, a bit of dandy, who were waiting for a signature fragrance, a mark of our time. A confidential perfume par excellence, finding it on another becomes almost a game, a wink heard between members of the same club to which the Vespero belongs.
top: Top notes : Bergamot, Apple, Grapefruit, Rose
middle: Heart notes : Cedar, Geranium, Leather, Jasmine
base: Base notes : Patchouli, Wood, Raspberry, Enigmatic Musks.

title: Jimmy Choo,  Aqua Edt 100Ml M

title: Jimmy Choo, Intense Edt 100Ml M
description: Taking elegant lavender and patchouli as its starting point, Jimmy Choo MAN INTENSE underlines the sensuality of the original Jimmy Choo MAN fragrance by adding an accent of black pepper and a trio of new notes to bolster its amber base. Honeydew melon adds a watery freshness whilst davana oil gives a sensual quality. Tonka bean brings an almond-meets-tobacco edge that’s warm and intensely masculine.

title: Jimmy Choo, Man Edt 100Ml M
description: Jimmy Choo MAN is the first fragrance for men from Jimmy Choo. A powerfully fresh and modern fragrance created for a confident and refined man with a rebellious spirit, it captures the independent attitude of the dynamic and urban Jimmy Choo man.
top: The fragrance opens with the crisp vivacity of mandarin and citrus notes tempered with calming lavender and the subtle sweetness of honeydew melon. Vibrant notes of geranium accompany pineapple leaf and blend harmoniously on the skin with the heady aroma of rare patchouli. At the base, notes of warm, amber-based wood are blended to form a signature fragrance that is distinctive and alluring.
middle: The packaging was inspired by an antique hip flask with an edge of rock ‘n’ roll rebellion. The smoky glass bottle instills the fragrance with a sense of mysterious sensuality, perfect for a sophisticated and masculine man.
base: Notes:Lavender, Honeydew Melon, Pineapple Leaf, Pink Pepper, Patchouli, Suede.

Urban Hero by Jimmy Choo flourishes a rebellious edge with sharp notes of black pepper and lemon caviar. The heart uses the spicy-woody tones of vetiver alongside indulgent rosewood. The base highlights animalic essences within a rich leather and grey amber accord.

title: Jimmy Choo, Urban Hero Gold Edition Edp 100Ml M
description: Jimmy Choo Urban Hero Gold Edition is a sophisticated fragrance with a fiercely creative heart, emblematic of the street art environment. Rebellious, inspired, elegant and daring, the Urban Hero Gold is also multifaceted – a man of contrasts who and openly embraces a free approach to life. This woody fruity Eau de Parfum is imbued with unique and enticing top notes of pineapple and blood orange. The bitterness of the latter helps to offset the balsamic sweetness of soothing lavandin and rich tonka bean at the heart.

middle: Heart Notes – Tonka Bean and Lavender

description: Artisan Pure is inspired by the verdant and lush hills of Xalapa, Mexico, and its vast coffee and citrus groves. Redolent, luxurious citrus notes bring an understated elegance to modern, sun-warmed woods.
top: The fragrance is a crisp, woody citrus scent, as refined as it is cool. Highlighted are three distinct types of petitgrains that use all elements of the citrus tree (leaves, branches and tender fruit), as well as the best quality of orris.

title: John Varvatos, Black Edt 125Ml M
description: John Varvatos Eau de Toilette is a smooth, masculine scent with notes of date fruit, coriander, amber and leather.
top: Bringing together elements that are both familiar and unique, the scent is intense yet inviting, sophisticated yet relaxed – it is the embodiment of sophistication. A staple, classic scent suitable for the office and versatile enough to transition as a signature, after hours fragrance

base: Middle – Coriander Seed Templar, Clary Sage Flower, Indian Ajowan.

description: A woody and aromatic eau de toilette that reaches back to move forward with a sensibility that is both old and new. Though rooted in the signature John Varvatos fragrance both olfactively and aesthetically, it is distinctly unique with a rugged authenticity and enduring appeal.
top: Notes:
middle: – Top: rhubarb, quince paste, juniper berries, cinnamon tree leaves.

Then comes the intoxicating ylang-ylang, an unusual ingredient in masculine fragrances, which provides extraordinary sensuality. The base notes include vetiver, tonka bean, and a bit of incense, giving the whole composition passionate warmth and intensity.
middle: JOOP! Homme Absolute is the fragrance of a natural-born seducer. Exquisite ingredients such as bergamot, cardamom and violet have a subtly captivating effect. Fir balm, tonka bean and vanilla form the sensual component, while the base note with distinctive wood fragrances completes the character. A provocative fragrance for men who dare.

title: Kenneth Cole, Black For Him Edt 100Ml M
description: Launched in 2003 by the design house of Kenneth Cole, Black is a celebration of the allure of the timeless color, black. Deep, dark and outright sexy, the perfume is a targeted charmer with an undeniable pull. It blends scents from exotic spices, invigorating herbs, and carnal woods, in one masculine fragrance that is not just sexy, but also pleasant, elegant and sophisticated. Perfect for casual use and date nights, Black is an absolute classic!

Both the name and the scents that build the perfume give out the idea behind the perfume: evolution of mankind, for the man who is going forward and is very clear about where he is going and how he is going to get there. The fragrance opens with top notes of pineapple, ginger, tarragon, and cardamom. The heart of the perfume consists of cinnamon, vetiver, and cedar. The base notes consist of sandalwood, tonka beans, musk, and oakmoss.
top: Notes
middle: Top Notes: Pineapple, Ginger, Tarragon, and Cardamom.
base: Middle Notes: Cinnamon, Vetiver, and Cedar.

title: Kenneth Cole, Vintage Black Edt 100Ml M
description: Exude confidence when adding Vintage Black to your grooming schedule each day. Introduced in 2009, this eau de toilette spray for men was created by the legendary Kenneth Cole design house, known for charming and masculine fragrance lines. Vintage Black is no different.
top: This signature scent blends earthy dewy greenery with bittersweet pink grapefruit for a powerful composition. Spicy white pepper melded with fresh lavender lends a floral overtone to this fragrance that offers a vibrant woody sandalwood finish.

title: Kenzo, Homme Edp 100Ml M
description: The fragrance of a free man. The fragrance of a sea journey. Gradated shades of blue cloak bamboo in freshness for a new masculine identity. Vibrant, invigorating notes of mint and cardamom reveal an explosive marine heart that leads to delectable woody accords. Terribly addictive.

title: KENZO, HOMME EDT 110ML M GIFT SET
description: A timeless woody marine scent created by Christian Matthieu, in a new design.The freshness of sea sprays mingles with the green and woody scent of pine and sandalwood, evocative of a walk by the sea along a tree-lined path.

middle: EAU DE TOILETTE 110ML
base: SHOWER GEL 75ML

title: KENZO, HOMME INTENSE EDT 110ML M GIFT SET
description: As a tribute to its creator, KENZO revisits the art of Sashiko, traditional Japanese embroidery, to adorn its gift boxes.Once used to give a second life to kimonos, these delicate stitches draw geometric shapes inspired by nature. Stitched onto dark blue denim, they create a graphic pattern accompanied by the iconic bamboo.Because KENZO PARFUMS is committed to a more beautiful world, KENZO HOMME has redesigned the caps to save 34% of plastic and reduced the weight of the glass by 23%, to hold an extra 10ml. This gift box is 100% recycled cardboard, recyclable and reusable. A symbol of Kenzo Parfums’ commitment, Kenzo Homme Eau de Toilette Intense is composed of 95% ingredients of natural origin (in accordance with the ISO 16128 standard).This men’s box contains :– KENZO HOMME EAU DE TOILETTE INTENSE 110ML– 2 x KENZO HOMME INTEGRAL SHOWER GEL 75 ML

title: Kenzo, Jungle Homme Edt 100ml M
description: A colourful blend of essences from all over the world. Nutmeg spices up a deep heart of Maté, while Guaiac Wood and Cedar characterise a vibrant and colourful trail.
top: This spicy fragrance contains notes of Lime, Nutmeg, Musk mallow seeds, Atlas cedar, Lebanon blue cedar, Benzoin and Guaiac wood.

title: Lacoste, Challenge Edt 90Ml M
description: Lacoste Challenge opens with fresh and energetic notes of tangerine and lemon, augmented by a burst of lavender. The middle accord is driven by spices including ginger, while the powerful base notes of rosewood and teak bring a modern edge and reinforces the heritage of the brand.

title: LACOSTE, EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 BLANC EAU INTENSE EDT 100ML M
description: Get hooked on the freshness of L.12.12 Blanc Eau Intense: a bold masculine scent with a balance of warm and cool tones, an elegant blend of fougère and leather. Inspired by the iconic Lacoste polo shirt, the fragrance balances the brightness of juicy mandarin and lavandin against the warm backdrop of white leather and vetiver. The bottle and outer pack feature our iconic ‘petit piqué’ pattern, inspired by the texture of our polo shirts. Each bottle is also adorned with an authentic Lacoste crocodile embroidery, same as on the polo shirts.
top: Top notes: Cardamom & MandarinHeart notes: Lavandin & SageBase notes: White Leather & Sandalwood

title: LACOSTE, EAU DE LACOSTE L.12.12 BLANC EDT 100ML M
description: L.12.12 Blanc captures the playful spirit of the brand, to evoke the very spirit of the iconic poloshirt – unforgettably cool, inventive, elegant and yet stylish. A clean, crisp and fresh masculine scent, like the confidence a man feels when he dons a classic Lacoste L.12.12 poloshirt.
top: Top notes: Grapefruit, Cardamom, Rosemary, Cedar Leaves.
middle: Heart notes: Tuberose, Ylang Ylang.
base: Base notes: Cedar, Vetiver, Suede Accord (leathery, musky, woody).

title: LACOSTE, ESSENTIAL EDT 125ML M
description: An elegant and masculine Lacoste eau de toilette. A fresh and invigorating fragrance for a feeling of freedom and serenity all day long.

title: Lacoste, Match Point Edt 100Ml M
description: When emotion propels you to action. Breathe in the thrilling freshness of this new masculine Eau de Toilette by Lacoste, an explosive fusion of two contrasting accords. The green energy of basil and gentian bitterness combine in a breathtaking freshness. The thrilling black elegance ofwoody vetiver brings strength and intensity.

title: LACOSTE, ORIGINAL POUR HOMME EDP 100ML M
LACOSTE, POUR HOMME EDT 100ML M
description: Discover the perfect embodiment of masculine elegance with the Lacoste Pour Homme Eau De Toilette For Men.Created for the modern man who values sophistication and style, this fragrance masterfully blends various notes to create an enchanting scent experience that’s utterly irresistible.Lacoste Pour Homme Eau De Toilette begins with an invigorating burst of grapefruit, plum, apple, and bergamot, establishing a fresh and vibrant aura.The heart introduces a harmonious mix of spices, pepper, and cinnamon, adding an intriguing twist to the fragrance.The base notes of rum, vanilla, sandalwood, and cedar provide a warm, masculine finish, leaving a lasting impression.

title: LALIQUE, ENCRE NOIR A L’EXTREME EDP 100ML M
description: Tread the line between light and darkness. That is where you find Lalique Encre Noire À L’Extrême Eau de Parfum – an embodiment of masculine sensuality. Immerse yourself in this intense woody fragrance that seductively combines cypress with other earthy notes.
top: Chypre woody fragrance with delicate citrus undertones,created for all strong men who don’t fear obstacles. The fragrance will reinvigorate your sensuality and give you strength.
middle: Immerse yourself in the world of woody notes in the opening and let notes of cypress, elemi essence, and bergamot welcome you in. The sensuality and intensity is then underscored by Haitian vetiver with incense and iris root. Finally, notes of sandalwood, patchouli, and benzoin give this fragrance a unique character.
base: Lalique Encre Noire À L ’Extrême is a new definition of masculinity. The fragrance represents a stronger, more sensual and richer successor to Lalique Encre Noire. It reveals a new side of masculinity: sensual, elegant, sophisticated, and seductive.

title: Lalique, Encre Noir Edt 100Ml M
description: Encre Noire is a fragrance created in praise of wood. Its fresh and woody top notes come from the naturally aromatic cypress. Its stimulating core combines mysterious notes of vetyver, Bourbon and Haitian vetyver with the warm and enveloping notes of cashmere wood and musk.

title: Lalique, Encre Noir Sport Edt 100Ml M
description: Encre Noire Sport has a truly daring composition that begins with notes of nutmeg, bergamot and grapefruit.
top: The heart consists heavily of water notes along with lavender and cypress.
middle: The base is comprised of musk, Haitian vetiver, bourbon vetiver and cashmere wood.

title: Lalique, Ombre Noire Edp 100ml M
description: It is an Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. It begins with fresh top notes of bergamot, fig leaf, and mint. Its heart is a fragrant combination of tobacco leaf, papyrus, and cinnamon set atop a sweet, woody base of olibanum, myrrh, tonka bean, cedar, and cognac. This eclectic scent has moderate sillage and moderate-to-high longevity and is an excellent choice for all-day wear. It’s beautifully spicy with dashes of cool sweetness and warm wood, resulting in a truly unique scent that stands out from the crowd.
top: Top Notes: Italian bergamot, Fig leaf, Peppermint
middle: Middle Notes: Tobacco leaf, Cinnamon, Papyrus
base: Base Notes: Myrrh, Frankincense, Cognac, Tonka bean, Cedarwood

title: LALIQUE, WHITE IN BLACK EDP 125ML M
description: The matte black finish of the glass has a unique characteristic: you can write on it with chalk. Your name, your mood, an inspirational motto reflecting the day’s vibe… Endlessly customizable. In the light of darkness, everything becomes possible… It’s your story to write.
top: -Top notes are Olibanum, Sicilian Bergamot and Grapefruit;
middle: -Middle notes are Cardamom, Lavender Extract, Elemi resin and Pink Pepper;
base: -Base notes are Vanilla, Ambroxan, White Cedar Extract, Tolu Balsam and Patchouli.

title: Lanvin, Eclat D Arpege Edt 100Ml M
description: Fragrance Eclat D’Arpege cologne for Men by Lanvin was introduced in 2015. Lanvin Eclat D’Arpege is classified as Citrus Aromatic fragrance. Scent notes of Eclat D’Arpege Lanvin include top notes of citrus bergamia, hesperidium fruits, lemon, lime fruit, mandarine, middle notes of jasmine, rosemary, violet leaves and base notes of musk, cedar wood, sandalwood, ambroxan. Lanvin Eclat D’Arpege fragrance composition is a creation of Sonia Constant.

title: Louis Vuitton, Imagination Edp 100Ml M
description: The unprecedented attraction of amber and tea for imagination to take flight.
top: Imagination. The key to the audacity, success and drive of the creatives who make the wildest dreams a reality. An immaterial energy that is nurtured by travel and experiences that forge a new state of mind. A creative impulse that has always guided Jacques Cavallier Belletrud.With an over-generous dose of Ambrox — perfumery’s white gold — the Master Perfumer reinvents the ambery accord to express a sensual and contemporary masculine elegance. Its contrasts appear upon contact with noble citrus and black tea from China extracted with CO2, a magical ingredient that carries within it the soul of travel. With Imagination, the spirit rises, escapes and conquers new paths of freedom.
middle: The bottle is refillable in stores equipped with a perfume fountain.
base: Key notes:AmbroxBlack Tea from ChinaTunisian neroliSicilian cedarCalabrian bergamotNigerian gingerCeylon cinnamon

title: Louis Vuitton, Orage Edp 100Ml M
description: The almighty power of patchouli embraces the elegance of iris.
top: At once magical and frightening, the storm’s connection with the sky symbolizes man’s union with the earth. The sacred resonates within the deepest self. From this connection with untamed nature, Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud created a surprising woody fragrance. To express the paradox of mankind’s fragility and the raw force of the elements, Orage blends the nobility of iris with vetiver’s vegetal freshness and a patchouli leaf heart. Majestically, the patchouli commands attention, as luminous as lightning. Suddenly, you crave only one thing: to lean in closer, and breathe in every note.
middle: The bottle is refillable in stores equipped with a perfume fountain.
base: Key notes:PatchouliVetiverIrisBergamotAmbrette

title: MAISON FRANCIS KURKDJIAN, AMYRIS HOMME EDT 70ML M
Maison Margiela, Replica Jazz Club Edp 100Ml M
description: Introducing Jazz Club from the Replica Collection by Maison Margiela, a set of fragrances designed to reflect our personal memories.
top: Jazz Club, a men’s perfume, delivers a woody, oriental, sweet and intoxicating fragrance. The balmy base scent added to Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Vetiver and Tobacco leaves, combine to produce a melody of leather and liquor aking you front row for the best seats in the jazz club.

title: MANCERA, WIND WOOD EDP 120ML M
description: A combination of powdery, earthy and woody scent, Wind Wood, is a powerful fragrance for the man who is refined and sophisticated.
top: Opening notes of Mandarin Orange, Pink Pepper and Green Notes.
middle: The middle is exotic and masculine with notes from Patchouli and Violet.
base: With Cedar, Oakmoss, Amber and Vetiver at the base, this casual scent is both pleasant and seductive.

title: Marc Antoine Barrois, B683 Edp 100Ml M
description: A perfume like a heady sobriety. Ten years after commencing Haute Couture, French couturier, Marc-Antoine Barrois is launching his first perfume: B683. Building on the timeless and charismatic elegance of his mentors, with this perfume he reveals his most beautiful souvenirs as well as his world of contemporary designs. Ultimately, B683 is an invitation to explore…to travel on his planet where bespoke unique pieces collections, jewels and accessories meet a genius symbiosis of poetry and dreams with arts and crafts. Subtly combining refined woody essences, sensual spicy notes and heady smell of leather, avant-garde perfumer Quentin Bisch is signing a perfume both heady and sober modelled on the fantasy universe of the designer.
top: The notes of this eau de parfum are, at the top : saffron, black pepper, chili and nutmeg, at the heart : violet leaf, musk, cistus absolute, Moheli vanilla tincture and amber ; at the base sandalwood, patchouli, ambroxan and oakmoss.

title: Marc Antoine Barrois, Barrois Encelade Edp 100Ml M
description: Fresh jungle on the side of a volcano, ENCELADE is a powerful and captivating perfume.
top: Shadow-light relationship within a perfume which plays its paradoxes with delight.
middle: Main accord of rhubarb, cedar and vetiver express the smell of Earth, sap, lush nature. Green and woody notes which comes to mingle with the crash of smoked and animal leather.
base: Milky sandal wood and tonka bean add sensuality and addiction to the skin.

title: Marciano, Guess Edt 100Ml M
description: Guess By Marciano Men Eau De Toilette is a fresh, effervescent fragrance for men. This contemporary scent features aromatic spices and notes of leather and woods.
top: Top notes: Tonic water, Pepper (black), Ginger, Mandarin (frozen)
middle: Heart notes: Lavender, Neroli, Violet leaves, Rosemary, Sage, Starfruit
base: Base notes: Leather, Patchouli, Wood (Ebony), Amber, Musk (Skin accord)

middle: 100ml EDT Spray
base: 100ml Shower Gel

title: Mdci Parfums, Ambre Topkapi Edp 75Ml M
description: Ambre Topkapi by MDCI is an aristocratic and elegant perfume. A modern classic with a fresh opening of citrus and fruits in the top, carried by aromatic notes and in the base woody and leather notes to give this perfume strength and body.MDCI: “The challenge was to find a way to express the complex emotions reflected by the powerful classic bust chosen to incarnate strength, power, wealth, and the conflicting feelings inspired by the severe but beautiful portrait crowning the men’s flacon…”
