middle: Amber, Musk, Nutmeg, Vanilla, Vetiver, Bergamot, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Sandalwood, Thyme, Basil, Grapefruit, Lavender, Leather

title: Mercedes Benz, Club Edt 100Ml M
description: Mercedes-Benz Club, a perfume for the new generation. A man. Young, stylish and trendy. A spontaneous lifestyle, an outgoing personality. An exalting fragrance contained in a streamlined and futurist bottle, engraved with the emblematic Star. More than a signature, a sign of recognition. The undeniable signal of a desire.
top: A woody aromatic perfume that draws you into the vibrant sillage of its seduction. Created by the French Master Perfumer Olivier Cresp, this young, free masculine fragrance has successfully orchestrated a subtle contrast between elegance and energy, with the deep, sensual base accord stimulated by fresh, sparkling, slightly acidic hesperidia notes.
middle: Top Notes : Grapefruit.
base: Heart Notes : Cardamom.

title: Mercedes Benz, Club Extreme Edt 100Ml M
description: The dynamic, deeper and more intense composition of CLUB EXTREME is characteristic for a blend of woody-oriental aromas embellished with masculine leather notes. The composition opens with bergamot, mandarin and lotus flower, illuminating delicately the warm and intense flavors of amber, leather and sandalwood in the base. The base contributes to intensity and depth, thanks to patchouli,
top: Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Bergamot and Lotus;
middle: Middle notes are Amber, Leather and Sandalwood;
base: Base notes are Patchouli, Woodsy Notes and Musk.

title: Mercedes Benz, Intense Edt 120Ml M
description: Bring darkness and mystery to your vibe with Mercedes Benz Intense, a men’s eau de toilette spray that combines botanical and woody notes with rare elements for a complex scent that keeps you coming back for more.
top: Ripe Calabrian bergamot opens this Mercedes Benz fragrance with a hit of strong citrus, while fresh, aquatic cascalone molecules and rich bourbon pepper contrast one another in the heart. Woody American cedar adds a down-to-earth masculine vibe, and chypre cetalox brings smooth musk.

title: Mercedes Benz, Le Parfum Edp 120Ml M
description: Refined and elegant, the fragrance starts off with a fizzy blend of Italian bergamot, pink pepper and cascalone.
top: Enhanced by mysterious notes of violet leaves absolute, galbanum and saffron, the heart finally unveils a precious and intriguing combination of patchouli, vetiver, oud and amber gris. A fragrance with a luxurious and modern signature.
middle: Top Notes : Pink pepper
base: Heart Notes : Saffron

title: Mercedes Benz, Private Edp 100Ml M
description: Mercedes Benz Private by Mercedes Benz Cologne. Aromatic, woody, and warm spicy, the Mercedes Benz Private fragrance offers all the evocative and striking features of its namesake. The base notes of cedarwood and cashmeran are set off by spicy cypress, cardamom and artemisia. The strong amber notes set the pace for this powerful and warm aroma. It’s perfect for a fast-paced day, a slow evening, or a warm, fall day. Take advantage of the instantly recognizable bottle, thanks to the classic star emblem. It’s a scent that promises a memorable day.
top: Top notes are artemisia, cardamom and cypress
middle: Middle notes are lavender, labdanum and ambroxan
base: Base notes are patchouli, cashmere wood and

title: Mercedes Benz, Select Edt 100Ml M
description: Mercedes-Benz Select by Mercedes-Benz is a Woody Chypre fragrance for men. Mercedes-Benz Select was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp.
top: Top notes are Bergamot and Black Currant;Middle notes are Apple and Mint;Base notes are Ambroxan, Musk and Patchouli.

title: Mercedes Benz, Select Edt 100Ml M Gift Set
description: Select by Mercedes Benz 100ml EDT 2 Piece Gift Set for Men
top: 2 Piece Set Includes:– 100ml Eau De Toilette Spray– 75g Alcohol Free Deodorant Stick
middle: This is a pillar of the brand as it embodies all the key elements of the Mercedes-Benz universe, while incorporating the noble codes of selective perfumery.
base: Mercedes-Benz Select is definitely an elegant perfume, with a timeless dimension. Promised to a great future!

title: MICHAEL KORS, EXTREME JOURNEY EDT 100ML M
description: For the trailblazer who charts his own path. Introducing Michael Kors Extreme Journey, a woody spicy men’s fragrance radiating with the thrill of adventure. Capturing the rugged intensity of racing through Saharan sands, it’s a powerful blend that drives you deep into the dunes, where peppery aromatics, desert woods, and notes of worn leather run wild. Warm and raw, it’s an eau de toilette to heat up any occasion.

title: Mont Blanc, Emblem Edt 100Ml M
description: Emblem, Montblanc’s latest masculine fragrance, embodies a new and authentic essence. A burst of clary sage and cardamom mixed with sparkling grapefruit immediately reveals a strong, contrasted, harmonious and charismatic fragrance. The crispy green frosted violet leaves wrapped in cinnamon leaves capture the incredibly elegant character of the fragrance. The dry-down is an alchemy of vibrant precious woods with tonka beans, unveiling a very unique signature.

title: MONT BLANC, EMBLEM INTENSE EDT 100ML M
description: Emblem Intense is a spicy interpretation of Emblem, the original scent. It features a cocktail of citrus leaves, cold spices and a refreshing blend of grapefruit, clary sage with a duo of cardamon with coriander seeds. The intense and elegant heart reveals the signature accord of crispy frosted violet leaves. The warmth of the heart is enhanced with spicy notes of nutmeg and cinnamon bark. In the drydown, precious woods and patchouli are exquisitely blended with a refined velvet suede accord, revealing an intense and masculine scent.

title: Mont Blanc, Explorer Edp 100Ml M
description: Mont Blanc Explorer is an invitation to adventure, a song to freedom and life. This is a fragrance for the lovers of nature, of freedom and wilderness: it makes a strong impression and is recognisable instantly.
top: Explorer features top notes of citric, acid bergamot, heart notes of fresh vetiver and base notes of oriental patchouli and wood. This fragrance is so exciting, and enticing, that it will make you think of exploring the world.
middle: Mont Blanc brings us this sexy, fun and fresh fragrance in a 100ml bottle. If you enjoy it’s scent, you can get yourself the full collection of the aftershave, deodorant stick and shower gel. soon, this fragrance will become one of your favourites, it will become another part of your charm: if any of your loved ones smell its scent they will immediately think of you.

title: Mont Blanc, Explorer Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: This Montblanc SET contains:Montblanc Explorer invites you to discover new territories. An unconventional woody aromatic leather Eau de Parfum that reveals a fresh green Italian Bergamot, contrasted with a powerful Vetiver from Haiti, and combined with rich and exclusive Patchouli from Indonesia.
top: Fragrance Family: Woody Leathery Aromatic
middle: Key Notes: Bergamot, Pomarose, Sage, Vetiver, Leather, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Ambrofix, Akigalawood
base: Experience this unconventional woody aromatic leather scent with this gift set featuring:

title: Mont Blanc, Explorer Platinum Edp 100Ml M
description: Montblanc Explorer Platinum celebrates the adventure and exploration of the mountains with this powerful, textured woody fragrance. It embodies the energetic freshness of violet leaf, aroma of clary sage and the warmth of cedarwood.

title: Mont Blanc, Explorer Platinum Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: This set contains a Montblanc Explorer Platinum Eau de Parfum 100ml, a 7.5ml travel spray and a 100ml scented shower gel. Montblanc Explorer Platinum takes you to the heart of the Italian mountains, to capture the thrill and beauty of a journey to the peaks. The woody amber Eau de Parfum opens with sparkling and vibrant green notes of violet leaves and clary sage oil; enhanced by an airy note of crystalline freshness reminiscent of snow and ice, the whole is enveloped in intense and elegant cedar wood. Made In France, this fragrance was created thanks to French know-how.
top: This limited edition box set consists of:– Eau de Parfum Vapo.100ml– The Vapo. travel 7.5ml– Perfumed shower gel 100ml
middle: Olfactory pyramid:
base: Olfactory family: Woody AmberTop notes: Violet LeafHeart notes: Clary sageBase notes: Cedarwood

title: Mont Blanc, Explorer Ultra Blue Edp 100Ml M
description: Mont Blanc explore ultra blue is an original scent, one that awakens a desire to discover the nature’s palette of blues: the sky, seas, and ice-covered mountains. A citrus marine woody scent with luminous top notes of zesty, luminous Italian bergamot and citrus of the finest quality. The Marine accord is the beating heart of the fragrance. The blue aquatic depth that comes from fusing citrus with the marine and airy notes evokes the freshness of Alpine landscapes. The base notes that define the structure of Explorer Ultra Blue, a singular patchouli of the finest quality exclusively crafted for Montblanc combined with refined woods give an earthy and rich base, with leathery facets. Signature of excellence in design and quality, the bottle’s thick glass base reveals the iconic Montblanc star representing the six glacial slopes creating the snowy peak of the mountain. Assembled by hand in the Maison’s Pelleteria in Florence, the leather-like protective sheath is printed with the elegant Ultra Blue Saffiano motif and decorated with the Montblanc emblem crafted in Montblanc’s Hamburg manufacture.

title: Mont Blanc, Explorer Ultra Blue Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: Explorer Ultra Blue by Mont Blanc 100ml EDP 3 Piece Gift Set for Men
top: 3 Piece Set Includes:
middle: – 100ml Eau De Parfum Spray– 100ml Perfumed Shower Gel– 7.5ml Eau De Parfum Travel Spray
base: Montblanc’s irrepressible spirit of adventure and exploration is expressed in a new fragrance inspired by the ultra blue of nature.

title: MONT BLANC, EXTREME LEATHER EDP 125ML M
description: Experience the touch and smell of Montblanc’s leather in a fragrance that is both woody and comforting.
top: The combination of soft, luxurious leather with sensual iris notes creates an olfactory impression of natural suede leather enhanced with powdery smoothness, transporting you to the Maison’s Tuscany ateliers. The musky facet adds depth and warmth, making this fragrance an irresistible indulgence.

title: Mont Blanc, Individuel Edt 75Ml M
description: MontBlanc Individuel expresses a self-confident and independent man who is original and individualistic. Such man loves freedom and space, he is not afraid to form his own opinions and each of his steps takes him to his goal. Mont Blanc Individuel is a reflection of luxury, sophisticated design, and endless elegance.
top: The head of this fragrance is formed by a unique combination of essences of bergamot, fresh pineapple, cinnamon, and fresh mint together with distinctive juniper, captivating coriander, rosemary, and intoxicating lavender.
middle: Its manly heart contains nutmeg, exotic bloom of orange tree, jasmine, and playful violet.
base: Its sensual base consists of patchouli, warm sandal wood, and smooth oakmoss. Its composition of aromas is complemented by tonka beans, seductive musk, and lovely amber.

title: Mont Blanc, Individuel Tonic Edt 75Ml M
description: Individuel Tonic is an Eau de Toilette that is packaged in a 75ml bottle. Individuel Tonic was launched in 2018 as a Amber Woody fragrance for men and has top notes of Rosemary, Juniper Berries, Coriander Berries, Cinnamon, Bergamot, Cardamom and Pineapple; middle notes of Lavender, Geranium and Jasmine; base notes of Oakmoss, Sandalwood and Patchouli. It is recommended for day wear during spring or summer months although this scent works well year round.
top: Top Notes: Rosemary, Juniper Berries, Coriander, Cinnamon, Bergamot, Cardamom, Pineapple, Lavender and Mint
middle: Middle Notes: Geranium, Jasmine, Orange Blossom and Violet
base: Base Notes: Oakmoss, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Musk, Vetiver, Vanilla, Raspberry, Dark Chocolate and Amber.

title: MONT BLANC, LEGEND BLUE EDP 100ML M
description: Montblanc Legend Blue is full of contrasts. The scent celebrates the classy and sophisticated men through fresh and woody notes. It embodies the freshness of spearmint, woody cedarwood and the sensuality of ambroxan.
top: Top notes: Crepe MintHeart notes: Woody accord, Cedarwood and SandalwoodBase notes: Ambroxan

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Edp 100Ml M
description: The Montblanc Legend man is confident and charismatic—an effortlessly seductive man who lives his feelings.
top: Montblanc Legend Eau de Toilette is the incarnation of a resolutely masculine fragrance, both modern and timeless, with depth, modernity, and the right amount of discreet mystery. A fresh fougére with top notes that are lively, bright, and clean, magnetic heart notes with a unique woody-floral tone, and a sensual dry down with an unforgettable signature of tonka beans and sandalwood.
middle: Notes:Italian Bergamot, French Lavandin, Pineapple Leaves, White Cedar, Rose, Fresh Jasmine, Pomarose™, Evernyl, Sandalwood, Tonka Beans.Style:Confident. Charismatic. Seductive.

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: Mont Blanc Legend Eau de Parfum is a sensual, seducing and sexy perfume for men. It is suitable for men who love to get compliments and to be the center of the attention. Mont Blanc Legend Eau de Parfum has a deep, woody-leather scent. The top scent is made of fresh, citrusy notes of bergamot as well as violet leaf. After them we feel a delicate, floral scent of white flowers made of jasmine and magnolia. It is combined with warm, woody notes. The base of the composition hides a gorgeous scent of leather and oakmoss.
top: Top notes: Bergamot, violet leaf
middle: Middle notes: Jasmine, magnolia, woody notes
base: Base notes: Leather, oakmoss.

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Edt 100Ml M
description: Montblanc Legend – the name says it all. Montblanc Legend Eau de Toilette for men is the right choice for a confident, quiet man who prefers to hold back and not draw attention. Even though he might not say much, you can feel his determination, his authenticity, his love for passion and all forms of pleasure.
top: Subdued fougère fragrance, which expresses both strength and gentleness, boldness and mysteryfor a confident, daring man who follows his emotions.The cap was inspired by the Montblanc fountain pen
middle: Top notes are Lavender, Pineapple, Bergamot and Lemon Verbena;
base: Middle notes are Red Apple, Dried Fruits, oak moss, Geranium, Coumarin and Rose;

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Night Edp 100Ml M
description: Legend Night is the latest reinterpretation of the Legend scent, the sensual woody fragrance that reveals the inner charisma of the man who wears it. The scent top notes are a blend of zesty bergamot and aromatic sage. The heart speaks a language of vetiver infused with violet. At the bottom, cedar wood and violet combine to lend elegance and distinction to the scent. The Legend Night bottle, inspired by a precious liquor, mixes shiny black contrasts with an intense cognac color.

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Night Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: Mont Blanc legend night 3-piece eau de parfum gift set.
top: In this third olfactory chapter, Maison Montblanc reveals an equally charismatic, but more mysterious side to this extraordinary gentleman. Montblanc Legend Night breaks with the duality of the house’s black and white codes, clearing the path for an amber colour that is reminiscent of wood, the ultimate authentic material. This new magnetic and woody Eau de Parfum reveals the charisma of the man who wears it. A sensual and reassuring note that features the fresh, lively opening notes of Bergamot, counterbalanced with the warm elegance of vetiver and the depth of black Vanilla. Montblanc Legend Night is a Man just as he is – instantly captivating. His innate virility sets the scene ablaze. Nothing will disturb this dialogue… until morning comes.
middle: What it includes:100ml EDP100ml Shower Gel100ml After Shave Balm
base: Top Notes: Bergamot, Sage.

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Red Edp 100Ml M
description: Montblanc Legend Red brings a vibrant and bold touch to our Montblanc Legend collection. It embodies the energetic freshness of blood orange, aroma of sage and the warmth of Mahogany woods.

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Red Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: A woody and aromatic eau de parfum with a bold scent determined to make you feel confident, strong and powerful.
top: This olfactory experience starts with the freshness of blood orange, intensified by aromatic notes of clary sage and finished by a magnetic woody accord. The charismatic scent evokes the thrill of speed and makes the heart beat a little faster.
middle: Style: Woody, aromatic.
base: Notes:

title: Mont Blanc, Legend Spirit Edt 100Ml M
description: Montblanc Legend Spirit stands out thanks to its radically modern aesthetic of immaculate glossy white lacquer and tempered steel. Inspired by all forms and shades of white, the fresh, virile and intense fragrance is as breathtaking as a resplendent landscape. If this new fragrance reveals a more casual and unguarded aspect of the Montblanc Legend man, it still embodies the versatile appeal and quintessentially elegant elements of his character.
top: Top Notes: Bergamot, Pink Pepper, Grapefruit.
middle: Heart Notes: Cardamom, Lavender, Aquatic Accord.
base: Base Notes: Oak Moss Accord, White Musks, Cashmere Wood.

Inspired by all forms and shades of white, the fresh, virile and intense fragrance is as breathtaking as a resplendent landscape. title: MONT BLANC, PATCHOULI INK EDP 125ML M
Mont Blanc, Starwalker Edt 75Ml M
description: Mont Blanc Starwalker Eau De Toilette is a fresh woody fragrance for men. A refreshing, energising scent that is well balanced with its calming woody and spicy notes.
top: Top notes: Bergamot, Tangerine, Bamboo
middle: Heart notes: Ginger, Nutmeg, Elemi
base: Base notes: Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Amber, Musk (white)

title: Mont Blanc, Starwalker Extreme Edt 75Ml M
description: Montblanc Starwalker Extreme Eau de Toilette is a new woody spicy fragrance for men launched in 2021 under Montblanc starwalker collection.
top: It’s An everyday approved scent with woody and spicy notes,starwalker extreme The perfume arrives with a citrusy splash of sensual Mandarin, Lemon, Apple and Pineapple Accord, followed by a heart of lavender, Geranium Accord and Marine notes, Finally Patchouli, Tonka Beans and Sandalwood Round out the spicy woody base.

title: MONT BLANC, VETIVER GLACIER EDP 125ML M
description: The Roja and Montblanc collection pays homage to the German label’s heritage as a crafter of premium stationery. Each scent is presented in a glass case that alludes to the Montblanc ink bottle, complete with the signature rounded star – representing the snow-capped peak of Mont Blanc itself – and a metal strip that echoes the Meisterstück pen’s clip.
top: The Vetiver Glacier eau de parfum embodies the spirit of freedom, exploration and excellence that lies at the heart of Montblanc, with vetiver, sandalwood and spicy ginger creating an invigorating olfactory experience akin to breathing in crisp mountain air.
middle: This fragrance embodies the spirit of exploration and the pursuit of excellence, with notes of bitter vetiver, spicy ginger and nutmeg, and warm cedarwood and sandalwood. A touch of white musk adds a modern touch, while the raw woody quality of sandalwood wraps the fragrance in a comforting embrace.

title: Montale, Black Aoud Edp 100Ml M
description: Black Aoud is a dramatic fragrance – but don’t confuse that with overly strong. It’s medium bodied and very rich, a bubbling potion of velvety rose and the old leather feel of labdanum, mixed with mystical oud tree oils. It’s a rare journey somewhere where you’ve probably never been and will beg to return to… all it takes is a little whiff of this amazing, rare elixir. If you seek a deeply incensed rose and sandalwood fragrance, one that would have scented the brightly dyed pillows of a harem, you need look no further.

title: Montale, Wood & Spices Edp 100Ml M
description: Wood and spices, a simple yet deeply effective combination. The unisex Montale Wood & Spices Eau de Parfum plays a sensual game on your skin, featuring sandalwood interlaced with a spiral of incense. This oriental fragrance is elevated in a masterly manner to suit the modern lifestyle.
top: Top-quality sandalwood oil will fill the room with a velvety warm fragrance like that of a Buddhist temple. The spiritual power of the fragrance is further enhanced by delicate incense. A blend of exotic spices combined with agarwood will set your skin alight with the desire for adventure, whilst elegant vetiver will make you feel unique and exceptional.

title: Moschino, Toy Boy Edp 100Ml M
description: Moschino Toy boy Eau de Parfum is a masculine scent with a woody, spicy character. As the first men’s fragrance in the Moschino Toy line, this eau de parfum reinterprets masculine fashion and trends with a touch of irony; indeed, it is designed for a unique and passionate man who is not afraid to discover his tender and playful side.
top: Top notes of Italian bergamot and green pear create an almost gourmand opening, which is then warmed up by pink pepper, elemi, clove, and spicy-sweet Indonesian nutmeg.
middle: A lush floral core of rose, magnolia and flax flower then blends with cashmeran for added warmth.
base: Finally, the woody drydown comes into play, with a light, dry note of Haitian vetiver that keeps the fragrance feeling masculine.

title: Moschino, Uomo Edt 100Ml M
description: UOMO? That’s the question! A fresh and fragrant scent to reawaken the sense of smell of modern man who’s increasingly perplexed in a society that questions roles and genres, that prefers a nice guy attitude to a tough guy stance, that favours the brain builder over the body-builder. Through the question mark of UOMO?, Moschino’s men’s fragrance exemplifies a cultural doubt that crosses, like a sceptical shiver, through the entire concept of virility in traditional men’s perfumes. UOMO? comes in a bottle resembling a whisky flask that deliberately evokes an almost cinematographic citation of masculinity.
top: Fresh and sparkling top notes of coriander grains, kumquat, new hedione and rosewood give way to a heart of cyclamen, cinnamon leaves and clary sage. Base notes of cedarwood, artemisia, sunlight accord, amber wood and musk round out this intriguing Aromatic/Floral/Musk fragrance.

title: Narciso Rodriguez, Bleu Noir Edp 100Ml M
description: A magnetic fragrance with an elegant trail.
top: Addictive amber and wood notes meet around a mysterious musk heart. An electric blue infusion captures the bottle’s dark blue interior.A black frame accentuates the intense blue case inside.

title: Narciso Rodriguez, Bleu Noir Parfum 100Ml M
description: For him bleu noir parfum is a new creation for a man who defines his own singularity. Mysterious and audacious, this new bleu noir fragrance revisits masculine elegance by exploring a new complementary universe within the franchise. In this new fragrance, suede Leather is enhanced by the sensuality of iris and sweetened by the addiction of tonka.
top: The heart of musc, brand’s signature, evokes the sensuality and opulence of bleu noir. Bleu noir parfum embodies a warm, oriental and utterly addicting fragrance. This perfume is an unforgettable trail that we can’t get rid of. Regarding the design, for the first time, the iconic bottle of bleu noir is unveiled without interior lacquering, revealing an elegant blue hue with a translucent black outer lacquering.
middle: Last, but not least, a matte navy cap brings the final touch of sensuality. An iconic design that expresses mystery and intensity. This new fragrance is embodied by Roberto Sipos. By bringing magnetism & mystery, bleu noir parfum enhances bleu noir range.
base: Top notes: Cardamom, Bergamot, Cypress, Mandarin orange.

Featuring top notes of cool green leaf and fresh-cut apple with heart notes of deep aquatic and sail cloth, and a bottom finish of dewy moss, musk and woody amber.

A complex eau de toilette combining sweet, juicy mandarin and peppermint. Creating intrigue and freshness… with lively pink cinnamon. An ambiguous and classy fragrance, to display a man’s spirit and passion! The signature amber-leather is distinctive and rich. White wood, matte blonde leather, amber, sexy patchouli. A perfume to refresh, but ultimately confuse.

title: Paco Rabanne, Invictus Intense Edt 100Ml M
description: Invictus Intense by Paco Rabanne is a darker take on the original scent, Invictus . This daring blend has accords of amber, whiskey and fresh spice. The top notes start out strong with pepper and orange blossom to create a bracing, yet bright tone. As the middle notes sweep in, laurels and whiskey make their entrance to introduce a sophisticated freshness. The base notes linger on salt, amber and ambergris for a savory muskiness.
top: The daring cologne was launched in 2016. It can be worn for almost any occasion any time of year. No matter when it’s worn, it’s sure to intrigue other men and women.

title: Paco Rabanne, Invictus Legend Edp 150Ml M
description: The ultimate hero—made for victory. Burning like desert heat, Invictus triumphs effortlessly and speeds towards glory. Two forces clash in a blazing duel. Fresh adrenaline rides a whirlwind of hot woods for a fragrance with power—thrilling like victory.

title: PACO RABANNE, INVICTUS PARFUM 100ML M
description: Rise to greatness and unleash the epic hero within, with new INVICTUS PARFUM by Rabanne. Captures your inner legend and empowers you to conquer divine heights. Blended with exceptional ingredients, Invictus Parfum is a powerful aromatic woody watery fragrance. Fresh lavender collides with sensual black soap and addictive sandalwood in an olfactive clash for gods. The iconic INVICTUS bottle comes with a stronger V–shape silhouette and a gold cap to make way for a more powerful trophy than ever before. Invictus Parfum: a fragrance for the half-god hero who turns life into legend.

title: Paco Rabanne, Invictus Platinum Edp 100Ml M
description: An intense power of minty freshness explode with elegant lavender. an eau de parfum to galvanize the senses. energy made liquid. invigorating grapefruit and absinth clash with richer and masculine notes of patchouli and cypress: a woody finish to bring strength and complexity. discover a radical cocktail of pure power and elegance.

title: Paco Rabanne, Invictus Victory Edp 100Ml M
description: The new Invictus Victory extreme eau de parfum seizes with its power and seduces with its freshness. Instantly, citric lemon notes flow. The woody fragrance of incense strengthens the composition whilst the sensual vanilla wraps itself around a fiery Tonka bean. An eau de parfum that subtly celebrates modern masculinity.

title: Paco Rabanne, Invictus Victory Elixir Edp 100Ml M
description: Discover Invictus Victory Elixir, the pinnacle of intensity from Invictus, the new powerful fragrance for men by Paco Rabanne.
top: A potent elixir made to push victory beyond limits. The time has come to embrace your moment of immortality. A rich, powerful, long-lasting nectar that blends spicy woods and a sharp freshness. It’s the ultimate expression of victory. Never stop winning.
middle: The fragrance: The quintessence of Invictus Victory. A precious amber-woody and spicy elixir with high-impact. Leading to high-performance, highly concentrated ingredients for maximum intensity. A rush of freshness boosts aromatic lavandin from Provence with the bite of green cardamom and the crunch of black pepper. At dark, mysterious incense blends with the woody opulence of Indonesian patchouli. The delicious nectar of tonka bean liqueur adds depth and elegance to a delectable overdose of vanilla bean sourced in Madagascar. The addictive scent of victory.
base: The bottle: The iconic Invictus Victory bottle concentrates all its power with a new, elegantly lacquered trophy that reflects the intense richness of the elixir it holds. Showcasing the scent’s powerful winning DNA, the golden V for victory is engraved in the glass, standing out against a lacquered gradient of black to dark blue. A glossy black cap crowns the trophy. It’s the ultimate icon of victory. Never stop winning.

title: Paco Rabanne, Phantom Edt 100Ml M

A futuristic aromatic fragrance born from the clash between luxury craftmanship and new-tech. Using a cutting-edge creative process to select ingredients to make you feel energized, powerfully confident and sexy. A bold scent with notes of addictive creamy lavender, energizing fusing lemon and sexy woody vanilla. Phantom was responsibly formulated:
top: A fragrance for today, created for tomorrow.

title: Paco Rabanne, Phantom Edt 100Ml M 2Pcs Gift Set

A mind-bending fragrance born from the daring encounter of an energizing green flash of lemon and vetiver and the attraction of an irresistible creamy lavender and woody vanilla. an overdose of feel-good and long-lasting sensations.

title: Paco Rabanne, Pour Homme Edt 100Ml M
description: Treat yourself to an aromatic wakeup call when you wear Paco Rabanne, launched in 1973 . This spicy, rich cologne starts your day with the crisp, refreshing scents of the outdoors. Herbal rosemary and clary sage begin the fragrance with an earthy, clean breath of cool air. The green ingredients are warmed by a touch of creamy Brazilian rosewood. The earthy note returns at the middle with lavender, while geranium and tonka bean add a subtle sweetness. Amber, oak moss, and musk lend the cologne its deep, masculine appeal, with a hint of honey shining at the finish. Clear your mind and revive your body with this exhilarating fragrance.

title: Paco Rabanne, Pure Xs Edt 100Ml M
description: This fragrance dedicated to men completely absorbs the female soul. The play of interesting chords begins with ginger and fresh green-spicy notes. At the heart of the fragrance you can feel the intensity of the skin and the sweetness of the liqueur, flavored with vanilla and cinnamon. The base is made of masculine, woody notes, such as cedar and myrrh, slightly sweetened with sugar.

title: PACO RABANNE, ULTRAVIOLET MAN EDT 100ML
description: A woody amber fragrance, Ultraviolet Man is a blend of liquid mint, vibratory spices, amber and vetiver. The woody amber fragrance reveals itself over several dimensions. The frosty freshness of mint is the perfect complement to a fruity heart of mandarin and blackcurrant. The full-bodied vibes of coriander, patchouli and black pepper enhance the warm woody notes while ambergris, oak moss and organic vetiver add a playful dash.

title: PARFUMS DE MARLY, DARCY EDP 75ML M
description: With a vibrant composition, Darcy is a festive encounter that is captivating and vivacious. This compelling eau de parfum opens with a sunny, sweet aroma of bergamot, orange and citrus. A sensual bouquet of rose and jasmine is found at the heart and delights. With a smooth base of patchouli, musk and praline, the aromatic composition unfolds, finding merriment in its splendour.
top: Top NotesBergamot Essence, Orange, Citrus
middle: Heart NotesRose, Jasmine
base: Base NotesPatchouli, Musk, Praline

title: Parfums De Marly, Darcy Edp 75Ml M
description: With a vibrant composition, Darcy is a festive encounter that is captivating and vivacious. This compelling eau de parfum opens with a sunny, sweet aroma of bergamot, orange and citrus. A sensual bouquet of rose and jasmine is found at the heart and delights. With a smooth base of patchouli, musk and praline, the aromatic composition unfolds, finding merriment in its splendour.
top: Top NotesBergamot Essence, Orange, Citrus
middle: Heart NotesRose, Jasmine
base: Base NotesPatchouli, Musk, Praline

title: PARFUMS DE MARLY, DARLEY EDP 125ML M
description: An eau de parfum that is both complex and elegant, Darley opens to a tonic trio of lemon, bergamot and mint. Softened and rounded by a heart of rose, orange blossom, lavender, rosemary and cinnamon the fragrance then meets new depths with its rich foundation of sandalwood, guaiac wood, patchouli, amber and tonka. It is the perfect blend of fresh, aromatic and precious notes house in a gold bottle.
top: Top NotesMint, Lemon
middle: Heart NotesLavender, Cinnamon
base: Base NotesPatchouli, Amber

title: Parfums De Marly, Haltane Edp 125Ml M
description: “Haltane is a fragrance for a gentleman of today, inspired by the gentilhommes of the Chateau de Marly in the 18th century.”Julien Sprecher, Founder and Artistic Director of Parfums de Marly.
top: Haltane is an original scent of both radiance and shadow. Its composition features a blend of rare and noble ingredients which revisit the tradition of 18th century French perfume making.
middle: Its dazzling freshness and herbal top notes quickly yield a warm and smooth sense of leather with a symphony of precious woods. Soft and sweet, escorted by saffron, its praline accord is an ultra-contemporary spin on the mythical oudwood.
base: Agarwood emerges in this veil of contrasts and imprints the skin with luminous refinement for endur-ing comfort. A privilege that is all about sensation.

title: Parfums De Marly, Herod Edp 125Ml M
description: One of the most accomplished racehorses (and prolific studs) of 18th century Europe, Herod was a horse of uncommon achievement descended from a famous line of Turkish warhorses. To honor him, Parfums de Marly has created a truly spectacular fragrance, one that combines robustly masculine tobacco, wood and patchouli notes with an alluring spice blend and a sumptuous vanilla.
top: Herod opens with an attention-grabbing spicy mix of cinnamon and peppercorns, and quickly introduces a resinous, sultry heart of incense and tobacco, combined with such smoky-sweet artistry that it makes our mouths water and pulses race all at once. In the base, the woodsier and earthier aspects are enhanced with rich patchouli and vetiver, while a creamy, delectable vanilla keeps things from ever getting too dark or deep. Rich enough to wear on a cold winter night but well-rounded enough for year-round, Herod is a luxurious addition to any gentleman’s arsenal- and we think it would be drop-dead sexy on any lady who loves tobacco scents as well.
middle: Herod Fragrance Notes
base: Cinnamon, pepperwood, osmanthus, tobacco leaves, frankincense, cistus, vanilla, cedar, vetiver, patchouli, musk

title: Parfums De Marly, Pegasus Edp 125Ml M
description: Pegasus- the horse God, the heavenly stallion portrayed in Coustou’s famed statue. A creature of such power, refinement and nobility that only a God himself would dare attempt to ride him. In this spirit, Parfums de Marly’s Pegasus is, itself, fragrance nobility- a skillfully refined take on the fougere style featuring unexpected notes of almond and vanilla that give it unique lasting power and striking dignity.
top: Pegasus opens with the aforementioned almond note- lightly sweet, somewhat bitter, and warm, given juicy heft by a more traditionally fougere-like bergamot. The heart of the fragrance further expands on the almonds’ sweet, marzipan-like depth, while an unlisted floral accord (lavender and jasmine?)exudes gentle, refined masculinity. In the base, vanilla is the clear star of the show, replacing a traditional fougere’s mossiness with creamy warmth supplemented by amber notes, while a light, sharp sandalwood keeps everything airy enough to still earn the genre. To read the notes of Pegasus is to wonder how it earns a categorization as a men’s fougere- to smell it, on the other hand, is to be so swept up in its sophistication and majesty that you’ve no choice but to understand.
middle: Pegasus Notes.
base: Bergamot, heliotrope, spice, almond, amber, vanilla, sandalwood

title: Parfums De Marly, Pegasus Exclusif Edp 125Ml M
description: With distinguishing marks of serene virility and exhilarating power, this unique creation embodies the sensuality of the much-appreciated vanilla, fused with an oriental twist of amber, sandalwood, natural oud and guaiac. All combined with floral heart notes of jasmine, lavender, bitter almond and geranium, the scent boasts a fine balance of fruits and spices including bergamot, pink pepper, cardamom and heliotrope.
top: Top NotesBergamot, Pink Pepper, Cardamom, Heliotrope
middle: Heart NotesJasmine, Lavender, Bitter almond, Geranium
base: Base NotesVanilla, Amber, Sandalwood, Natural Oud, Gaiac Wood

title: PARFUMS DE MARLY, PERSEUS EDP 125ML M
PENHALIGON’S, LORD GEORGE EDP 75ML M
description: What are the secrets of the British aristocracy? Are they as well behaved, courteous and polite as they seem to be? “Portraits” is a tribute to the English spirit; between establishment, humour and provocation. The family portrait starts with one of its main character: Lord George (chapter I).
top: Deceptively traditional, Lord George is a perfect reminder that one should be aware of appearances. He himself maintains that one should never be able to divine what a man is thinking. This ability being, of course, the key to a happy marriage.
middle: Honourable, to a tee, his fidelity to King and Country is resolute. His fragrance, powerful, rich and ever-so welcoming “do come in, I’m sure we’ve met before”. For the well-to-do who are able, stable, reassuring but also lots of fun. A solid shoulder to cry on (was that a protective hand I felt on my?) This is a fragrance for the man whose reputation lives on.Not quite Latin but full of love nevertheless.
base: Notes

title: PRADA, LUNA ROSSA OCEAN EDP 100ML M
description: Luna Rossa OCEAN Eau de Parfum, the new masculine intensity, by Prada. The fragrance of a powerful, transformative journey to open new horizons. Built on a conviction that with technology as an extension of ourselves, we can push beyond our limits, re-imagining what’s possible and augment our performances.
top: Luna Rossa OCEAN Eau de Parfum combines intense sophistication and sensuality through pioneering technology and nature’s finest ingredients. Opening with an invigorating burst of grapefruit essence, contrasted with the woody vibrancy of incense and a rich Vanilla Bean accord. A composition augmented by the cutting-edge molecule of AmberXtreme™ boosting the ingredients’ intensity and diffusing a powerful trail.
middle: Key Notes: Grapefruit Essence, Incense, Vanilla Bean Accord

title: Prada, Luna Rossa Ocean Edt 100Ml M
description: Formulated by IFF Master Perfumers Anne Flipo and Carlos Benaim, Prada Luna Rossa Ocean has a unique neo-fresh olfactory signature that reinvents the emblematic fougère family. Sublimating notes of aromatic freshness mixed with the sophisticated sensuality of bergamot, a contrast is created with the sophisticated essence of vetiver. Everything intertwines in the heart notes with an elegant iris accord. The fragrance unveils a luminous cocktail of citrus combined with a lively duo of lavender and sage to add a fresh, clean sensation. The unique leather heart creates a second skin effect, exploring a sensual accord of suede and saffron combined with the elegant creamy notes of iris root. Enveloped in a masterful blend of patchouli, Haitian vetiver and musks, the fragrance leaves an addictive and masculine scent.

The Valentino Green cologne base presents sustainably sourced & crafted warm and woody notes of Vetiver Heart Essence Haiti that intensify the fragrance

base: This iconic duo playfully challenges the rivalry between day and night, classic and intensity and you and me.

The tactile presence of the bottle is paired with a clear carafe shape, unveiling the fragrance’s amber hue, suggestion a rare liquor held within.

The bold fragrance is housed in an elegant, deep blue bottle, reflecting the depth and mystery of the Mediterranean.

Vanilla, sandalwood, tonka bean, and patchouli provide an oriental background, while cedar and oakmoss are more indicative of a fougere pedigree.

title: Xerjoff, 1861 Naxos Edp 100Ml M
description: 1861 COLLECTION: Since 1861, Italy has united the identity of a people who love to define themselves as poets, saints and seafarers, with an extraordinary talent for creativity written in their DNA. Developed from a love of aesthetics, an artistic heritage feeds and refines creativity and pervades every aspect of Italian life. 150 years mark an important anniversary for Italy and Xerjoff celebrates this moment with the release of XJ 1861, an homage to the grandeur and glamor of our home country.
top: Naxos rises the flags of Sicily where smoothness of citruses and impregnable stone castles by azure Mediterranean landscape are landmarks of an unique ancient culture. An elite fragrance with Baroque blood in vein, leaning to progress in modernity of 19th century first class haberdasher shops and hay day of art deco. Exuberant and predominant, it widens hefty amount of lavender rendered by lemon, and tessellates it with honey and fine tobacco to manifest in premium fougère style. Relying on lemon and Italian bergamot, Naxos establishes cheerful atmosphere within warm and piercing tobacco and pungent honey and tender flowers. To deeply unify the modern aura with ancient style, cinnamon, vanilla and robust tone of tonka beans encompass an artistic, iconic and timeless classic.
middle: TOP NOTESBergamotLemonLavender
base: HEART NOTESJasmine sambacCinnamonHoneyCashmere

title: XERJOFF, CASAMORATTI 1888 EDP 100ML
description: A fresh floral spring time potion, which works magically…
top: Springtime in the Mediterranean lands, where the olive trees bloom for just a few days every year. This treasured scent is at the core of Fiore d’Ulivo.
middle: Fresh citrus and lotus flower notes surround the gentle sweetness of the olive blooms. The addition of jasmine and magnolia emphasises the floral facet. Playing the role of counterpoint, amber and musk add structure to the whole composition.
base: Fiore D’Ulivo is a tribute to the ephemeral cycle of nature epitomised by the springtime blossoms of olive flowers.

title: Xerjoff, Fiero Edp 75Ml M
description: The heat of the sun, the cold of marble walls, the shades of bergamot and lemon trees. Fiero is a masculine powerhouse fragrance composed of rich classic mentholated bergamot, neroli, and fine dusty vetiver scaffolding drawing to picture of the glamourous tonsorial masculinity of the past.
top: The fragrance opens with pungent touch of fresh and green fougère-style citrus accord and sets in with a grown woody spicy base. It marks a unique journey through the past with the most prestigious olfactory signs of a golden era.Fiero is a perfect blend of rich citrus notes with an ardent spicy heart, intense and sophisticated. Fiero is a classical gentlemen’s perfume, harmoniously mixing notes of Italian citrus fruits embellished with subtle aromatic
middle: A crisp and refined composition for true connoisseurs.
base: Head Notes

title: Xerjoff, Mefisto Edp 100Ml M
description: Fresh and light like clouds, blue sky and azure ocean, Mefisto is divine and soothing.

middle: A heritage. Mefisto unfolds with the marine vibe of a citrus accord which includes divine grapefruit and bergamot to sign its Italian identity.
base: While the neat green vibe turns into a joyous powdery and woody floral heart, the fragrance cruises to a prestigious and casual aura that has never been experienced before.

title: XERJOFF, SHOOTING STARS NIO PARFUM 50ML M
description: SHOOTING STARS COLLECTION: Inspired by a Siberian meteorite shower, each perfume in this collection is presented in a crystal flacon and enthroned in a leather box embedded with a piece of meteorite.
top: A modern take on classical Italian citrus and wood compositions. Nio is composed around hespridic Chypre bergamot of Calabria and freshly unopened green pods of citrus blossom, accentuated in flamboyant modern translation to build incredibly spine-shivering fresh mood. Nio is a remedy for hot Mediterranean summer weather. Intense and astringent citrus accord mingles with cardamom, pink pepper and luring jasmine who promises of a rich; however remote; ambery woody base. Beside transformation of citrus to ambery base, Haitian vetiver with its crisp green-ward floral-inclining odor embraces angular citrus accord. Hints of guaiac wood and earthy Indian patchouli appear in the dry down, yet, Nio is sturdy to maintain active fresh theme. 1.7 oz. Made in Italy.
middle: TOP NOTES• Bergamot• Tunisian neroli• Rose pepper• Cardamom• Nutmeg
base: HEART NOTES• Jasmine• Green leaves

middle: The freshness of Eucalyptus contrasts with the spirituality of Incense smoke. The provocative blend of Chinese Cedar and Mace gives way to Benzoin and Camphor Wood which envelope the skin in divine warmth.

The aromatic blue notes of lavender and geranium are enriched by a cocktail of ginger and cardamus

title: Ysl, M7 Oud Edt 80Ml M
description: Discover the pinnacle of male sensuality with the Yves Saint Laurent M7 Oud Absolu, a warm and resonating fragrance first introduced in 2002.
top: The smoky, woody scent of YSL Oud Absolu is one of excess. All of the notes are overdosed, from the freshness of mandarin to the complexity of the spicy drydown.
middle: Fragrance Notes: A vibrant opening quickly makes way for a potent heart of potent patchouli wood. The oud accord of Yves Saint Laurent M7, the most intensely scented of woods, is blended with cistus and exotic amber for a resoundingly sexy trail. An addictive and tenacious scent that is resolutely contemporary.

title: YSL, MYSLF EDP 100ML M
description: MYSLF, the refillable men’s fragrance by Yves Saint Laurent. The first YSL Beauty woody floral fragrance with a unique, long-lasting trail of modernity. On top, a fresh & vibrant accord with sparkling bergamot, followed by a rich and intense orange blossom absolute heart from Tunisia. At the base, the scent is balanced by warm and sensual woods, including Indonesian patchouli and musky Ambrofix™. A statement of modern masculinity to celebrate your true self. Unapologetically. Proudly. A fragrance that seamlessly fuses with your skin, revealing a distinct signature for each individual. My scent, MYSLF.
top: MYSLF is the expression of the man you are, with all of your emotions and nuances. A distinctly unique fragrance for those redefining what it means to be a man. A floral twist on a traditional woody fragrance. My scent, MYSLF.
middle: About The FragranceTop Notes: Fresh AccordMiddle Notes: Orange Blossom Absolute HeartBase Notes: Woods Accord

title: YSL, MYSLF PARFUM 100ML M
description: MYSLF Le Parfum, the intense masculine fragrance by Yves Saint Laurent. A long-lasting, woody-floral, & spicy vanilla bourbon fragrance born from the unexpected encounter of rich orange blossom, warm woods, spicy black pepper, and enhanced by velvety vanilla bourbon for a sensual & warm ambery trail.
top: At first, a vibrant & spicy accord made of black pepper essence. At the heart, a radiant & rich orange blossom absolute heart from tunisia crafted for YSL Beauty. At last, sensual & warm woods meet an addictive & velvety vanilla bourbon infusion. A statement of modern masculinity, a fragrance that seamlessly fuses with your skin to reveal a distinct signature for each individual. Myslf, no matter what.

title: YSL, TUXEDO EDP 125ML M
description: Inspired by the emblematic creations of Monsieur Saint Laurent, Le Vestiaire Des Parfums is a collection of fragrances that each interpret a centrepiece of the couturier’s wardrobe.A sleek black ensemble; an interplay of shiny satin and matte grain de poudre fabric – the tuxedo is an icon.
top: Reinvented by Monsieur Saint Laurent, it reveals its innate sensuality. An eternally bold look to evoke the contours of an androgynous eroticism.Tuxedo eau de parfum encapsulates the matte texture of patchouli enlightened by the dusky brightness of spices. A contemporary elegance subverted by a note of utter impertinence.

base: Middle notes: Rose, Lily-of-the-valley, Black pepper.

An intense portrayal of the Y signature, sophisticated notes of bergamot, ginger and sage are sharpened by an apple accord. At its base, the boldness of vetiver embodies the passion of the Y man’s unique strength. Never stop believing. Y, masculinity redefined.

title: Ysl, Y Edp 100Ml M Gift Set
description: Wrap yourself in the bold scent of Yves Saint Laurent, which will underline your uniqueness. The gift set offers you Y perfumed water full of seduction and freshness at the same time. This scent will appeal to purposeful men who are not afraid of new challenges, still set other goals and nothing will stop them. Initially, you will be surrounded by tones of juicy apple, bergamot, elemi and spicy ginger with aldehydes. The heart is dominated by the unmistakable sage with juniper, aromatic lavender and geranium. The basis of the scent is based on oliban, tonka beans and vetiver chords with amber wood. The Yves Saint Laurent Y Eau de Parfum gift set also contains a shower gel that washes your skin perfectly and smells beautiful. After shave balm will provide your skin with gentle care and a feeling of comfort. Modern and active men will fall in love with the gift set.

middle: Yves Saint Laurent will envelop you in a bold scent

title: Ysl, Y Edt 100Ml M
description: Y Eau de Toilette is a fresh & clean men’s cologne for the fearless experimenter who lives by his own rules. The long-lasting scent features aromatic and fresh notes of sage and lavender fused with a crisp bite of geranium rounded out by sensual woods and masculine incense. The Y bottle encapsulates the color of coolness with its icy blue that reveals the freshness of the fragrance. The crystal clear glass bottle features a striking silver Y that slashes through the square-shouldered bottle. An ultra-desirable piece for the fearless Y man.
top: Key Notes: Geranium, Lavender, Incense

title: YSL, Y INTENSE EDP 100ML M
description: The time has come for self-realization. Yves Saint Laurent Y Eau de Parfum Intense will help you along this path, giving you the necessary dose of adrenaline and self-confidence. But it’s up to you to enjoy the intoxicating feeling of releasing creative energy.
top: Composition of the fragrance
middle: The composition of the fragrance is based on the contrast of coolness and sensuality, which is characteristic of the Y collection. To begin with, you will be greeted by a fresh touch of juniper berries. After a while, a mix of floral notes of lavender and geranium is heard. The combination of cedarwood and patchouli notes, which you will feel on the skin for the longest time, adds intensity and sensuality to the fragrance.

title: Ysl, Y Le Parfum 100Ml M
description: Y Le Parfum, a smooth and intense woody fragrance for men. Vibrant lavender, fresh geranium, bold black cedarwood.
top: Y Le Parfum, the NEW bold and woody take on the iconic signature of the Y male fragrance franchise.
middle: The absolute strength of a dark fougère, more intense than ever.
base: Smooth freshness.

title: Zadig & Voltaire, This Is Him Edt 100Ml M
description: THIS IS HIM! de Zadig & Voltaire is a masculine Eau de Toilette that belongs to the Woody Oriental fragrance family. It was launched in 2016 by perfumers Nathalie Lorson and Aurelien Guichard as a complement to the feminine fragrance THIS IS HER! .
top: An urban and current fragrance that defines a young and alive boy who captures the attention of all those who cross his path. With a dark, oriental and woody essence, it provides a casual and very versatile rocker touch that fits with multiple personalities, as reflected by the fashion brand in its masculine collections full of versatile and unisex garments.
middle: Its olfactory pyramid highlights sandalwood as a badge, opening with predominant notes of fresh grapefruit and sparkling black pepper. At its heart we find contradictory notes of incense and vanilla that play the contrasts. Finally, there is an imperious and sensual base note, sandalwood.

title: A Lab Of Fire, Eau D’ Ipanema Edp 60Ml U
description: This scent is almost as mysterious in character as Carlos Kusubayashi himself, the creative force behind the brand A Lab on Fire. And indeed, a sense of mystery does swirl around Carlos Kusubayashi, a citizen of the world who was born in the Brazilian city of São Paulo, grew up in Japan, and now lives near the Texas town of Marfa. Eau d’Ipanema is a new fragrance influenced by Carlos’ own childhood in Brazil. His childhood memories are blurry, but one of his most treasured memories was captured in a photo that shows him in his father’s arms on Ipanema beach. Shortly after the premature death of his beloved father, a grieving Carlos abandoned the white beaches, the flavors, and the bright colors of his native Brazil for the tranquility of Japan.
top: And yet, the name of Ipanema continued to live on in his memory, with strong emotions triggered by that famous song “The Girl from Ipanema”, which even today he likes to play in order to slip back into the past. Now Kusubayashi has decided to create a fragrance that recreates the atmosphere of his native Brazil, the memories of his father, and of Ipanema. Carlos leaned on perfumer Jean-Marc Chaillan for this fragrance, as Chaillan is himself married to a Brazilian woman and could therefore be relied upon to faithfully recreate the authentic spirit of Brazil and the aromas that define Rio de Janeiro and its sugar-white beaches.
middle: Eau d’Ipanema is a perfume with a Latin American soul, shifting easily between tropical fruits such as pineapple, mango, and red berries, and sultry floral notes such as jasmine, orange blossom, fresia, and neroli. There is a sunny, carefree cast to the fragrance – gently spiced fruit and flowers to make you smile, coming to rest in a late afternoon Ipanema beach glow of whipped cream, vanilla, and musk.
base: Head NotesPineapple, Bergamot, Berries, Mango, Pepper.

title: AL HARAMAIN, AMBER OUD RUBY EDITION EDP 100ML U
Al Haramain, Amber Oud Ruby Edition Edp 200Ml U
description: Her London Dream: a modern yet romantic, dream-like moment, set in the heart of London.
top: Effortlessly natural – the epitome of the Burberry girl attitude – Her London Dream brings to life the beauty and freedom of hazy days in London. Bright and intriguing, it embodies a relaxed and youthful sense of style. Radiant and sparkling, the signature Her scent evolves into Her London Dream, with ripe top notes of lemon and fresh ginger – vibrant and memorable. With a romantic rose and peony heart.

title: Al Haramain, Amber Oud Tobacco Edition Edp 60Ml U
description: Oriental and spicy, Amber Oud Tobacco Edition is a rich, full-bodied fragrance for men that’s chock full of exotic ingredients. The top notes of ginger, black pepper, cinnamon and tobacco leaf open the fragrance with their bold, spicy blend. The heart notes of tonka bean, cloves, star anise, vanilla, cacao and incense imbue the fragrance with a pungent sweetness that contains creamy, dusky and green hints. The base notes of dried fruits, assorted woods and tobacco give the scent a rich, earthy foundation. The result is a very long-lasting fragrance with an enormous sillage. When you apply it after showering or bathing, you can rely on it lasting for hours. Its aromatic depth and dimension make it especially well-suited to wear in the fall and winter.

title: Alghabra Parfums, Eye Of Seven Hills Edp 100Ml U
description: All roads lead to Galata from the Seven Hills? The journey through the centuries begins with saffron and cinnamon. As you walk, absorb the magic of verses carved on ancient walls. A pinch of sesame, a pinch of rolling tobacco, a sprinkling of Tonka seed calls to the heart as the rich cacophony of cultures that mark Galata’s past. Narrow stairways spiral you above the rooftops of Istanbul as the stone walls exude the scent of the seven carnations in its soul and the wild figs that have grown from its soil for centuries. Here Istanbul lies beneath your feet, with the Maiden’s Tower, the love of the city, gleaming below. Remember! If you haven’t seen Istanbul from the Galata Tower, then you haven’t seen it at all? Immerse yourself in Istanbul from the Galata Tower, experience a miracle?
top: Top notes are saffron, cinnamon and nutmeg;
middle: Middle notes are whiskey, tobacco, vanilla, tonka bean, benzoin, iris and patchouli;
base: Base notes are amber, sandalwood, cedar, agarwood (oud) and musk.

A luscious, exuberant and stuporous Rose, it drowns its scarlet petals in a flow of woody and animalic Sidr Honey, replete with aromas of fruity-sweet caramel and roasted hazelnuts.
middle: With evening come the mists, the blueness and the balsamic and enveloping dark-rum scent of Oakwood CO2, contrasting the freshness of Vetiver and a dry, desert-like Atlas Cedarwood.
base: A rare, fulsome and spicy rose, Crimson Rocks conjures up the majesty of Al Hajar mountains in all their crepuscular glory.

title: Amouage, Opus Xiv Royal Tobacco Edp 100Ml U
description: One of knowledge and aesthetic pleasure, Opus XIV – Royal Tobacco is a fragrant journey along the Tropic of Cancer from Oman to Cuba, connecting Royal Frankincense to Regal Tobacco. The perfume references the tradition of ‘El Lector’, whose role was to read to cigarmakers in Cuban factories, captivating them with riveting novels like Les Misérables by Victor Hugo and works by Honoré de Balzac, Stendhal, Edgar Allan Poe or Herman Melville until it became an honored ritual as synonymous with the rolling floor as the scent of tobacco. Interpreted by renowned perfumer Cécile Zarokian, a unique accord of Frankincense and Tobacco bursts alive in a novel and rich sensory experience.
top: Top Notes Frankincense Oil, Elemi, Cardamom, Anise, Basil, Bergamot
middle: Heart Notes Tobacco Absolute, Liquorice Root, Lavender, Prunol, Fenugreek, Orange Blossom, Osmanthus, Rose

description: A fresh and elegant signature that has become legendary.
top: In 1981, Annick Goutal founds her Maison of niche Perfumes and creats the avant-garde Eau d’Hadrien, in memory of her reading of Memoirs of Hadrian, in Italy. The signature fragrance of Maison Goutal, Eau d’Hadrien delivers a loving vision of Tuscany, its sun and cypress-lined terraces. In this citrus fragrance, a cocktail of lemon and bright citrus sparkles in the shade of cypress wood.

title: ARGOS, ADONIS AWAKENS EDP 100ML U
description: ADONIS AWAKENS takes inspiration from ‘The Awakening of Adonis’, a painting by the second artist featured in our Artist series—John William Waterhouse. This English painter was renowned for his embrace of the Pre-Raphaelite painting style and his exploration of ancient Greek mythology in his subjects.
top: According to legend, Adonis, the Greek god of beauty, desire, and rebirth, met a tragic end while hunting. Rushing to his side, Aphrodite (Venus to the Romans) accidentally cut herself on a thorn, turning the once pure and white rose, symbolizing her, into a brilliant crimson shade stained by her blood. A kiss from the goddess awakened Adonis, perpetuating the eternal circle of life.
middle: This romantic scent, Argos ADONIS AWAKENS, is both opulent and timeless. It opens with Bright Bergamot, Grapefruit, and Pink Peppercorn, transitioning seamlessly into a bouquet of Bulgarian Rose, Sambac Jasmine, Creamy Vanilla, Chestnut, and Juicy Raspberry. The base notes of Mysore Sandalwood, Cashmere Wood, and Rose Absolute create a strikingly provocative and alluring fragrance.
base: Top Notes: Bergamot, Grapefruit, Pink Peppercorn

description: Represented by the Roman god Bacchus. Bacchus was considered the god of wine making, fertility, ritual madness, theater, and religious ecstasy. He was one of the twelve Olympians, although he was the last to arrive. Often called Eleutherious, meaning “the liberator,” because his wine, music and ecstatic dance freed mortals from self-consciousness and the restraints of society.
top: Bacchus crossed the boundary between life and death, between the known and unknown. He was a god of chaos and protector of misfits. This Luxurious scent is shrouded in grandeur and mystery.
middle: Wildly romantic and fragrant notes dance beautifully together in chorus. Argos TRIUMPH OF BACCHUS is an exotic fragrance opening with Spicy Saffron, Royal Green Apple, and Rhum notes. Confident and refined Tobacco is paired perfectly with amber and Vanilla revealing a powerfully seductive and almost sinful aphrodisiac.
