title: Atelier Cologne, Musc Imperial Edp 100Ml U
description: Experience the unmistakable crisp scent of Spanish sage and bergamot from Calabria, Italy with the Atelier Cologne Musc Imperial, a unisex perfume suitable for all.
top: Inspired by a visit Atelier Cologne’s founders made to the Majestic Hotel and Spa Barcelona and in particular the suites “impériales”, the Atelier Cologne Musc Imperial is a warm, seductive scent that evokes the sun and Mediterranean Sea as well as a touch of imperial majesty.
middle: With ingredients gathered from all over the world, this fragrance combines the sophistication of cedarwood with the mystery of musk accord, coupled with heart notes of lavender, fig and leather accord, resulting in a timeless yet irresistible aroma that captures the senses.

title: Atelier Cologne, Santal Carmin Edp 100Ml U
description: Personal satisfaction is what you are striving for. With every challenge comes experience. You know it. But sometimes enough is enough. You need to take some time off to think about what you really want from life. And whom you want in it. At that very moment, a warm, woody scent puts your thoughts on standby. You suddenly feel relaxed.
top: Rich and deep, the wood perfume Santal Carmin by Atelier Cologne creates pleasant sensations. Made of sandalwood from Australia, bergamot from Italy and guaiac wood from Central America, this unisex perfume helps you feel confident and comfortable. This sensual fragrance will add a touch of softness and roundness to your personality.

title: Atelier Cologne, Vanille Insensee Edp 100Ml U
description: A sweet, yet somehow woody vanilla scent makes her turn around. She knows this perfume more than well. It is the fragrance of past memories. Her eyes are searching for the person who is wearing it. Suddenly, love is in the air. Once again.
top: The pure perfume Vanille Insensée by Atelier Cologne is a unisex fragrance that plays with the unexpected, addictive contrast between vanilla and woody moss. Among its exotic perfume ingredients you will find vanilla from Madagascar, lime from Mexico and cilantro from Russia. Warm and audacious olfactory notes in a beautiful perfume bottle.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Blanc Polychrome Edp 100Ml U
description: This is a concentrated zesty blend inspired by the mesmerizing effect of white light dispersing into a rainbow.
top: This perfume presents a uniformly fresh sensation, but upon closer inspection one detects tiny aromatic currents of green mandarin, crisp petitgrain, and a delicious rhubarb/fig fantasy in the soft focus of ambroxan.
middle: Each perfume in the Atelier des Ors (Gold Atelier) collection is infused with flakes of 24k gold that when sprayed, settles on your skin and clothes like stars in the night sky.
base: Top NotesLemon Mandarin Rhubarb.

title: ATELIER DES ORS, BLUE MADELEINE EDP 100ML U
Atelier Des Ors, Cuir Sacre Edp 100Ml U
description: This powerful fragrance was designed as an Andalusian dream, imagined while strolling the Old Town of Cordoba. Cordoba is a Spanish city once famous for its “Cuir de Cordoue” also called Gold Leather, a unique technique of gold embossed on leather hangings used as a tapestry.
top: The leathery and woody notes combined with saffron and vetiver revive this Cordoban leather heritage. These beautiful materials bring a strong and elegant character to Cuir Sacré.
middle: Top NotesCardamomCypressJuniper
base: HeartCedarwoodIncenseSaffron

title: Atelier Des Ors, Iris Fauve Edp 100Ml U
description: Iris Fauve is inspired by Iris, messenger of the gods, who personifies the rainbow, known poetically as “the scarf of Iris”.
top: The beguiling scent of iris is highlighted in this fragrance and also musk, for its ability to add complexity and nuance. The palette contains smooth as well as powdery elements, spices and at times a defined animalic presence.
middle: A refined fragrance, Iris Fauve is warm and enticing, offering comfort, elegance and a highly sensual experience that softly drapes skin.
base: It drapes the skin like a soft and reassuring caress. It is an intensely sensual composition. The palette contains smooth as well as powdery elements, spices and at times a defined animalic presence.The mythological character Iris, messenger of the gods, inspires this very personal perfume. The bearer of good news, Iris was cherished by Hera, the wife of Zeus. She also personifies the rainbow, known poetically as the ‘scarf of Iris’.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Larmes Du Desert Edp 100Ml U
description: Larmes Du Désert reflects the tradition of perfumes in the Middle East with the use of amber and incense. It pays homage to the ancient incense trade routes and the birthplace of perfumery.
top: Gold and incense confer a divine ascendance to this beautifully crafted and resounding fragrance.
middle: A spiritual captivating nectar blending the sensuality of noble amber and precious woods with the mysterious spiciness of incense.
base: Top NotesCypress

title: Atelier Des Ors, Lune Feline Edp 100Ml U
description: Lune Féline radiates seduction and temptation. Like a magnetic star, it captures everyone’s attention with its symphony of dark and luxurious notes inspired by the moon.
top: The fragrance opens on vibrant accords of warm spices melting with intense and precious woods at its heart.
middle: Lune Féline is a dark and animalic scent based on vanilla pods and sensual orchid, warmed with balsamic notes and musky accords. These notes convey a rich, gourmand trail.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Noir By Night Edp 100Ml U
description: Atelier Des Ors, Noir By Night Edp 100Ml U

title: Atelier Des Ors, Nuda Veritas Edp 100Ml U
description: Nuda Veritas signifies the beginning of a spiritual quest on the search for happiness.
top: The perfume unfolds with a delicate floral heart of jasmine and osmanthus encased in layers of textural whiteness, full of hope and yearning. Humanity is connected to the earth and minerals through hints of moss. We look to the sky and seek the naked truth, laid bare in a transparent, watery haze with hints of patchouli and the gentle caress of ambroxan.
middle: A serene moment, simple and true…
base: Head Notes – Bergamot, Orange Blossom.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Pink Me Up Edp 100Ml U
description: Pink Me Up sparkles and pops, with a mood boosting shine. Experience uplifting emotions with the radiating glow of happiness, joie de vivre and frivolity. Pink Me Up is like a joyous bubble of pleasure, swirling in a crystal glass, symbolising the pleasures of life. Discover the addictive fizz of champagne and the perfectly paired fruitiness of blackberry and bergamot. Pink Me Up’s addictive yet sophisticated scent unveils the delicacy of champagne and the blush of rose centifolia. Swirling floral notes of orange blossom and iris are amplified with seductive musk.
top: Fragrance Notes
middle: Top Notes: Bergamot Essence, Orange Petal Flowers.
base: Heart Notes: Champagne NaturePrint, Rose Centifolia, Blackberry.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Pomelo Riviera Edp 100Ml U
description: Overlooking the jewelled azure sea, sits a beautiful villa and a secluded garden. An abundance of citrus trees laden with fruits and fragrant flowers creates a vivid portrait of a paradise found. A gentle sea breeze brings refreshment and a crystalline scent, tinged with salt, sun and the promise of memorable moments.
top: A natural synergy between the tart refreshment of bergamot and the silky smoothness of orange blossom, jasmine and rose creates a serendipitous moment. The radiant zest of punchy pomelo mixed with beams of sunlight is simple, yet enchantingly seductive with an easy allure.
middle: Pomelo Riviera is a fragrance to evoke the glow of lightly bronzed summer skin and never ending summer days and nights.
base: Relaxation, enjoyment and simple pleasures. Memories made to last.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Riviera Sunrise Edp 100Ml U
description: Riviera Sunrise revels in the golden light of the Mediterranean sun. The warm rays glimmer on aged orange treetops and merge with azure tinted waves in a scented dance.
top: A bold opening combines the zesty pulp of lemon, mandarin and orange with the aromatic freshness of basil. The sparkling layers of citrus play a duet with the joyful synergy of orange blossom and fig leaf, harmonising with the faceted woody notes of vetiver and cedarwood.
middle: Riviera Sunrise expresses an atmosphere that oscillates between the meditative morning calm and bursts of radiant solar energy.
base: Marie Salamagne wanted to capture and transform the beauty of these fleeting moments of happiness as an ode to the indescribable charm of the French Riviera.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Rose Omeyyade Edp 100Ml U
description: Rose Omeyyade by Atelier Des Ors shows a flower in all its delicacy, a rose with her sensual petals – and all this in the realm of the Umayyad in the magical Orient. Here, one willingly gives in to pleasures of the senses – on a bed of fragrant woods.
top: An intense and bewitching velvety fragrance inspired by the precious and captivating Damask Rose. Named after the Umayyad dynasty, Rose Omeyyade tells of the grandeur of the lavishly decorated Levant palaces. A resounding ode to the sensuality and refinement once captured in Oriental paintings. The woody and amber accords mark a unique and elegant creation.
middle: Top note: Pink Pepper, Rose, Raspberry.
base: Heart note: Patchouli, Lignum Vitae, Sugar.

title: Atelier Des Ors, Rouge Saray Edp 100Ml U
description: Rouge Sarây translates the romantic imaginings of adventures and tales on the ancient trade routes that traversed the Middle East. These journeys are kept alive today through the vitality of alluring spices and scents.
top: Long considered a potent symbol of abundance and hospitality, Rouge Sarây sublimates the date and its fruity and fleshy aroma. This fragrance captures the feeling of exquisite indulgence and shared moments of hospitality at the caravanserai, under sheltering desert skies.
middle: NotesJasmine Petals, Cinnamon Essence, Plum AccordHeliotrope, Date Accord, PatchouliPeru Balsam, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Gaiac Wood

title: ATELIER DES ORS, VILA PRIMEROSE 100ML U
description: A woody leather-lined voluptuous rose with velvety, suede notes.
top: Villa Primerose is a tribute to elegance as an art of living. In the origins of perfumery, the most beautiful flowers were used to perfume the leather gloves worn at the time by aristocratic ladies. Atelier Des Ors pays tribute to this «savoir-faire» of exception and reinterprets this Rose-Leather duo making this contrast of scents a creative line that enhances both. In this opposition of notes a singular duality is created, between delicacy and power, masculine and feminine, past and futur. A play on materials where the rose will no longer be there to hide but to reveal the leather. A reinvented rose leather…
middle: Marie Salamagne’s perfumed note: “For this new creation, I worked around two iconic materials from the Grasse olfactory landscape: rose and leather. They celebrate the magnificence of a unique heritage.”
base: Fragrance Notes

title: ATKINSONS, 24 OLD BOND STREET COLOGNE 100ML U
Attar Collection, Hayati Edp 100Ml U
description: Hayati by Attar Collection Perfume. Lounge near the pool, pick up your umbrella drink and rejoice in the warmth of the sun on your skin any time you splash on Hayati.
top: This vibrant women’s fragrance blends fruity, gourmand, floral and powdery notes for an undeniably succulent and feminine aroma that can boost your confidence and satiate your senses.
middle: Top notes of raspberry, pineapple and a large assortment of berries set the tone from the top, creating a sensational olfactory treat that simply screams summer indulgence. Adding to this delectable elixir are middle notes of honey, plum, whipped cream, black currant and an arrangement of florals for an even more luxurious result. Completing the formula are base notes of vanilla, ice cream and white musk, which combine to create a stunningly chic and flirtatious perfume you can wear with any summertime ensemble.

title: Bdk Parfums, Citrus Riviera Edp 100Ml U
description: Citrus Riviera pays homage to the landscape of the Cap d’Antibes.
top: Top notes are Italian lemon, orange blossom, Italian mandarin and figs;
middle: The heart of the fragrance smells of water, orange blossoms, notes of grass, sun gold, jasmine, eucalyptus and strawberry;
base: The fragrance base consists of Haitian vetiver, Indonesian patchouli leaves, white musk and tonka bean.

title: BDK PARFUMS, CREME DE CUIR EDP 100ML U
description: It’s the Indian summer, when the hot days are over and the sweet freshness of the evening begins to fall. A sensual elixir marked with white and beige hues, a pure representation of contemporary sensuality. The perfume evolves through the monochromatic style of Rothko where materials are dancing in circle one after another one. The leather is stripped down, dusted of any impurities, made it white and pure. The green notes embrace passionately while musk and bergamot push to the skies of Italy.
top: Top notes: Mandarin, Bergamot,Pineapple
middle: Heart notes: Pink berries, Solar Accord White suede, Sandalwood
base: Base notes

title: Bdk Parfums, French Bouquet Edp 100Ml U
description: French Bouquet is a homage to the legacy of French perfumes in the 1970s. It showcases authentic Parisian sophistication and the capital’s passion-filled nights, embodying the ultimate in French elegance. Created by Amélie Bourgeois (Flair), French Bouquet is a traditional chypre in which bergamot, rose, jasmine, oak moss and musk are revealed and sublimated by aldehydes. Their slightly oily and metallic potency gives a powdery appeal, as well as whitens and brightens the flowers in the chypre accord.
top: Top notesAldehyde C12CorianderBergamot from Italy
middle: Heart notesRose from MoroccoJasmine from IndiaOrange blossom from Tunisia
base: Base notesLabdanum from SpainTobacco from CubaVetiver from HaitiPatchouli from IndonesiaVioletSandalwoodTonka bean

title: Bdk Parfums, Gris Charnel Edp 100Ml U
description: Quai Saint-Bernard, near the Jardin des Plantes, the first couples arrive at the Tino-Rossi garden. As the night falls, the number of dancers increases and the bleachers fill up. Under the silver moon and the lights of the tourist barges that criss-cross the quay a few metres away, the bodies mingle to the rhythm of the music. It is then that two glances cross paths. A discreet invitation brings them to the centre of the track. As if they were carried away, they dance in the heat of the night. From this hand-to-hand seduction punctuated by knowing smiles, they end up slipping away to give free flow to more carnal desires. In the early morning, the sheets give off a scent of sleepless nights, mischievous and lascivious embraces.
top: Top notesFigBlack teaCardamom essence
middle: Heart notesAbsolute of irisBourbon vetiver
base: Base notesSandalwood from IndiaAbsolute of Tonka bean

title: Bdk Parfums, Gris Charnel Extrait Edp 100Ml U
description: Concentrated at 30%, Gris Charnel Extrait reveals the intensity of the original signature to extract a richer and more faceted version. A new creation, where the woody essence of patchouli is invited and brings depth to the sandalwood and tonka bean that reveal themselves more textured and warm. Voluptuous, vanilla underlines this trail with an ambery and smoked roundness. At the top, the freshness and vibrant cardamom combines with the delicacy of a fig with green and fruity accents. A bright opening that illuminates the opulent note of the fragrance.
top: Top notesCardamom essenceBlack tea extractFig accord
middle: Heart notesAbsolute iris from MoroccoCistus essenceBourbon vetiver from Madagascar
base: Base notesPatchouli essence from IndonesiaVanilla absolute from MadagascarSandalwood essenceCedar essence from United StatesTonka bean absolute

title: Bdk Parfums, Nuit De Sable Edp 100Ml U
description: In this garden of the sumptuous Palais Royal, out of sight, the pages of a book are slowly turning. Intrigued, a silhouette advances to start the conversation. It is there, at the end of the afternoon, sitting on a bench in front of a sumptuous bed of roses with a scent mixed with sand, where they meet. Carefree of the time that passes, reality ends up catching them. The guard’s keys come to close the garden doors.
top: Top notesCardamom from GuatemalaNutmeg from IndonesiaCumin.
middle: Heart notes.
base: Absolute of rose from TurkeyRose oxideHot sand accord.

title: Bdk Parfums, Oud Abramad Edp 100Ml U
description: At dawn, the doors close. The light coloured marble has kept the intoxicating heat of the day. It seems as if the lush garden is soothing, and the trees open their arms. The desert’s night creeps under the arcades and the garden seems circled by alcoves. Someone silently crosses the darkness. You can hear the subtle sound of fabric draping like a cloak over the discreet sound of the leather’s patina. The silhouette slow and haughty floats through the silenced garden. Maybe it’s Abramad… heavy door opens and a glimmer of light filters through. A proud shadow covers the stone in the trail of the golden light. She disappears. Lift your heard towards the seven windows of the palace opened like big black eyes. In the hushed obscurity, someone stands facing the desert.
top: Top notesSafranGinger
middle: Heart notesRose of TurkeyCumin
base: Base notesAgarwoodGuaiac woodRockroseIncensePatchouliCastoreumOrcanox

title: BDK PARFUMS, PAS CE SOIR EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
Bdk Parfums, Rouge Smoking Edp 100Ml U
description: At nightfall, the sky becomes misty letting the red light of the mill glimpsing through the window. The horns sound and the spirit of celebration comes to the city. In front of her mirror, she’s getting ready and doing her makeup. It’s time for beauty to go on stage. She goes toward her wardrobe, inspired by that tuxedo that will enhance her bodylines. It is the Parisian glam, she knows it well, the trends too. Her bohemian style and erotic energy leaves indelible footprints on the streets. She is Pigalle, beautiful and mysterious.
top: Top notes: Bergamot from Italy, Cherry accord, Pink berries.
middle: Heart notes: Black vanilla,Heliotrope.
base: Base notes: Ambroxan,Cashmeran, Tonka bean, Labdanum, White musk.

title: Bdk Parfums, Sel D Argent Edp 100Ml U
description: With its roots firmly in Paris – and its glass flacon even finding inspiration from an iconic Parisian building –BDK Parfums knows a thing or two when it comes to delectably captivating fragrances that transport you to France. Opening with notes of Italian bergamot, salted accord and grapefruit, the Sel D’Argent eau de parfum is irresistibly mesmerising with undertones of ylang-ylang, cashmeran and white musk evoking late afternoons spent under the fading light, with the sea air stirring up the freshness of summer nights.
top: Top notesEssence of Italian BergamotGrapefruitSalted accord.
middle: Heart notesOrange Blossom Absolute from TunisiaYlang-Ylang Essence from MadagascarGalbanum Essence from Iran.
base: Base notesAmbroxanCashmeranTimbersilkWhite Musk

title: Bdk Parfums, Tabac Rose Edp 100Ml U
description: A dense and potent elixir that pays tribute to the most famous of all flowers used in perfumery. David Benedek chose to work with rose in a different manner in order to unveil its atypical facets.
top: Tabac Rose is a fragrance that expresses textures, highlighting oriental and mysterious sensuality depicted in layers of pink, purple and plum shades. Opulent addictive tobacco, boosted by delectable plum and chocolate join forces with the majestic Turkish rose. I
middle: FF perfumer Julien Rasquinet brought contrast by adding spicy notes of pink pepper and cinnamon. The sweet voluptuousness is prolonged thanks to the deep and mystical notes of patchouli and labdanum.
base: Top Notes: Pink pepper from Madagascar, Plum accord, Lemon from Italy.

title: Bdk Parfums, Tubereuse Imperiale Edp 100Ml U
description: Nonchalant, she walks with regular strides. Her headpiece and the swing of her hips are well rehearsed. She doesn’t want to seem to pretty in her white headdress. Sovereign, she faints ignorance while passer-by’s stares cover the light coloured turban that unfolds in a corolla. Her frail silhouette sways proudly under the weight of this crown of sunshine: the envy of all flowers.
top: Top notes
middle: Pink peppercornGeranium of Egypt
base: Heart notes

title: BDK PARFUMS, VANILLE LEATHER EDP 100ML U
Bdk Parfums, Velvet Tonka Edp 100Ml U
description: Tonka bean is an ingredient full of contrasts, sometimes reminiscent of vanilla leather, sometimes of almonds, sometimes even revealing chocolatey facets. Velvet Tonka is characterized by its trilogy of tonka bean, orange blossom and almond. When worn on the skin, it coats it like an oriental delicacy dusted with icing sugar. The balmy tonka bean is adorned with almonds and rose petals for a velvety touch, and with a hint of tobacco absolute to give it a honeyed feel. In the base, addictive notes of milky amyris wood unfurl, enhanced by ambroxan and vanilla absolute for an unparalleled velvetiness and sensuality. Velvet Tonka is a tribute to the Moroccan origins of founder David Benedek and to the iconography associated with the region through its flavors and its landscapes, like a sweet, indulgent breeze coming straight from the Atlas Mountains.
top: Top notesOrange blossomAlmond
middle: Heart notesRose absoluteTobacco absolute from the Balkans
base: Base notesTonka bean absoluteVanilla absolute from MadagascarAmyris wood essenceAmber woods

title: Bdk Parfums, Wood Jasmin Edp 100Ml U
description: Mystic wood with notes of tobacco, vanilla, and jasmine, developed in Paris. Modern, sophisticated and solar notes. An oriental, sensual and animal fragrance with an oud accord. A royal elegance with brown and gold reflections.
top: Top Notes: Plum, Pear.
middle: Middle Notes: Jasmine from Egypt, Sambac Jasmine, Rose from Turkey, Dhavanam.
base: Base Notes: Incense from Somalia, Vanilla from Madagascar, Patchouli from Indonesia, Labdanum from Spain, Cypriol Nagarmotha from India

title: BDK, AMBRE SAFRANO EDP 100ML U
description: Sensual and intense, amber is at the centre of the olfactory narrative of the new BDK fragrance. Ambre Safrano explores the oriental facets of this emblematic raw material. Blended with saffron, suede and woods, the fragrance transports the wearer to the burning heat of the Orient. The golden tones of the saffron reveal a leathery, velvety, gourmand softness. By combining vanilla with the sensuality of sandalwood and oakwood, Ambre Safrano takes us on a heady faraway olfactory journey.
top: “Saffron’s symbolism is very rich. During the Antiquity, it embodied sensuality and exquisite pleasure. In India, it represents luck. It can suggest color, wealth, joy, opulence… Working on a saffron imagery is telling all these stories simultaneously. For Ambre Safrano, I attired it with amber’s gilded fineries, as to make it even more precious. Sandalwood, vanilla and oakwood contribute to craft him an enhancing leather skin.”
middle: Olfactive PyramidTop Notes: Plum, Saffron, PepperHeart Notes: Leather, Rose, OlibanumBase Notes: Sandalwood, Vanilla, Oakwood

title: BILLIE EILISH, NO.2 EDP 100ML U
description: An alluring aroma which opens with the freshness of Italian bergamot and apple blossom. It flows into a woody, earthy spiciness of papyrus and black pepper with a contrast of wild wet poppy flowers. A base of woody palo santo and ebony are expertly wrapped in a metallic, nuanced veil of skin musk.

title: BOADICEA THE VICTORIOUS, ARDENT EDP 100ML U
description: Ardent is a captivating fragrance inspired by sweet depths of the earth and peppered with delectable floral notes. The combination of such natural rarities creates a delicate, yet rich scent reminiscent of humid seductive evenings in a far exotic land.
top: The top notes open with theatrical anticipation and dazzle on the skin; plucky saffron mingles with coriander before being softened by creamy, elegant Turkish rose. The middle of this scent only intensifies our lust for luxury, as rose absolute and jasmine take on a sumptuous role arresting the wearer with their heady warmth. Ardent’s base gently simmers, bringing us down to earth with the subtle use of argarwood along with benzion and amber. Ardent is a fragrance full of romantic drama- indulging the senses from beginning to end

title: BOADICEA THE VICTORIOUS, AZRAK EDP 100ML U
description: Azrak is a perfume that breaks like waves upon the shore, heady, hypnotic and entrancing. Sure to entrance, it is superbly presented with a unique blue finish and golden shield.
top: Azrak hints at a colour of the rarest blue, reminiscent of the ultramarine deeps that surround our island nation, the cobalt swirls and cerulean tints that play in the ocean. Presented in a bottle with a unique blue finish and gold shield, this is a perfume that breaks like gentle waves upon the shore, assailing the senses with its pinnacles of pineapple, lemon, cardamom and cassis, following through with eddying touches of rose, jasmine and spicy accord to wash softly against cedarwood, musk and amber. Heady and hypnotic, Azrak is sure to entrance.
middle: The Blue Collection
base: A coming together precious notes from around the world, sourced by our perfumiers to create scents which hark back to hedonistic days of old while at the same time capturing the irrepressible fortitude of our island nation. Think of midnight blue skies, of cobalt seas and azure mountain tarns – this collection exudes an intensity that simply takes the breath away. As with all Boadicea the Victorious fragrances, both the eau de perfumes and pure perfumes deliver exceptional endurance on the skin.

title: Boadicea The Victorious, Blue Sapphire Edp 100Ml U
description: Blue Sapphire by Boadicea The Victorious Perfume for men and women
top: Inside a prestigious black satin box lies the epitome of sensory surprise – a regal fusion of citrus highs and green accord melded with harmonious hints of rose, cardamom, Indian jasmine, Oud, patchouli and amber. Created in honour of the 65th wedding anniversary of Queen Elizabeth ll and Prince Philip, Blue Sapphire is a fragrance founded on loyalty, harmony, friendship and trust, the qualities embedded in this precious gemstone. Celebrate our kingdom’s rich heritage, from present day glories to the thrilling era of a much earlier warrior queen.

title: Boadicea The Victorious, Complex Edp 100Ml U
description: Boadicea The Victorious – Complex – The Courage Collection
top: Complex radiates a rich and engaging complexity achieved through inimitable perfumery experience and enlightenment. Suggestive and confident, it has a heightened herbal kick.
middle: There are perfumes whose appeal is unadorned and straightforward, and there are those that simply can’t be pinned down or pigeon-holed. Complex is such a scent, yet its complexity is achieved not through an overblown list of ingredients but through perfumery experience and enlightenment. A brew of heady base notes gives an earthy foundation; violet and incense play a pivotal role; sage and basil provide a heightened herbal kick that dries down to a distinguished fragrance that is sexy, suggestive and confident, with a wonderful longevity on the skin.
base: The Courage Collection

title: Boadicea The Victorious, Consort Edp 100Ml U
description: A perfume that exudes an easy elegance with its bright, charming, and inspiring sentiment. You can depend on Consort to invigorate the mind and be by your side with grace and stature. The perfect companion.
top: Consort is kaleidoscope of subtle notes combining to reach a confident conclusion that all will notice and appreciate. The effect begins with orange flower and magnolia, dispersing through notes of citruswood, juniper berry, bergamot and lime, with a trace of voluptuous musk and grassy vetiver adding a spellbinding finish. Like all good consorts, this is a fragrance which will reward you with loyalty and fidelity – an ally that will go through fire to serve you well.

title: BOHOBOCO, DARK VINYL MUSK EDP 50ML U
description: DARK VINYL • MUSK from the BOHOBOCO • PERFUME line is the quintessence of life – the jazzy scent of black vinyl and the scent of enveloping musk combine to create a metaphor for beautiful and difficult moments, ups and downs that build us. The fragrance contains mesmerizing incense and enveloping balsamic notes that protect us and take us to special and exciting moments. Intense leather notes show the dark side of the world, and the magnetizing scent of the rose shows its bright side. This composition symbolizes the experience and hope that the change is inscribed in our life, and that in the end, you are always reborn as a new you – a new day comes and a new year – the beginning of something unknown and exciting – like the swirling hypnosis of life.
top: HEAD NOTES: rose, sandalwood, cistusHEART NOTES: styrax, incense, balsamic notesBASE NOTES: musk, amber, labdanum, leather notes

title: Bohoboco, Red Wine Brown Sugar Parfum 50Ml U
description: RED WINE • BROWN SUGAR secrets notes of dry red wine, enriched with the aromas of wood and brown sugar. It is an unconventional composition that awakens the senses. The enveloping sweetness gives courage, introduces you to a world full of inspiration and self-awareness. Spicy notes of red wine open the door of extravagance and allow you to overcome all adversities. This addictive perfume will let you feel spiritual bliss from both sweet success, and the bitter path that leads to it.
top: HEAD NOTES: dried fruits, red fruits, blackberries
middle: HEART NOTES: patchouli, red wine, cedarwood
base: BASE NOTES: caramel, sweet liquor, leather

title: BOHOBOCO, SEA SALT CARAMEL EDP 50ML U
Bohoboco, Vanilla Black Pepper Edp 50Ml U
description: The metaphysical memory of the creative director inspired him to create a unique line – BOHOBOCO • PERFUME, opened by the VANILLA • BLACK PEPPER fragrance. Like an invisible thread, it combines magical layers of emotion, fascination and devotion. This composition reflects a journey within oneself – in order to find one’s true self and the path to a life full of passion, devotion to what you love and excitement in the moment. Thanks to this, the visionary understood what real art is and from that moment he wanted it to accompany him throughout his life. In a minimalist bottle of perfume, he hid dreams of creative passion, devotion and inner excitement of the moment. The sweet and spicy scent is very seductive and lingers on in one’s memory for a long time.
top: HEAD NOTES | Orange Blossom, Rosebay
middle: HEART NOTES | Heliotrope, Olibanum, Rose, Nutmeg
base: BASE NOTES | Black Pepper, Vanilla, Cedarwood, White Musk

title: Bois 1920, Cannabis Edp 100Ml U
description: A fragrance that defies the traditional rules, reinterpreting them with a modern twist. The greatest expression of the Cannabis buds, a debut of pureness, a voluptuous heart for a piercing, slightly impudent perfume.
top: Top: Cannabis.
middle: Heart: Cannabis,Patchouly
base: Dry down: Light Woods, Cannabis.

title: Bois 1920, Cannabis Fruttata Edp 100Ml U
description: Seductive, soft, involving composition that symbolizes an unusual olfactory journey where the fruity senses of Blueberry, enhanced by an Amber shade, awaken a unique and surprising sensorial experience.
top: Top: Origan, Rosemary, Fig leaves.
middle: Heart: Cannabis, Blueberry, Lily of the valley.
base: Dry down: Patchouly, Ambergris, Cedarwood.

title: Bois 1920, Dolce Di Giorno Edp 100Ml U
description: Dolce Di Giorno
top: Seductive and mysterious, it is an encounter between citrusy notes of Grapefruit and Bergamot, spaced out to sensual ones of Cinnamon and Pepper. Thyme, Cardamon, Nargamutta and Prune intertwine in the heart, creating a memorable alchemy. The dry down seals and exalts the fragrance, extraordinary woods, Patchouly, Cashmere and Gaiac, elegant Vetiver, Sandalwood and Cedarwood, bound with tender Vanilla and virile Labdanum.
middle: Top: Bergamot, Cinnamon, Pepper, Grapefruit.
base: Heart: Cardamom, Thyme, Nargamutta, Prune.

title: BOIS 1920, ELITE II EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: An elegant olfactory pyramid, finely soft in all its evolution. The delicacy of Rose drifts to notes of White Flowers, Amber and Precious Woods. A refined lightness which seizes the mind revealing its inebriating charm.
top: Top: Lemon, Acquatic Notes.
middle: Heart: Rose, Caramel Sugar, White Flowers.
base: Dry Down: White Musk, Vanilla, Precious Woods, Amber, Tonka Bean.

title: BOIS 1920, ORO 1920 EDP 100ML U
description: A strong and deep fragrance, at times dark and therefore magnetic. An olfactory fantasy that opens in a weave of elegant nuances of Ginger and Incense, touched by new caresses of Aromatic Fir and punctuated by unusual fruity sparks of Raspberry. Mysterious and sensual notes of Guaiac Wood are released in the heart, which is completed thanks to the sumptuous floral accord given by the refined and precious Iris and May Rose, nestled between the soft and sinuous Osmanthus and Opoponax. The base is dark and intense, a melange of Tobacco, dense resins (Benzoin, Beeswax) and touches of Vanilla that enhance all the strength of Leather, symbol of class and durability.
top: OLFACTORY PYRAMID:
middle: Top: Raspberry, Ginger, Incense, Fir.
base: Heart: May Rose, Iris, Guaiac Wood.

title: BOIS 1920, ORO NERO EDP 100ML U
description: Oro Nero, created to sublimate in an even more intense and mysterious way the olfactory harmonies exalted in the Oro 1920 fragrance. In Oro Nero elegant notes of Saffron blend with a lively Bergamot, Orange and Clove give life to an exhilarating oriental spicy note. The heart denotes a woody character where Patchouli, Sandalwood, Cedar and Ylang Ylang intertwine. Notes of Leather, Amber and Vanilla give a harmonious character to the final notes.
top: OLFACTORY PYRAMID:
middle: Top: Saffron, Bergamot, Orange, Clove.
base: Heart: Patchouli, Sandalwood, Cedar, Ylang Ylang.

title: BOIS 1920, ORO ROSSO EDP 100ML U
description: A poetic, sensual, enveloping alchemy… where the softness of Jasmine meets the spicy warmth of Saffron and thus enhances the aphrodisiac and passionate side of the fragrance. The base is solid, sublimated by intense woody notes that accentuate the rich accords of Musk and Oak Wood.
top: OLFACTORY PYRAMID:
middle: Top: Blood Orange, Citrus Notes.
base: Heart: Jasmine, Lavender, Sage, Saffron.

title: BOIS 1920, PARANA EDP 100ML U
description: From the union of luxurious leathery notes of Birch with fruity accents that smell of Blackcurrant and Italian Bergamot, an eau de parfum in which the heart notes open up on a bouquet of Rose combined with Moroccan Jasmine. In the base, woody and amber notes reveal the unique and sophisticated personality of the fragrance.
top: OLFACTORY PYRAMID:
middle: Top: Birch, Bergamot, Cardamom, Cassis, Galbanum, Blackcurrant.
base: Heart: Rose, Jasmine Neroli.

title: Bois 1920, Sandalo E The Edp 100Ml U
description: Sandalo e the
top: The fresh and the Mediterranean touches of the top welcome us in an embrace of happiness and transparency, attractive and sunny. The heart, a precious bouquet of Rose Absolute and Lilly of the Valley, is wrapped by the vibrant intensity of pleasant White Woods notes and by the mysterious essential oil of Patchouli, and it evolves into a comfortable and enveloping dry down rich of Labdanum Absolute, nuances of Benzoin, Sandalwood, Incense and Tonka Beans for an unforgettable signature.
middle: Top: Bergamot, Lemon, Lavender, Tea.
base: Heart: Lilly of the Valley, Rose, White Woods, Patchouly

title: Bois 1920, Vetiver Ambrato Edp 100Ml U
description: Vetiver Ambrato
top: Elegantly and profoundly seductive. An absolutely masculine perfume that embodies all the power and mystery of modern man. These suggestions of the fragrant architecture of an eau de parfum make their debut with sparkling, tonic notes towards a warm and spicy middle note to conclude with a virile, provocative top note that surprises again and again.
middle: Top: Bergamot, Lemon, Petitgrain, Galbanum, Artemisia.
base: Heart: Lavender, Geranium, Cloves.

title: Bond No 9, Greenwich Village Edp 100Ml U
description: With Greenwich Village, Bond No. 9 brilliantly captures one of New York’s most beloved neighborhoods in a scent. It is a celebration of individuality and creativity, and the rich heritage of the city’s artists and intelligentsia, and the community they created. The result is an oriental vanilla with a touch of light floralcy.
top: Notes: Cassis, Lychee, Mandarin, Peony, Waterlily, Patchouli, Jasmine Petals, Ambrox, Peach Musk, Vanilla, Oak Moss and Praline

title: Bond No 9, New York Musk Edp 100Ml U
description: New York Musk is part of the New York Notes collection from Bond No 9.
top: The fragrance opens with light and buoyant grapefruit flower, tart blackcurrant and galbanum. The heart notes reinforce an Asian theme, with peach-like osmanthus flower, lemony-green lilies and spicy nutmeg. Musk, patchouli, sandalwood, and vetiver support the fruits, spices and flowers above.

title: Bond No 9, Tribeca Edp 100Ml U
description: Manhattan is Bond No.9’s current muse, captured in the label’s latest unisex eau de parfum: TriBeCa. Embodying the young sophisticates of the New York borough, this jasmine-hearted scent is enriched with top notes of cacao and green hazelnut, underpinned with complex woody tones such as sambac, moss and caramel for rich depths.
top: Fragrance notes: Cacao absolute, Green hazelnut, Jasmine, Sambac absolute, Ambroxan, Moss, Caramel

title: BOND NO.9, ANDY WARHOL EDP 100ML U
description: Bond No. 9 introduced the 4th fragrance from the Andy Warhol collection, named Andy Warhol Success is a job in New York. It’s bottled marked with the dollar sign $. The perfume is warm, spicy – gourmand, and it opiates just like the money, captivating you with its aromas if you sniff it.
top: The bottle shape is identical to the previous Bond No.9 editions. Only this time, it is decorated with stylized dollar graphic and colored in colours from Warhol’s 1981 collection – Dollar Signs. The Coral colored dollar is on the front of the bottle, and light blue one is on the back.
middle: The composition includes spicy citrus start of coriander, cardamom, mandarin, bergamot, and the heart of jasmine, tuberose, rose, plum, and pepper Oriental base is made out of vanilla, patchouli, and amber.

description: Inspired by millennial Chinese Black Tea, an intense luxury fragrance for men and women. Eau Parfume au Noir imprints itself indelibly on the skin with its floral and woody notes.
top: The top notes are as palpable as those of a rose. The fluid and woody notes of black tea accord and patchouli strongly interact with the sensual and captivating harmonies of oud. Olfactory family: Woody – Floral ,
middle: Top Notes: Rose Absolute – Bergamot Essencence ,
base: Heart Notes: Black Tea Accord – Magnolia Essencence ,

title: Byredo, Bal D’Afrique Edp 100Ml U
description: Bal d’Afrique is inspired by Paris in the late 1920’s, when the city was infatuated with an idiosyncratic and fantastical vision of African culture, music and dance. Paris embraced the fabulous Josephine Baker as its muse and so does this enigmatic and playful scent. Drawing on the euphoric mix of the avant-garde and exoticism that fueled the artistic life of the city, Jerome Epinette has created a fragrance with the exuberant sensuality of La Baker herself.
top: A vivacious blast of sunny citrus with just a pinch of spicy marigold makes a suitably dramatic entrance, leading to a brew of green bucchu, sheer and aqueous cyclamen and sweet violet. At center stage is the ever-bewitching vetiver, earthy and spicy, and smoothed with sweet amber and warm musk until it becomes velvety and almost edible. An extra soupçon of growl is provided by cedar wood, but the overall effect is less voracious man-eating tiger and more of a mischievous tiger cub – sweet and adorable, but it still has claws.
middle: Bal d’Afrique is warm and embracing with a purring, cozy quality that has us at its mercy. Be careful, this one is addictive.
base: Bal d’Afrique Notes

title: Byredo, Black Saffron Edp 100ml U
description: Saffron is a spice. Saffron is a color. Saffron is a way of life. Black Saffron pays tribute to the many facets of saffron, weaving a spell of a spice symbolic of India.
top: A vibrant citrus opening belies the deeper heart of the perfume. The aroma of saffron starts to wrap around you like holy robes, earthy and unmistakable. A dewy rose emerges, tickling your nose with a soft sweetness. Then, there it is, the surprise of leather nestled among the woods and vetiver. At once ancient and modern, Black Saffron brings all the traditions of the East alive while winking at you from the seat of a sleek motorcycle.
middle: Black Saffron Fragrance Notes: Pomelo, saffron, juniper berries, black violet, accord cuir, cristal rose, blonde woods, raspberry, vetiver.

title: Byredo, Casablanca Lily Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Distilled into a pure essence, each Night Veils fragrance taps noble raw materials chosen with meticulous care. With its high concentration, this new trio reinvents a new perfume ritual.
top: Casablanca Lily was inspired by the thriving city that rises on the shores of the Atlantic Ocean. From its Berber roots to its colonial heritage, Casablanca’s modern identity is a mix of diverse cultures, a place in constant change between tradition and modernity. Given time, the city unravels itself, revealing the most amazing corners, a vibrant kaleidoscope of Moroccan life found nowhere else. The fragrance surrounds you like the elegance of the city that inspired it: abundance, richness and grandeur combined.
middle: Notes
base: Top: Plum, GardeniaHeart: Carnation, Indian TuberoseBase: Rosewood, Honey Accord

title: BYREDO, DE LOS SANTOS EDP 100ML U
description: A scent created in celebration of life, De Los Santos incants memories and acknowledges the fleeting. An aromatic cloud of musk is pierced by the clarity of sage. The splendor of amber and incense is grounded by iris root and mirabelle.
top: Earthen notes of cistus flourish in dry heat. In homage to the traditions of Día de los Muertos and All Saints’ Day, De Los Santos captures the transcendent power of coming together in collective ceremonies,translating scent into a new ritual of remembrance.
middle: Top: Clary Sage, Mirabelle.
base: Heart: Orris, Ciste Oil.

title: Byredo, Gypsy Water Edp 100Ml U
description: Gypsy Water is a glamorization of the Romani, or Gypsy, lifestyle. The scent of fresh soil, deep forests and campfires evokes the dream of a free, colorful lifestyle close to nature.
top: Style: Woody, aromatic.
middle: Notes:
base: – Top: bergamot, lemon, pepper, juniper berries.

title: Byredo, La Tulipe Edp 100ml W
description: When tulips start blooming, it is the sign that Spring has sprung. With the dull days of winter at an end, gardens come to life with bold colors and clean-cut shapes. Tulips may not be the first flowers you would think of as being fragrant, but a number are definitely sweet-smelling.
top: Top: Cyclamen, Freesia, Rhubarb.
middle: Heart: Tulip.
base: Base: Blonde Woods, Vetiver.

title: Byredo, Mojave Ghost Edp 100Ml U
description: Mojave Ghost is a woody composition inspired by the soulful beauty of the Mojave Desert. In this xeric wilderness, rare are the plants that dare to blossom. With a light and graceful character top notes of musky Ambrette combine with fresh Jamaican Nesberry. Powdery Violet then unfurls to reveal Sandalwood. Finally warm Chantilly Musk rounds out a base of crisp Amber and Cedar wood, leaving the raw spirit of Mojave Ghost to linger on the skin.

title: BYREDO, MUMBAI NOISE EDP 100ML U
description: Mumbai Noise – a tribute to the sensorial multitudes and multifaceted modernity of Mumbai, anchored in Ben Gorham’s memories of its past.
top: A scent crowded with contrasts: of rich, warm woods and amber blended with brightness; of plummy Davana positioned alongside leather; bitter coffee stirred with sweet tonka beans.
middle: The mesmerising abundance of Chembur’s streets – the smoky haze of incense interspersed with streetside coffee carts and cacophonous soundscapes – is explored through a contemporary lens.
base: Notes

title: Byredo, Oud Immortel Edp 100Ml U
description: The duo Oud Immortel is created around oud, a certain type of wood that because of its use in traditional incense and perfume, has gained great cultural significance and has gotten its existence recorded in one of the world’s oldest written texts – the Sanskrit Vedas from India. When the once light heartwood from the Aquilaria tree becomes infected with a specific type of mold, it defends itself by saturating its core with a dark, highly fragrant, resin. This dark wood, oud or agarwood holds a complex fragrance, resembling few or no other natural ingredients.
top: Notes
middle: Top: Cardamom, Incense
base: Heart: Brazilian Rosewood, Papyrus, Patchouli

title: Byredo, Pulp Edp 100ml U
description: In Pulp, a compilation of exotic and swedish influences create an international fruit basket. A dramatic composition focused on the idea of ripe, sweet, shapeless mass of fruit, an unruly and intense savor.
top: Notes.
middle: Top: Bergamot, Blackcurrant, CardamomHeart: Fig, Red Apple, TiareBase: Cedarwood, Peach Flower, Praline

title: Byredo, Reine De Nuit Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Distilled into a pure essence, each Night Veils fragrance taps noble raw materials chosen with meticulous care. With its high concentration, this new trio reinvents a new perfume ritual.
top: Reine de Nuit is a testament to how empowering a rich floral perfume can be in the twilight hours. It revives the rich tradition of oriental perfumes and celebrates the intrinsic seductiveness of the rose. Reine de Nuit has a sensual and spellbinding scent.
middle: NotesTop: Blackcurrant, SaffronHeart: Incense, RoseBase: Ambrette Seeds, Patchouli

title: Byredo, Rouge Chaotique Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: The first oud gourmand fragrance in our Night Veils collection, Rouge Chaotique takes personal inspiration from Ben Gorham’s belief that accepting the chaos within any creative process can result in singular forms of expression.
top: At the top, a prelude of precious saffron undercuts the fresh juiciness of blackcurrant and bergamot with a tangent of spiced leather. Velvety smooth gourmand notes form the heart, as syrupy sensations of plum and the toasted sweetness of praline transform into an irresistible guilty pleasure. Drawn from one of the world’s most opulent raw materials, the animalic sensuality of oud brings the spectacular finale, blended with patchouli and balanced with the crisp tension of papyrus.
middle: Distilled into a pure essence, a small amount of Rouge Chaotique works closer to the skin and radiates through the heat of the body, lingering for many hours.
base: NotesTop: Bergamot, Lemon, Saffron, CassisHeart: Plum, Praline, Upcycled OakwoodBase: Papyrus, Upcycled Patchoud

title: Byredo, Sellier Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Distilled into a pure essence, each Night Veils fragrance taps noble raw materials chosen with meticulous care. With its high concentration, this new trio reinvents a new perfume ritual. An essential ally of any equestrian, the saddle brings horse and rider together as one.
top: Distinguished, sombre, smoky, Sellier is a truly unbridled concentration of leather. The olfactory surprise explodes from the very first second. Sellier teleports us to a vintage smoking room with precious tobacco leaves, antique books and age-worn leather club chairs. Olfactory acrobatics that give the leather fragrance a good whip of the riding crop.
middle: NotesTop: Cashmeran, Black TeaHeart: Leather Accord, Tobacco LeavesBase: Birch Tree, Oakmoss

title: Byredo, Tobacco Mandarin Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: In this evocation of contrasts and intrigue, raw noble ingredients stay true:
top: A sparkling swathe of citrus and spice instantly transports through top notes of Mandarin, Coriander and Cumin;
middle: At heart, any flightiness is forgotten, where traditional and elegant, creamy Leather and Labdanum fix the fragrance, while a smoky cloak of narcotic Tobacco envelops all;
base: At base, further anchoring and compelling, are ancient resins and woods, both sacred and profane—Olibanum or Frankincense with its connotations of holy, aromatic sweetness, Oud and Sandalwood with their nuanced and captivating soothing woodiness.

title: BYREDO, VANILLE EXTRAIT DE PARFUM EDP 50ML U
description: Focusing the fragrance on perfumery’s rarest raw ingredients, Byredo Vanille Antique has the vanilla bean at its heart. In this fragrance, the sweet and smoky vanilla blends with an intriguing combination of cashmere wood, ciste and musk to create something that is both unexpected and irresistible.
top: Expertly made, the eau de parfum uses traditional techniques to distil pure essences. Just a small amount of the fragrance applied to the skin uses the body’s heat to radiate the richly nuanced aroma and allowing it to linger for many hours.
middle: Apply Byredo Vanille Antique to the pressure points to let the smoky aroma of this eau de parfum from the luxurious Night Veils range tantalise the senses.
base: Vanille Antique by Byredo features top notes of plum, musk followed by middle notes of Lightwoods, cistus and a base notes of Amber and Vanille.

title: Byredo, Velvet Haze Edp 100Ml U
description: Velvet Haze evokes the daze state attained in artificial paradises. The opulence of the scent embarks us in a psychedelic whirlpool. Along this exhilarating path, the sweetness of coconut water soon gives way to the feverish power of patchouli leaves. An experience of all senses that the velvety cacao and the wild musk enrich with their earthy envelope.
top: Notes
middle: Top: Ambrette, Coconut WaterHeart: Patchouli LeavesBase: Cocoa Absolu, Wild Musk

title: Calvin Klein, Ck One Edt 100Ml U
description: Ck one is a naturally clean, pure, and contemporary fragrance with a refreshingly new point of view. This light, relaxed scent is meant to be used lavishly. ck one Eau de Toilette can literally be splashed all over the body. It is an intimate fragrance, one that you need to be near to smell.
top: Top notes: bergamot, cardamom, pineapple, papaya
middle: Mid notes: jasmine, violet, rose, nutmeg
base: End notes: musk, amber

title: Calvin Klein, Ck One Edt 200Ml U
description: Ck one is a naturally clean, pure, and contemporary fragrance with a refreshingly new point of view. This light, relaxed scent is meant to be used lavishly. ck one Eau de Toilette can literally be splashed all over the body. It is an intimate fragrance, one that you need to be near to smell.
top: Top notes: bergamot, cardamom, pineapple, papaya
middle: Mid notes: jasmine, violet, rose, nutmeg

title: Calvin Klein, Ck One Shock For Her Edt 100Ml U
description: Spicy, aromatic and deeply oriental, the CK One Shock Eau De Toilette Spray for women was introduced by Calvin Klein in 1994. The interesting blends of floral and musk is loaded with a sensual appeal that is truly irresistible.
top: The top notes feature whiffs of Passion Flower, Pink Peony and Red Poppy. The middle notes of Blackberry, Mexican Chocolate, Narcissus and Jasmine diffuse a satiny smooth fragrance. The end notes contain notes of musk, Patchouli, Amber and Vanilla for a medley that is mysterious as well as fun.

title: CALVIN KLEIN, CK ONE SUMMER DAZE EDT 100ML U
description: Calvin Klein CK One Summer Daze cologne is a unisex eau de toilette that has an addictive aromatic and fruity scent profile. This fragrance draws inspiration from summer road trips and came out in 2022.
top: Scent Type:Green, tart, fresh, cool, aquatic, smooth, creamy, musky, woody, sweet
middle: Notes:CK One Summer Daze cologne opens with a fruity note of kumquat, which is both sweet and sour with an unexpected creamy undertone. The middle note of this fragrance is iced mint tea. The mint in this concoction is aromatic and bracing, and the iced tea element adds a brisk aquatic quality. Once the fragrance dries down, you get to enjoy the base notes of white musk and vetiver.

title: CALVIN KLEIN, EVERY ONE EDP 100ML U
description: CK EVERYONE Eau de Parfum is a gender-neutral scent. Bold, authentic. CK EVERYONE Eau de Parfum is a vegan, citrus, woody unisex perfume with rich freshness.
top: Infused with ingredients derived from natural origins, this citrus woody fragrance features the rich freshness of organic Mexican orange over a heart of black tea from Sri Lanka and a sensual woody base of responsibly sourced Haitian vetiver. The resulting scent is dynamic and lush, artistically blended.

title: CALVIN KLEIN, EVERY ONE EDT 100ML U
Calvin Klein, Every One Edt 200Ml U Gift Set
description: A clean, green, citrus fragrance, CK EVERYONE is a genderless scent for today that celebrates the infinite freedom of self-expression. The multifaceted scent is fresh and provocative. Building on the iconic legacy of CK ONE, this new scent is vegan, made from naturally-derived alcohol and infused with ingredients derived from natural origins, making this Calvin Klein’s first clean fragrance. Organic orange oil layers over a heart of blue tea accord and a musky base of cedarwood, creating a complex, uplifting scent. The glass bottle, which is recyclable once the pump is removed, features an elastic logo band, in homage to classic Calvin Klein Underwear, that can be worn and reused. Love every one of you in CK EVERYONE.
top: This set contains:
middle: CK EVERYONE 200ml eau de toilette spray
base: CK EVERYONE 100ml Body Lotion

title: Carner Barcelona, El Born Edp 100Ml U
description: The winding cobbled streets flow seamlessly into the old stones of the medieval times, witness of Barcelona’s history.

base: mid notesFig, Heliotrope, Benzoin from Laos, Egyptian Jasmine

title: Carner Barcelona, Felino Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: The lion; a symbol of power for the Catalan bourgeoisie. An opulent and memorable perfume.
top: top notesMorroccan absinth herb, Papyrus extract hazelnut, Vert de Bergamot

title: Carner Barcelona, Palo Santo Edp 100Ml U
description: For thousands of years, the sacred wood releases an aromatic essence that comes to life in a bewitching mix, impregnated with earthy notes of wood and incense. Coveted by shamans for centuries, it is believed that this spiritual wood has the power to protect and pave the way for good fortune. The warmth of the caramel, the sweetness of the tonka bean and the finesse of the vetiver merge in the intensity of the Palo Santo to create a fragrance that frees the spirits.
top: notes
middle: families : woody floral
base: head notes : davana, rum

title: CARNER BARCELONA, SUPER MOON EDP 100ML U
description: The moon, at its greatest splendor, brightens our short summer nights… nights of stories, conversations and laughs with priceless moments of silence and feelings of wonder when we stare up and admire the glowing super moon…
top: A fruity, enveloping fragrance that frees the wonders of the summer nights lit by the most fantastic moon.
middle: Top notes: Italian Yellow Mandarin, Cassis, Pomegranate
base: Heart notes: Lily of the Valley, Jasmine, White Amber

title: Carolina Herrera, Amethyst Haze Edp 100Ml U
description: Unleash your creativity with Amethyst Haze, a deep and intoxicating scent inspired by the precious amethyst stone. The newest addition to the Herrera Gems line, this fragrant tribute to amethysts evokes the ingenuity, imagination and dedication required to transform any idea into a jewel-like object of desire. Whether you are crafting an amethyst, a fragrance or any creative endeavour, Amethyst Haze will ignite your imagination with its hypnotic aroma and lustrous, deep purple hue.
top: Top notes are Cardamom and Pink Pepper.
middle: Middle notes are Lavender and Coffee.
base: Base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Cashmere Wood and Patchouli.

title: Carolina Herrera, Gold Myrrh  Absolute Edp 100Ml U
description: Gold Myrrh Absolute is a tribute to the exclusivity of myrrh and an invitation to experience the opulence of gold.
top: Precious myrrh is the protagonist of this powerful scent. The perfume’s deep character is revealed in its composition which opens with floral top notes of immortelle and a spicy touch of black pepper. The heart features gourmand notes of licorice and cacao, while at the base, vanilla and myrrh converge harmoniously.
middle: Top Notes: Immortelle
base: Heart Notes: Licorice & Cacao

title: Carolina Herrera, Sandal Ruby Edp 100Ml U
description: Inspired by the rich tradition of Middle Eastern perfumery the secret of this woody scent is Sandalwood, while the ardent rouge comes from the luxurious floral of Tuberose petals and rich spices. Sandal Ruby combines woody and floral tones to sculpt a passionate, magnetic fragrance.
top: Top Notes: Black Pepper & .
middle: Heart Notes: Geranium & Tuberose Petals.
base: Bottom Notes: Sandalwood, Patchouli & Atlas Cedarwood.

title: Caron, Tabac Noir Edp 100Ml U
description: Tabac Noir shows great generosity and unveils exceptional ingredients. A honey accord and tonka bean absolute underline the almost delicious roundness of the tobacco absolute. Cistus Labdanum highlights its naturally leathery inflections. A leather note, the same as the one used in Tabac Blond, further reinforces this depth. Within the scent, the oriental aromas of patchouli essence bring woody notes to the warmth of papyrus and the smokey effects of cedar wood. Luxurious, almost baroque, Tabac Noir leaves a wonderfully enveloping imprint on the skin. An invitation to the excitement of an evening in the East, Tabac Noir is a magnetic leathery fragrance that blends power with sensuality.

title: CARTIER, RIVIERES DE CARTIER ALLEGREESE EDT 100ML U
description: Beautiful and joyful, the river quivers with delight as a tuberose passes by. Leaf after leaf, petit-grain and bergamot, the river flourishes vivaciously, bathing in the radiant, fresh notes.

title: CARTIER, RIVIERES DE CARTIER INSOUCIANCE EDT 100ML U
description: Free and sweet, this gentle river sparkles in the reflection of the sun’s rays. Bouncing off blooming flowers, irises

title: Chanel, Beige Edt 75Ml U
description: Beige, a soothing shade, offering shelter from the chaos of the world. A colour with a natural sophistication that enhances those who wrap themselves in it. The floral and honeyed accord of BEIGE is in its image. A beautiful haven to get lost in and find your true self.
top: BEIGE is a voluptuous fragrance with an intense hawthorn-freesia-frangipani accord subtly enhanced with honeyed notes.

title: Chanel, Coromandel Edp 200Ml U
description: Mademoiselle Chanel knew how to capture styles and skilfully play with them, as evidenced by the precious COROMANDEL screens adorned with mysterious Asian flowers that lined the walls of her Parisian apartments.
top: The intensely ambery notes of COROMANDEL reflect this oriental enchantment. COROMANDEL is an exotic and fabulous enchantment. An intensely ambery oriental fragrance with notes of patchouli, frankincense and benzoin. A soft and voluptuous embrace.

title: Chanel, Coromandel Edp 75Ml U
description: Mademoiselle Chanel knew how to capture styles and skilfully play with them, as evidenced by the precious COROMANDEL screens adorned with mysterious Asian flowers that lined the walls of her Parisian apartments.
top: The intensely ambery notes of COROMANDEL reflect this oriental enchantment. COROMANDEL is an exotic and fabulous enchantment. An intensely ambery oriental fragrance with notes of patchouli, frankincense and benzoin. A soft and voluptuous embrace.

title: Chanel, Le Lion Edp 75Ml U
description: Le Lion de Chanel is described as a fragrance characterized by strength and charm, luxury and elegance, built around amber and leathery notes softened with vanilla and bergamot.
top: Top notes: bergamot, lemonHeart: labdanum, amberBase: vanilla, patchouli, sandalwood, musk
middle: Perfumer Olivier Polge did not dedicate this creation to the animal, but to the vision that CHANEL took over from it. “I was much more interested in the emblematic CHANEL lion than the animal,” says Perfumer-Creator for the House of CHANEL.

title: Chanel, No. 19 Edp 100ml W
description: A interpretation of Mademoiselle Chanel’s signature scent, N°19 POUDRÉ is an incredibly soft, musky and voluptuous composition.
top: composition
middle: The legendary Galbanum-Iris Pallida accord of N°19 is blended with smooth, soft White Musks and heightened by woody notes of Vetiver for a nuanced floral-powdery-green fragrance.

title: Chanel, Paris Edimbourg Edp 100Ml U
description: Chanel, Paris Edimbourg Edp 100Ml U

title: Chanel, Sycomore Edp 200Ml U
description: Named for a giant tree, SYCOMORE evokes the earthy nature of autumn. Composed around vetiver, it leaves behind a reassuring, slightly spicy fragrant touch.
top: SYCOMORE is composed around the smoky scent of vetiver. Its notes of cedar and vanilla leave behind a reassuring, slightly spicy fragrant touch.

title: Chanel, Sycomore Edp 75Ml U
description: Named for a giant tree, SYCOMORE evokes the earthy nature of autumn. Composed around vetiver, it leaves behind a reassuring, slightly spicy fragrant touch.
top: SYCOMORE is composed around the smoky scent of vetiver. Its notes of cedar and vanilla leave behind a reassuring, slightly spicy fragrant touch.

title: Clive Christian, Amberwood Edp 50Ml U
description: A warm amber, spiced with smoky blonde tobacco tells the story of Art Deco decadence. A riot of flourishing florals and dried fruits join the melee of fine ingredients creating an indulgent blend. Bold and flourishing this perfume is sweet, sensual and smoky with an aromatic twist that continues to dazzle long into the night. Inspired by the infamous paintings of Tamara de Lempicka, this perfume embodies angular and bold colours with a charming fluidity that runs throughout

title: Clive Christian, Amberwood Edp 50Ml U
description: A smooth and almost translucent amber brings to life a modern take on the amber style with a sophisticated nod to the past.
top: A vibrant and refreshing top from Calabrian bergamot, pink pepper, and angelica seed, which imparts both an aromatic note as well as musky soft green woods with just a hint of sweetness. Angelica is also a powerful fixative, ensuring the ingredients work better together and helping boost this sublime scent.
middle: A strand of sage runs from the heart to the base using three different extractions of this herb, sacred to the romans.
base: With fresh green tones this ingredient gives a sweet balsamic and yet aromatic touch for comforting freshness. Silvery sage is enhanced with rich and opulent woods and whispering musks.

title: CLIVE CHRISTIAN, CRAB APPLE BLOSSOM EDP 50ML U
description: This refreshing Citrus Aquatic Perfume captures the signature spring flower Apple Blossom and exotic Marine Bergamot in its top for a sparkling first impression. A fruity floral character is revealed in the heart offset against modern notes of sharp green rhubarb and a fresh mint and sugar accord, before settling into a base of creamy sandalwood and aquatically aromatic driftwood. A fresh, energising citrusy yet soft perfume exploring 151 ingredients and a potent concentration of 25% for a lasting scent that trails on the skin like blossoming branches in the spring sunshine.
top: Top notes are Sea Notes, Bergamot and Apple Blossom;
middle: Middle notes are Mojito and Rhubarb;
base: Base notes are Sandalwood and Driftwood.

title: Clive Christian, Jump Up And Kiss Me Edp 50Ml U
description: The Addictive Arts Collection is pure perfume hedonism, inviting you to step deeper into a secret underworld of hedonistic decadence with perfumes that explore our most indulgent emotions, inspired by the words of British literary greats. With bottles of cobalt blue symbolic of poison in the Victorian era, these perfumes have 25% perfume concentration and are our boldest and most complex perfume offering.

title: Clive Christian, No.1  Edp 50ml M
description: Clive Christian’s magnum opus. Rare and exotic flora are rendered timeless in this sparkling homage to the finest ingredients in perfumery. Truly worth of the name No1. A floral amber with fruity top notes of mirabelle plum, white peach and bergamot slowly and sensually unravelling to reveal jasmine, carnation and rose. A precious base of musks and Madagascan vanilla finish this divine perfume.

title: Comme Des Garcons, 2 Edp 100Ml U
description: Comme des Garçons 2 plays with complements and contrasts… with reflection and opacity… with mirrors and brilliance… with light and shadow… with earth and the energy of the sun.
top: Rei Kawakubo constructs a perfume with a powerful presence precisely because of its simplicity. Powerful and intense yet pleasing to the senses in a subtle, somewhat naïve way. Comme Des Garcons 2 is presented in a striking silver reflecting canister and evokes an exotic mix of incense, ink, amber, patchoulli, Chinese cedarwood, cumin, vertiver and fresh magnolia.
middle: Notes: ink, incense, amber, labdanum, patchouli, chinese, cedarwood, new aldehydes, cumin, angelica root, vetiver, cade oil, absolute maté, magnolia, absolute folia

title: Comme Des Garcons, Amazingreen Edp 100Ml U
description: Amazing Green is an evocation of the lush exuberance of nature, a fusion of green notes and gunpowder. The perfume has top notes of verdant, natural wild leaves, settle with an elemental heart of flint and coriander to finish with a smoky explosion of gunpowder and white musk.
top: Head Notes – Palm Tree Leaves, Green Pepper, Dew Mist, Jungle Leaves.
middle: Heart Notes – Ivy Leaves, Orris Roots, Coriander Seeds, Silex.
base: Base Notes – Gunpowder Accord, Vetiver, Smoke, White Musk.

title: COMME DES GARCONS, FLORIENTAL EDP 100ML U
description: Floriental is a disrupted floral fragrance that challenges the traditions of perfumery to reimagine a flower that has no scent.A creative collision that blurs the lines between the floral and the oriental to create something completely new.An odourless flower is given life, a virtual scent imagined: enigmatic, contrasted, intense.
top: Labdanum, lavish sandalwood, vetiver, incense, pink pepper and plum liqueur.

title: CREED, CENTAURUS EDP 100ML U
description: It harnesses the unbridled magnitude and intense radiance of the brightest of stars with its fiery debut of smoky tobacco, pink pepper, spicy cinnamon and cardamom. Sumptuous sandalwood and sweet jasmine intertwine before yielding to the voluptuous depths of velvety Bourbon vanilla, which leaves an enduring impression of warmth that is out of this world.
top: Fragrance notes:
middle: Top Notes: Cardamom, Cinnamon, Tobacco, Pink Pepper
base: Heart Notes: Geranium, Sandalwood, Heliotrope, Jasmine, Patchouli

title: CREED, DELPHINUS EDP 100ML U
description: A universal woody amber fragrance from The House of Creed, Delphinus shines bright, capturing a captivating constellation that lights up the cosmic sky.
top: Swirls of resinous incense intertwine with luminous black pepper and pink pepper, painting a mystical, smoky scene. Meanwhile, sweet almond, orchid and heliotrope illuminate the senses together with precious, powdery orris that beams like stardust. Profound patchouli combines with the enveloping warmth of tonka bean and dark, leathery Bourbon vanilla, leaving a golden glow reminiscent of distant stars.
middle: Fragrance notes:
base: Top notes: Black Pepper, Incense, Almond, Pink Pepper

title: Creed, Green Irish Tweed Edp 100Ml M
description: A classic, as the old saying goes, never goes out of style. Like a perfectly tailored suit, Green Irish Tweed has been and continues to be worn by bold, assertive men. The fragrance elegantly blends woody freshness with pure masculinity, ideal for a walk through the Irish countryside as well as a run down the red carpet. One of Creed’s greatest olfactory masterpieces, wearing it is an unforgettable memory.
top: Head notes : artemisia, bergamot, galbanum, ginger, lavender, lemon, lemon verbena, orange blossom, peppermint.
middle: Heart notes : freesia, geranium, orris, violet leaf.
base: Base notes : amber, coumarin, musk, patchouli, sandalwood.

title: CREED, JARDIN D’AMALFI EDP 75ML U
description: Fresh, stylish and effortlessly balanced, Millésime Imperial is brimming with light, citrus notes of bergamot, mandarin and lemon. A hearty marine accord reveals an aquatic twist to the zesty top notes, which gives way to a richer and subtly masculine base of sandalwood, amber and musk.
top: This refined and sophisticated blend of ingredients lends itself well to not only a unisex fragrance, but also to a discreet and timeless classic – not too overbearing for the daytime, but equally warm enough to see you through to the evening.
middle: The elegant scent is beautifully housed in an enchanting gold bottle for the ultimate luxury experience.

title: Creed, Millesime Imperial  Edp 100Ml U
description: Fresh, stylish and effortlessly balanced, Millésime Imperial is brimming with light, citrus notes of bergamot, mandarin and lemon. A hearty marine accord reveals an aquatic twist to the zesty top notes, which gives way to a richer and subtly masculine base of sandalwood, amber and musk.
top: This refined and sophisticated blend of ingredients lends itself well to not only a unisex fragrance, but also to a discreet and timeless classic – not too overbearing for the daytime, but equally warm enough to see you through to the evening.
middle: The elegant scent is beautifully housed in an enchanting gold bottle for the ultimate luxury experience.

title: Creed, Neroli Sauvage Edp 100Ml U
description: Infuse your day with a splash of citrus topped with a bitter kick when adding Neroli Sauvage Creed to your fragrance collection.
top: This signature scent, launched in 1994 by the Creed Design House, boasts a blend of sweet and green notes ideal for both men and women.
middle: Indulge in this rich fragrance that opens with bitter grapefruit notes balanced by calming bergamot. Blended perfectly with neroli and lemon verena notes, this light and airy scent finishes with a strong base of ambergris.

title: Creed, Original Santal Edp 100Ml U
description: India’s royal and spiritual splendor meet in Original Santal. Looking to Asia for inspiration, Olivier and Erwin combine Mysore sandalwood, fiery cinnamon, warm vanilla, and Tonka bean. A robust scent fit for both formal and casual occasions, Original Santal is destined to captivate a room. Prepare yourself for compliments.
top: TOP NOTESSicilian Lemon, Orange tree absolute, Jamaican ginger
middle: MIDDLE NOTESPinkberries, Lavendar, Peppermint, Rosemary
base: BASE NOTESVanilla, Mysore Sandalwood, Virginia cedar, Siam benzoin, Ambergris, Tonkin Musk

title: Creed, Original Vetiver Edp 100Ml U
description: True to its name, Original Vetiver dramatically reinvents the traditional vetiver scent. Before Original Vetiver, only one part of the vetiver plant was used in a fragrance. The House of Creed infuses all three parts of the plant—the earthy root, the verdant leaves and the rich heart—to freshen the blend. The result is a scent reminiscent of lingering summers, invigorating and vivacious. It leaves an alluring air of freshness around any lucky enough to wear it.
top: Style: Green, fresh.
middle: Notes:
base: – Top: bergamot, bitter orange, mandarin, vetiver leaves.

title: Creed, Royal Oud Edp 100Ml U
description: Rich and woody, Royal Oud’s opulence makes this fragrance well suited to both ladies and gentlemen of spiritual nature and assured elegance. Oud, frankincense and guaiac wood combine to form the base notes of this majestic Eau de Parfum, whilst top notes of lime, galbanum and bergamot form a fresh and citrus twist to this classic and sophisticated scent.
top: Notes:
middle: – Top: lemon, pinkberries, bergamot.
base: – Middle: cedar, galbanum, angelica root.

title: Creed, Royal Princess Oud Edp 100Ml U
description: Celebrating Creed’s female sartorial history, Royal Princess Oud is a captivating floral fragrance sublimated by rose, sweet violet and Sicilian bergamot, giving way to warm notes of vanilla and iris. Signature notes of oud and benzoin deliver a sensual and woody dry down to this classic feminine Eau de Parfum.
top: Top NotesBergamot Grapefruit, Pink Pepper, Blackcurrant, Pineapple, Raspberry & Aldehydes
middle: Heart NotesIris, Orris Butter, Jasmine & Rose
base: Base NotesOud Vanilla, Cedarwood, Solar Notes, Musk & Patchouli

title: Creed, Silver Mountain Water Edp 100Ml U
description: The adventurous Silver Mountain Water evokes sparkling streams coursing through the snow-capped Swiss Alps, a bracing landscape in which Olivier Creed, a championship skier, finds relaxation and renewal. A bestseller since its launch, this modern marine/green scent captures the purity of the mountains-soft, milky-sweet blackcurrants mixed with green tea, the richness of bergamot, and sandalwood. Its opaque white bottle hints at icy snowbanks topped with a glistening cap.

title: Creed, White Amber Edp 100Ml U
description: White Amber, Les Royales Exclusives’ latest jewel is a fruity-floral scent featuring a bouquet of fruit, jasmine, and benzoin combined with rich amber and Indian sandalwood. White Amber pays homage to golden amber, a precious resinous ingredient long used in jewelry and perfumery. Amber has historically been one of the world’s most highly-prized treasures known for its beauty as well as its healing and life force energies. Crafted from handpicked ingredients by Olivier Creed, White Amber marks the sixth fragrance in Les Royales Exclusives Collection.

title: Dior, Balade Sauvage Edp 125Ml U
description: Balade Sauvage is the fragrance that immediately calls to mind an escape to a cliff top lined with fig trees. The discovery of a pristine nature.
top: The trail of the Balade Sauvage fragrance is a mix of raw and natural emotions. A creation with a strong Mediterranean character.
middle: Citrus and woody notes resonate with the tangy vivacity of citrus fruit.
base: Top notes are Ozonic notes, Petitgrain and Bergamot.

title: Dior, Collection Privee 7.5Ml Travel Tubes U
description: Dior, Collection Privee 7.5Ml Travel Tubes U

title: Dior, Dioriviera Edp 125Ml U
description: This eau de parfum composed by Francis Kurkdjian combines two concepts in one name: the south of France, his source of inspiration, and Paris, the city where Dioriviera was created. A fragrance that conveys the love story between Christian Dior and the French Riviera, and draws inspiration from its solar beauty.
top: CHARACTERCreated as a getaway, festive and hedonistic fragrance, Dioriviera incarnates a solar state of mind and an epicurean art of living.
middle: DISTINCTIVE FEATUREWhile its olfactory notes effortlessly evoke a summer atmosphere, Dioriviera is a bright and exhilarating, joyful and festive fragrance that can be worn year round. It is a scent you make your own and rediscover throughout the day.
base: COLOURA soft green with a shimmer of honeyed hues.

title: Dior, Feve Delicieuse Edp 125Ml U
description: Feve Delicieuse
top: The perfume was created by in-house perfumer François Demachy as a sophisticated oriental – gourmand harmony. Tonka bean smells like a mixture between caramel, almonds and cut hay, milky sweet, but also bitter. The composition includes notes of tonka bean, vanilla, caramel, cocoa, pralines and woody accords.

title: Dior, Gris Edp 125Ml U
description: Gris Dior is a signature fragrance that is closely tied to the history of Dior Couture. The fragrance is the olfactory expression of the Dior gray, the now-iconic color Christian Dior loved to celebrate. It symbolizes the couture gray, the sentimental gray reminiscent of the couturier’s family home in Granville, Normandy, and the pearl gray of the storefront on Avenue Montaigne.
top: Multi-faceted, Gris Dior is a subtle and elegant olfactory signature. An elegant fragrance that uninhibitedly combines heritage with a modern twist.
middle: Like the color gray, the fragrance Gris Dior cannot be broken down into component parts. It is an indivisible mix, the seamless embodiment of a chypre.
base: Gray is such an evocative color for François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, he proclaims that “Chypre is the gray of the perfume family.”

title: Dior, Jasmin Des Anges Edp 125Ml U
description: NAMEThe fragrance Jasmin des Anges is like a stroll through the fields of jasmine in Grasse, where the scent of the flower fills the air. This fragrance is rooted in the south of France and echoes the name of the legendary Baie des Anges in Nice.
top: CHARACTERA concentrate of indulgence and spontaneity, a few drops of the fragrance are enough to prolong the pleasures of summer. A delicious Jasmine with Apricot aromas, Jasmin des Anges is a true Proustian madeleine.
middle: DISTINCTIVE FEATUREA reinterpretation of jasmine, the fragrance Jasmin des Anges reveals a sweet and syrupy Jasmine, far from its animal-like facets.
base: COLOURThe pure, celestial white of the delicate jasmine petals is cloaked in a delightful orangey yellow similar to an apricot liqueur.

title: Dior, La Colle Noire Edp 125Ml U
description: La Colle Noire is the name of the estate Christian Dior purchased in 1951, which became his floral paradise: a true haven of peace. Ode to the May Rose that pervades the grounds, the fragrance La Colle Noire was composed like an olfactory portrait of a place and its legendary flower.
top: CHARACTERLa Colle Noire fragrance paints the spicy portrait of a May Rose with a strong character. The olfactory composition is orchestrated around the beauty and vehemence of this sensual, honeyed flower.
middle: DISTINCTIVE FEATUREThe rosy, peppery scent wafting in the air during the harvest.
base: COLOURThe flower’s vivid pink hue, whose nuances vary according to the angle of the sunlight in the fields of Grasse and the flower garden of the Château de La Colle Noire.

title: Dior, Oud Ispahan Edp 125Ml U
description: Dior, Every single Dior product is a trademark blend of heritage and expertise, an honest reflection of the brands rich legacy. Oud Ispahan Eau De Parfum is no exception. Featuring a fascinating oriental fragrance, this perfume complements you on any occasion, be it formal or casual. The intense notes comprising of powerful labdanum absolute, wraps you in a wreath of natural oriental fragrance. Also, it gradually evolves and forms a gentle veil around your skin that lasts for a longer time.

title: DIOR, ROSEWOOD EDP 125ML U
DIOR, VANILLA DIORAMA EDP 125ML U
Dior, Vanilla Diorama Edp 125Ml U
description: The Vanilla Diorama fragrance pays homage to the Diorama Gourmand, one of Christian Dior’s favourite desserts. Created especially for the couturier by the famous Parisian restaurant Maxim’s, there are no pictures or detailed descriptions of this mysterious pastry. The Vanilla Diorama fragrance derives its name from this intriguing sweet creation.
top: Warm, round and opulent, the Vanilla Diorama fragrance evokes the nobleness of Vanilla from Madagascar. It is a portrait of the perfect Vanilla. Its warm, intense trail with accents of Rum and Patchouli is contrasted by fresh citrusy notes and accentuated by a denser Cocoa note.
middle: The rare and prized Vanilla is one of the most precious ingredients of high perfumery.
