Chosen with precision and rigour for its strength and noble quality coloured with woody and ambery tones, Bourbon Vanilla from Madagascar is at the heart of François Demachy’s creation. A coveted treasure, it is sculpted for the Vanilla Diorama fragrance like a precious gem by the Dior Perfumer-Creator.
base: Vanilla Diorama is golden with amber tones, as warm and precious as Vanilla from Madagascar.

title: Diptyque, Capitale Edp 75Ml U
description: For diptyque, only chypre, a legendary accord with a thousand facets, could pay worthy tribute to the city of a thousand faces. A bouquet of roses verging on excess follows fresh bergamot spiced with pink peppercorns. Freedom claimed: this time not moss, but patchouli. An Eiffel Tower, roses, flowing calligraphy, a peacock with its tail fanned, volutes, lines intertwined… To illustrate Eau Capitale, diptyque and Pierre Marie drew their inspiration from Parisian architecture and iconic Art Nouveau buildings.
top: Top: rose.
middle: Middle: bergamot.
base: Base: patchouli.

title: Diptyque, Discovery Mini Set U
description: L’ART DU PARFUM
top: A discovery set of five diptyque fragrances that invite your mind and senses to explore five olfactory landscapes.
middle: Set includes:
base: – Do Son 7.5 ml. A fragrance with the sensual scent of tuberoses sprinkled in water that was used as offerings at temples.

title: Diptyque, Eau Dualle Edp 75Ml U
description: An ode to travel and vanilla. Along the spice route, the vanilla at the heart of Eau Duelle takes on new aromas: luminous, addictive accents of calamus and dark, smoky nuances of cypriol. Travelling through time and over borders, Bourbon vanilla from Madagascar reveals itself between darkness and light.
top: Notes:
middle: – Top: pink peppercorn, juniper berry, green cardamom, elemi.
base: – Middle: frankincense, calamus, black ceylon tea.

title: DIPTYQUE, EAU NABATI EDP 75ML U
description: In the vast desert emerges a miniature seemingly painted amid the dunes – an oasis untouched by time. As a visitor approaches, doors open onto a paradise garden, where an imaginary stroll begins. Behind high stone walls, exuberant blooms follow pools of clear water set out along symmetrical paths. In the shade of palms and cedars, the warm, spicy wind disperses vivid citrusy notes. These astonishing contrasts are at the heart of the composition of Eau Nabati. Between the sparkling freshness of bergamot and the green notes of petitgrain, surrounded by the enveloping amber warmth of immortelle and balsam of Peru: a harmony of opposites.
top: Notes: Bergamot, Petitgrain, Immortelle, Balm of Peru.

title: Diptyque, Fleur De Peau Edp 75Ml U
description: In ancient Greece, one myth stood out as the most passionate and sensual—the love between Psyche and Eros, the beauty’s quest to meet with her lover and the happy outcome of their union which led to the birth of their daughter, Hedone. Only one scent can convey this legend as a fragrance, that of musks. Equally legendary, they have the unique ability to enhance the skin with their arousing carnal accents. They are at the very heart of Fleur de Peau, as cottony and light as they are soft and moist. Highlighted with elegantly powdery iris and fruity, ambery ambrette seeds, they reveal their full tactile dimension. Absolute ambrette seed extract comes from hibiscus flowers. Its notes are extraordinarily rich: sweet, slightly animal and fruity, like pear and plum.
top: Notes: musk, iris, ambrette, pink peppercorns.

title: DIPTYQUE, PHILOSYKOS EDP 75ML U
description: Fresh perspectives on the fig tree. In Philosykos eau de parfum, the flavour of the fruit cedes centre stage, and white cedar underscores the woody strength of the tree and its bark.
top: A fragrance that carries the scent of a memory: crossing a grove of wild fig trees during a summer in Greece.
middle: Top notes are Fig Leaf and Fig;
base: Middle notes are Green Notes and Coconut;

title: DIPTYQUE,TAM DAO EDP 75ML U
description: A memory of the holy forests of Indochina. In this eau de parfum, Asian spices highlight the sandalwood and its creamy nuances.
top: Tam Dao immerses us in the childhood of Yves Coueslant, one of the founders of the Maison Diptyque. A trip through space and time.
middle: Notes: Sandalwood, Cedar, Cypress, Coriander

title: Dolce & Gabbana, The One Gold Intense Edp 100Ml M
description: Introducing The One For Men Gold – the showstopping masculine fragrance from Dolce & Gabbana.
top: Drawing on the legacy of The One line, this sophisticated woody, spicy, citrus Eau de Parfum Intense embodies radiant luminosity and charisma. The fragrance celebrates a man who has a natural but unmistakable magnetism. A true gentleman, he exudes confidence with his innate elegance and unique style.
middle: An invigorating fusion of juicy Italian bergamot and zesty bloody orange opens the fragrance, with red ginger adding a warm spiciness to the citrus top notes. The vibrant energy of these sparkling citruses evolves to a powerfully masculine heart of aromatic clary sage and crisp Egyptian geranium essence, enlivened by spicy notes of cardamom. Mysterious patchouli gives the perfume an intensely alluring base, its richness and subtle smokiness balanced by earthy Haitian vetiver and woody ambery notes. The One For Men Gold is as powerfully alluring as the man who wears it.
base: The Bottle: The signature bottle is now reinvented in gleaming gold. Symbolic of luxury and refinement, the metallic gold lacquer catches the light with its lustrous shine, reflecting the luminous allure of The One For Men Gold.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Velvet Desert Oud Edp 150Ml U
description: The mystical conquest of the desert.The hidden treasures of the Middle East, the convoys and essences dispersed by burners.The picture painted is one of adventure and mystery, told by the smoky wood notes.“Nothing is more exciting than the chase”, says Domenico Dolce.Dolce&Gabbana Velvet Desert Oud floods the senses, permeating so quickly andso powerfully that the chase ultimately becomes an unconditional and comforting conquest.
top: NOTES
middle: Warm, smoky, enveloping.The warmth of the dark woods.Ambery notes.A touch of musk, as light as a veil.The incense with its tonalities of chypre like the oud nuances.

title: Dolce & Gabbana, Velvet Desert Oud Edp 50Ml U
description: The mystical conquest of the desert.The hidden treasures of the Middle East, the convoys and essences dispersed by burners.The picture painted is one of adventure and mystery, told by the smoky wood notes.“Nothing is more exciting than the chase”, says Domenico Dolce.Dolce&Gabbana Velvet Desert Oud floods the senses, permeating so quickly andso powerfully that the chase ultimately becomes an unconditional and comforting conquest.
top: NOTES
middle: Warm, smoky, enveloping.The warmth of the dark woods.Ambery notes.A touch of musk, as light as a veil.The incense with its tonalities of chypre like the oud nuances.

title: Electimuss Auster, Pure Parfum 100Ml U
description: Spicy fruity floral with earthy WOODY BASE
top: Late summer Mediterranean lemon groves and sweet geraniums lightly laced with star anise and cloves, transform into stormy skies with a fresh earthy base of patchouli, ambergris and cedar and a slightly leathery undertone.
middle: This spicy and fruity floral is a complex blend of light and dark, opening with bright aromatic spices and citrus, a hint of floral and unfolds into a slightly sultry base.
base: INSPIRATION

title: Electimuss, Trajan Pure Parfum 100Ml U
description: Electimuss, Trajan Pure Parfum 100Ml U

title: ELECTIMUSS,PERSPHONE’S PATCHOULI PARFUM 100ML U
description: Persephone was beautiful both inside and out, and her sweet nature and pure soul were adored by gods, goddesses and humankind. Associated with flowers, the harvest, fruit, grain and the bounty of nature, Persephone’s story became a way of understanding the changing of the seasons. Trapped in the underworld for six months of the year, because she had been tricked into eating pomegranate seeds, Persephone returned to the surface with the return of the warmer months, only to be forced to venture underground when the seasons changed again.
top: This perfume was created with Patchouli of the Underworld as a pair. Two perfumers explored the central note of patchouli through their own unique viewpoints whilst using the story of Pluto and Persephone as the inspiration.
middle: Top – Guatemalan cardamom, plum, six pomegranate seeds
base: Heart – Patchouli, Egyptian jasmine, Bulgarian rose

title: Escentric Molecules, Escentric 01 Edt 100Ml U
description: Wrap yourself in the radiant Winsor Violet of Escentric 01, the colour of star-stained dusk, the colour of touch.
top: Iso E Super is a molecule that hovers close to the skin to create an indefinable aura around the wearer.
middle: Escentric 01 focuses on Iso E Super at 65% of the fragrance compound in an abbreviated formula designed to maximise the molecule’s efflorescence. It contains lime peel, hedione (green jasmine bud), orris, balsamic notes, and fresh musk.

title: Escentric Molecules, Molecule 01 + Mandarin Edt 100Ml U
description: Molecule 01 + Mandarin consists of Iso E Super + Mandarin.
top: Iso E Super is an abstract synthetic molecule characterised as a cedarwood note with a warm, velvety cocooning sensation.
middle: Mandarin is a natural extracted from the mandarin orange.
base: Geza Schoen: “Mandarin is all about the instant hit. It’s so alive, the way it radiates off the skin with that citrus zestiness. But there’s more to mandarin; it’s very fruity and aromatic as well. It’s a beautiful ingredient. Its transparency means that it vanishes quickly. I’ve touched it up with a little extra shading to extend it, adding a mandarin ingredient used in flavourings to give it super-juiciness. Then as it begins to fade, Molecule 01 syncs in, bringing a warm, erogenous feeling to play with that zinging freshness. That’s unusual – for a topnote ingredient like Mandarin and a base note like Iso E Super to dance together naked like this, without other notes coming between them. And then the mandarin is almost gone, and you are left with the elevated simplicity of Molecule 01.

title: Escentric Molecules, Molecule 01 Edt 100Ml U
description: Molecule 01 consists of the molecule Iso E Super pure and singular.
top: Iso E Super is a molecule that hovers close to the skin to create an indefinable aura round the wearer.
middle: It is characterised by a hyper-modern cedarwood note with a velvety sensation. Perfumer Geza Schoen explains its allure: “Iso E Super is one of those skin-sexy scents that makes you want to nestle into it. It’s comforting, cocooning.”
base: Iso E Super has a marked intermittence. To the wearer, it seems to vanish and then re-appear. This is due to the way it bonds with receptors in the olfactory system, only slowly releasing to make way for a fresh charge of the molecule on the receptors.

title: ESCENTRIC MOLECULES, MOLECULE 03 EDP 100ML U
Escentric Molecules, Molecule 04 Edt 100Ml U
description: Enter the synaesthetic palette of Escentric 04, robed in diluted magenta and flushed with salacious grapefruit.
top: Javanol is a sandalwood-type molecule that retains the radiance and endurance of natural sandalwood but is sheer and transparent like no sandalwood in nature.
middle: Escentric 04 focuses on Javanol in a formula that highlights the grapefruit accent in the molecule. The result is a uniquely fresh interpretation of a sandalwood fragrance, fizzing with crisp, bitter topnotes of pink grapefruit peel with the added zest of lime. Juniper and pink pepper give an extra shot of freshness, and marijuana brings out the softer quality of the grapefruit pith.
base: The heart is orris with a ‘fresh soft rose’ composed of four different rose ingredients. The drydown is balsamic and woody with Javanol in combination with the somewhat sweeter sandalwood molecule, Polysantol.

title: ESSENTIAL PARFUMS, BOIS IMPERIAL EDP 100ML U
description: Freshly crushed and spicy Thai Basil leaves meet the sparkling peppery and grapefruit facets of Nepalese Timut Pepper absolute. A brilliant combination that contrasts perfectly with the bold woody signature of the fragrance.
top: A green, rich and earthy Haitian Vetiver oil echoes with Georgywood – an exclusive molecule with powerful cedarwood tones.
middle: This vibrating woody association is illuminated by the sophisticated floralcy of Petalia.Majestic Akigalawood truly signs the fragrance. This exclusive natural ingredient is upcycled from Patchouli through a biotechnology process.
base: Its unique spicy-woody character is enhanced by a rich Indonesian Patchouli oil and a powerful, sustainable note of Ambrofix.

title: ESSENTIAL PARFUMS, DISCOVERY SET 9*2ML U
description: Discover the creative, modern, surprisingly refined world of Essential Parfums with this specially priced discovery set featuring generous 2ml spray samples of the entire line:
top: Patchouli ManiaFig InfusionOrange x SantalThe MuskNice BergamoteMon VetiverRose MagneticDivine VanilleBois Imperial

title: Essential Parfums, Divine Vanille Edp 100Ml U
description: Divine Vanille, is a tribute to Vanilla absolute, sustainably produced of Madagascar.
top: Mysterious, suave, deep, carnal … simply irresistible. Natural Tonka Bean and benzoin enhance the soft, balmy and addictive facets of Vanilla. A blend of natural Cinnamon bark and sensual leathery tones of natural Osmanthus reveal rich facets of blond Tobacco and dried fruits. An innovative fraction of natural Cedarwood and Patchouli brings a creamy woody structure highlighted with silky musks, wrapping the fragrance with a delicate luminous veil.

title: Essential Parfums, Fig Infusion Edp 100Ml U
description: Essential Parfums, Fig Infusion Edp 100Ml U

title: Estee Lauder, Dream Dusk Edp 100Ml U
description: Walk through a garden in full bloom as flurries of Spring blossoms scent the air, illuminate the sky and exhilarate your senses. A dream without end that leads you into the beauty of dusk.
top: This fragrance has an uplifting, cheerful feeling.
middle: THE FRAGRANCE FAMILY
base: Dream Dusk is an uplifting Floral Marine fragrance. It is the lightest floral in the Collection and belongs to our Floral fragrance family.

title: ETAT LIBRE, D’ORANGE RIENE INTENSE INCENSE EDP 100ML U
Ex Nihilo, Fleur Narcotique Edp 100Ml U
description: Our interpretation of the new Rive Droite woman, sophisticated and seductive.
top: An overdose of substantive ingredients for an explosion of subtle but affirmed scents. The trail of a sensual peony wrapped in woods.
middle: A falsely candid flower, airy, fatal.
base: OLFACTORY NOTESTopBergamot, Lychee, Peach

title: EX NIHILO, FLEUR NARCOTIQUE EDP 7.5ML U TRAVEL SET
description: Fleur Narcotique Travel Set, an olfactory experience of sophistication
top: Ex Nihilo, in its constant search to offer the best in high-quality perfumes, presents the exclusive Fleur Narcotique Travel Set, designed for lovers of sophisticated aromas who want to carry with them a complete olfactory experience. This set includes five bottles of the Fleur Narcotique fragrance, each with approximately 100 sprays, guaranteeing exquisite delicacy in each application.
middle: The Fleur Narcotique fragrance opens with a feast of fruits, where bergamot, peach and red lychee awaken the senses with their freshness. This fruity bouquet merges with a lush floral mix of jasmine, peony and orange blossom, creating a seductive harmony that envelops you with its sweetness. The woody base of transparent wood and moss, sweetened with musk, adds depth and sophistication to the composition.
base: The white cylindrical jars, adorned with smooth gold lids, are the epitome of elegance and simplicity. This exquisite presentation is completed with a luxurious Black & White box, which enhances the exclusivity and distinction of the set.

title: EX NIHILO, FLEUR OUTCAST BLUE EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
Fragrance Du Bois, New York 5Th Avenue Edp 100Ml U
description: Fragrance Du Bois, New York 5Th Avenue Edp 100Ml U

title: Fragrance Du Bois, New York Intense Edp 100Ml U
description: Fragrance Du Bois, New York Intense Edp 100Ml U

title: Francesca Bianchi, Angel’S Dust Edp 100Ml U
description: In a dusty boudoir of bygone times, a mistress is putting on lipstick, while waiting for her lover to arrive.Face powder is floating in the air, mixed with the smell of roses and the woody effusion of the boiserie. The innocence of powdery musks blends with the decadence of sensual balsamic notes.
top: Notes: black pepper, mimosa, rose, iris, musk, sandalwood, tolu balsam, benjoin, vanilla.

title: Francesca Bianchi, Sex And The Sea Edp 30Ml U
description: SEX AND THE SEA
top: Accords: Oriental, powdery, fruity, animalic
middle: Mood: outrageously seductive, original, naughty
base: This perfume represents the memory of a sensual encounter at the seaside. Far from being a fresh-ozonic, harmless perfume, it is a passionate and wild concoction of overheated skin, coconut sun lotion, saltiness of the sea and the sand, suggesting the atmosphere of a voluptuous rendez-vous behind the dunes.

title: Franck Olivier, Oud Vanille Edp 100Ml U
description: Delight your senses with Oud Vanille a tempting and syrupy fragrance for men and women. Launched in 2017 by the house of Franck Olivier, this fragrance stimulates a freshness that lasts.
top: At the top of this enchanting fragrance are notes from Raspberry, Caramel and Orange. The fragrance then moves to a refreshing middle with flowery notes from Jasmine, Violet and Rose merged with Patchouli and Incense. The composition comes to a dramatic dry down with notes from Musk, Spices, Vanilla and woody notes for a trail that is as refreshing as the start.

title: FRANCK OLIVIER, PURE ADDICTION EDP 100ML U
description: Pure Addiction by Franck Olivier is an Amber Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pure Addiction was launched in 2021. Top note is Orange; middle notes are Saffron, Tagetes and Jasmine; base notes are Praline, White Amber, Moss and White Cedar Extract.
top: At first inspiration, a delicious juicy orange from Brazil brings freshness. Then emerge the floral and luminous facets of Tagète and Jasmine flowers enhanced by Saffron. In the base, white Amber, Moss, white Cedar and Praline reveal the sensuality of the fragrance in an instant.

title: Frederic Malle, Bigarade Concentree Edp 100Ml U
description: Luxurious in its apparent purity, like a crisp white shirt: minimal and transparent. Yet beneath, lies an undercurrent of mischief. A sense of warm skin tone and clear-cut sex appeal that unfolds as it lingers. For those who believe that seduction is found in cleanliness and perfection, here is a cologne designed to renew its wearer with every splash.
top: An overdose of extremely refined bitter orange essence (or “bigarade”, as they say in Provence), embellished with cardamom and pink pepper on a woody base of hay and cedar, heralds a new generation of “eaux”.
middle: An ocean of sophisticated freshness.
base: Perfume top notes: bitter orange (bigarade);

title: FREDERIC MALLE, EN PASSANT EDP 100ML U
Frederic Malle, Iris Poudree Edition Edp 100Ml U
description: In the enchanting realm of fragrances, Iris Poudre Eau de Parfum is a timeless classic that unfolds like a story of passion concealed beneath a glistening layer of ice. It is a perfume that, much like a woman in a perfectly tailored suit, holds its sensuous femininity in check, revealing it only to those who dare to look beyond the sober facade. The fragrance is a masterpiece that showcases the art of subtlety, where a concealed satin lining of iris, musk, and tonka bean forms the heart of its allure. This elegant core is delicately trimmed by the cool embrace of synthetic aldehydes, which add an aura of serene formality.
top: As this fragrance unfolds, it introduces a new dimension of crisp chic, led by the sophisticated presence of vetiver. Like a tailored suit that accentuates a woman’s grace, Iris Poudre is adorned with decorative notes of rose, violet, and ylang-ylang. These delicate floral nuances serve as a reminder to those who encounter it: there is a depth and complexity beneath the surface that beckons exploration. The perfume weaves a narrative of a woman who exudes confidence and allure without needing to shout it from the rooftops.
middle: Top notes: Rose, Violet, Ylang-Ylang.Heart notes: Iris.Base notes: Sandalwood, Musk, Tonka Bean.

title: Frederic Malle, Lipstick Rose Edp 100Ml W
description: Vintage Hollywood glamour.
top: A star’s moment of privacy at her dressing table with her lipstick, which she spreads carefully onto her lower lip: grapefruit and violet sparkle above sweet notes of rose, iris and raspberry on a sensuous bed of vanilla and white musk.
middle: Top notes: bergamot, galbanum, green notes, lemon, litchi, raspberry
base: Mid noted: clove, heliotrope, lilac, lily of the valley, rose, violet

title: FREDERIC MALLE, MUSIC FOR A WHILE RAVAGEUR EDP 100ML U
description: Allure irrésistible.
top: At a party on Paris’ rive gauche, a woman’s fur coat is lifted from her bare shoulders, exposing her neck to the candlelight. Aware of many eyes upon her, she pauses, smiling to herself, before emerging like a conqueror from the shadows. A sensuous body of lavender is warmed by patchouli, amber and vanilla, and transformed by notes of pineapple and mandarin.
middle: Perfume top notes: Lemon, Mandarin, Bergamot
base: Perfume middle note: Lavender

title: Frederic Malle, Noir Epices Edp 100Ml U
description: Depths of black.
top: Composed like a Rothko painting, where layer upon layer of somber notes form a deeper, more textured darkness. A thick coating of spices rests on a wooden base of sandalwood and patchouli; top notes of orange and geranium are subtly illumined by rose, which, like all masterful paintings, reveal that even darkness is made of light.
middle: Unafraid of the dark
base: Top notes: orange; geranium

title: Frederic Malle, Promise Edp 100Ml U
description: In the Middle East, a promise made between two people is accompanied by the strictest honor code. Frédéric Malle celebrates this principle with a promise of his own, whose beating heart is made of two precious varieties of rose: rose essence from Bulgaria and rose absolute from Turkey are lifted by apple, pink pepper and clove, and bound to a sensuous base of patchouli, cypriol and labdanum; an accord as unbreakable, and invisible, as a vow.
top: To trust and be trusted
middle: Top notes: Pink Pepper, Rosemary Oil, Apple Accord.
base: Middle notes: Bulgarian Rose Oil, Turkish Rose Absolute, Clove Oil.

title: Frederic Malle, Rose Tonnerre Parfum 100Ml U
description: Rose, Truffle, Wine Lees, Honey, Patchouli Frédéric Malle’s beloved classic, Rose Tonnerre is part of an exotic garden of exquisite rose scents at night: in the foreground, intoxicating, sparkling, sweet and fresh all at once, it reveals deep and warm facets. Dark and enigmatic, subtly gothic.
top: Within the context of this personal work, Édouard Fléchier showed Frédéric Malle a new base, a kind of olfactive sketch, reproducing the smell of a “Perigord’s truffle”. This assemblage of dark notes, for the most part woody and animal, was destined to masculine perfumery, but the two friends had the idea – a priori paradoxical- to marry it to the feminine scent par excellence: the rose. In the hands of the master perfumer, the classic rose aroma becomes dark and sensual.
middle: A garden flower with hidden depths.

title: Frederic Malle, The Essential Collection Edp 3.5Ml U
description: There are days one can not forget, a first encounter unlike any other.
top: This carefully considered collection features 6 perfumes that we are particularly proud of, presented in 3.5ml sprays.
middle: The beginning of a beautiful friendship, no doubt.
base: This selection includes 3.5ml sprays of the below perfumes for your discovery and enjoyment:

title: FREDRIC MALLE, MONSIEUR EDP 100ML U
GIARDINI DI TOSCANA, EUTOPIE DISCOVERY 13*2ML U
Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive 5Pcs Mini Set U
description: Discover Les Eaux Armani/Privé 5-piece miniature fragrance set. A luxurious wardrobe of bold, fresh and vibrant fragrances to begin a journey of rare and unique scents discoveries.
top: The Fragrance Set Contains:
middle: Pivoine Suzhou, a blooming yet delicate peony fragrance echoing the harmony of Suzhou gardens in China.
base: Rose Milano, a delicate Damascena rose emboldened fragrance with matching earthy notes of Chypre, the embodiment of Milanese elegance.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Bleu Lazuli Edp 100Ml U
description: Fascinated by Indian spirituality and mysticism, Giorgio Armani has decided to dedicate the latest creations of La Collection des Terres Précieuses to India. Bleu Turquoise and Bleu Lazuli capture the soul of this country, as the designer sees it, in an exclusive duo of unisex fragrances. The inspiration comes from both the mythical vision of India and its reality. The two unisex fragrances, Bleu Turquoise and Bleu Lazuli, particularly evoke the country’s deep spiritual bond with blue: the color of strength and power, but also of the universe – water and infinite horizons.
top: The perfume is represented by two diamonds and precious stones originating from these lands: turquoise, symbol of the fusion between the sea and the sky, and lapis lazuli, evocation of the infinite spirit of the universe. Lapis lazuli is the universal emblem of wisdom and truth: blue like the sky, it is linked to the principles of loyalty and honor, divinity and power, spirituality and foresight.
middle: Authentic journey into the universe of perfumes, Bleu Lazuli – transcends borders to infuse Italy, the heart of Giorgio Armani’s creativity, with the spirit of India. Among the dominant notes stand out the scents of incense and Indian spice markets, expression of a tradition that combines spiritual life with everyday life.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Bleu Turquoise Edp 100Ml U
description: Captivated by the spiritual land and nature of India, Giorgio Armani dedicated the newest additions of La Collection des Terres Précieuses to his vision of India. Two fragrances for men and women alike, Bleu Turquoise and Bleu Lazuli are captured in deep blues to represent the spirit of the universe – the colour of the sky and the sea.
top: Bleu Turquoise is a perfume where the sky meets the sea, with salty mineral accords transitioning to addictive vanilla. The precious turquoise stone is one of the oldest gems in man’s history, a talisman of rulers, shamans, and warriors – a stone of protection and mental wellbeing.
middle: Like true pieces of turquoise, each Bleu Turquoise bottle is unique.

title: GIORGIO ARMANI, ARMANI PRIVE BOIS D ENCENS EDP 100ML U
description: LA NUIT TRESOR LE PARFUM, A NEW PRECIOUS MOMENT LIKE A VELVET CRUSH La Nuit Trésor’s unique signature is taken to a further level of sensuality and passion with La Nuit Trésor Le Parfum, the collection’s most intense.
top: The new fragrance is an elixir of absolute rose envelopped with bitter cocoa extracts and blackcurrant notes. La Nuit Trésor Le Parfum is a subtle encounter between the clash of a surprise and the tenderness of a desired love.
middle: Le Parfum becomes women’s most precious accomplice, with whom to delight dearest hours and secrets of the night, as an elixir of absolute rose with embittered cocoa notes.
base: A new touch of blackcurrant accord lying between green and red fruit scents, adding light and woody notes to rose and cocoa. Our new fragrance comes in a diamond-shaped glass bottle revealing sharp cuts and powerful reflections of light through a purple veil, embraced in a velvet ribbon stiffening an elegant desire.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Indigo Tanzanite Edp 100Ml U
description: Indigo Tanzanite is said to represent the mysterious aura of the Tanzanian plains and their beautiful sky at night, reminiscent of the intense blue-violet color of tanzanite in a dark yet enchanting composition. The fresh head of bergamot essence and an almond accord create an enveloping and radiant effect, while accords of milk and heliotrope bring sweetness to this woody scent. Patchouli is enveloped in resins and amber, symbolizing the contrasting atmosphere of a soothing dark night.
top: Top note: Almond and Bergamot.
middle: Middle note : Heliotrope and Milk.
base: Base: Benzoin, Patchouli, Cistus and Tolu Balsam.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Magenta Tanzanite Edp 100Ml U
description: Magenta Tanzanite reinterprets the tanzanite stone in a magenta hue, conjuring an atmosphere suspended in time, when savannah awakens. The roasted warmth of a unique blend of tobacco leaf and coffee, constrated by a fresh and spicy top of cardamom, ginger and bergamot, expresses this moment of serenity, against the backdrop of a wild, natural environment.
top: The fragrance opens with invigorating top notes of cardamom, ginger and cinnamon, creating a fresh and spicy effect, as a metaphor for a warm, intense sun at dawn.
middle: Then the textured scent warms up thanks to the coffee, the spicy cinnamon, and the sensual myrrh from Namibia.
base: At the base, a tobacco absolute and a sustainably sourced Vanilla Bourbon Premium extract create a voluptuous, honeyed, and woody trail. As a tension between intense spices and soothing tobacco, this composition echoes the fascinating instant when sun rises on African raw savannah.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Oud Royal Edp 100Ml U
description: Discover the Armani Privé fragrance, Oud Royal. From “La Collection des Mille et une Nuits”, a collection of fragrances inspired by medieval Arabic tales from 1001 nights, the warm, fascinating elixir of fragrances depicts the exotic beauty of the Orient. The elevated oud wood is treated like fine embroidery, woven with gold and silver to magnify its richness, as a splendid oriental offering.
top: A splendid oriental dream, Oud Royal is inspired by a unique wood more tantalizing that gold: oud wood. Giorgio Armani treats it like fine embroidery, woven with gold and silver while conserving its strength, noble complexity and majestic radiance.
middle: Respecting the singular identity of oud, the fragrance highlights each of its facets: a depth amplified by an amber accord, a reddish glow enhanced by spices, and earthy reflections giving a smoky veil of myrrh and incense.
base: Oud Royal is encapsulated in the iconic Armani Privé opaque and mysterious onyx-coloured glass bottle, topped by a golden cap.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Pivione Suzhou Edt 100Ml U
description: Discover Armani / Privé’s Pivoine Suzhou fragrance. The blooming yet delicate peony echoes the harmony of Suzhou gardens in China.
top: Pivoine Suzhou is a tribute to the classical gardens of Suzhou, considered ‘the Venice of the East.’ The fragrance is a celebration of the beautiful gardens that are crossed by canals and bridges, fed by the Yangtze River, and where pagodas can be glimpsed above the walls of the gardens and peonies distil their splendour to the eyes of lucky wanderers.
middle: The opulence of the peony is balanced by its own ethereal delicacy, creating a plethora of luminous emotions, from sparkling fruity notes to soft and seductive musks.
base: Floral Fruity, Fresh, Sparkling, Delicate, Refined.

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Rose D Arabie Intense  Edp 100Ml U
description: Discover the Armani/Privé’s fragrance, Rose d’Arabie, a majestic ode to the voluptuous ambery damescena rose, intoxicating and undulating, like a desert melody.
top: Rose d’Arabie was inspired by the most beautiful of all roses, a royal rose, the incarnation of ambery sensuality for Giorgio Armani. The unisex fragrance is a majestic ode to the voluptuous damescena rose, unveiling every shade of red in its corolla from royal purple to sensual scarlet. It is together uniquely generous, incandescent and ostentatious.
middle: The intoxicating rose reveals its unabashed sensuality, blossoming from spicy saffron notes into a heart of patchouli and dark woods before surrendering to the voluptuous accords of golden amber.
base: NOTES:

title: Giorgio Armani, Armani Prive Rouge Malachite Edp 100Ml U
description: Discover the Armani / Privé Rouge Malachite fragrance, a fantastic red stone enclosing a carnal and opulent tuberose that pulsates beneath the icy lands of Russia.
top: Rouge Malachite and Vert Malachite are a duo of fragrances that pay homage to Russia, the land that inspired and excited Giorgio Armani. Rouge Malachite is the expression of the varied Russian culture that fascinates Giorgio Armani with its mysterious and intoxicating power. It is a land of contrasts, of mysterious strength and power, where temptation and passion pulsate beneath the frozen surface.
middle: This fantastic red stone creation reveals the tuberose in its opulence and voluptuousness. A carnal accord with exuberant notes oscillates between strength and sweetness, while the delicacy and intensity of the flowers reveal a creamy, sensual, almost obsessive fragrance.

title: Giorgio Armani, Emporio Armani Stronger With You Amber Edp 100Ml U
description: STRONGER WITH YOU AMBER is the new exclusive fougère ambery fragrance that infuses the sensual signature of STRONGER WITH YOU with a contemporary and addictive Amber note.
top: Crafted for both men and women, the fragrance is an embodiment of everlasting togetherness. Its warm amber accord combined with Lavender, sustainably sourced in Provence, and Vanilla, sustainably sourced from Madagascar creates a captivating evocative effect.

title: Givenchy, Accord Particulier Edp 100Ml U
description: The signature fragrance of La Collection Particulière. Givenchy in a bottle. Crafted with and for each individual’s particular skin, exactly like Hubert de Givenchy crafted his couture designs directly on each individual’s silhouette.A match-or-mix scent. Worn alone as your own, singular identity. Or combined with one of the eight olfactory personalities. For more texture, character, density. Directly inspired by The Separates.
top: A scent intricately balanced around Givenchy Perfumery’s iconic quartet of ingredients: honeyed Rose Damascena Essence, woody Haitian Vetiver, the musky-amber of Ambrox and intoxicating Patchouli Essence.To unleash an augmented you.

title: Givenchy, Desinvolte Edp 100Ml U
description: DÉSINVOLTE DE GIVENCHY is the fragrance of free electrons exuding lighthearted charm: when freedom makes a “rendez-vous” with impertinence. An absolutely free-spirited man, Hubert de Givenchy surrounded himself with eclectic personalities. Temperaments refreshingly light and nonchalantly hypnotic.This Eau de Parfum is a generous bouquet composed of a sublime trio of white flower Absolutes. In pride of place, majestic Indian Tuberose releases its characterful fragrance, balanced by radiant notes of Jasmine Grandiflorum and Orange Blossom. Delicately hand-picked, the white corollas are harvested at first light to preserve every fresh drop of their scent. Exceptional floral sensuality contrasted with the woody elegance of Haitian Vetiver.
top: DÉSINVOLTE DE GIVENCHY embodies Givenchy-style irreverence, with a definitely sophisticated trail.
middle: OLFACTORY NOTES
base: Olfactory contrast: Indian Tuberose Absolute / Haitian Vetiver Essence.Other facets: Grandiflorum Jasmine Infusion & Absolute from Egypt and India, Orange Blossom Absolute from Morocco, Ambrox

title: Givenchy, Enflamme Edp 100Ml U
description: Elegance in charisma. The lifeblood of Givenchy. His code: the color red. Symbol of power and passion. Of Hubert’s burning desire for all that’s glam.
top: Ardent Vanilla Surabsolute tussles with Turkish Tobacco to fan the flames of temptation. An incandescent duo dressed up in the animal sweetness of Labdanum and Tolu Balsam Absolute, with sparks of Coffee Absolute and Patchouli. Unlock outrageous combustion with this olfactory firebomb, for scandalously delicious adventures.
middle: OLFACTORY NOTES
base: Olfactory Contrast:

title: Goldfield & Banks Australia, Bohemian Lime Edp 100Ml U
description: Australian perfumer Goldfield & Banks provides a captivating accent to your sharp suiting with the Bohemian Lime pure perfume. The brand expertly blends notes of vetiver and sandalwood with zesty notes bergamot and lime, creating an alluring scent that sets the right tone from the office to the restaurant, and everywhere in between.
top: Base notes: Sandalwood, Patchouli, Amber.
middle: Middle notes: Vetiver, Cedarwood Atlas, Georgywood
base: Top notes: Lime, Bergamot, Mandarin, Coriander seeds

title: GOLDFIELD & BANKS AUSTRALIA, PACIFIC ROCK MOSS PARFUM 100ML U
description: Seize the day and experience a moment of pure bliss with this aquatic and fresh perfume. A distinctive marine note, graced with aromatic essences brings you on a lush coastal walk on a perfect summer day. Cedar wood gives this perfume a sturdy base on which to reveal a fresh, sea spray scent that speaks of summer days diving into Australia’s blue waters.
top: A fragrance for men and women, inspired by waves crashing upon sun-kissed rocks and long days that turn into warm, summer nights.
middle: Head notes: Italian lemonHeart notes: Geranium, sageBase notes: Oakmoss, virgina cedar

title: GOLDFIELD & BANKS AUSTRALIA, PURPLE SUEDE PARFUM 100ML U
description: Tasmanian lavender – a French affair. Born of Provence lavender introduced to Tasmania’s rich climate a century ago, Purple Suede expresses the scent of aromatic fields of sunburnt lavender, where blossoms are crisped by the fierce heat of the sun. Paired with the scent of rust-coloured saddles, this perfume reveals a distinctively rich and dry sillage. A leathery aromatic perfume of lavender, pink pepper, hyssop flowers, civet, smoky woods and dark amber that encapsulates the dry heat of Australian summers among fields of purple.

title: GOLDFIELD & BANKS AUSTRALIA, SILKY WOODS ELIXIR 100ML U
GOLDFIELD & BANKS AUSTRALIA, SILKY WOODS PARFUM 100ML U
description: Encased in molten gold and infused with precious Agarwood, Silky Woods is the aptly named debut fragrance in a new luxury collection called the Botanical Series by Goldfield & Banks.Showcasing the precious wood species harvested sustainably for the first time in perfume history in the Daintree Rainforest in Tropical Queensland, Silky Woods is a delightful and delicate yet very sensual blend that captures Australia’s sensorial experience.To a modern sillage of suede, exotic vanilla and smoky tobacco leaves, Goldfield & Banks has added refined essences of saffron, incense, ylang ylang and native sandalwood.
top: Silky Woods is a celebration of the abundance of organic ingredients in Australia, and the home-grown innovation with which they are transformed into essences coveted across the globe.

title: GOLDFIELD & BANKS AUSTRALIA, SUNSET HOUR EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: As the warm sun sets over the Indian Ocean, the aroma of Australian fruits perfumes the night breeze. A blend of floral, gourmand and fruity notes create a warm and romantic atmosphere. A heavenly cocktail of peach, pear and pink berries awaits us, accompanied by sensual gourmand notes of caramel, cinnamon and musk. Even better served at “Sunset Hour”!
top: Notes
middle: Opening notesmandarin, peach, pear
base: Heart notesginger

title: Gritti, Seta Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Guaranteed seduction, making a refined statement. A kaleidoscope and cloak bestow light and shadows, providing delicate havens or daring hideaways. A dress for goddesses and merchants: noble in its weave, it can only ever be exquisite. Irresistible whirls, and true to itself, it knows how to be that little bit different every time, like no other.
top: A loving rose petals and violet loose powder caress; a homage to the Gritti family’s glorious past in the silk trade. Smooth and elegant, Seta opens with a sleek raspberry mousse accord and embraces the skin with the smell of fresh morning rose petals. The pearly iris luster and feathery musks crown the composition, leaving a subtle sillage in the air.
middle: OLFACTORY PYRAMID
base: HEADRaspberry, Violet, Orange blossomHEARTJasmine, Rose, IrisBASECedarwood, Amber, Musk

title: Guerlain, Angelique Noire Edp 75Ml U
description: A fresh and luminous splendor, this best-selling fragrance blends the freshness of the angelica plant with the sweetness of a vanilla note and the luminosity and smoothness of bergamot.Guerlain’s Art of Material Collections is a range of fragrances for aficionados of rare scents, those who appreciate noble raw materials and refinement down to the last detail.
top: The fragrance dresses up in a bottle with clean, contemporary lines, decorated with a golden metal label on the side, like a precious book. An elegant wooden cap adds the finishing touch to this beautiful piece. The bottle nestles in an amethyst “leather feel” case (which may be transformed into a jewelry box as you wish).2.5 oz. Made in France.
middle: TOP NOTES• Angelica seeds• Pear• Pink pepper
base: HEART NOTES• Sambac jasmine• Caraway

title: GUERLAIN, AQUA ALLEGORIA COCONUT FIZZ EDT 125ML U
description: Aqua Allegoria Coconut Fizz by Guerlain is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men.
top: Top notes: Coconut water, bergamot
middle: Heart notes: Watermelon, coconut, freesia note
base: Base notes: Tonka bean, sandalwood, white wood

title: Guerlain, Aqua Allegoria Coconut Fizz Edt 75Ml U
description: Coconut Fizz Aqua Allegoria 75ML by Guerlain is a sparkling, sweet and airy feminine scent. It features top notes of zesty lime and juicy bergamot, followed by a heart of creamy coconut and exotic ylang-ylang. The base notes are warm and inviting, with a blend of cashmere wood, musk and vanilla. This eau de toilette is perfect for a romantic evening or a day out in the sun.

title: GUERLAIN, AQUA ALLEGORIA FLORA SALVAGGIA EDT 125ML U
description: With Aqua Allegoria Flora Salvaggia, everything soars in freshness and delicacy. Its top notes highlight a first wild flower: violet. Widely used in perfumery, it is usually very feminine and displays a fruity and powdery appearance in its wake. Many also consider the violet to be a retro flower. Thus, with it, Aqua Allegoria Flora Salvaggia is aimed at all generations. An excellent binder, violet gives Aqua Allegoria Flora Salvaggia a certain floral sweetness. For more freshness, this raw material is accompanied by watermelon, with a more fruity and aquatic appearance.

title: GUERLAIN, BAISER DE RUSSIE EDP 125ML U
GUERLAIN, BOIS D’ARMENIE EDP 125ML U
Guerlain, Eau De Guerlain Edc 100Ml U
description: As if to assert its proud tradition, Guerlain chose simplicity, took it to perfection and christened it with its name: Eau de Guerlain.
top: Profound and refreshing, Eau de Guerlain is the Rites of Spring, heralding a hot, fragrant summer in Provence.
middle: Head Notes: Lemon, Verbena, Bergamot
base: Heart Note: Neroli

title: GUERLAIN, EPICES EXQUISES EDP 125ML U
description: Guerlain Epices Exquises Eau de Parfum is a unique unisex perfume that blends an irresistibly oriental aroma of Cardamom and Coffee.
top: Guerlain Epices Exquises perfume is part of the Les Absolus d’Orients collection, it is a bewitching woody spicy signature evoking a sensory journey. Taking inspiration from the most beautiful notes in Oriental fragrance, Guerlain Epices Exquises enhances the contrasts between precious spices to create an olfactory chiaroscuro that awakens the senses with Cardamon and Coffee taking centre stage. Like the warm and exhilarating wisps of this coffee, Guerlain Epices Exquises blends a warm, full-bodied and sensual base, tinged with black pepper and woody notes of oud, patchouli and sandalwood, with refreshing, subtly overdosed facets of cardamom, notes of pink peppercorn and green and fresh angelica. A sublime and surprising contrast between hot and cold in an explosion of fine spices.
middle: Guerlain Epices Exquises begins with that key note of spicy Cardamom, brightened by Angelica and Pink Pepper, over a spicy and provocative heart of Black Pepper and that powerfully emotive blend of Cardamom and Coffee. The base is enduring and luxurious, captivating the heart with Sandalwood, Agarwood or Oud and Patchouli.
base: Guerlain Epices Exquises EDP Fragrance Notes:

title: GUERLAIN, JASMIN BONHEUR EDP 100ML U
GUERLAIN, L’ART ET LA MATIÈRE COLLECTION EDP 125ML U
description: Cruel Gardenija is one of the fragrances of Guerlain’s L’Art et La Matière collection, and as the people of the Guerlain house say, it is on the verge of cruelty and stuns with its diabolical power.
top: It was launched and presented in 2008 together with fragrance for men, L’Âme d’Un Héros. It was created by two noses, Randa Hammami and Sylvaine Delacourte. It is designed in a way that its notes sunny, silky, smooth and lingering…can become an obsession.
middle: Unlike the usual tradition, the creators of this fragrance did not strive towards the richness of notes that gardenia creates when combined with the precious light musk which would give velvety soft aura… In the contrary, Cruel Gardenia is like an arrow that aims directly at the heart and stays there forever.
base: The magic starts with the notes of mouthwatering peach, Damask rose and neroli. The heart of Cruel Gardenia bursts of floral notes, revealing the fusion of violet and wafts of ylang-ylang, touched by light musk. The base notes follow with the accords of Tonka beans, light musk, vanilla and sandal wood.

title: Guerlain, Oud Essential Edp 125Ml U
description: Guerlain Oud Essentiel EDP 125ml is a new fragrance in the Absolus d’Orient collection. To create the new fragrance in the Absolus d’Orient collection, Guerlain Perfumer Thierry Wasser drew his inspiration from the unique and precious oud wood. This fragrance is a celebration of this rare ingredient which reveals its true strength and sensuality. Both mellow and intense, this woody leather fragrance blends the mysterious notes of leather and Frankincense and the sweet notes of Bulgarian Rose in a subtle alchemy. A unique olfactory encounter between East and West.
top: Leather Woody. Sumptuous, charismatic, seductive.
middle: Top notes: Saffran notes, Pelargonium.
base: Heart notes: Agarwood, Rose, Atlas Cedarwood.

title: Guerlain, Santal Pao Rosa Edp 100Ml U
description: Santal Pao Rosa is a new spicy woody floral fragrance for women and men launched in 2021 .
top: A POWERFUL AND FLORAL INTERPRETATION OF SANDAL
middle: Nature becomes Art when the strength of sandalwood is enveloped in tender rose petals. Between wood and flower, a score of opposites is reinforced by a fresh and spicy entry of cardamom, and a darker background of oud and notes of myrrh.
base: Guerlain Santal Pao Rosa borrows its name from the Guerlain heritage: Pao Rosa was a perfume by Aimé Guerlain from 1877 that’s already evoking the meeting of wood and rose.

title: Guerlain, Santal Royal Edp 125Ml U
description: For the creation of Santal Royal Eau de Parfum, Guerlain House Perfumer Thierry Wasser drew inspiration from the treasures of the East and worked one of the rarest and most precious ingredients in the perfume world—sandalwood. Shrouded in mystery, the bewitching note is exalted in a new woody oriental fragrance, a study of subtle contrasts between the dark notes of leather and oud wood and the luminous floral notes of jasmine and rose.
top: Notes:
middle: – Top: neroli, jasmine.
base: – Middle: peach, rose, cinnamon.

title: Guerlain, Santal Royal Edp 125Ml U Gift Set
description: GUERLAIN Les Absolus d’Orient Santal Royal unisex fragrance gift set will be a sure way to bring joy to your loved ones. The set contains a unique and delightful fragrance and comes in a gorgeous, eye-catching box. Give this luxury set as a gift and find out what it feels like to make the people around you happy.
top: Characteristics:
middle: unisex – suitable for both women and men
base: The set contains:

title: Guerlain, Tobacco Honey Edp 100Ml U
description: Guerlain, Tobacco Honey Edp 100Ml U

title: GUERLAIN, TOBACCO HONEY EDP 100ML U
description: The wickedly sensual substance of raw tobacco reveals itself as an accord, unveiling its most beautiful facets when touched by honey. A contrasting olfactory tension is struck between the golden sheen of honey and the intoxicating vibrancy of the tobacco accord.
top: A deliciously ambery tobacco accord is enveloped in vanilla, Tonka bean and sesame before being enlivened under the vibrant brightness of heady honey, then heightened by aniseed accord and clove. At the base, the precious accord reinforces its trail of woody notes combining a blend of sweetly creamy sandalwood and powerful oud wood.
middle: Top notes are Honey, Cloves and Anise;
base: Middle notes are Tobacco, Tonka, Vanilla and Sesame;

title: Guerlain, Tonka Imperiale Edp 75Ml U
description: Tonka Impériale Eau de Parfum is well-named indeed: a subtle blend of balmy scents, rich in contrasting facets, with accents of honey, gingerbread, almond and tobacco. An astonishing construction that blows hot and cold between the uplifting top notes and the sweet, pervasive fullness of tonka bean. Alluring and surprising, this cult ingredient gives the fragrance a rare and memorable personality.
top: Tonka Impériale Eau de Parfum is constructed around one of the cult components of the Guerlain perfumer: the tonka bean. From Jicky to Shalimar, by way of Habit Rouge, this precious seed, originating in the forests of Venezuela, is one of its iconic raw materials. The warmth of the tonka bean is balanced here by a very fresh rosemary note.
middle: Top notes: Bergamot, Almond, Rosemary.
base: Heart notes: Jasmine, Tonka Bean, Tobacco.

title: Haute Fragrance Company (Hfc), Discovery Mini Set U
description: Travel Set Asian-HFC
top: The Travel Set Original features the best sellers from the Asian Collection, revealing all manifestations of love passion:
middle: Devil’s Intrigue 15ml
base: Indian Venus 15ml

title: HERMES, EAU DE CITRON NOIR EDC 100ML U
description: Eau de citron noir was created in 2018 by Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel. It presents an elegant and surprising freshness that reveals the paradoxes of a citrus fruit known and loved by all: the lemon. A sophisticated composition full of contrast.
top: OLFACTORY NOTESA citrus woody fragrance, Eau de citron noir cologne combines sharp lemon and a woody black tea with smoky notes of guaiac wood.
middle: THE OBJECTThe iconic lantern bottle is adorned with a radical deep blue hue. On the orange box, a vividly contrasting band recalls the color of the bottle.
base: THE HERMÈS COLOGNES COLLECTIONThe Hermès Colognes collection offers a playground that is as infinite as it is masterly for exploring the sensory nature of materials. It brings immediate and abundant pleasure that unifies beyond genres, fashions, ages or seasons.

title: Hermes, Le Jardin De Monsieur Li Edt 100Ml U
description: Poised between reality and imagination, Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette evokes a Chinese garden. In this place of meditation, perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena conceived a fragrance dotted with flowers, water, trees and rocks.
top: A floral and botanical fragrance, Le Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette expresses a harmonious blend of delicate sambac jasmine, tangy kumquat and fiery

title: Hermes, Un Jardin Sur Le Nil Edt 100Ml U
description: A garden full of life, generous and sparkling, where the scents of green mango, lotus blossom and rush blend with incense and sycamore wood.
top: Olfactory emotion: Fresh, Delicate.
middle: Notes: Green mango, Lotus, Sycamore wood.

title: HERMES, VOYAGE D’HERMES EDT 100ML U
description: Some fragrances have names so well-fitting to their scent the effect feels almost poetic. With cold & warm spices combined with weathered woods, Hermès Voyage d’Hermès truly seems to evoke an enchanting mix of nostalgia and adventure – a voyage into somewhere far, wide, and beautiful
top: Voyage d’Hermès opens with a clear cardamom note – fresh and sharp, with a soft lemon edge. This is soon followed by pleasant, slightly peppery spices, then the subtle heart notes. Here I get a touch of tea (I’d say a gentle black tea instead of green) and subtle, undefined florals, light and neutral, that could pass unnoticed in the overall picture. Finally, the base is more present than the heart. It centres around a woody note, rich but cool-feeling, with a dry, smoky, leathery edge.
middle: The final effect of Voyage d’Hermès feels completely unissex, slightly mature, with no trace of fluff nor sweetness. It’s deep, yet fresh and crisp, with a sense of transparency that’s characteristic of the style of its perfumer, Jean-Claude Ellena. This fragrace doesn’t really feel “old-fashioned”, but it does have a traditional aura, very elegant, but not overly formal – as in, it seems to go with khaki pants and leather accessories rather than fancy black-tie attire.

title: House Of Sillage, Cherry Garden Edp 75Ml U
description: Cherry Garden evokes a sense of playfulness and curiosity through sweet traces of almond, vanilla and Sicilian bergamot oil. This fragrance transports the senses to a heavenly, glowing field of aromatic cherry blossoms, where floating butterflies and gentle rays of sun envelop the tantalizing and saccharine scent of the warm breeze.
top: Notes– Top Notes: Almond Oil, Aniseed Oil– Heart Notes: Rose, Jasmine– Base Notes: Heliotrope, Musk

title: House Of Sillage, Love Is In The Air Edp 75Ml U
description: This fragrance flirts delicately with sweet hints of jasmine and succulent plum paired with the romantic and smooth essence of white musk. Perched over the fragrance are two silver lovebirds, which are known to sing beautiful and harmonious songs of pure love. This fragrance fills the air with grace and tender affection, and serves as a reminder that true love worth keeping should never be caged.
top: Notes– Top Notes: Plum, Black Currant– Heart Notes: Jasmine, Cedarwood– Base Notes: Patchouli, Musk
middle: 4 x 8 mL / 0.27 fl oz Refills + 1 Case

title: House Of Sillage, Whispers Of Seduction Edp 75Ml U
description: Whispers of Seduction exudes remorseless sensuality that is unabashed and audacious, delivering a playful and primal olfactory journey infused with candied apple, marshmallow, vanilla orchid, and caramelized oud. The heart of Whispers Of Seduction celebrates exotic glamour with striking carnality.
top: Fragrance Notes
middle: – Top Notes: Sweet Clementine, Candied Apple, Marshmallow
base: – Heart Notes: Egyptian Orange Blossom, Vanilla Orchid, Fluffy Freesia Petals

title: Initio, Absolute Aphrodisiac Edp 90Ml U
description: The softness of Vanilla intimately intertwined with the animal potency of Musk and Castoreum. A powerful fragrance that obsessively reminds you of the other. A truly aphrodisiac essence.
top: MAIN NOTES
middle: White Flowers, Amber, Vanilla, Musk, Castoreum

title: Initio, Atomic Rose Edp 90Ml U
description: A rose diffracted into a scent of phenomenal power.An olfactory explosion with an intense emotional charge.An exhilaration of pure energy, climaxing into intoxication.An extraordinary fragrance in the true sense of the word.From the first moment, rose rushes to the head and brings colour to the cheeks. As explosive as it is elusive,it expresses itself forcefully and fully embraces its ambiguities. Bright, with its shadows. Feminine and masculine. Soft, but ruthless.
top: MAIN NOTESItalian Bergamot, Bulgarian Rose, Turkish Rose, Egyptian Jasmin, Madagascar Vanilla… All Naturals

title: Initio, Divine Attraction Edp 90Ml U
description: Leather and Vetiver beauty, strength and supernatural in a dual accord that loves to provoke. The fragrance feeds fantasies.Worn by a man it bewitchesWorn by a woman it disconcerts and fascinates.
top: MAIN NOTES
middle: Leather, Vetiver, Cedar wood, Iso E Super.

title: Initio, High Frequency Edp 90Ml U
description: The combination of Magnolia and Almond, overtly so innocent yet truly sexy, takes you by surprise. Its effect is like a sound wave that starts off gently and then powers up the decibels on the skin. An overdose of hedione detonates the final explosion.
top: Head note: Raspberry
middle: Heart notes: Almond, hedione, heliotrope, jasmine, magnolia
base: Base notes: cedar, sandalwood, vanilla

title: Initio, Musk Therapy Edp 90Ml U
description: Close your eyes,Smell and feel a new way of sensations,Experience the power of scent therapy.Natural white sandalwood blended with an overdose of white and pink musk creates an ultra-addictive milky and velvety accord.The white magnolia activates the pleasure receptor while the cassis stimulates the energy, releasing a supplement of eroticism.MUSK THERAPY, a magical mood enhancer, paves the way to relaxation and a state of well-being.Finally, a delightful alternative to artificial paradises and their illicit substances.
top: MAIN NOTES
middle: Bergamot, Mandarin, White Magnolia, Cassis, White Sandal Wood. All Naturels White Musk, Rose Musk.

title: Initio, Mystic Experience Edp 90Ml U
description: A heady and distinguished combination of Musk and Coffee, this fragrance captivates the senses, unsettling all around you. A fragrance for the initiated on a quest for transcendent experiences.
top: MAIN NOTES
middle: Coffee, Musk, Vanilla, Patchouli

title: INITIO, NARCOTIC DELIGHT EDP 90ML U
description: Immerse yourself in the irresistible allure of “Narcotic Delight,” a captivating fragrance that intertwines the seductive essence of vanilla bean with the electrifying notes of pink pepper. A touch of decadent cognac adds a luxurious twist, leading to the intoxicating swirls of a rich cigar. The cheeky inclusion of plump cherry adds a playful element, creating a bold and refined scent that celebrates the indulgence of a polished proposition. Succumb to desire and sophistication with every enchanting whiff of “Narcotic Delight.”
top: Top Notes: Cherry, Pink Pepper and Black PepperHeart Notes: Cognac, HedioneBase Notes: Tobacco, Vanilla

title: Initio, Oud For Greatness Edp 90Ml U
description: Oud for Greatness breathes out a force of nature, the wake of Greatness.The natural essence of Oud Wood has been perfected to this pitch, handled with majesty (and brutality) in this bold formula, scarcely highlighted by Patchouli and Musk.Superbly textured, strikingly natural, Oud has been handled by the creator in a register that is astonishingly fresh (Lavender) and spicy (Nutmeg, Saffron).An enchanting, thrilling perfume that makes all our dreams of greatness possible.
top: MAIN NOTES
middle: Natural Oud Wood, Agar Wood Oil, Lavender, Saffron, Patchouli, Musk.

title: Initio, Oud For Happiness Edp 90Ml U
description: Can a scent make you feel happier ?Oud for Happiness is a portal to modernity. It amplifies the benefits of oud through a puff of freshly-cut narcotic grass, energizing and uninhibited.
top: The composition provides an addictive means of relaxation that stimulates self-confidence.Better than an imaginary paradise, enter into a secret dimension where the experience of deep harmony can be lived
middle: MAIN NOTES
base: Bergamot, Ginger, Licorice, Vanilla, Cedar Wood, Indian Oud, All Naturals, Musk

title: Initio, Paragon Edp 90Ml U
description: Paragon, goes beyond the skin all the way to the soul and leads you to another dimension : plenitude.
top: PARAGON houses the botanical soul of Palo Santo and white Sage. It draws in the beneficial properties of these sacred plants, whose use has been secretly passed down through initiation ceremonies dating back to the first lines of Inca shamans.
middle: This mystical blend holds both protective and purifying powers. It feeds self-confidence and helps the spirit to rise, enveloped in positivity.
base: MAIN NOTESBergamot, White Sage, LavenderPlum, Palo Santo, Black PepperSandalwood, Agarwood

title: Initio, Psychedelic Love Edp 90Ml U
description: The signature of this narcotic bomb lies in three essential ingredients: rose, hedione and heliotropin. Beware of its creamy, powdery and floral facets, wavering between vanilla and almond! Confronted with this diabolical indulgence, no one is safe from an olfactory obsession that can soon become a real addiction!
top: Notes: bergamot myrrh, rose, vanilla, patchouli.

title: Initio, Rehab Extrait De Parfum 90Ml U
description: Rehab promises an ecstatic return to the pleasure of perfume. The harmony of its natural raw materials is revealed by a skilful combination of Bergamot, natural Lavender, Black Pepper and various Spices. It reaches an ultimate balance by lying on a bed of natural Sandalwood and Musk perfecting a modern fougère olfactory experience.
top: MAIN NOTESBergamot, Lavender, Cedar Wood, Patchouli, Sandalwood, All Naturals. Hedione, Musk

title: INITIO, SIDE EFFECTS EDP 90ML U
description: The Tobacco, Vanilla, Rum, and Cinnamon harmony of this fragrance is spell binding. It tantalises the most discerning senses by playing off each of its facets – leather, animal, and the woody note of vanilla – one by one. Recklessly bold… and stirring. Deeply buried emotions and passions take over. The fragrance lifts the veil on the unsayable.This passionate perfume has the power to plunge its wearer into that altered statewhere nothing is too daring because there are no risks left.
top: MAIN NOTES
middle: Cinnamon Bark, Rum, Tobacco, Saffron, Sandal Wood, Hedione

title: Jeroboam, Hauto Extrait De Parfum 30Ml U
description: Hauto is inspired by the France of the roaring twenties, more precisely the French Cancan dancers in the emblematic Parisian cabarets. A sensual, addictive fragrance that opens with delicate fruity and gourmand top notes with bergamot and pineapple, delicately wrapped in a floral heart of tuberose and rose. The fragrance then becomes suave with its spice and musk notes.
top: Top notes : Bergamot, Pineapple
middle: Heart notes : Tuberose, Rose, Spice

title: Jeroboam, Miksado Extrait De Parfum 30Ml U

A delicously addictive blend that opens with a soaring resinous note of labdanum and spices followed by a majestic heart of precious woods and an enveloping base of patchouli, musk and vanilla.

middle: Notes:
base: – Top: petitgrain.– Middle: French lavender.– Base: amber.

title: Jo Malone, Amber & Patchouli Cologne Intense 100Ml U
description: From the first whiff, Amber & Patchouli unveils spicy notes and a touch of tea bestowed by essence of gaiac wood. The fragrance then reveals the ambry, musky, slightly animalic note of ambroxan. Paired with amber, the patchouli unveils intense, balsamic waves of scent, with hints of chocolate and leather. Perfumer: Christine Nagel

title: Jo Malone, English Pear & Freesia Cologne 100Ml U

title: Jo Malone, Mimosa & Cardamon Cologne 100Ml U
description: Mists of honeyed, golden mimosa float above the spiciness of freshly crushed cardamom. Creamy tonka and smooth sandalwood woven under powdery heliotrope and Damask rose picked at dawn. Warm, ethereal, mesmerising.

description: Jo Malone, Myrrh & Tonka Cologne Intense 100Ml U

title: Jo Malone, Nectarine Blossom & Honey Cologne 100Ml U
description: Succulent nectarine, peach and cassis and delicate spring flowers melt into the note of acacia honey. Sweet and delightfully playful. Cassis opens the fragrance. Juicy and ripe, it gives a crisp edge to the scent. Acacia honey illuminates the heart. This deliciously honeyed note suffuses the scent with its smooth, sweet accents of beeswax and blossoms. Peach defines the base. It is a lusciously juicy note, succulent with textural velvety softness.
top: Notes:
middle: – Top: cassis.– Middle: acacia honey.– Base: peach.–

title: Jo Malone, Oud & Bergamot Cologne Intense 100Ml U
JO MALONE, OUD & BERGAMOT COLOGNE INTENSE 100ML+5ML U
Jo Malone, Peony & Blush Suede Cologne 100Ml U
description: The essence of charm. Peonies in voluptuous bloom, exquisitely fragile. Flirtatious with the juicy bite of red apple and the opulence of jasmine, rose and gillyflower. Mingling with the sensuality of soft, blush suede. Luxurious and seductive.

title: Jo Malone, Scarlet Poppy Cologne Intense 100Ml U
description: From poppies in the golden fields of England to the wild steppes of Asia, home of the great scarlet poppy. This ravishing scent has been inspired by its extravagant blooms, and amplified by velvety iris. Barley and tonka bean add a double hit of sweet decadence while a burst of succulent fig draws us into this opulent and moreish fragrance. Available in an eye-catching red bottle.
top: Notes
middle: Top: ambrette.
base: Middle: scarlet poppy.

title: JO MALONE, SCARLET POPPY COLOGNE INTENSE 50ML U
description: From poppies in the golden fields of England to the wild steppes of Asia, home of the great scarlet poppy. This ravishing scent has been inspired by its extravagant blooms, and amplified by velvety iris. Barley and tonka bean add a double hit of sweet decadence while a burst of succulent fig draws us into this opulent and moreish fragrance. Available in an eye-catching red bottle.

base: Middle: scarlet poppy.

title: Jo Malone, Velvet Rose & Oud Cologne Intense 100Ml U
description: Darkest Damask rose. Rich and textural, wrapped with smoky oud wood. Spiked with clove, decadent with praline. Magnetic.

title: Jo Malone, Vetiver And Golden Vanilla Cologne Intense 100Ml U
description: The bounty of an island’s two prized ingredients, entwined along Madagascar’s vanilla-swept coastline.
top: This deliciously sensual scent opens with a dash of cardamom and the freshness of grapefruit tea, ushering in the earthy depths of native vetiver. Precious vanilla bourbon warms and envelops, hand-picked from the orchid-sown jungle.

title: JO MALONE, WOOD SAGE & SEA SALT COLOGNE INTENSE 100ML U
description: A mineral and woody cologne that helps you escape the everyday, along the windswept shore.Fragrance story: Waves breaking white, the air fresh with sea salt and spray. Alive with the mineral scent of the rugged cliffs. Mingling with the woody earthiness of sage. Lively, spirited and totally joyful. Ambrette seeds open the fragrance. Their textural quality wraps the scent with an aura of sophistication. Sea salt illuminates the heart. The crunchy nature of sea salt brings both texture and a sense of freshness. Sage defines the base. It is woody with earthy, aromatic tones that bring a natural depth.

title: Juliette Has A Gun, Vanilla Vibes Edp 100Ml U
description: Inspired by the aesthetic demonstrated by the famous Burning Man festival. Founder and Artistic Director Romano Ricci wanted to capture the beautiful display of human expression, interactive art, and electro music. In this role, Juliette’s character captures the human spirit at play, like a futuristic amazon, freely dancing in the dusty desert under a vanilla sky. Close your eyes, let the music melt into your mind, transport across the immensity of the desert. The memory of this very moment, sensual, and electric, leaving a dream-filled trail of wild wonder just like the fragrance.
top: Key Notes: Sea Salt, Natural Vanilla, Sandalwood
middle: Kshs 14800 for the 100ml edp

title: Kajal, Almaz Edp 100Ml U
description: A beauty so enchanting, it has enraptured people for centuries.A clarity so pure, one glimpse is enough to mesmerize. A love so powerful, its eternal radiance will forever shine.Treasured throughout history, precious gemstones have been sought after on many a quest. By far the most desired and cherished is the Almaz, a gem of legendary sparkling brilliance which symbolizes everlasting love, strength, and good health. Almaz, the Arabic name for diamonds, are renowned not only for their sublime beauty, but also for their timelessness as they withstand millions of years of immense pressure to form.
top: Top notes:Almaz opens with a beguiling fruity combination of bergamot and blackcurrant, a delightful mixture of fresh sweetness with a spicy edge.
middle: Heart notes:The heart notes consist of an elegant blend of Raspberry, Flower notes and heliotrope, resulting in a warm and alluring floral embrace
base: Base notes:As we reach the base notes, we find a delicious fusion of musk, wood notes, vanilla, amber and brown sugar, a mellow yet sensual composition consisting of a rich and pure earthy softness.

title: Kajal, Dahab Edp 100Ml U
description: Magical, hypnotic and enchanting, Dahab by Kajal is a 100ml EDP, and a masterpiece created by the renowned perfumers Christian Carbonnel & Rosendo Mateu. With “Dahab” meaning “Gold” the fragrance exudes richness and luxury for the wearer.
top: Top notes:Magical elements from magnificent bergamot and the uniqueness of Granny Smith apples capture the hearts of the wearer.
middle: Heart notes:Mystifying notes of luscious fruits particularly passionfruit combined with cedar and coriander seeds compose the heart of this wonderful scent.Base notes:
base: And, to complete the unique aroma, we combine patchouli, musk and amber for a seductive, sensuous base.

title: Kajal, Faris Edp 100Ml U
description: Faris perfectly encapsulates the fundamental chivalrous characteristics of a valiant and noble knight. A masculine name of Arabic origins, Faris means Knight, someone who carries himself with impeccable etiquette yet manifests courage, honor, and loyalty. Meticulously created by renowned perfumers Urs Castelletti and David Chieze, Faris is a splendid, curated fragrance that has been exclusively produced for Kajal.
top: “We wanted Faris to embody the definition of strength, respect and courage…for that we went with the silver metalized effect on the bottle, box and cap” the co-founder and Chief Creative Officer of Kajal, Moe Khalaf, describes: Silver symbolizes subtle strength and represents purity. Spiritually, Silver is considered to be a mirror to the soul, helping us to realize ourselves as others see us.

title: Kajal, Homme Edp 100Ml U
description: Kajal Homme EDP 100ml, for a charming, sincere and charismatic person, is the first fragrance for men from the House of Kajal. The scent is rich, graceful, sleek and sexy.
top: TOP NOTES
middle: These include cassis, along with ruby-red grapefruits and a touch of mandarine.
base: HEART NOTES

title: Kajal, Lamar Edp 100Ml U
description: LAMAR…beauty in a name, beauty in a bottle, beauty in a scent. A name with French origins Lumière, meaning light, LAMAR is also known to be liquid gold: mesmerizing, fascinating and enticing. A scent created to resemble the beauty of a golden sun setting in the horizon. Distant clouds reflect rich rays of color – hues of red, streaks of yellow and shimmers of gold. The scent of LAMAR evokes fragrant notes of rose and jasmine that float on a Mediterranean breeze. A magnificent scent.
top: LAMAR…magnificent beauty.
middle: In the creation process of LAMAR, Mark Buxton, the renowned perfumer said “My inspiration, was to create a rich, natural, warm, long lasting fragrance, by using high quality natural products. This gives a feeling of walking through a bed of roses or a jasmine field – very feminine and sensual.”
base: Top notes:Pineapple, red berries, apple, cardamom and coriander

title: KAYALI, OUDGASM CAFE OUD 50ML U
KAYALI, SWEET DIAMOND PINK PEPPER/25 EDP 100ML U
description: Sweet Diamond Pink Pepper | 25 is an electric, floral, woody creation. With its luxurious, modern metallic finish the unique bottle epitomizes the vibrant and flirtatious juice inside. The scent of Sweet Diamond Pink Pepper | 25 combines the spiciness of pink pepper and saffron with sweet Bulgarian Rose and Royal Lily florals for a perfect balance. Deepened with Sandalwood and Golden Amber and intriguingly heightened with sparkling bergamot, this scent is perfect for those who expect a little more from the unexpected. The number 25 indicates the 25 rounds of formula modifications that went into creating the perfect balance of flirtatious and sweet.
top: Fragrance Notes:
middle: Top notes: Pink Pepper, Bergamot, Royal Lily, Saffron.
base: Middle notes: Bulgarian Rose, Rose Centifolia, Magnolia, Vanilla Orchid.

title: KAYALI, YUM PISTACHIO GELATO 33 EDP 100ML U
KILIAN, ANGELS SHARE EDP 100ML U
description: Angel’s Share is Kilian Hennessy’s most personal fragrance creation yet, inspired by his eighth-generation inheritance of Hennessy savoir-faire in cognac making.The perfume goes deep into the cellars of founder’s mind and memory, and into its most mysterious dimension: “la part des anges” or “angels’ share”— an evaporation of liquor in oak barrels that lifts, while aging, like a silent offering to the gods.
top: Angels’ Share contains the essence of Cognac derived from the liquor to lend it a natural caramel color. Opening with cognac oil, upon a blend of oak absolute, cinnamon essence and Tonka bean absolute, the scent’s long-lasting notes of sandalwood, praline and vanilla make for a delicious finish, a rare concoction only angels should experience.
middle: Base notesPraline, Sandalwood Oil, Vanilla.
base: Heart notesCinnamon, Oakmoss, Tonka Bean

title: KILIAN, ANGELS SHARE EDP 50ML U
description: Angel’s Share is Kilian Hennessy’s most personal fragrance creation yet, inspired by his eighth-generation inheritance of Hennessy savoir-faire in cognac making.The perfume goes deep into the cellars of founder’s mind and memory, and into its most mysterious dimension: “la part des anges” or “angels’ share”— an evaporation of liquor in oak barrels that lifts, while aging, like a silent offering to the gods.
top: Angels’ Share contains the essence of Cognac derived from the liquor to lend it a natural caramel color. Opening with cognac oil, upon a blend of oak absolute, cinnamon essence and Tonka bean absolute, the scent’s long-lasting notes of sandalwood, praline and vanilla make for a delicious finish, a rare concoction only angels should experience.
middle: Base notesPraline, Sandalwood Oil, Vanilla.
base: Heart notesCinnamon, Oakmoss, Tonka Bean

title: Kilian, Apple Brandy On The Rocks Edp 50Ml U
description: Inspired by the citiy of New York, KILIAN PARIS introduces its new addition to the Liquors olfactive family: Apple Brandy on the Rocks, an olfactive soundtrack to nightlife’s liberation to come. Apple Brandy was first conceived with perfumer Sidonie Lancesseur for the opening of KILIAN PARIS’s New York flagship eight years ago. The fragrance returns, featuring the original apple brandy core but, this time, with an added uplift—KILIAN PARIS’s signature “on the rocks” accord blended into the opening for an ice-cold liquored delight expressing a uniquely KILIAN PARIS character. A blend of bergamot, apple brandy and cardamon, the accord cools down the original, adding excitement and modernity.
top: This fresh opening of Apple Brandy on the Rocks unfolds into the perfume’s core personality: a distinctive apple brandy accord, in which a crisp fruity blend harmonizes with brandy—recreated using notes of rum for the liquor aspect, moss and vanilla. Upon a core structure of cedarwood and ambroxan, the scent carries sophistication into the night. It captures the constant reincarnation and incontestable elegance of the ‘Big Apple’—most especially that of its legendary nightlife.
middle: Perfume notes: Bergamot, Apple Brandy and Cardamon
base: Olfactive family: the Liquors

title: Kilian, Good Girl Gone Bad Edp 50Ml U
description: Inspiration: The uninhibited Good girl gone Bad finds herself in a luscious floral whirlwind in the garden of good and evil.
top: Fragrance story: Half-innocent, half-voluptuous, the apricot-tinged osmanthus absolute, orange blossom and rose of May absolute that open the fragrance are beholden by the ultimate temptress: an explosion of the three-sirens of flowers: tuberose absolute, jasmine and narcissus.
middle: Key notes: Orange Blossom, Osmanthus, Tuberose
base: Olfactive Family: Narcotics – From rose to tuberose, from orange blossom to gardenia… Kilian flowers are composed like a narcotic dependence.

title: Kilian, Good Girl Gone Bad Extreme Edp 50Ml U
description: Good Girl Gone Bad is a spinning flower petals in the Garden of Eden or in the deepest limbo. The sweetness of the apricot osmanthus, the May rose honey and the orange blossom display a delicate fragrance supported by an explosion of three flowers: the tuberose, jasmine and narcissus.notes
