middle: Heart notes : lactone, may rose, narcissus, orange blossom, sambac jasmine, tuberose.
base: Base notes : caramel, musk.

title: Kilian, Intoxicated Edp 50Ml U
description: Inexplicably addictive, Intoxicated curbs craving like a cup of rich Turkish coffee, laced with green cardamom–both in oil and absolute–doubling the addictive stronghold of this stimulating substance. Warmth rises like stream with a spicy cinnamon and hallucinogenic nutmeg. At its base, like at the bottom of a delicate porcelain mug, floats the crystallized sweetness of caramelized sugar.
top: Key notes: Mocha Coffee, Cardamom, Vanilla
middle: Olfactive Family: Cellars – Woods in all their forms – from sandalwood to cedarwood, from patchouli to Vetyver – but always with a Kilian twist: rum, coffee, cacao, cognac, whisky, as a reminder of Kilian Hennessy’s heritage.

title: Kilian, LHeure Verte Edp 50Ml U
description: L’Heure Verte opens on notes of absinthe essence, which instantly twists into a nostalgic heart of violet leaf and licorice root absolute. Its dry-down articulates a unique facet of patchouli that resonates throughout and blends into a trio of earthy woods, along with vetiver and sandalwood.
top: Key Notes: Absinthe, Violet Leaf, Patchouli

title: Kilian, Liasons Dangereuses Typical Me Edp 50Ml U Gift Set
description: This two-piece perfume set features one refillable bottle (50ml) and a travel-size spray (7.5 ml).
top: The chypre fruity fragrance suits both modern men and women who like to live their lives freely.The top notes of the composition include delicious peach and plum mixed with coconut.
middle: The sensual heart has notes of rose and geranium, blended with the spicy cinnamon.
base: Charming notes of musk come in the base along with the softness of sandalwood and sweetness of vanilla

title: Kilian, Love Don’t be shy Edp 50ml U
description: Inspiration: Exhilarating, unforgettable, Love, don’t be shy implores you at the opening with tender orange blossom absolute.
top: First love’s innocence makes itself known with juicy honeysuckle and plush rose softly caressed by the sweetness of luscious marshmallow sugar accord, satisfying the craving pang of new love. A warm amber base lends a pulsing touch of sensuality, hinting the possibility of soon knowing another soul, inside and out.
middle: Key notes: Neroli, Orange Blossom, Marshmallow
base: Olfactive Family: Narcotics – From rose to tuberose, from orange blossom to gardenia… Kilian flowers are composed like a narcotic dependence.

title: KILIAN, LOVE DON’T BE SHY EXTREME EDP 50ML U
KILIAN, MOONLIGHT IN HEAVEN EDP 50ML U
description: A dazzling beam of pearlized light dances on the ocean’s belly, witnessed by two lovers who watch from a balcony draped in floating white opaque gauze that seems alive, responding to a warm wind that blows. The lovers, high above the world to almost touch the stars, with full hearts and bodies light as air.
top: Fragrance story: Omnipresent, Moonlight in Heaven sparkles with a citrus-forward opening, driven by a duo of lemon and grapefruit, spiced with pink pepper berry. Coconut milk and rice–white as the moon’s face–rounds out creamy mango and powdery jasmine sambac, while a tonka bean drydown envelops delicate vetiver.
middle: Top notes are grapefruit, pink pepper, and lemon
base: Middle notes are mango, coconut, and rice

title: Kilian, Rolling In Love Edp 50Ml U
description: Rolling in Love is a musc de peau, capturing the sensation of feeling so high on love that it seems to almost “get under the skin.” Working with perfumer Pascal Gaurin, Kilian Hennessy took an entirely new direction. Rolling in Love is more direct and less faceted than his previous fragrances—almost “monochromatic” in its focused representation of a single emotion. Rolling in Love is a “white” scent, layering different textures along the scent’s trail with notes of ambrette seeds, almond milk, iris, and musk.
top: Key notes: Almond milk, iris, musk.
middle: Olfactive Family: Narcotics – From rose to tuberose, from orange blossom to gardenia… Kilian flowers are composed like a narcotic dependence.

title: Kilian, Roses On Ice  Edp 50Ml U
description: Kilian Hennessy’s inspiration: Introducing a brand new collection, Kilian Hennessy felt it was time to pay tribute to his heritage, as heir to the renowned French cognac making family, and to his choice olfactory intoxicants for driving the night towards dawn. As a first-time collaboration with perfumer Franck Voelkl, Kilian Hennessy wanted to recreate the tasting of “gin on the rocks” with a splash of lime.
top: The Perfume: Anyone for notes of gin, distilled with rose and cucumber? The perfume Roses on Ice opens with the aquatic freshness of cucumber and the aromatic uplift of juniper berries, creating an icy sensation, rounded in an accord with voluptuous Rose Centifolia. Upon a drydown of sandalwood and musk, the scent expresses the sharp—yet deeply infused—character of gin consumed in its ideal.
middle: Perfume notes: Cucumber, Juniper Berries and Rose.

title: KILIAN, SMOKING HOT EDP 50ML U
description: Kilian Hennessy’s Inspiration:At night, there are no rules but one: just be Smoking Hot! KILIAN PARIS newest smoky fragrance is a truly caramelized delight. It features Kentucky Tobacco absolute, infused with a hookah drag of Apple-flavoured shisha tobacco and intense Bourbon Vanilla. Evoking everything from European clubs to Eastern hookah lounges, Smoking Hot redefines what a smokey scent is today, going almost where it’s too hot to handle.
top: The Perfume: The fragrance opens with forbidden fruit: a round Apple Hookah flavour blends with warm Cinnamon Bark essence. In a slow burn, notes of fire-cured Kentucky Tobacco absolute emerge. Harmonized with Oakmoss, this resonant Tobacco absolute leads into a Bourbon Vanilla, with balsamic tonalities. Also known as a Pure Jungle essence™ Bourbon Vanilla, it is of the highest quality Vanilla available, especially intense, and textured. When crossed with Orcanox™, a powerful sensuality comes full circle.
middle: The Perfume notes:Hookah Flavour, Tobacco Absolute, Bourbon Vanilla Pure Jungle Essence

title: Kilian, Straight To Heaven White Crystal Edp 50Ml U
description: Moments of ecstasy envelop the senses with Straight to Heaven, white cristal.
top: Fragrance story: Smoldering with addictive sensuality, a burning splash of rich dark rum defines the opening, its sweet gourmand chord is softened by creamy vanilla and dried fruit. Spicy patchouli pairs with the fresh, woodsy scent of cedarwood to finish, finding animalic harmony at long last.
middle: Key notes: Patchouli, Nutmeg, Cedarwood
base: Olfactive Family: Cellars – Woods in all their forms – from sandalwood to cedarwood, from patchouli to Vetyver – but always with a Kilian twist: rum, coffee, cacao, cognac, whisky, as a reminder of Kilian Hennessy’s heritage.

title: L’ARTISAN PERFUMEUR, MURE ET MUSC EXTREME EDP 100ML U
description: L’Artisan Parfumeur Mûre Et Musc Extrême EDP 100 ml is a fruity eau de parfum for women. An eau de parfum originally created for fans of Mûre Et Musc who want a more intense interpretation of the typical notes of blackberries and musk. The result is a more intense aura of red fruit with blackcurrant that enhances the power of the rich dark blackberry note. Still just as sensual, but deeper and more narcotic. Perfect for daytime or special hot evenings. The fragrance is dominated by notes of bergamot, blackberry, musk and red berries.

title: Le Labo, Another 13 Edp 100Ml U
description: Modern Princess Fruity Floral scent is a fruity floral perfume for women. Launched in 2016, this Lanvin fragrance features notes of red currant and red apple. The heart is intense and sensual with notes of jasmine and freesia. The heart it’s addictive with hints of White Musk, White Woods and Vanilla Orchid.

title: Le Labo, Matcha 26 Edp 100Ml U
description: In the same way, matcha tea is much more than just a drink in Japanese culture, THÉ MATCHA 26 is much more than a scent to us. It is a moment of introspection, a moment of self that offers a quiet inner celebration of grace and soulful beauty. A simple whiff takes us away from the hum of the outside and brings us back “in”.
top: Matcha tea accord is infused with a creamy fig note, grounded by soft vetiver and textural cedar woods, and uplifted by enticing bitter orange.
middle: Introverted and deep by nature, THÉ MATCHA 26 is a skin scent, something meant for, and only those individuals lucky enough to be very close to, the wearer. It carries a noble stillness. To us, it is a scented reminder of home, of welcomed solitude, and of all things familiar and treasured.

title: Le Labo, Rose 31 Edp 100Ml U
description: The perfume’s aim is clear: to transform the famous Grasse rose, a symbol of voluptuousness and unqualified femininity, into an assertively virile fragrance that can be worn by anyone…
top: The result is a model of its kind: alternating femininity and masculinity of the Centifolia rose, quickly picked up by a chorus of warm, spicy, and woodsy notes such as cumin, olibanum, cedar, and a touch of amber… In the background, the declared sensuality of Gaïac wood and cistus highlighted by distinctly musky notes, give this perfume a disconcerting sense of mystery.view less

title: Le Labo, Santal 33 Edp 100Ml U
Le Labo, Tonka 25 Edp 100Ml U
description: This fragrance is dark. A good, addictive, warm dark, as if the humid summer underwoods, their seeds and resins, were sprinkled with layers of musks and sweetened with drops of vanilla. The perfumer’s notes say orange flower absolute, the unique cedar atlas, styrax resins, absolute tonka and musks. Le Labo says Tonka 25.
top: Notes:
middle: Orange flower absolue, cedar atlas, styrax resin, absolute tonka, musks.

title: Liqvides Imaginaires, Blanche Bete Edp 100Ml U
description: Often represented in medieval tapestries alongside a young woman in a flowery and fragrant garden, I am an imaginary animal, wild and solitary. My immaculate body is that of a fabulous white horse. Wearing a single, twisted poison neutralizing horn on my forehead. My ivory is sought after because it purifies the waters of its magical power. I embody love and mystery. I only appear in the light charged with the dynamic energy of my supernatural strength that only creative minds can perceive. Can you dream hard enough to see me? Because I am the animal that never was.
top: TOP NOTES: Ambrette Seed, Milk Accord, Mystikal
middle: HEART NOTES: Jasmine Vintage, Tuberose Petals, Mahonial, Incense
base: BASE NOTES: Tonka, Cacao, Musky Vanilla

title: Liqvides Imaginaires, Desert Suave Eau Edp 100Ml U
description: Desert Suave is a fragrance that captures the essence of an imaginary land in the midst of a vast arid expanse. At sunset, the coolness of the moon is dreamt of, and at dawn, the pure, blinding light of the sun blazes through the sand dunes. The wind sweeps up a fantastical world of hallucinatory aspirations and spiritual thirsts. This fragrance borrows from travellers passing through the oasis to blend rose and orange blossom in its delicious trail. The scent of lush vegetation of date palms provides water and shade, creating a theatre of wonder, bewitching sensuality and floating feasts.
top: Top notes: Mandarin, Cardamom, Clove
middle: Heart notes: Dates, Rose, Orange blossom
base: Base notes: Sesame, Cistus labdanum (Rockrose), Cedarwood (Atlas)

title: Liqvides Imaginaires, Dom Rosa Edp 100Ml U
description: The scent of the blood of a rose, sacrificed for the beauty of wine. An age-old Champagne ritual. Flower of passion, its bubbling excitement gives way to romantic, heady charm. The fresh effervescence of its initial fragrance gives way to the bewitching charm of rose, lightly smoked in incense. The woody base notes enrich the perfume with a powerful contrast. A perfume of flavours.
top: TOP NOTES: Champagne accord, Grapefruit, Pear accord
middle: HEART NOTES: Damascena rose, Clove, Incense
base: BASE NOTES: Woody accord, Cedarwood, Vetiver, Gayac wood

title: Liqvides Imaginaires, Fortis Eau Dela Edp 100Ml U
description: Fortis — strong water — this perfume instills its precious properties to drive out evil spirits and face the future with strength. The indelible aromatic mark of a precious assembly of rare woods and spices warmed up by a few smoky notes giving the fragrance its mesmerizing strength.
top: Top Notes: Saffron, Cumin, Oud, Cypriol
middle: Middle Notes: Guaiac Wood, Cedarwood, Amyris, Vetiver
base: Base Notes: Amber, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Musk

title: Liqvides Imaginaires, Sancti Edp 100Ml U
description: Sancti opens with the freshness of bergamot, mandarin, grapefruit and cardamom. The heart is more spicy with a blend of lavender, rosemary, fir balsam, coriander and cypress. In the background, the wake is composed of incense, amber, wood, resin and white musk.
top: Top Note: Cardamom, Bergamot, Mandarin, Grapefruit.
middle: Heart notes: Lavender, Rosemary, Balsam Fir, Cypress, Coriander.
base: Base notes: Myrrh, Benzoin, Cedarwood, Patchouli, Vetiver, White Musk, Amber, Smoke Incense, absolute Cistus.

title: LORENZO PAZZAGLIA, CHERRY INK EXTRAIT DE  PARFUM 50ML U
description: Lorenzo Pazzaglia Cherry Ink Extrait de Parfum is a fruity unisex fragrance. A long-lasting and original perfume with an unusual, dark, and solitary Cherry, enhanced by warm spices and precious woods over a sweet and musky base. This sexy perfume intersects with an original note of Ink, giving life to a dark, captivating, deep, and reflective olfactory composition. Once sprayed, the Cherry Ink Extrait de Parfum by Lorenzo Pazzaglia evolves, revealing its boozy side of Rum and Red Wine, enhancing and warming the sweet fruity notes and finally the intense base of Amber and woods for a simply dreamy grand finale! Let yourself be conquered by Lorenzo Pazzaglia Cherry Ink Extrait de Parfum: its sweet, sensual fragrance and its endless trail will make you fall in love!
top: Top Notes: Cherry, Bergamot, Black Pepper, Rum Accord, Sour Cherry
middle: Heart Notes: Red wine, Damask Rose, Jasmine, Lily of the Valley, Mimosa, Warm spices, Ink, Myrrh
base: Base Notes: Vanilla pods, Tonka bean, Precious woods, Patchouli, Benzoin, Amber, Musk, Agarwood

title: Louis Vuitton, L’Immensite Edp 100Ml U
description: To open your arms so wide it’s as if they were wings deployed to take flight. Like a response to a vast, beckoning sea that nourishes fantasies of total freedom. Sometimes, finding yourself before a limitless horizon that stretches to the sky is all it takes to make your heart beat faster. Inspired by this invigorating impression captured during his travels, Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud composed a laser-sharp ode to freshness. A crackling whisper of ginger brightened by the bitterness of grapefruit and softened by an addictive and sensual amber note. The promise of new horizons, like a fresh page waiting to invent a new life.
top: Key notes:
middle: Fresh gingerGrapefruitLabdanumAmbroxanCascaloneAmbergri

title: Louis Vuitton, Ombre Nomade Edp 100Ml U
description: As the day passes, the path of the sun creates shimmering patterns of shadow and light on the dunes. Whilst everything else seems motionless, the desert comes alive and draws the traveler into a passionate odyssey. Designed for lovers of rare essences, Ombre Nomade concentrates that sensation of infinity into one of the most mythical ingredients in perfumery, oud wood. A rebellious material, intoxicatingly beautiful, that the Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud has faceted with a hint of benzoin and raspberry accents. Far away, a smoky wisp of incense floats towards the heavens. Never has oud been so mystical.
top: Key notes:Oud WoodBenzoin tearsIncenseRaspberry

title: M.Micallef, Vanille Patchouli Edp 100Ml U
description: Vanille Patchouli by M. Micallef is a fragrance with a voluptuous accord revealing a vibrant departure of nutmeg and saffron softened by pink berries and mandarin. The refined notes of Ylang and jasmine affirm the elegance of Madagascar vanilla inscribed in the scents of musk, patchouli and precious sandalwood.
top: Olfactory notes
middle: Top notes: nutmeg, saffron, pink pepper and mandarin orange
base: Heart notes: Praline, Ylang-ylang and Jasmine

title: Maison Crivelli, Ambre Chromatique Edp 100Ml U
description: Rainbow jungle, a spicy trek, vanilla vines, cut multicolored bark: a golden resin. Pointed flowers, a davana pigment, sunlike feathers, an akigala leaf. An amber colorama.
top: For this new creation, Thibaud Crivelli has chosen to work with one of the most iconic raw materials in perfumery: amber. He has taken inspiration from a trek through multicolored jungles in search of benzoin resin.
middle: Top notes: incense, pink peppercorn
base: Heart notes: davana, osmanthus

title: Maison Crivelli, Bois Datchai Edp 100Ml U
description: The defining adventure: a taste of spicy black tea and wild berries in the heart of a primitive forest.
top: The surprising contrast: crisp and lively berries contrast with smoky and enchanting woods.
middle: Fragrance family: woody fruity eau de parfum.
base: Key raw materials: blackcurrant bud absolute, black tea absolute, cinnamon essential oil, patchouli essential oil, cedar essential oil, leather accord.

title: MAISON CRIVELLI, HIBISCUS MAHAJAD EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: Inspired by tasting an infusion of hibiscus petals in the heart of a gemstone market, Hibiscus Majahad is a flamboyant, shimmering creation that glows with ruby red rose, crushed pomegranate and crystal clean mint, warmed by vanilla and amber. The first extrait in the Maison Crivelli collection takes you beyond the ordinary and into a colourful haze of sensual delights.
top: Top Notes: Spearmint, CinnamonHeart Notes: Damask Rose, Hibiscus, LeatherBase Notes: Vanilla & Ambrette Musk

title: Maison Crivelli, Hibiscus Mahajad Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Inspired by tasting an infusion of hibiscus petals in the heart of a gemstone market, Hibiscus Majahad is a flamboyant, shimmering creation that glows with ruby red rose, crushed pomegranate and crystal clean mint, warmed by vanilla and amber. The first extrait in the Maison Crivelli collection takes you beyond the ordinary and into a colourful haze of sensual delights.
top: Top Notes: Spearmint, CinnamonHeart Notes: Damask Rose, Hibiscus, LeatherBase Notes: Vanilla & Ambrette Musk

title: Maison Crivelli, Iris Malikhan Edp 100Ml U
description: The noble elegant iris with its delicately scented flowers and pungent roots – the famous orris rhizomes – is one of the most ancient as well as most expensive ingredients in perfumery.
top: Iris Malikhan is the vision of blue, mauve, purple and white iris blooming on the edge of an arid desert. Green leaves like swords thrust up against the brilliant cloudless sky.
middle: Iris is blended with golden mimosa to conjure an animalic, leathery note intensified and sweetened by vanilla; and by mastic resin “the tears of Chios”.
base: Top: Mimosa

title: MAISON CRIVELLI, OUD MARACUJA  EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML U
description: Maison Crivelli’s Oud Maracujá Extrait de Parfum is inspired by the heart of an oud wood forest presented with exotic contrast between the thirst-quenching freshness of passion fruit and the tropical heat of oud wood. This unique accord is enhanced by the lushness of saffron, Indonesian patchouli, leather, and a duo of Turkish rose and vanilla. Made in France.
top: TOP NOTESPassionfruitEbeliaSaffronTurkish rose
middle: HEART NOTESIndonesian patchouliBenzoin
base: BASE NOTESLeatherAmber VanillaLabdanumAkigalawood

title: Maison Crivelli, Patchouli Magnetik Edp 100Ml U
description: An Electrifying Take on Patchouli:
top: Launched in 2022, Patchouli Magnetik Extrait is an eau de parfum by the niche French fragrance house Maison Crivelli. Unlike your typical earthy or hippie-esque patchouli scents, this one takes an unexpected and modern turn, described as an “electrifying” and “bold” reinterpretation of the classic note.
middle: The perfumer, Quentin Bisch, drew inspiration for this fragrance from a rather unique and evocative image: a motorcycle ride through patchouli fields during a tropical storm. This translates to a scent that’s both earthy and woody, with the patchouli’s dark, musky tones given a jolt of energy by a “luminous and milky duo” of gardenia and sandalwood.
base: Key Notes and Fragrance Family:

title: MAISON CRIVELLI, SANTAL VOLCANIQUE EDP 100ML U
description: The scent of scorched sandalwood on the slopes of an erupting volcano. Potent and addictive sandalwood, brightened by the vibrant notes of a spicy coffee.
top: Notes: ginger, cardamom, limette, sandalwood, cedar wood, ylang-ylang, coffee, musk.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, 724 Edp 70Ml U
description: In the light of a pure sky rising over the city ascends the elegant silhouette of 724.
top: To the tempo of bergamot from Calabria, a crystalline white flower accord and sensual musks, this Eau de Parfum captures what all megalopolises have in common: that vibrant energy resonating in unison like a 724-beats-per-minute pulsation.
middle: Fragrance notes:
base: Bergamot, mandarin, jasmine, seringat, sweet pea and musks.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Aqua Celestia Forte Cologne Edp 70Ml U
description: The bergamot becomes tinged with the fruity notes of blackcurrant, mimosa (with its raspberry and blackberry facets), and jasmine (strawberry, apricot and peach accents), before gradually melting into the mellowness of a fruity musky accord. Aqua Celestia Cologne forte releases a bright, crystal-clear aura and offers a flight towards the horizon.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Aqua Celestia Forte Edp 70Ml U
description: A heavenly freshness.
top: In an aura of absolute serenity, the blue of the sky and the blue of the sea separate allowing the glow of a radiant sun to spring forth.
middle: This energising freshness, embodied by jasmine from Egypt and petigrain from Italy, offers a forte to the intensity of Aqua Celestia.
base: A light and musky burst of heaven.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Aqua Universalis Edt 70Ml U
description: Aqua Universalis Perfume by Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Women and men can benefit from wearing Aqua Universalis from Maison Francis Kurkdjian. This perfume came out in 2009, and its blend of notes produces a crisp, relaxing sensation. The aromas in the composition include Calabrian bergamot, Sicilian lemon, lily of the valley, mock orange, orange blossom, blonde wood and musk.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Aqua Vitae Forte Edp 70Ml U
description: The sun caresses your tanned skin, your senses are awakened, your inspiration overflows. Aqua vitae forte embodies a bright breeze and the power of life. This woody citrus floral eau de parfum sets the senses on fire with its citrus notes and hints of cinnamon and sandalwood.notes
top: Head notes : bergamot, cardamom, cinnamon, lemon, mandarin, pink pepper
middle: Heart notes : hedione, orange blossom, star anise, ylang-ylang
base: Base notes : haitian vetiver, mysore sandalwood.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Baccarat Rouge 540  Edp 3*11Ml U Miniature
description: Luminous and sophisticated, this eau de parfum lays on the skin like an amber, floral and woody breeze. A poetic alchemy with a graphic and highly condensed signature.
top: Notes: Jasmine, saffron, cedarwood, ambergris.
middle: A trio of travel-sized fragrances featuring the scent of Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum.
base: 11ml edp×3 kshs 27800

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Baccarat Rouge 540 Edp 70Ml U
description: Created as a celebration of the 250th anniversary of French crystal house Baccarat, this fragrance was inspired by the signature ruby crystal used in their iconic chandeliers. This romantic-feeling scent opens with the ethereal notes of jasmine and saffron, before softening into a woodier blend of amber accord and cedar. The fragrance is longwearing and has strong sillage.
top: Notes to know:Jasmine, saffron, cedar wood and ambergris.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait De Parfum 70Ml U
description: The Baccarat Rouge 540 extrait de parfum augments the strength and radiance of the fragrance’s amber woody floral aura. In this exalted version of a signature scent, jasmine blossoms and woody musks engage in an alchemy of the senses. A profusion and fusion of the elements that can only be tamed by the art of the perfumer and time-tested wisdom. Made in France.
top: NOTESGrandiflorum jasmine from EgyptSaffronBitter almond from MoroccoCedar woodMusky woody accordAmbergris

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Baccarat Rouge Extrait De Parfum 3*11Ml U Miniature
description: Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait de Parfum intensifies the power and radiance of the three breaths that compose the Eau de Parfum without betraying its original inspiration.
top: Born of the perfumer’s mastery and time-tested wisdom, this Extrait de Parfum is, for Francis Kurkdjian, a culmination.
middle: Top notes of jasmine Grandiflorum from Egypt delicately accentuate the breadth of expertise evoking both the skilful hand that picked the flower and the one that transformed it into an absolute.
base: The breath of fire is enhanced by the powdery, gourmand facets of bitter almond from Morocco, extracted as an essential oil using an ancestral process. Lastly, the breath of minerals built around ambergris softens on contact with a woody musk accord.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Cologne Forte  Edp 4*5Ml U Min Set
description: Set Maison Francis Kurrkdjian Paris Collection Cologne Forte EDP.
top: Includes 4 mini spray bottles, each 5ml.The scents in the set include:
middle: – Aqua Vitae: extremely elegant and clean, as if you have just taken a thorough bath with the gentle scent of fragrant citrus. This citrus scent awakens your senses with lemon from Calabria, mandarin from Sicily, hedione, vanilla absolute, tonka bean and gaiac wood.
base: – Aqua Media: New 2023, like a newly cut patch of grass still covered with morning dew. It’s fresh, green, rich in citrus and has a subtle, gentle bitterness from matcha. The unique highlight of fennel and verbena adds a sharp edge to the green scent on a woody and musk background

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Gentle Fluidity  Edp 2*5Ml U Min Set
description: 2 x 5ml Eau De Parfum for men and women.
top: Gentle Fluidity Gold – a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women and men launched in 2019. Notes include Vanilla, Amber, Musk, Woodsy Notes, Juniper Berries, Nutmeg and Coriander.
middle: Gentle Fluidity Silver – a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men launched in 2019. Notes include Juniper Berries, Musk, Coriander, Woodsy Notes, Nutmeg, Amber and Vanilla.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Gentle Fluidity Gold Edp 200Ml U
description: Same notes, two identities. The challenge is to create two singular eaux de parfum using the same ingredients: juniper berries, nutmeg, coriander, musks, amber wood and vanilla to express their full potential. The Gentle Fluidity duo was imagined by the perfumer to sketch two distinctive olfactive silhouettes for him and for her in a gentle blurring of identities.
top: In the generous and fully enveloping trail of gentle Fluidity Gold Maison Francis Kurkdjian, you’ll find essence of coriander seeds and an extra dose of musks and vanilla. Like the musks, the coriander seeds’ spicy floral notes add a breezy volume and lasting trail. The vanilla accord brings tasty and reassuring back notes underscored by the amber wood which sketches a bright and radiant silhouette. gentle Fluidity Gold eau de parfum diffuses comfortable notes, a reassuring musky ambery scent.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Gentle Fluidity Gold Edp 70Ml U
description: Same notes, two identities. The challenge is to create two singular eaux de parfum using the same ingredients: juniper berries, nutmeg, coriander, musks, amber wood and vanilla to express their full potential. The Gentle Fluidity duo was imagined by the perfumer to sketch two distinctive olfactive silhouettes for him and for her in a gentle blurring of identities.
top: In the generous and fully enveloping trail of gentle Fluidity Gold Maison Francis Kurkdjian, you’ll find essence of coriander seeds and an extra dose of musks and vanilla. Like the musks, the coriander seeds’ spicy floral notes add a breezy volume and lasting trail. The vanilla accord brings tasty and reassuring back notes underscored by the amber wood which sketches a bright and radiant silhouette. gentle Fluidity Gold eau de parfum diffuses comfortable notes, a reassuring musky ambery scent.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Gentle Fluidity Silver Edp 70Ml U
description: A novel concept, two fragrances that share the same ingredients, at differing strengths, to offer two unique scent profiles. Born out of Kurkdjian’s imagination, the two distinct olfactory silhouettes are composed of juniper, musk, amber, nutmeg, vanilla and coriander. Gentle Fluidity Silver is presented as the more masculine of the pair. Vibrant, fresh and aromatic, this sophisticated scent prominently features the spiciness of the nutmeg with the energising freshness of the juniper. Elegant, refined and completely charming.
top: Top notes: Pineapple.
middle: Middle notes: Bergamot, Berries, Nutmeg, PineappleCoriander.
base: Base notes: Amber wood, Cedar, Musk, Vanilla.

title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Grand Soir Edp 200Ml U

title: MAISON FRANCIS KURKDJIAN, OUD EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 70ML U
MAISON FRANCIS KURKDJIAN, OUD SATIN MOOD EDP 70ML U
description: Free interpretation of oud wood, a rare and precious material, this OUD satin mood Maison Francis Kurkdjian eau de parfum reflects the creator’s desire to bring a shimmering facet to life. Wrap yourself in the woody ambery scent to suspend time and lose yourself in the depth of the here and now. Transported by the finesse of the violet accord, the oud wood from Laos bows down to the essence of rose from Bulgaria and rose absolute from Turkey to then blend into the rich vanilla amber accord. Oud satin mood is made to be delicately worn on your skin like a rich fabric.

Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Oud Silk Mood Edp 70Ml U

title: Maison Lancome, Oud Bouquet Edp 100Ml U
description: Ôud Bouquet is a narcotic and sensual rose. It draws its mysterious depth from the heart of oriental wood and its strength from warm, captivating spices. Fabrice Pellegrin, renowned for his subtle creations, blended a trio of bold woods – composed of 20-year-old Oud Wood and smoky Guaiac Wood softened by the enveloping sweetness of Copahu Wood. The Praline Rose signature, crafted from Centifolia Rose Absolute, Vanilla and a Praline Accord, gives this fragrance an enigmatic and infinitely seductive power. [Woody Oriental]

title: Maison Lancome, Patchouli Aromatique Edp 100Ml U
description: Enhanced with the opulence of patchouli and the warm and earthy notes of vetiver, the lancôme patchouli aromatique eau de parfum makes a striking and warm fragrance choice. An enchanting offering from the parisian scent makers, the decadent fragrance is presented in a captivating glass and gold bottle that will take pride of place in your collection.

title: Maison Lancome, Tubereuse Castane Edp 100Ml U
description: Maison Lancôme Tubéreuses Castane by Lancome is a floral fragrance for women and men.

title: MAISON MARGIELA, REPLICA AT THE BERBER’S  EDT 100ML M
description: At the Barber’s scent evokes the memory of an invigorating masculine ritual: the sounds and sensations encountered at a local barber shop.
top: Get back to this relaxing instant with this aromatic Eau de Toilette. At the Barber’s is a true balance between aromatic and woody notes.Its freshness is made up with tonka beans, white musk, black pepper, rosemary, lavender and basil accord.
middle: Focus on the orchestrated ballet of gestures: a shaving brush is soaked with soapsuds before the blade slides jerkily over the skin.The trendy vintage ritual ends with the soft rustling of a warm white towel on the cheeks.
base: -Top: bigarade essence, basil accord, black pepper.

title: Maison Margiela, Replica Autumn Vibes  Edt 100Ml U

title: Maison Margiela, Replica Bubble Bath Edt 100Ml U
description: The relaxing memory of a me time moment in the bubbles of a hot scented bath. Sweet memories of relaxing moments enjoying a hot bubble bath. Slowly plunge yourself in the warm scented water and feel your body soothed from all tensions. Replica Bubble Bath by Maison Margiela makes you relive the exquisite “me time” of pure wellness. This clean & fresh eau de toilette captures the soothing sensation of a hot bath filled to the brim with fragrant soap bubbles.
top: This gentle floral fragrance is a bubble of comfort and freshness. The soothing notes of coconut milk blended with the clean freshness of the soap bubble accord recreat the relaxing feeling of a hot foaming bath.
middle: To fully evoke this moment of pure wellness, the Bubble Bath perfume makes you feel the comfort of wrapping yourself in a soft towel. This cocooning sensation is brought by enveloping notes of white musks and delicate floral notes of Rose Superessence

title: Maison Margiela, Replica By The Fireplace Edt 100Ml U

This enveloping addiction, intensified by woody notes, evokes the sweetness of a Winters evening spent by the fireplace.

title: MAISON MARGIELA, REPLICA FROM THE GARDEN EDT 100ML U
MAISON MARGIELA, REPLICA LAZY SUNDAY MORNING EDT 100ML U

title: MAISON MARGIELA, REPLICA MATCHA MEDITATION EDT 100ML U
description: A peaceful moment with oneself, at home, on a bright afternoon.Focusing on the now, feeling every gesture, all senses awaken. Relive a peaceful me-time with Matcha Meditation : mind escapes transported by a feeling of enlightenment and the soothing steam of enveloping Matcha tea.
top: Imagine you are meditating at home on a bright afternoon. Focus on the moment, feel every gesture, awaken your senses and feel your mind escape. Serenity reigns as you achieve a joyful feeling of enlightenment. The soothing steam of the warm cup of Matcha tea envelops you in a comforting sensation.
middle: This uplifting eau de toilette by Maison Margiela is a zen scent that envelops you in a peaceful and luminous sensation. The bright Bergamot and the luminous Orange blossom essences make you relive the joyful feeling of enlightenment achieved by meditation. The enveloping feeling brought by the Matcha tea accord is reinforced
base: by the warmth of the Benzoin absolute to recreate the peaceful and comforting sensation of enjoying a warm cup of matcha tea.
