title: MANCERA, SOLEIL D’ITALIA EDP 120ML U
description: Modern yet timeless, it combines effervescent notes and dynamic freshness. Soleil dItalie is a delicious of la dolce vita. This luminous perfume combines citrus, woody and earthy accords for a naturally refreshing scent thats as enriching to the soul as it is to the olfactory senses. Top notes of tart mandarin orange, Calabrian bergamot, zesty lime, bitter orange, spicy cardamom and pink pepper lead to a bold, exhilarating opening. Notes of elegant Bulgarian rose, heady patchouli leaf and various watery tones lend a lush, balancing layer at the heart. Completing the essence are base notes of guaiac wood, white musk, marine ambergris, fresh cedar and vetiver for a bright and illuminating aroma thats impossible to ignore. Perfect for daytime wear during the spring and summer months.
top: Top notesCedarwood, Grey amber, Vetiver, White musk
middle: Mid notes: Aquatic notes, Patchouli leaves, RoseCardamom, Pink pepper
base: Base notes: citrus, woody

title: Mancera, Tonka Cola Edp 120Ml U
description: On the trail of this famous spearhead of pop culture, invented in the United States, we followed in the footsteps of caravans, travelers and kola nut merchants. This journey took us from the hectic modernity of the world’s great metropolises to the warm plains of the sunset empires, where the tonka bean awaited us. Sweet and engaging, pop and elegant, Tonka Cola will catch you in the moment.
top: HEAD NOTESSicilian Lemon, Nutmeg & Cinnamon Stick, Black Cherry.
middle: HEART NOTESFizzy Cola, Indonesian Patchouli, Orange Flowers.
base: BASE NOTESBrazilian Tonka Beans, Balmy Benzoin & Labdanum, Powdery Vanilla.

title: Mancera, Velvet Vanilla Edp 120Ml U
description: Velvet vanilla is an aromatic fruity floral scent for both men and women to wear. Simply amazing. Absolutely stunning. Be prepared as one whiff and you will be in love.
top: A fresh fruity scent with great floral notes that will charm you. The spicy notes and some spunk to the blend and the base notes add warmth and depth to this scent that will enchant you.
middle: The top notes are pear, clove, pink pepper, angelica, mandarin orange and black currant.
base: The heart notes are tuberose, jasmine, neroli and rose.

title: Mancera, Vetiver Sensuel Edp 120Ml U
description: The classy, yet sophisticated scent of Vetiver Sensuel is a floral and woody perfume for women and men from the design house of Mancera.
top: At the start are refreshing notes of orange, bergamot, lime, pepper and lemon. The heart is intense with hints from patchouli, mint and orchid, while the base is filled with notes of white musk, amber, oakmoss and vetiver and woody notes.

title: Mancera, Wild Fruits Edp 120Ml U
description: Juicy citrus fruits have incredible power. They refresh, re-energise and beautifully brighten the entire day. The Mancera Wild Fruits Eau de Parfum consists of fresh notes of citrus fruit combined with sweet apples and peaches, which are complemented by warming cedar.
top: a refreshing citrus fragrancea unisex fragrance for both women and menideal especially for the summer monthsThe Wild Fruits fragrance is a spectacular basket full of fruit. Citrus notes of kumquat, grapefruit and lemon intertwine with apple, peach and tart blackcurrant. The violet leaves add airiness, whilst cedar and white musk give the fragrance a calming aroma.
middle: Story of the fragrance
base: This fragrance is by the French brand Mancera, which makes its perfumes from precious and luxurious ingredients. The brand gets inspiration from the style of Art Deco, which is reflected in the design of the bottle. Like all Mancera’s fragrances, Mancera Wild Fruit was created with the aim of pleasing lovers of perfume by combining the best from the western and oriental styles.Ingredients

title: Marc Antoine Barrois, Ganymede Edp 100Ml U
description: Second opus of the creative duo composed of designer Marc-Antoine Barrois and perfumer Quentin Bisch, Ganymede is inspired by the eponymous planet orbiting Jupiter, discovered in 1610 by Galileo. A rocky planet hilly by multiple craters, it is marked by the powerful notes of leather and suede. If you explore its surface, you may encounter oceans of salt water whose pungency is reminded by saffron. This natural satellite takes its name from the eponymous character of Greek mythology:
top: Ganymede, a human whose impeccable beauty earned him the elevation to the rank of cupbearer of the Gods; a beauty that softens the leathery notes thanks to its perfume of violet and Chinese osmanthus, and a vivacity translated by the acidic mandarin. Ganymede will later become the lover of Zeus, who will grant him immortality, like the scent of the immortelle found at the heart of the fragrance.
middle: Head notesmandarin, saffron
base: Heart noteseverlasting, osmanthus, violet

title: Marc Antoine Barrois, Ganymede Extrait De Parfum50Ml U
description: Jupiter’s immense satellite has not only inspired our perfume’s name but is also known to be full of craters and to have an underground ocean vaster than all of earth’s oceans put together. The perfume’s creators, Marc-Antoine Barrois and Quentin Bisch, have imagined it here in a world with an atmosphere brimming with aromatics that it becomes combustible: its sky is gleaming with the sour spike of mandarin and the holy fumaroles of incense and myrrh. It’s a planet covered with warm velvet dunes where the spicy and caramelized everlasting flower is preponderant. The fiery heart of this fragrance reminds us that the gods gave Ganymede eternal life so that his beauty would never fade. Is it the smouldering skin hidden underneath the wild leather? This precious perfume extract is as much a sophisticated perfume as a carnal one.Ganymede EXTRAIT unfolds in its dizzying trail the seduction of great classics.
top: The sound of the waves from far away. The wind is sweeping a field of everlasting flowers. The sun takes out its right and heats the spicy, almost syrupy scent of these yellow flowers. The waves are caressing the dune.The wind picks up the sand into warm, leathery, heady gusts- incense, myrrhe? Grains of sand are twirling, incandescent. The rock is flushing, The Akigala wood and Mandarin bring minerals and freshness. The air becomes… captivating.

title: MARC ANTOINE BARROIS, TALIA EDP 100ML U
description: The first floral fragrance in a constellation, Tilia is also named after a fictitious star, symbolizing for its creator Marc-Antoine Barrois and his long-time collaborator, perfumer Quentin Bisch, a sentinel of happy moments.
top: This creation celebrates simplicity and optimism. This fragrance evokes eternal summer, enduring vacations, and endless lunches with friends in the countryside, around a large wooden table. It captures the essence of flowers in endless bloom. A fragrance evoking the soft greenness and delicacy of spring, with notes of lime blossom and orange blossom, accented by the freshness of jasmine sambac and underscored by thewoody, vanilla nuances of ambrox, cedar and heliotrope.

title: MASQUE MILANO, L’ATTESA 100ML U
description: Act III: Falling in Love – Scene One: L’Attesa – A cocktail of emotions while you await that first encounter. Under the moonlight, a summer breeze filled with bergamot and neroli intertwines with a sophisticated accord of champagne. A trio of iris meets elegant tuberose and sensual ylang ylang, completing this sumptuous bouquet. With a touch of oakmoss, anticipation becomes exhilaration, in the calm before the storm. If only these moments could last forever; The wait is almost over.
top: Head Notes:Italian Bergamot, Moroccan Neroli, Champagne accord.
middle: Heart Notes: Italian Iris abs., Italian Iris Root Butter, French Iris Root Butter, Tuberose abs., Ylang Ylang Madagascar.
base: Base Notes: Sandalwood Mysore, Oakmoss, Leather accord.

title: MASQUE MILANO, LOVE KILLS 100ML U
description: Love Kills by Masque Milano is a Floral fragrance for women and men. On the “Love” side of things, the fragrance opens with joyful brightness, using a mouthwateringly juicy lychee note to introduce a sparkling, ambrette-tinted rose oxide. As it blossoms into a full-bodied, romantic Turkish rose absolute, we see the darker, more sensual, “Killer” side of the equation- sultrier floral tones, animalic musk, and a woodsy patchouli distillation with a decidedly. thorny quality. It’s a portrait of love in full- the joy, the hope, the intensity, and even the heartbreak.
top: Top notes: turkish rose
middle: Heart notes: patchouli
base: Base notes: cedarwood, musk, and amber

title: MASQUE MILANO, MANDALA 100ML U
description: Mandala opens with a kaleidoscope of spices, creating the feeling of a whopping medical-dipped oud, sweaty, shuddering and sensual. Yet no agarwood was employed in the composition.
top: A steroidal incense work, myrrh and frankincense smashed into one-another with great energy. Christian’s perfume work is cleverly composed of ingredients he understands very well and combined in such a way as to impact the senses in a vivid-fireworks-in-the dark style.
middle: The myrrh and frankincense punch out at you simultaneously; for a dizzying moment the mind and nose are overwhelmed. You’d be forgiven for thinking these two notes will be the only things you will smell, such is the kickass joy of the overture. Then then two coalesce into a single high-toned note, steady and unbroken, the odd vegetal bitterness of the myrrh smoothed out by the woody ancient Zen of frankincense. Two materials in fascinating harmony yet still discernible as separate components.
base: Head Notes: Frankincense, Nutmeg, Angelica.

title: MASQUE MILANO, TIMES SQUARE 100ML U
description: In MASQUE MILANO Times Square, extremes are intersecting, the excess becomes norm, as people are surrendering to the restless indulgence and irresistible wildness of the city that never sleeps.
top: Mind you: the surprising opening of glossy lipstick and hazelnut spread will blow you away!
middle: The floral heart expresses a visible sensuality, seductive and provocative, with a prominent white floral tuberose, and the supple suede texture of the osmanthus. The drydown , with the styrax – representing the rubber of the many taxis lining up in Broadway – perfectly blends with the soft notes of sandalwood and gajacwood, to support the sensuality and offer to the wearer a memorable drydown.
base: Head Notes: Hazelnut Accord, Glossy Lipstick Accord.

title: Matiere Premiere, Bois D’Ebene Edp 100Ml U
description: Bois d’Ebene by Matiere Premiere
top: Olfactive Family – Ambery Wood
middle: Bois d’Ebene is a dark Ambery wood fragrance.
base: Aurélien Guichard has taken Guaiac Wood oil from Paraguay and strengthened the woody density with Patchouli oil from Indonesia and Cypriol oil from India. The ambery facet is accentuated by the addition of Cabreuva oil from Brazil.

title: Matiere Premiere, Cologne Cedrat Edp 100Ml U
description: With Cologne Cédrat, Aurélien Guichard has taken up a major challenge: ensuring that the freshness of a cologne lasts over time. Italian citron, reminiscent of the lively effect of zests, is combined with essence of Madagascar pepper and pink berries from Argentina, for a vibrantly spicy side. Italian bergamot, in head notes, brings a floral note to the fragrance. Finally, maté notes from Paraguay amplify the impression of freshness of this citrus cologne.notes
top: families : citrus spicy
middle: head notes : black pepper, cedrat, italian bergamot, lemon, mate, pink pepper
base: heart notes : orange blossom

title: Matiere Premiere, Crystal Saffron Edp 100Ml U
description: Matiere Premiere, Crystal Saffron Edp 100Ml U

title: MATIERE PREMIERE, CRYSTAL SAFFRON EDP 100ML U
Matiere Premiere, Discovery Mini Set U
description: Matiere Premiere Discovery Set6 x 6ml Eau de Parfumby Aurélien Guichard
top: Matiere Premiere discovery set of 6 x 6ml Eau de Parfum, created by master perfumer Aurélien Guichard.
middle: Includes
base: Santal Austral,

title: Matiere Premiere, Encens Suave Edp 100Ml U
description: INITIAL IDEA: “A black incense, addictive and carnal”
top: MAIN INGREDIENT: Resin Incense Somalia
middle: CREATIVE APPROACH: The sensuality of the Incense note is accentuated by Labdanum Absolute Andalusia and Benzoin Absolute Laos. The addictive facet is supported by Coffee Extraction Venezuela and Vanilla Absolute Madagascar.

title: Matiere Premiere, Falcon Leather Edp 100Ml U
description: Place your hand in the leather glove, close your fist and wait for the claws of the bird of prey to sink into the fabric. The scent of cistus labdanum and saffron accentuate the facets of the falconer’s equipment in tanned nubuck. An ancient art placed at the heart of this creation accompanied by the woody notes of birch bark.notes
top: Head notes : bergamot.
middle: Heart notes : labdanum cistus.
base: Base notes : benzoin, birch, leather, moss.

title: Matiere Premiere, French Flower Edp 100Ml U
description: The intoxicating smell of a tuberose field at night.
top: Create a bouquet of Tuberose with Absolute and Enfleurage of Tuberose petals. Nigeria Ginger amplifies the whiteness of the flower. Chinese Tea Leaf Essence and a Green Pear accord underline the vegetal character of this stemmed flower.
middle: Absolute and Enfleurage Tuberose France, extracted from tuberoses organically grown by MATIERE PREMIERE.

title: Matiere Premiere, Neroli Oranger Edp 100Ml U
description: Working around purity, Aurélien Guichard focuses here on Tunisian orange blossom, with its sweet regressive scent. The neroli and the ylang-ylang in the heart bring to the fragrance, of classic appearance, a fresh and crystalline side. The presence of bergamot in the head sublimates the perfume by completing its sparkling facet. Finally, the musk in the base notes fixes and softens the fragrance.notes
top: ingredientsfamilies : floral powder
middle: head notes : italian bergamot, neroli
base: heart notes : orange blossom, ylang-ylang

title: Matiere Premiere, Radical Rose Edp 100Ml U
description: The melodious song of the birds; the water of a fountain flowing gently; the morning dew delicately deposited on each button. Then the perfume that emanates. Every morning, in Grasse, Matiere Premiere’s centifolia roses are harvested according to a family and regional know-how. Celebrating in each of his creations a particular material, Aurélien Guichard, from a family of noses for 7 generations, revisits it to highlight or hide some of its facets. Here, the rose appears as an obvious choice. But in the end, it surprises us with its infinite character. Its notes dazzle at the top, where bay pepper and saffron illuminate the scent of the queen of flowers. Then, like a chiaroscuro, patchouli, vanilla and cistus labdanum bewitch and reveal its darker aspect. The most intense concentration of centifolia rose absolute in the world for an extreme, unconditional, fanatical overdose.notes
top: Head notes : berry pepper, saffron.
middle: Heart notes : rose.
base: base notes : labdanum cistus, patchouli, vanilla.

title: Matiere Premiere, Santal Austral Edp 100Ml U
description: Santal Austral was conceived as a ‘Sensual White Wood’.
top: Aurélien Guichard wanted to emphasise the creamy velvety facet with an almond milk Iris Absolute from Tuscany. He then strengthens the Organic Australian Sandalwood with the addictive Benzoin Absolute from Loas with Tonka Bean Absolute from Venezuela.
middle: Head Notes – Almond MilkHeart Notes – Australian Sandalwood, Florentine IrisBase Notes – Benzoin, Tonka Bean

title: MATIERE PREMIERE, VANILLA POWDER EDP 100ML U
description: For this new creation, Aurélien Guichard places vanilla at the heart of his olfactory approach, giving birth to an explosive composition that marries the modernity of Coconut powder with the irresistible addictive character of Madagascar vanilla (from the Fair For Life agricultural program). To perfect this olfactory balance, light Palo Santo wood lends an elegant verticality and structure, while white musks envelop the whole to create a contemporary, luminous trail. The result is a captivating fragrance that celebrates the richness and warmth of vanilla while infusing it with a touch of modernity and sophistication.
top: Top notes: Coconut Powder
middle: Heart notes: Vanilla Absolute
base: Base notes: Palo Santo, Musk

title: Memo, African Leather Edp 75Ml U
description: For the fourth installment of the Cuirs Nomades series, exploring various facets of leather scents through a global journey, MEMO has abandoned the peculiar comforts of Europe (previous editions in this series were French, Italian and Irish) for a taste of the wild. Like the bright Kenyan sun above the plains of the Serengeti, African Leather is at once impossibly vibrant and undeniably full of life, a deeply aromatic, richly spiced floral leather with all the soulfulness and natural magnetism of the world’s last unspoiled habitat.
top: African Leather opens with a burst of gorgeously vivid exoticism, as stunningly bright bergamot illuminates a wondrous and wild blend of green, herbal spices, cardamom, cumin and saffron combining for a hugely evocative, ruggedly sensual set of top notes. In the grassy, floral heart, wild vetiver combines with a stunning geranium absolute that delivers commanding depth and a feral edge that rolls perfectly into the titular leather, a majestically unpolished, animalic leather that evokes tooth and fur, hide and claw, feeling as savagely regal as the great beasts of the savannah. Take an unforgettable journey with African Leather, and get in touch with your wild side.
middle: African Leather Notes
base: Bergamot, cardamom, saffron, cumin, geranium, patchouli, oud, leather, vetiver, musk

title: MEMO, DISCOVERY SET 7 *1.5ML U
description: With seven travel-sized minis (1.5ml each) combined into one gorgeous set, MEMO PARIS’ Discovery Kit will allow you to indulge yourself in the luxurious beauty of a brand inspired by each and every corner of the globe.
top: African LeatherOil of Cardamom, Geranium absolute, Leather accord
middle: MaduraiTurmeric Essence, Sambac Jasmine, Absolute Peach
base: French LeatherLime essence, Rose essence, Suede accord

title: MEMO, FLAM EDP 75ML U
Memo, French Leather Edp 75Ml U
description: With its lime and rose essences and its suede accord evoking the inside of a handbag, this scent signs the adventure of a French rose, the one that makes your eyes shine. French leather is a fragrance that hones the senses, as all worthy Parisian women should do.
top: Top Note: Clary Sage, Juniper, Lime, Pink Peppercorn
middle: Heart Note: Pink water, Resin, White Cedar
base: Base Note: Skin, Vetiver, White Musk

title: Memo, Irish Leather Edp 200Ml U
description: Like a nod to the Irish origins of Memo Paris’ co-founder, this fragrance blends his leather accord with the windy freshness of juniper berries and green mate absolute.
top: Top notePink Pepper, Sage, Juniper Berries.
middle: Heart noteParaguay Tea, Grass, Iris.
base: Base noteTonka Bean, Leather, Ambergris

title: MEMO, KEDU EDP 75ML U
description: Sesame and grapefruit come together and merge like the landscape that inspired them, the high plain of Kedu. Nestled on the island of Java, at the heart of Indonesia, this land is fertile, luxuriant and volcanic in one. The generosity of nature and the eruptive proximity of the Merapi volcano resound in echo, just like the promise of sesame and the burst of grapefruit answer one another. The same vitality, the same vigorous energy flows from one to the other, giving the composition all of its depth and breadth.
top: Notes
middle: Neroli, oil of Mandarin, Maté absolute, Freesia accord, Rose-peony accord, Moss

title: Memo, Marfa Edp 75Ml U
description: Marfa. A destination with a unique destiny. Its bottle emblazoned with a wide-open eye provides the first clue. Deep in the Texas, Marfa beckons the eye and holds its gaze. Marfa has a power of attraction like no other, like the tuberose Absolute: a bewitching, lingering, unforgettable flower. Marfa evokes the singular nature of this white-hot land.
top: The eye of a tuberose
middle: Marfa. A destination with a unique destiny. Its bottle emblazoned with a wide-open eye provides the first clue.
base: Notes

title: Memo, Ocean Leather Edp 75Ml U
description: With Ocean Leather, Memo decides to leave the mainland to embark on a major destination, an infinitely blue one, the ocean, and sets off in search of a majestic cetacean, a mythical animal that has inspired literature and now the imagination of a perfume. Ocean Leather transports you in its current, its wake and its movement. An oceanic freshness given by Mandarin Oil and Elemi essence meets the depths of Leather Accord, Vetiver and Cedar essences. Top notes: mandarin orange, violet and basil Heart notes: elemi, cedar and sage Base notes: nutmeg, vetiver and leather

title: Memo, Russian Leather Edp 75Ml U
description: Memo is venturing into the northern realms where humans are scarce. An exposed and lofty space, where everything is intensely Russian. In this kingdom of bleak steppes, endless forests and icy plains, the boldness of plant life emerges in full glory. The stubborn fern challenging the tundra inspires a fougère accord that takes pride of place in the fragrance.
top: Fougere accord, Oil of rosemary, Leather accord
middle: Oil of basil, Oil of Cedar leaf, Oil of Siberian pine needle, Oil of Coriander seed, Heart of Lavandin, Mint, Oil of Nutmeg, Oil of Guaiac, Oil of Patchouli, Tonka bean absolute, Oil of clary sage, Cypress absolute

title: MEMO, SHERWOOD EDP 75ML U
description: A sandalwood cream, with a deep and mellow woody signature enhanced by upcycled oakwood. Creamy woods colored in red, faceting them with sparkling balckcurrant buds and a bouquet of warm spice, including fusing pink pepper.
top: Top notes are Carrot Seeds, Black Currant and Pink Pepper;
middle: Middle notes are Orange Blossom, Damask Rose and Spices;
base: Base notes are Sandalwood, Cashmeran and Oak.

title: Memo, Sicilian Leather Edp 75Ml U
description: An immaculate journey, accompanied by the most faithful companion: the leather luggage. Between volcanic earth and seismic sea, the accord of bitter orange, bergamot, lime, coriander and cardamom is perfect. End your day’s walk by a fire, where leather, cedar and gaiac wood merge. The door opens, a breath of fresh air with the scent of dakigala wood and violet takes hold of our backpacker.
top: Top notes: Bitter orange, cardamom, cedrat, coriander, italian bergamot, lime
middle: Mid notes: Fir, balsam, violet leaf.
base: Base notes: gayac wood, indonesian patchouli, leather, morocco cedar

title: Memo, Sintra Edp 75Ml U
description: Sintra, like a reminiscence of childhood with its marshmallow note brought by Orange blossom Absolut, petitgrain, Vanilla Madagascar Absolut. Both mellow and airy, thanks to the presence of musks, it is a very round, with a floral and fruity sweetness. Gourmet yet light, resolutely addictive.
top: Notes:
middle: Orange Blossom Neroli Absolute, Madagascar Vanilla, Marshmallow Musks

title: Memo, Tamarindo Edp 75Ml U
description: Tamarindo is lined with lush wilderness, surrounded by turquoise waters beyond the primal forest and mountains. Giant tamarind trees are home to colourful parrots, their cries ringing through the jungle, the warm forest air made humid with forgotten scents. A round of captivating notes, a dizzying dance beneath the sun. Tamarindo is a well-guarded secret, a joyful landscape, a trail of happiness, a solar scent. Lose yourself, let the journey of this vagabond seed be your guide.
top: Notes
middle: Pineapple flower
base: Tamarindo is lined with lush wilderness, surrounded

title: MEMO, TIGER’S NEST EDP 75ML U
description: Tiger’s Nest from Memo Paris emerges from the sacred mountain of Bhutan. A tiger’s lair, nestled between the forest and the impenetrable clouds, overlooks the abyss of the valley. Dazzling.
top: Top: Absinthe essence, Aldehyde, Lime
middle: Heart: Amber, Saffron, Incense absolute, Osmanthus, Ylang Ylang, Rose
base: Base: Papyrus, Vanilla, Balsam of ToluIntensity

title: Min New York, Magic Circus Edp 75Ml U
description: Turn of the century,a carnivaltravels at dusk.
top: A scrumptious,gourmand perfume.A splendid wonderswirlingin enchantment.
middle: Top: Bergamot, Pink Peppercorn, Ananas & Cotton Candy
base: Heart: Cistus, Labdanum, Nuts & Geranium

title: Mizensir, Bois De Mysore Edp 100Ml U
description: No perfumer had approached sandalwood like this. The tree as a whole, from the top to the roots. And not as is customary, as an ingredient signing the compositions with its enveloping and woody nuances. Here, it is the green of the leaf, its freshness and its sweetness that Alberto Morillas evokes with green cardamom and violet leaf. It is also the heart of the wood, the very trunk of the tree with a sandalwood from Sri Lanka, creamy and dense. And immersed in the earth, the roots, via very special white musks like Vulcanolide®. Mineral, earthy, it blends with sandalwood to reveal a barely powdery sensuality, carnal like suede. A sumptuous skin wood.
top: OLFACTORY FAMILY: WOODY
middle: TOP NOTES: MANDARIN ESSENCE, NEROLI ESSENCE, GREEN CARDAMOM ESSENCE
base: HEART NOTES: JASMINE SAMBAC ABSOLUTE FROM INDIA, VIOLET LEAF ABSOLUTE,

title: Mizensir, Bois Iridescent Edp 100Ml U
description: Iridescent Wood . What a strange name. Iridescent as iridescent, rainbow? All the magic is there. In this enigma which says in two words the fascination of a perfumer for the woody accord that he has always explored. Here, Alberto Morillas has turned it into a “flower wood” crossed by a ray of light. Solar with essences of bergamot and mandarin, crystalline freshness with Paradisone®. A powdery and floral touch thanks to the concrete iris in duo with the violet leaf. Both form the heart of the composition, which extends into the woody density and comfort of sandalwood, to which Cétalox ® adds an amber-musky nuance. Bois Iridescent is a certain idea of wood, a sublimation of the material that transports us elsewhere.
top: Top notes are Bergamot, Mandarin Orange and Hedione;
middle: Middle notes are iris and Violet Leaf;
base: Base notes are Sandalwood and Ambergris.

title: MIZENSIR, EAU DE GINGEMBRE EDP 100ML U
description: A wave of icy water is transposed here into a fragrance, enlivened by a citrusy wind. A souvenir of the master perfumer’s trip to India, where the atmosphere is regularly refreshed with ginger-scented water, this citrusy composition with spicy notes reinvents the eau de cologne genre.
top: The composition borrows the rhizomes’ vivid and intense notes, which mingle with the bergamot, neroli and petit grain accords with slightly floral nuances. At the heart of the fragrance, the SFE ginger extract obtained by CO2 extraction, which keeps intact the purity of its facets. An accord of fig leaf and cypress essence extends the ginger’s freshness. A sober and audacious creation, as a dive into the ice water.
middle: Top notes: essence of bergamote de Calabre, SFE ginger extract, Tunisian neroli, petit grain.
base: Heart notes: fig leaf accord, cypress essence.

title: Mizensir, Elixir De Musc Edp 100Ml U
description: A soft skin is lulled by the first rays of sunlight. While closing our eyes, the warmth of the summer light carries our body and mind into a deep sleep. The master perfumer Alberto Morillas conceived this fragrance as an elixir of musks, so powdery and enveloping that we dream of falling asleep with.
top: This composition has no top notes whatsoever. At the heart of the fragrance, an overdose of musks, sunny yet delicate, such as muscenone and habanolide, provide the perfume with a “second skin” effect. Iris concrete, intensely powdery, and vibrant amber woods, such as limbanol, reinforce the depth of the fragrance. Elixir de Musc is a scented cocoon that envelops us while letting us envelop itself.Olfactive family: MUSKY – WOODY
middle: No top note
base: Heart notes: concrete iris, Limbanol, Habanolide.

title: MIZENSIR, EPINE E ROSE EDP 100ML U
description: This is not a rose. It is much more than that. It is all that makes strength, sometimes cruelty, often the mystery of a flower in armor. Here, we must therefore forget what we think we know about the rose. Its apparent fragility, its femininity, the softness of its petals. You have to change your look and focus on what makes it a flower apart: its thorns. This perfume has the spiciness of ginger and peppers, the dark part of agarwood and incense. And to underline this duality, the delicate essence of Bulgarian rose contrasts with the power of an intense wood, limbanol. Epine de Rose shows another dimension of the flower, its lethal weapon that makes it captivating and elusive.
top: Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Ginger and Agarwood (Oud);
middle: Middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Pink Pepper and Black Pepper;
base: Base notes are Cedar and Incense.

title: Mizensir, For Your Love Edp 100Ml U
description: The power of scent is such that Mizensir has pretty much bottled passion into its For Your Love Eau de Parfum. Capturing the rush of taking a risk, it translates the intimacy of a kiss into olfactory sensations. The raspberry note is reminiscent of powdery lipstick, while benzoin and patchouli combine to recreate the sensual caress of skin touching skin with their depth and sweetness.
top: Top notes: raspberry, Exaltone.
middle: Heart Notes: caremelised flowers, rose, paradisone, Cachalox.
base: Base Notes: benzoin, patchouli.

title: Mizensir, Golden Oud Edp 100Ml U
description: Oud Assafi, the extraordinary ingredient the center of this captivating fragrance comes from an essential oil found near the Bangladesh-India border. One leisurely summer day, Alberto Morillas caught a whiff of the scent lingering in the air while walking along Lake Geneva. He instantly recognized it and was inspired to craft Golden Oud.
top: Beginning with a delicate Bulgarian rose and incense, the fragrance slowly merges with earthy papyrus and soulful Oud Assafi®, the purest essential oil there is. Amyris wood and Cétalox® at the base infuse Golden Oud with a richness and sensuality that’s hard to forget.

title: Mizensir, L Envers Du Paradis Edp 100Ml U
description: Alberto Morillas knows his pink pepper well enough to pull its freshness out thanks to green cardamom, iced and sour with a duo of Cascalone and bergamot. Spicy and fresh, ambrox sensual and addictive note is yet dominating mixing gently with the woody and musky notes of Muscenone and Clearwood. On the skin? The vibrancy of hot and cold.
top: TOP NOTES: CALABRIAN BERGAMOT ESSENCE, CASCALONE, PINK PEPPER ESSENCE.
middle: HEART NOTES: GUATEMALAN GREEN CARDAMOM ESSENCE.
base: BASE NOTES: AMBROX, CLEARWOOD, MUSCENONE.

title: Mizensir, Mythique Vetyver Edp 100Ml U
description: Mizensir, Mythique Vetyver Edp 100Ml U

title: Mizensir, Perfect Oud Edp 100Ml U
description: Freeze frame. Heated by the embers, a few pieces of oud burn very slowly. In front of our eyes, the metamorphosis of an extraordinary wood which reveals all its depth. Nevertheless, this is only a vision. Master perfumer Alberto Morillas chose not to use the natural essence of the famous wood, while rather representing its olfactory memory. The emotions evoked by the memory of the embers that turn crimson, the fine volutes perfuming at once our body, the fabrics and our skin are therefore highlighted.
top: In this woody memory, the Alaskan cedar is the undisputed protagonist. Rarely used in perfumery, it gently reveals nuances of leather and incense. Refreshed by coriander and bergamot, it burns with cade wood. Incandescent and radical, it becomes rounder in contact with the floral notes of rose and iris. And the scroll finally becomes a scented trail.
middle: Top notes: essence of bergamot, essence of coriander, essence of Bulgarian rose.
base: Heart notes: concrete iris, oud accord.

title: Mizensir, Poudre D’Or Edp 100Ml W
description: Once upon a time, a magician wanted to stop time to capture a precise moment in the day – that moment when the night comes and the candles glow resembling gold dust. The atmosphere is soft, everything is calm, everyone is getting ready for the night, to capture these golden hours the magician borrows the perfumers’ palette and all its luminous and comforting scents. In MIZENSIR’s Poudre D’or Eau De Parfum, the explosiveness of paradisone and the softness of the tiare flower gives a powdery nearly tactile feel. A duo of rare musk with a concrete iris underlined with sandalwood and vanilla. Then the magician doses his recipe with extreme precision to achieve a perfect harmony. This divine potion reminds us of the golden evening light

title: Mizensir, Solar Blossom Edp 100Ml U
description: Seville, 1960. “Blossoming orange trees perfume the patio under the intense spring sun. A light breeze from the sea calls us to reach the beach, while vanilla ice cream awaits us in the shade. Thus the master perfumer Alberto Morillas describes the sunny moments spent in Spain during his childhood, lulled by a sun that was both powerful and comforting.
top: Paradison and neroli evoke the notes of fresh water that was thrown on the hot tiles. Orange blossom and jasmine sambac are a tribute to the warm air saturated with perfumes, while vanilla superabsolute brings a gourmande sweetness. A mille-feuille of olfactory reminiscences concentrated around a soft and regressive orange blossom, barely sweet like a gourmandise from childhood.
middle: Olfactive family: CITRUS
base: Top notes: essence of bigarade neroli, Paradisone

title: Montale, Aoud Night Edp 100Ml U
description: The mysterious power of an Aoud from Malaysia reveals a precious heart of subtle Rose and Patchouli and leaves a very rich sillage of Amber and Leather harmoniously intertwined with pleasing Guaiac Wood and Sandalwood from Mysore.

title: Montale, Arabians Edp 100Ml U
description: A powerful oriental scent inspired by the “King of the Desert” The Arabian Horse.Lavender, Leather, Red Thyme, Cardamom, Patchouli, Malaysian Aoud, Vetiver, Rose, Amber and Animal Musk: charisma and mystery for a unisex perfume in the sillage of an elegant king.
top: Top Notes: Red Thyme, Cardamon, Lavender
middle: Heart Notes: Patchouli, Vetiver, Rose
base: Base Notes: Leather, Oud, Ambergris, Musk

title: Montale, Arabians Tonka Edp 100Ml U
description: Arabians Tonka, intended for lovers of rare perfumes, is the complice of Arabians, a tribute fragrance to the Arabic Horse. A fine blend of spiced volutes, bewitching Roses, Tonka Bean and Bergamot reveal an animal temperament of Oud, Amber and Musk. An audacious, racy and fiery fragrance, with an almost feminine look.

title: Montale, Chocolate Greedy Edp 100Ml U
description: Chocolate Greedy is a mouthwatering ode to delectable creaminess, a luscious, rich ganache of incredible scrumptiousness. The middle stage has an attractive hint of powderiness that makes us think of the highest-quality Cocoa generously sprinkled on very expensive truffles with a subtle undertone of Bitter Orange. The Chocolate creaminess turns the drydown of Chocolate Greedy into an exquisitely, subtly gourmand skin scent, delicate, enveloping and very sensual.
top: A must have for chocoholics, which is to say, a must have for everybody!

title: Montale, Dark Vanilla Edp 100Ml U
description: Dark Vanilla will warm your heart thanks to its sensual notes of resinous Vanilla, Spices and Amber. Sandalwood, Leather and Oud Wood give it an intense oriental sillage, intimate and narcotic.

title: Montale, Day Dreams Edp 100Ml U
description: Reminiscing warm summer nights in Greece, where the daylight is endless.
top: The air evokes the scent of Orange Blossom, Jasmine and Mandarin. The Neroli, the Tiare Flower and the Sandalwood awake the night into a surprising Vanilla – Coconut realm.

title: MONTALE, FRUITS OF THE MUSC EDP 100ML U
description: A fruity garden of Italy: Mandarin of Sicily, Bergamot of Calabria. The Blackberries, the Raspberries and the Strawberry Leaves harmonized with the Bulgarian Roses, underlined by the delicate and soft White Musk.
top: Notes: Mandarin Orange, Bergamont, Strawberry Leaf, Raspberry, Rose, Musk, Blackberry.

title: MONTALE, HOLY NEROLI EDP 100ML U
description: Montale Holy Neroli is a unisex fruity-floral fragrance launched in 2023. Its creator is the popular perfumer Pierre Montale. It is sophisticated and exciting, enriched with high-quality ingredients that are a real feast for the senses.
top: The top notes open with a refreshing combination of neroli, bitter orange, and Sicilian bergamot. The heart is a seductive mix of delicate Tunisian orange blossom, sensual Bulgarian rose, and velvety cedar. The base is deep and mesmerizing, saturated with the scent of vanilla sugar, warm amber, and mysterious white musk.Montale Holy Neroli comes in an elegant designer bottle with golden accents. The perfume is designed for the representatives of both sexes, who love new and intriguing perfumes.
middle: Top notes: neroli, bitter orange, Sicilian bergamot
base: Middle notes: Tunisian orange blossom, Bulgarian rose, cedar

title: MONTALE, HONEY AOUD 100ML U
description: An irresistible honeyed heart enclosing Leaves of Patchouli from Sumatra and Delicate Floral Notes, spirited with lively Cinnamon from Ceylan, is magnified with precious Laotian Aoud, Rich Amber, Leather and greedy Vanilla Pods from Madagascar.

title: Montale, Intense Cafe Edp 100Ml U
description: Montale’s Intense Cafe opens with a perfect waft of fresh brewing coffee that will take your breath away.
top: The flourish of coffee bean is paired with a fresh, vegetal rose. The two combine for an unexpectedly dry and refreshing top note.
middle: As the coffee softens, a vanillic white musk emerges, slightly sweetening the brew with just a hint of cream and sugar.
base: Even in the final ambery drydown the coffee remains as a rich and nutty presence. This addictive and surprising gourmand is suitable for both men and women, and is the perfect fix for the coffee addict in all of us.

title: MONTALE, LOUBAN 100ML U
MONTALE, OUD ISLAND EDP 100ML U
Montale, Ristretto Intense Cafe 100Ml U
description: Intense Café Ristretto opens with a perfect waft of fresh brewing coffee that will take your breath away. The flourish of the coffee bean is paired with a fresh, vegetal rose. The two combine for an unexpectedly dry and refreshing top note.As the coffee softens, a vanillic white musk emerges, slightly sweetening the brew with just a hint of cream and sugar. This addictive and surprising gourmand is suitable for both men and women and is the perfect fix for the coffee addict in all of us.
top: Top notesCoffee, Rose of Turkey
middle: Heart notesSugar, Whipped cream
base: Base notesVanilla, White Musk

title: Montale, Rose Night Edp 100Ml U
description: Elegant leaves of Rose enfold an enchanting heart of crystalline essence of Bulgarian Rose combined to Patchouli from Sumatra and warmed by rich Amber and Sensual White Musk.
top: Notes: Rose, Patchouli, White Musk and Amber

title: Montale, Roses Elixir Edp 100Ml U
description: Rose Elixir presents the magnetic scent of rose, which interacts playfully with strawberry leaves, jasmine and orange blossom in a game of attraction. Rose petals and strawberries are delicately placed on an enticing base of amber, vanilla and musk. The overall aromatic composition is the epitome of a young woman who is always ready to dance the night away and to playfully enchant her surroundings. Rose lends the fragrance elegance and attraction, whilst citrus fruit adds freshness. Jasmine and strawberries provide joyful sweetness and the base concludes with a touch of passion.
top: Notes:
middle: Rose, Strawberry, Vanilla, Amber, Tangerine, Strawberry Leaves, Patchouli, Musk, Citrus Fruit, Orange Tree Blossom, Jasmine

title: Montale, Sensual Instinct Edp 100Ml U
description: Sensual Instinct invites you to let your primitive instinct take over.
top: A lush, warm and dense fragrance, that combines vibrant notes of roasted coffee with the mysteries of the rose and creates a praline balance of mesmerizing sensuality.
middle: This olfactory nugget is sublimated by precious amber notes and the subtlety of cedarwood and oakmoss.An irresistible sillage, elegant and beastly obsessive.

title: Montale, Vanilla Cake Edp 100Ml U
description: Montale, Vanilla Cake Edp 100Ml U

title: MORESQUE, ARISTOQRATI EDP 50ML U
description: Aristoqrati encapsulates the spirit of the aristocratic and royal dynasties of the Middle East. An olfactory journey of sophistication exalted by a twist of modern artistry.
top: The woody-spicy perfume hints at a particular bond between the sense of majesty/nobility and arts; a synergy sublimed by contrasting and vibrant Vetiver of Madagascar.
middle: Right from the start, the scent releases whiffs of Egyptian geranium and spicy nutmeg that make way to a refreshing heart. This alliance rests on solid/strong accords of earthy patchouli and long-lasting amber, rounded by vanilla.
base: TOP NOTES:geranium from Egypt, nutmeg

title: MORESQUE, CONTESSA EDP 50ML U
description: Contessa is an ode to aristocratic sensuality. A floral and musky fragrance that celebrates genuine and absolute femininity, one that reveals its boldness, strength and instinct. Uncommon, elusive, incomparably fascinating.
top: TOP NOTES:pink pepper, nutmeg, bergamot, star anise
middle: HEART NOTES:rose, jasmine, ylang-ylang
base: BASE NOTES:ambroxan, tonka bean, vanilla, musk

title: MORESQUE, REGINA EDP 50ML U
description: Regina is a floral and marine composition inspired by the story of a noblewoman who lived in the late 1800s. Its bouquet speaks of the journey, aboard a vessel, this aristocratic figure undertook at a young age in order to rejoin her husband. Regina is the spirit of the sea with its sense of adventure and mystery; the pursuit of a destiny that unfolds before our eyes while observing the horizon; the romantic waves of the heart, rhythmic and calm at first before the emotions’ beats and the jolts of love set in.
top: The fragrance bottle is a unique work of art: each piece is handmade according to an old Florentine decoration technique.
middle: TOP NOTES:Bergamot, essence of Ylang – Ylang
base: HEART NOTES:Cinnamon, Carnation, marine notes, Jasmine

title: MORESQUE, SAHARA BLUE EDP 50ML U
description: Sahara Blue tells the charm of the ancient lords of the desert: the only inhabitants of the Sahara’s innermost region, one million kilometers long of sand and rocks. Here, in the silence of the night, a Tuareg walks in the moonlight after horseback riding away from his village. As he halts behind a dune, where landmarks seem to vanish, the Tuareg unties his tagelmust –the long blue veil that covers his head and face– and looks up at the sky, questioning the stars about his destiny. He is torn by a choice he needs to make: either pursuing his nomadic life or chasing a love that will force him to renounce his roots. The voice of the wind utters the answer: freedom is, and always has been, the one and only companion every Tuareg wants by his side.
top: TOP NOTES:Lemon, Fresh Ginger, Pink Pepper, Granny Smith apple
middle: HEART NOTES:Coriander, Lavender, Sambac Jasmine
base: BASE NOTES:Musk, Oak Moss, Algae, Amber

title: NASOMATTO, BARAONDA EDP 30ML M
description: Baraonda is the spirit of a Whiskey Single Malt married to a Russian Red. Hot and hot notes like a fruit liqueur, then an enveloping sensory swirl.
top: Head notes cinnamon
middle: Heart note date, everlasting
base: Base notes amber, cedar, musk, patchouli, peru balm, rum, tonka, vanilla

title: Nasomatto, Black Afgano Edp 30Ml U
description: Unravel the mysterious Black Afgano by Nasomatto. Inspired by hashish, its rich and complex scent notes create an irresistible and long-lasting fragrance. Black Afgano takes you on an olfactory journey to the depths of mystery and seduction. Bold and intoxicatingly good.
top: The scent of Black Afgano is deeply alluring, weaving together a tapestry of rich and complex notes. It opens with a potent blend of earthy and smoky accords, reminiscent of aromatic Afghan hashish. As the fragrance evolves, hints of resinous woods and warm spices emerge, adding depth and sensuality to the composition. A touch of floral essence weaves through the heart, softening the intensity and adding a touch of elegance.
middle: Black Afgano’s long-lasting nature ensures that the fragrance lingers on your skin, creating an irresistible aura that commands attention.

title: Nicolai, Amber Oud Edp 100Ml U
description: Forget all rules and limits. Nicolai Amber Oud unisex Eau de Parfum is perfect for anyone who dares to stand out from the crowd.
top: unique fragrance for a unique personality
middle: Top notes: Thyme, Artemisia, Sage, Lavender.
base: Middle notes: Cedar, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Cinnamon, Agar Wood, Saffron.

title: Nicolai, Baikal Leather Intense Edp 100Ml U
description: The leather aspect of Baïkal Leather Intense is essentially created by blending two dry, woody notes: essence of guaiac wood and essence of smoked pine. This powerful duet is revealed by a fiery start of spicy citrus with yuzu, pepper and saffron, while the aromatic touch of spearmint completes the top note.The floral heart of rose and violet envelops the leather, softened by an iris butter, Tonka beans and white musk background.

title: NICOLAI, BELIZE INTENSE EDP 100ML U
description: Bois Bélize Intense is a smoked tea wrapped in an assortment of precious woods: guaiac, patchouli and vetiver. Starting with a burst of citrus bergamot, the guaiac wood, combined with mate leaves, develops an exotic bittersweet note. A delicate touch of rose, matched by cardamon, clove and oak moss, adds a deliciously spicy facet. An invitation to travel to the distant lands of the Americas. An extremely elegant Eau de Parfum with an original signature.
top: Notesbergamot essence, osmanthus absolute, ambrette seeds absolute, rose, cardamom essence, clove essence, guaiac wood essence, patchouli essence, mate leaves absolute, vetiver, oakmoss, musk

title: Nicolai, Patchouli Intense Edp 100Ml U
description: Nicolai, Patchouli Intense Edp 100Ml U

title: Nicolai, Riviera Verbena Edt 100Ml U
description: Nicolai, Riviera Verbena Edt 100Ml U

title: Nicolai, Rose Oud Edp 100Ml U
description: An amber rose, red and opulent with its fruity and spicy accents. With its animalic and woody facets, Rose Oud leaves an irrestible chypre effect.
top: Top notes;Coriander essence , Davana essence & Osmanthus absolute
middle: Middle notes;Rose absolute and essence & Lily of the valley
base: Base notes;Oud, Patchouli essence, Sandalwood,Vanilla,Musk &Amber

title: Nishane, Afrika Olifant Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Stimulates hidden desires… The fragrance opens with frankincense and myrrh. As animalic notes castoreum and civet settle down, leather and oud dominate the battlefield. Timid and audacious at the same time… Have you known that African elephants have the largest number of genes dedicated to smell of any mammal?
top: TOP NOTESambergris – frankincense – myrrh – labdanum
middle: HEART NOTEScastoreum – civet – leather – oud
base: BASE NOTESmuscenone – thibetone – muscone – civetone

title: Nishane, Ambra Calabria Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Abra Cadabra! Get ready to witness the magical transition of an opening of a romantic mixture of Calabrian bergamot and green notes into sweet amber and vanilla… This unusually fresh, leafy-green amber fragrance is an intriguing and inviting one both for special occasions and daily usage.
top: TOP NOTESBergamot – galbanum – green leaves
middle: HEART NOTESJasmine – coriander seeds
base: BASE NOTESSweet amber – musk – vanilla

title: Nishane, Ani 15 + 100 + 30Ml Extrait De Parfum Mini Set U
description: Nishane, Ani 15 + 100 + 30Ml Extrait De Parfum Mini Set U

title: Nishane, Ani Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Having shown by the perfume lovers as the best vanilla scent and becoming an iconic scent, highly celebrated ANI is a romantic and calm perfume created under the inspiration of a famous Anatolian folk song called “Sarı Gelin” (in Turkish) or “Sari Gyalin” in Armenian. As the similarity of the name of the song in both languages suggests that both nations share a very similar culture as far as art, food or other aspects of life are concerned. ANI is the name of an ancient city that is now known as the Ani Ruins, which was included on UNESCO’s World Heritage List.The only boundary is in the imagination of the people. This perfume is dedicated to ruin any border between people and to empower the wearer to build his/her own empire even in a situation when all he/she is left with nothing but the ruins.
top: TOP NOTESbergamot – green notes – blue ginger – pink pepper
middle: HEART NOTESblackcurrant – Turkish rose – cardamom
base: BASE NOTESpatchouli – cedarwood – vanilla – benzoin – ambergris – musk – sandalwood

title: Nishane, Ani Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Having shown by the perfume lovers as the best vanilla scent and becoming an iconic scent, highly celebrated ANI is a romantic and calm perfume created under the inspiration of a famous Anatolian folk song called “Sarı Gelin” (in Turkish) or “Sari Gyalin” in Armenian. As the similarity of the name of the song in both languages suggests that both nations share a very similar culture as far as art, food or other aspects of life are concerned. ANI is the name of an ancient city that is now known as the Ani Ruins, which was included on UNESCO’s World Heritage List.The only boundary is in the imagination of the people. This perfume is dedicated to ruin any border between people and to empower the wearer to build his/her own empire even in a situation when all he/she is left with nothing but the ruins.
top: TOP NOTESbergamot – green notes – blue ginger – pink pepper
middle: HEART NOTESblackcurrant – Turkish rose – cardamom
base: BASE NOTESpatchouli – cedarwood – vanilla – benzoin – ambergris – musk – sandalwood

title: Nishane, Ani X Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Nishane, Ani X Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U

title: NISHANE, ANI X EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: ANI X is a fragrance with true heritage to its name, and invites you to explore how to eliminate the boundaries of time and space, to create your own empire even when all that remains is nothing but the ruins. So spray on ANI X, let the fragrance take you on a journey through the ages, and embrace the power of history in a bottle.
top: TOP NOTES
middle: bergamot oil – lemon oil – watery notes – honeydew melon – cardamom oil – blue ginger – pink pepper
base: HEART NOTES

title: Nishane, Ege / Alfaio Extrait De Parfum 100ml U
description: Is a tribute to the Aegean Sea – an elongated embayment of the Mediterranean Sea located between the Greek and Anatolian peninsulas – that has been historically important, especially in regard to the civilization of Ancient Greece, who inhabited the area around the coast of the Aegean and the Aegean islands. The Aegean islands facilitated contact between the people of the area and between Europe and Asia.
top: “Blue is the color of longing for your most beautiful dreams in this blue world and enjoy sharing the glamor of being able to see the same charming blueness no matter from which part you look at it.”
middle: Everyone is invited to reminisce about the most unforgettable summer holidays by wearing this green aquatic scent by conveying the most pleasant aromas of the sea and the Mediterranean summer.
base: TOP NOTES

title: Nishane, Fan Your Flames Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Fan Your Flames perfume extract by Nishane takes inspiration from a quote by Rumi, a Persian poet and theologian from the 13th century. It’s part of a duo by perfumer Jorge Lee and, in the brand’s signature manner, it calls upon history and heritage in order to create a truly unique scent for the modern wearer. It evokes a joyous evening shared with friends – expect notes of rum, coconut and tobacco anchored by a woody base.
top: Base notes: Oakmoss, Chinese Cedarwood
middle: Middle notes: Tobacco, Tonka bean
base: Top notes: Coconut, Rum

title: NISHANE, FAVONIOUS EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: The God FAVONIUS (one of the Roman wind gods and generally equated with the Greek god Zephyrus) loved Flora, the Goddess of Flowers, so much that he changed himself into a rose because the Goddess had no interest other than flowers. When Flora saw the rose, she kissed it and thus fulfilled Favonius’ wish. And it is said that the very word “rose” originated when Flora, in pain upon being struck by Cupid’s arrow, was unable to properly pronounce the word Eros but made it sound like “ros”. From this the word “rose” becomes a synonym for Eros; both in Rome and in Greece it is the symbol of youth, of vitality, love, beauty and the fruitfulness of nature.
top: FAVONIUS was a Roman nomen, meaning “favorable”. It applied to a number of Roman mythological and historical figures. The gentlest of the winds, FAVONIUS is known as the fructifying wind, the messenger of spring. He held dominion over plants and flowers. The Roman poet Horace writes: quid fles, Asterie, quem tibi candidi primo restituent vere Favonii? Why do you weep, Asterie, for the man whom the bright west winds will restore to you at the beginning of spring?
middle: In this “rose & oud” dominant perfume, the rose and the incense notes complement each other with a very balanced touch of oud. The effect of the opening comes from an incense note which goes with flow and pleasures the continuity.
base: TOP NOTESbergamot – pink pepper – incense

title: NISHANE, HACIVAT & ANI EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 15ML*2 U
description: ANI & HACIVAT TRAVEL SET
top: Two best-sellers come together as a dynamic duo. Hacivat 15ml and Ani 15ml are perfect for the collector who likes to travel. Furthermore, this boxed set makes for a great gift idea and a perfect means to explore the best of Nishane.
middle: Set contains 2 x15 ml travel bottles with the following duos:
base: ANI & HACIVAT

title: Nishane, Hacivat Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Hacivat Perfume by Nishane, Designed as a tribute to the elegant and ancient art of shadow play, Nishane Hacivat perfume is named for one of the most popular traditional shadow puppets from classical Turkish theater. Launched in 2017, it’s radiant and devilishly tantalizing; an artisan take on a magical form of popular art.
top: The top starts with a sparkling breath of sweet bergamot orange, tropical pineapple and refreshing grapefruit for an airy and cheerful open. The heart is alluring and intoxicating with pungent white jasmine, warm, herbal patchouli and gently earthy cedar. The base is smoky and very outdoorsy with the ethereal scent of clearwood, dry campfire timberwood and damp, green oakmoss. The dry-down is luxurious and sublime; the overall effect, otherworldly. The sillage is truly impressive yet not overpowering; the trail is striking and intoxicating.
middle: Top Notes: Bergamot, Pineapple, Grapefruit.
base: Middle Notes: Jasmine, Patchouli, Cedarwood.

title: Nishane, Hacivat Oud Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Hacivat Oud was crafted to address the taste of those who desire a luxurious scent that embodies elegance and charm but still has traces of Hacivat. Nishane’s fragrance is the perfect choice for those who appreciate the finer things in life. The scent is a complex blend of oud and pineapple, making it an unforgettable fragrance that will leave a lasting impression. With carefully selected and high-quality ingredients, this fragrance offers a more intense and captivating aroma, giving you an unforgettable sensory experience.

title: Nishane, Hacivat X Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: HACIVAT X is the new interpretation of NISHANE’s global hit HACIVAT (launched in 2017), paying homage to the traditional shadow play character with a chypre structure that exudes elegance, competence, and love of art. This fragrance is a celebration of life, with stimulating notes of pineapple and bergamot backed by woody notes. It features top notes of juicy pineapple, zesty bergamot, and spicy pink pepper, leading to a heart of refreshing lime, delicate jasmine,and orange blossom. The base notes include earthy patchouli, woody cedarwood, and vetiver from Haiti.
top: NISHANE is looking forward to hearing the thoughts of the crowded HACIVAT fans worldwide about HACIVAT X and is sure that it will quickly become a new favorite amongst the fragrance enthusiasts with its highly addictive and noticeable scent.
middle: TOP NOTES: bergamot – pineapple – pepper pink
base: HEART NOTES: lime – jasmine – orange flower

title: Nishane, Hundred Silent Ways 15 + 100 + 30Ml Extrait De Parfum Mini Set U
description: It was created as a tribute to the most popular perfumes in the history of perfumery, with a modern interpretation and a mix of pleasant notes. With one drop, one would feel themselves wearing the appeal of every beautiful soul that has ever lived on earth and would silently share this with everyone they meet. Get ready for the compliments.
top: Contains:
middle: Parfum Extract 15mlHand cream 30mlHair and Body Oil 100ml
base: Top notes: Tuberose, mandarin and peach.

title: NISHANE, HUNDRED SILENT WAYS 50ML SPRAY+ 50ML HAIR MIST EXTRAIT DE PARFUM GIFT SET U
Nishane, Hundred Silent Ways Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Was created as a a tribute to most-liked perfumes in the history of perfumery with a modern interpretation and blend of pleasant notes. With a drop, one would feel wearing the attractiveness of all beautiful souls ever lived on earth and silently share this with everyone he/she encounters. Get ready for the compliments.‘I closed my mouth and spoke to you in a hundred silent ways’Rumi
top: TOP NOTEStuberose – mandarin – peach
middle: HEART NOTESwhite jasmine – gardenia – orris
base: BASE NOTESvanilla – sandalwood – vetiver

title: Nishane, Hundred Silent Ways X Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: HUNDRED SILENT WAYS has always been one of the top 5 bestsellers of NISHANE in global markets. HUNDRED SILENT WAYS X is designed to maintain the overall mood that the original fragrance (launched in 2016) offers. The leathery notes were resorted to be able to add an even more elegant touch to the original formula. HUNDRED SILENT WAYS X is a deliciously captivating fragrance that combines the elegance of floral notes with the richness of gourmand accords.
top: The fragrance opens with a juicy burst of mandarin and peach, leading to a heart of delicate gardenia, iris, jasmine, and heliotrope. The base notes of vanilla, leather, and patchouli give the fragrance a sensual and warm character, making it perfect for those who appreciate a relatively sweet and comforting scent. HUNDRED SILENT WAYS X is a must-try for those who love the original fragrance and are looking for a new take on the charming mood the original formula has.
middle: TOP NOTES
base: tuberose – mandarin – peach

title: Nishane, Karagoz Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: KARAGOZFRUITY / GREEN / WOODY
top: Is a tribute to playful treats of life, wittiness, straightforwardness and sincerity. Enjoy being noticed just as the famous shadow puppetry character “Karagöz”. The cheerful opening with the pineapple and the herbs is followed by the strong personality coming from the rich heart made of neroli, jasmine and patchouli. Vetiver, agarwood and amber were meant to be the final strokes of the brush to depict this playful character.
middle: TOP NOTESpineapple – black grape – bouquet garni
base: HEART NOTESneroli – jasmine – patchouli

title: Nishane, Kredo Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: It’s no secret humans are social creatures with beliefs that are, literally, all over the map. What wasn’t known was how those beliefs are influenced by our social interactions.
top: Beliefs are the assumptions we hold to be true. They stem from real life experiences. As human beings, our values and beliefs affect the quality of our life, our work, and our relationships. Since what we believe is what we experience, we tend to think that our beliefs are founded on reality. In fact, it is our beliefs that shape our experiences.
middle: The beliefs that we hold are a critical and essential part of our identity. They could be religious, moral or cultural; but they are part of us and reflect who we are.
base: With this perfume, NISHANE wants to depict how beliefs shaped up human lives and how these various beliefs interact and conflict throughout history.

title: Nishane, Nefs Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Nefs is a luxurious interpretation of the oriental notes. Like Istanbul itself, the masterful creations of Nishane straddle the line between Europe and Asia, synthesizing the palettes and traditions of both in the service of dynamic, modern perfumery. And so it’s unsurprising that Nefs, conceptualized as the line’s flagship oriental scent, strives for a new, modern oriental- an East-meets-West portrait of refined luxury to sway even those who dislike oriental fragrances. Like a breeze blowing from the east across the Bosphorus, Nefs is an exquisite oriental that bridges the gap between civilizations. A scent to revive the fantasies told by the stories of One Thousand and One Nights of the Orient.
top: TOP NOTES
middle: honey – violet – sage – saffron – fig
base: HEART NOTES

title: Nishane, Pachuli Kozha Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Patchouli Kozha is a voluptuous composition of patchouli, leather and incense. Final touch from honey not only balances the mixture but also adds more lustfulness. Feel the libertine sexuality with one of the strongest patchouli perfumes available.
top: TOP NOTEShyacinth – ylang ylang – armoise – camomile
middle: HEART NOTESpatchouli – black pepper
base: BASE NOTESleather – honey – incense

title: Nishane, Papilefiko Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Is inspired by Papilia Efiko which means Butterfly Effect in Esperanto.
top: Just like the butterfly effect – a property of chaotic systems by which small changes in primary conditions can lead to great-scale and unpredictable variation in the future state of the system– one individual’s action eventually will affect the flow of the whole world.
middle: Any small action taken would trigger other actions that would be followed by greater consequences.
base: Through its adventurous and galvanized aromas of the world, this scent is intended to provoke and spark the desire to act.

title: NISHANE, SHEM EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: Shem means candle. A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle. Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared. As we let our light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence actually liberates others. “Let light shine out of darkness.”
top: TOP NOTEScardamom – turkish rose – geranium
middle: HEART NOTESosmanthus – amber – cypriol
base: BASE NOTESelemi – vetiver – leather

title: Nishane, Suede Et Safran Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Gives the feeling of a tailored leather jacket spiced with saffron from Iran and ambrette seed from India. A chic and fascinating signature suite.
top: TOP NOTESambrette seed – saffron
middle: HEART NOTESsuede – ginger
base: BASE NOTESmusk – leather

title: Nishane, Sultan Vetiver Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Opens on a neroli note intensified by Javanese, Haitian and Bourbon vetiver at the same pot! As the sultans and the kings were the actual conquerors for ages, Sultan Vetiver is the new rule breaker in its genre. This is a heavenly perfume for the vetiver lovers.
top: TOP NOTESjavanese vetiver – absinthe – schinus molle – bergamot
middle: HEART NOTESbourbon vetiver – haitian vetiver – neroli – tonka
base: BASE NOTESamberwood – leather – brazilian vetiver

title: Nishane, Tempfluo Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Means Time Flow in Esperanto.
top: The law of physics imply that the passage of time is an illusion.
middle: Sense of time is measured by someone’s own perception of the duration of the indefinite and unfolding of events. The perceived time interval between two successive events is referred to as perceived duration.
base: As the humanity is in the same time period now, with this perfume dedicated to the unity of time, we aim to remind that “we all live once, and we must seize the day”. Carpe diem!

title: Nishane, Tero Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Means Earth in Esperanto.
top: Even with billions of planets out there, finding a carbon-copy of the Earth seems unlikely (at least until today). Such a planet would have to have undergone the same steps in its evolution to get to a similar state to our “now”.
middle: So we all live in the same “place”: our planet earth and we are made up from the earth in a complex yet simple way. In a lot of ways, we are very similar to the earth. We go through cycles as human beings just as the earth goes through cycles, just on different scales. The earth grows and dies, it changes and shifts, it warms up and cools down, the earth produces life and is fed by the things it creates.
base: The earth asks us to take care of it so that in doing so we take care of ourselves and our future generations, plants, animals, air, and water. It asks us to be aware that we are as much a part of the earth than anything else and the earth and its nature is a part of everything.

title: Nishane, Tuberoza Extrait De Perfum 50Ml U
description: Tuberoza by Nishane is an Oriental Floral fragrance. Nishane Tuberoza is floral, woody, and tuberose.
top: Top notes are ylang-ylang, sweet orange, orange blossom and artemisia;Middle notes are tuberose, gardenia, jasmine and marigold.
middle: Base notes are amber, vetiver, sandalwood and musk.
base: “Reveals mainly the captivating tuberose of Mexico which is accompanied by other floral notes like gardenia, marigold and jasmine. Strong ambery base is a guarantee for the distinctiveness of the scent.”

title: NISHANE, TUBEROZA X EDP 100ML U
description: Tuberóza X exemplifies this ethos. Entrusted to the talent of Master Perfumer Dominique Ropion, this interpretation of Nishane’s iconic white floral pays homage to the captivating scent of tuberose blossoms swaying under a starry sky. Built around an exquisite Indian Tuberose Absolute from the Laboratoires Monique Rémy, Tuberóza X is more vegetal than its older version, its greenness here tinged with a bright Violet accord while the sultry character of this supreme flower remains boldened by fruity and narcotic accents of Ylang-Ylang.
top: TOP NOTESylang-ylang – mandarin
middle: HEART NOTESindian tuberose LMR – violet – lipstick accord
base: BASE NOTESvelvet musk – amber – sandalwood

title: Nishane, Vain & Naive Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Vain & Naïve is the creamy rose that throws you back into the childhood.
top: Imagine a small family house (cottage) surrounded by a beautiful yard, where the woman, with passion, works around it. But in that garden, you can find beautiful roses, neatly cut grass as soft as the clouds and a young girl jumping around. Somewhere in the distance, you hear bees working smoothly to produce the golden nectar, the honey. That young girl that jumps around is free, free of restrains and cruelty, immersed into the relaxing life of nature. It’s the life in harmony.
middle: Voilà, that’s how Vain & Naïve smells like. It’s a beautiful perfume based on rose, tonka, musk and amber. The perfume that really makes you feel like you have found the rose, your only rose you will have for a lifetime.

NISHANE, WULONG CHA EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: As one of the strongest fresh scents in the market, it opens on citrus notes of bergamot, orange and mandarin that provide the sparkling freshness. While Mediterranean fig and musk provide a base for the fragrance, oolong tea mesmerizes in an evasive way.

middle: HEART NOTESoolong tea – nutmeg
base: BASE NOTESmusk – fig

description: As one of the strongest fresh scents in the market, it opens on citrus notes of bergamot, orange and mandarin that provide the sparkling freshness. While Mediterranean fig and musk provide a base for the fragrance, oolong tea mesmerizes in an evasive way.

title: Nishane, Wulong Cha X Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: The original WŪLÓNG CHÁ has been celebrated especially because of its robust power of refreshing notes. However, WŪLÓNG CHÁ X is designed to mute the sharp edges of the original formula and enhance it with the addition of florals namely magnolia. This fragrance opens with a burst of zesty citrus notes of bergamot, orange, mandarin, and yuzu transporting the wearer to the sunny shores of the Mediterranean. As the scent settles, the heart notes of magnolia, thyme oil and green tea weave a magical spell around you, evoking the tranquil stillness of a teatime. Finally, the base notes of musk and fig provide a warm and grounding finish to this fragrance that will keep the wearer feeling fresh and revitalized all day long.
top: WŪLÓNG CHÁ X is a perfect choice for those who seek a refreshing and uplifting fragrance that can be worn all year round.
middle: TOP NOTESbergamot – yuzu – litsea – mandarin
base: HEART NOTESmagnolia – thyme oil – green tea

title: Nishane, Zenne Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Is a tribute to beauty, energy, self-confidence, and flirtation. Inspired by the female character in the traditional shadow puppetry, Zenne will teleport you to the enigmas of the paradise gardens full of joy and romance with a deliberate mix of the fruity and floral accords along with vanilla, ambergris and musk at the base.
top: TOP NOTESgrapefruit – blackcurrant – rhubarb
middle: HEART NOTESturkish rose – gardenia – sandalwood
base: BASE NOTESvanilla – ambergris – musk

title: Nobile 1942, Ambra Nobile Edp 75Ml U
description: An aphrodisiac perfume as irresistible and eternal love, carnal and spiritual; It evokes “nights for happy lovers – bright and brief”. Its sensual, animalic fragrance is at the same time delicate. Ambra Nobile picks on our animal nature but in a refreshing way thanks to helichrysum. For all those women who do not like flirting fragrances. It’s like 2 inch heels shoes: an introduction to the world of heels and femininity.
top: Top Note: Neroli, Bergamot, Ambergris
middle: Heart Note: Labdanum (Rockrose), Patchouly
base: Base Note: Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Vetiver

title: Nobile 1942, Fougere Nobile Edp 75Ml U
description: A fougère accord that for its time was avant-garde. With aquatic, sparkling, evocative top notes of fizzy water and bitter soda to accentuate his positive vision of the future. A fougère accord that symbolises his devotion to his family, because it is in itself a reference to nature as sanctuary, thanks to its notes of natural origin.
top: A fougère accord to reveal his great charm and search for that special detail that made him attractive. This is a man who stands out for his sophistication. He wears a fragrance that belongs to nobody, emphasising his individuality, courage and strong personality, attractive to many women.
middle: Finally, a fougère accord for his link with tradition. The past guides him, in order to build a better future. A past made up of evocative smells such as tobacco, the scentof shaving cream, notes of vanilla and the tonka bean.

title: Nobile 1942, Patchouli Nobile Edp 75Ml U
description: Really masculine on men but if a woman wears it become very elegant and classy. Warning! This fragrance cannot be spayed on paper blotters. Why? Our patchouli maceration lasts at least six months. Only if it’s sprayed on skin, we can appreciate all the amazing service of olfactive facets of this fragrance. On Sunday Times, on November 2009, when Patchouli Nobile was launched, Luca Turin, the most accreditated critic in the perfumed world, defined it as “One among the 10 fragrances most interesting at the moment”.Olfactive family: woody spicy
top: Top Noteslemon, white pepper, fresh notes, incenses.
middle: Heart Notesjasmin, patchouli, gaiac wood, cistus
base: Base Notesambery notes, labdanum, tonka bean, sandalwood, patchouli, oak moss

title: Nobile 1942, Sandalo Nobile Edp 75Ml U
description: Our muscles relax, our mind yelds itselfThe heady fragrance of spices such as saffron and cumin seeds wafts from sacks piled in the storehouse, ready to fill wagons bound for the market, and hangs in the room barely lit by the faint light of dawn.
top: Immersed in the heat of the water, steam infused with essence of sandalwood forms clouds, softened by siamese benjoin.
middle: Feeling our muscles relax and tensions disappear, our mind yields itself to the beauty of our experiences, affections and emotions, linked as gurgjum links the flowery iris to the precious figue tree, like a fog that envelops us in a gentle embrace, filling our nostrils with pleasure. A brief moment that makes us one with Mother Nature and helps us face a new day with serenity.

title: Orientica, Amber Rouge Edp 100Ml U
description: Like a red bridal veil adorned with golden embroidery lush in the scent of celebration, Amber Rouge calls out to those in search of completeness…those who want to take love in the air and turn it into winds of passion & obsession. The compelling fragrances of jasmine & orange ignite the first spark, and with saffron & praline at its thumping heart, oak moss, amber & seaweed are the distinct aromas that stay with you long after the tempestuous moments have left you gasping for more.
top: Fragrance Notes:
middle: Top note: Jasmine, Saffron.
base: Middle note: Amber wood, Ambergris.

title: ORIENTICA, AMBER ROUGE EDP 100ML U GIFT SET
description: Luxury Collection Amber Rouge Pouch Gift Set by Orientica
top: When you have someone precious in your heart & mind, there’s no better way to surprise them than with this elegant Luxury Collection Pouch Gift Set containing Luxury Collection Amber Rouge 80ml Eau de Parfum, 7.5ml Miniature and Atomizer, a winning combination of aroma, style, color and finesse to swathe them in luxury & comfort. Occasions will come and go, but the memories created in the moment will be yours to savour forever.
middle: Like a red bridal veil adorned with golden embroidery lush in the scent of celebration, Amber Rouge calls out to those in search of completeness…those who want to take love in the air and turn it into winds of passion & obsession. The compelling fragrances of jasmine & orange ignite the first spark, and with saffron & praline at its thumping heart, oak moss, amber & seaweed are the distinct aromas that stay with you long after the tempestuous moments have left you gasping for more.

title: Ormonde Jayne, 4 Montabaco Intensivo Edp 120Ml U
description: Montabaco is a perfume to capture the essence of Latin America: leather, suede, wood and tobacco leaf repeated over and over again creating a suggestive sensuality and Latino temperament. It sits above the rich floral presence of magnolia, jasmine and rose. It is all unashamedly seductive yet profoundly simpatico.

title: Ormonde Jayne, 4 Montabaco Verano Edp 50Ml U
description: At the cutting edge of creativity, Verano is a seductive and profound scent of leather, wood and tobacco leaf with a good measure of grapefruit and a dash of cashmeran for added bravado and sensual creamy dry down. Presented in a stunning azure bottle, Verano takes centre stage as it captures the essence of Latin America.

title: Ormonde Jayne, Ambre Royal  Edp 120Ml U
description: Time-honoured accord of roses and jasmine with dashing notes of orange blossom and bergamot but veers away and deepens with patchouli, cedar wood and fanned with a big hearted warm amber molecule, expertly synergised to create a perfectly balanced but hypnotic and opulent perfume.Ambre Royal is to be treasured and trusted for it is both strong and sensual, warm but powerful.

base: Green Notes, Orange Absolute and Bergamot

title: Ormonde Jayne, Babylonia Edp 50Ml U
description: The ultimate in soft powdery perfume with facets of iris, bluebells and violets like sweet candy floss. Babylonia begins its persuasion with a quartet of luscious gourmand notes – blackcurrant, pink pepper, davana and bergamot followed by the heavenly warmth of soft musk, sweet resins, vanilla and praline. The perfume sings in perfect harmony and could not fail to achieve a sense of romance – positively enchanting

title: Ormonde Jayne, Levant Edp 50Ml U
description: A journey on the legendary Silk Road that leads us to the eastern Mediterranean – right into the sunny heart of the Levant.
top: THE FRAGRANCEAn innocent peony meets a singing note of lily – adorned by a garland of jasmine and orange flowers. Levant is a bottle full of happiness that doesn’t want to be anything more but gorgeous. A perfume playing with sunny lust for life – and an overdose of joy.

title: ORMONDE JAYNE, LEVANT EDP 88ML U
ORMONDE JAYNE, NAWAB OF OUD  EDP 120ML U
description: Nawab (Ruler) of Oudh is a province of central India. Our perfume is inspired by the Nawabs who once ruled over it. It is a potent blend of amber and rose with a soft oudh edge. Yet surprisingly not one ingredient stands out from the others. It achieves a perfume synergy that defies traditional analysis, releasing a pulsating pungency, brooding and hauntingly beautiful, a rich tapestry of fascinating depths, a jewelled veil to conceal its emotional complexity and extravagance.
top: Nawab of Oudh is presented in a 120ml spray-bottle.

Elusive elegance, realising the power of subtlety, radiating an inner confidence – to be worn with an innate love of understated good taste.
