title: ORMONDE JAYNE, TAIF EDP 120ML U
Ormonde Jayne, Tsarina Edp 120Ml U
description: Tsarina is part of the Four Corners of the Earth collection, and represents a romantic view of the Eastern lands known variously throughout history as Moscovia, the Russian empire, USSR, and now, Russia.
top: These fabled landscapes are the setting for Slavic folk tales about the cannibal witch Baba Yaga, the three headed dragons, and many brave maidens ruling over kingdoms. This region which is also the setting for beloved classic literature including War and Peace and Eugene Onegin.
middle: Tsarina is an ancient title for a female ruler of these lands, whether imaginary or real. Tsarina the perfume has romantic references to fairy tales and the opulence of courts: delectable candied citruses, the waxy, melted candle-like nuance of sandalwood, and the fine leather/fur presence provided by orris and labdanum.
base: Top NotesBergamotCassisCorianderMandarin

title: ORMONDE JAYNE,EVERNIA EDP 88ML U
Orto Parisi, Bergamask Edp 50Ml U
description: An ever-evolving perfume extract, Bergamask hangs on the skin and keeps changing over time. A dance of seduction between the killer and his victim, Bergamask runs through you like a nagging wound.
top: families : citrus woody
middle: head notes : bergamot, lemonheart notes : lavender, lily of the valley, orange blossombase notes : cedar, musk, tonka

title: ORTO PARISI, SEMINALIS EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML U
description: Alessandro Gaultieri refers to Seminalis as ”an odour substance which seems responsible for leading males to females”. The scent is inspired by a study that found that the male sperm is attracted to the scent of the female egg and travels towards it to engulf itself in this scent. The scent in question? It is similar to that of Lily of the Valley, and yes, you may call this the fragrance of life! The word Seminalis comes from colliculus seminalis – the area near the entrance of the ejaculatory ducts. This fragrance explores the scent of sex, our attraction and animal instincts. The idea that we are all a product of the allure of scent. Those musky pheromone like scents that are dirty yet impossible to resist. Seminalis is a sexy, smooth woody fragrance with a hint of sweetness. Creamy and musky, this a raw and provocative scent!
top: NOTES
middle: Top: UndisclosedMiddle: UndisclosedBase: Undisclosed

title: Paco Rabanne, Paco Edt 100Ml U
description: Paco Unisex is a deep, layered fragrance for the modern sensibility. Launched in 1995, the cologne is both refreshing and intoxicating.
top: The opening notes of juicy mandarin orange and sour Amalfi lemon revive your body and spirit.
middle: Warm coriander and cool pine mellow the sweetness of the citrus fruits. Earthy lavender blends with tea, jasmine, and cyclamen at the center.
base: The rich, lush aromas add a fullness to the fragrance. Virginia cedar, sandalwood, tonka bean, and musk are the strong base notes, balancing the earlier ingredients with a sugary creaminess. This cologne can be enjoyed at any occasion.

title: PAPILLON ARTISAN, TOBACCO ROSE EDP 50ML U
description: A sensual blend of Bulgarian rose, geranium and Rose de Mai form an opulent backdrop of velvety rose notes set against a luxuriously rich and smoky base of French hay and earthy oakmoss.
top: Soft animalic touches of ambergris and beeswax have been suspended in a sumptuous blend of musks, creating an enigmatic, alluring and unmistakable perfume.
middle: A stunningly different interpretation of the majestic rose.
base: PERFUME NOTES

title: PARFUMS DE MARLY, AKASTER EDP 125ML U
description: Aksater is a multifaceted oud. Vibrant and effervescent top notes of pink pepper, incense, and Sicilian lemon opens the olfactory. At the heart is Bulgarian rose, Taif rose and geranium that are opulent and carnal in their narrative. With a base of leather, musk, guaiac wood and cypriol, this eau de parfum is timeless and distinctive thanks to its unique woody signature.
top: Top NotesPink Pepper, Incense, Sicilia Lemon
middle: Heart NotesBulgarian Rose, Taif Rose, Geranium
base: Base NotesAgarwood, Guaiac Wood, Cypriol, Leather, Musk

title: Parfums De Marly, Carlisle 125Ml U
description: A wave of freshness bathes the skin – Carlisle is the embodiment of light. Sunny and radiant, this sensual fragrance is built around a sandalwood theme that is warm, with a hint of vanilla, whilst both soothing and rich. The clear, seductive top notes of crisp green apple, warming nutmeg and golden saffron unearth the scent to an elegant heart of rose, tonka bean, osmanthus and davana. The perfume narrative is concluded by a base of vanilla, patchouli and opoponax resinoid – an olfactory for fragrance connoisseurs and lovers of niche fragrances.
top: Olfactive notes
middle: Top NotesGreen Apple, Nutmeg, Saffron
base: Heart NotesTonka Bean, Rose, Osmanthus, Davana

title: Parfums De Marly, Galloway Edp 125Ml U
description: Galloway is the art of olfactory music. The shade and heat of pepper and citrus aromatics create surprise within this discerning perfume. The heart notes are an injection of sweet iris and heady orange blossom. At the base is a warm musk, honey-like amber and deep-wooded sandalwood, highly textured to curate a distinguished eau de parfum.

title: Parfums De Marly, Godolphin Edp 125Ml U
description: Godolphin named after the renowned stallion ancestor of so many glorious horse race winners, is embodied through this opulent rose note, leading to a woody-leather scent base.
top: Top notes: thyme, saffron, cypress, green notes, fruity notes and mate. Heart: rose, iris and jasmine. Base: leather, vetiver, cedar, musk, amber and vanilla.

title: Parfums De Marly, Greenley Edp 125Ml U
description: Greenly is housed in a statuesque green bottle and modelled after its composition, reflective of pure energy and the fresh breath of spring. This olfactory signature draws upon nature to create a joyful whirlwind of fruit, citrus, bark and sap which flows into a crisp, tangy green apple surprise. With a daring juxtaposition of nature’s finest materials, it is a rich, masculine fragrance that is designed to stand the test of time.
top: Top NotesSicilian Bergamot, Mandarin, Green Apple, Cashmere Wood
middle: Heart NotesCedarwood, Petitgrain, Violet, Pomarose
base: Base NotesOakmoss, Musk, Amberwood Accord

title: Parfums De Marly, Greenley Edp 75Ml U
description: Greenly is housed in a statuesque green bottle and modelled after its composition, reflective of pure energy and the fresh breath of spring. This olfactory signature draws upon nature to create a joyful whirlwind of fruit, citrus, bark and sap which flows into a crisp, tangy green apple surprise. With a daring juxtaposition of nature’s finest materials, it is a rich, masculine fragrance that is designed to stand the test of time.
top: Top NotesSicilian Bergamot, Mandarin, Green Apple, Cashmere Wood
middle: Heart NotesCedarwood, Petitgrain, Violet, Pomarose
base: Base NotesOakmoss, Musk, Amberwood Accord

title: PARFUMS DE MARLY, HABDAN EDP 125ML U
Parfums De Marly, Kalan Edp 125Ml U
description: Intense and subtle at once, Kalan is an olfactory signature that surprises with a sparkling opening, blending black pepper and spices with fresh notes of blood orange. The Parfums de Marly eau de parfum is anchored with a heart of orange blossom and lavender, and while it evolves, facets of white sandalwood unfold and drape into notes of moss and precious wood. The result is an olfactory narrative that is round with clear, seductive top notes and simultaneously an immediately discernible base. The harmony between the materials and the accords creates this olfactory music that is the signature of Kalan.
top: Top NotesBlood Orange, Black Pepper, Spices
middle: Heart NotesLavender, Solar notes, Orange Blossom Absolute
base: Base NotesPrecious Wood, Oakmoss, White Sandalwood

title: Parfums De Marly, Layton Edp 125Ml U
description: Inspired by the colorful bustle of the Royal Court of Versailles, Layton bursts forth with a fresh, dynamic masculine elegance that perfectly embodies the festive yet elegant atmosphere of the 18th century’s most important and luxurious seat of power.
top: Layton opens with a dazzling splash of juicy, tangy bergamot and apple, tilted towards the alluringly masculine with fresh lavender, geranium and violet. Warm amber tones lend richness to the spicy heart, while a drydown of precious woods and vanilla up the opulence even further- perfect for a fragrance meant to evoke a name still synonymous with gloriously high-end excess. Life at Versailles must surely have been a dazzling mix of business, statecraft, leisure and celebration- it should come as no surprise that Layton presents itself as a perfect fragrance for any and all of those pursuits.
middle: Layton Fragrance Notes
base: Bergamot, lavender, apple, mandarin, violet, jasmine, geranium, gaiac, patchouli, sandalwood, cardamom, vanilla, pepper.

title: Parfums De Marly, Layton Edp 125Ml U Gift Set
description: A limited-edition fragrance set featuring the scent of Layton in full and travel-size shower gels, plus an eau de parfum packaged for gifting.
top: Fragrance story: Bergamot leads with its tangy passion, while lavender and geranium blend into a fresh note, chic and chivalrous all at once. The intensity rises from mesmerizing amber, enhanced by the natural elegance of pink pepper. Distinguished and addictive, its character carried by vanilla and precious woods grows more powerful with an intriguing note—a flavorful and fascinating hint of caramelized coffee.
middle: Set includes:
base: – Full-size Eau de Parfum 125ml

title: Parfums De Marly, Layton Exclusif Parfum 125Ml U
description: A parfum that introduces new notes that are more mysterious, more intense, more manly and yet more sensual with passion as its unapologetic key note.
top: The head notes offer generous, spirited, explosive bergamot, with rose and geranium vying to add elegance. In the base note, a hint of cardamom mingles with sandalwood and guaiac, emphasizing all the nobility of wood. On the skin, the sudden turmoil is total thanks to the distinctive, evocative hint of caramelized coffee.
middle: Notes:
base: – Top: bergamot, mandarin, water accord, grapefruit.

title: Parfums De Marly, Oajan Edp 125Ml U
description: Oajan is an unforgettable olfactory journey. This eau de parfum envelopes the skin with rich and warm top notes of honey and cinnamon, punctuated with fruity osmanthus. The heart continues the narrative and exhilarates the senses, with sweet and smooth amber, labdanum and benzoin that are rounded off under united notes of vanilla, tonka bean, patchouli and Davan. A noble style de vie. Original in its craftsmanship.
top: Top NotesHoney, Cinnamon, Osmanthus
middle: Heart NotesAmber, Labdanum, Benzoin
base: Base NotesVanilla, Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Davana

title: Parfums De Marly, Percival Edp 125Ml U
description: Presenting a subtle balance of citrus and aromatic notes on a woody base, this eau de parfum exudes a fresh, sensual and refined scent in an ocean blue bottle that will be remembered. Amongst the top notes, scents of bergamot and mandarin sublimate through a touch of aromatic water to offer a unique combination. The heart notes give Percival its character and depth through a blend of natural jasmine, violet and geranium, overlapping with lavender, coriander and cinnamon. On the skin, musk mixes with pepper, absolute balsam fir and, to give emphasis, woody spices are revealed at the base.
top: Top NotesBergamot, Mandarin, Pink Pepper
middle: Heart NotesLavender, Geranium, Cardamom
base: Base NotesBalsam fir, Woody spices, Tonka Bean

title: PARFUMS DE MARLY, PERSEUS EDP 125ML M
Parfums De Marly, Sedley Edp 125Ml U
description: A fragrance of unparalleled freshness and deceptive complexity, Sedley is a dynamically bright men’s fragrance for those who know the power of confident subtlety. While it doesn’t enter the room in front of you the way many of Parfums de Marly’s powerhouse classics do, its bright, light aromatic citrus opening steadily develops on the skin into a beguiling woodsy masculine that hits its stride just as you hit yours.
top: But first, a bit more about that opening- a hesperidic trio of mandarin, grapefruit, and lemon that combines the best of all three- tart, bright, juicy, and sharp, with the herbaceous, aromatic zing of mint and rosemary. Sedley’s development is impressively judicious- the top notes linger well past a normal opening, and the classic gentleman’s heart of lavender and geranium comes on so gradually that you may find yourself seduced by your own fragrance. And with that same deliberation, a warm, smooth, powerful base of musky woods emerges that hums on the skin with potent energy. It’s often said that real men speak softly and let their actions do the talking. If that’s you, Sedley is your fragrance.
middle: Notes
base: Mandarin, grapefruit, lemon, mint, rosemary, geranium, lavender, olibanum, sandalwood, cedar, vetiver, patchouli, cashmeran, ambroxan.

title: Parfums Dusita, La Douceur De Siam Edp 100Ml U
description: A perfume of strange, nocturnal beauty, La Douceur de Siam is like walking into a Thai spice garden overhung with night-blooming flowers.
top: Olfactive NotesThe Opening,a heart-stopping blend of fabulous flowers –Rose de Mai, Frangipani, Champaca.Uplifting green Carnation balanced bybalsamic sweetness fromYlang Ylang Extra and Violet Leaf.
middle: At the Heart,the unique and heavenly notes ofsoft, warm Cinnamon with anexceptional Thai Chalood Bark –a sensual, woody, vanillic accord from old Siam.
base: The Base Notes,an exclusive blend of Vanilla Absoluteand Sandalwood Mysore, withthe aphrodisiac scent of rare Amber anda seductive hint of Ambergris.Lasting harmony through a long dry down.

title: PENHALIGON’S, 2ML MIN SET U
description: The nose is all too often neglected when it comes to education, but no more. Rejoice in ten diminutive samples of Penhaligon’s most fabulous fragrances. A veritable library of nasal erudition.
top: Includes 2 ml each of:
middle: Luna Eau de Toilette
base: Empressa Eau de Parfum

title: PENHALIGON’S, BABYLON EDP 100ML U
description: Babylon is a tribute to the mysteries of the legendary Mesopotamian city. In the heart of the hanging gardens, deities, architecture and mathematics meet. The union of coriander and saffron plunges us straight into the fragrant alleys of the ancient city. Then comes the voluptuous cypriol, on a warm background of cedar and sandalwood mixed with vanilla, recalling the mythical and divine side of the city.notes
top: head notes : coriander, nutmeg, saffron.
middle: heart notes : cypriol.
base: base notes : cedar, sandalwood, vanilla.

title: Penhaligon’S, Cairo Edp 100Ml U
description: The sun of an ancient city, rises slowly over the citadel, like liquid gold that fills the sky. Now, the early morning murmur of life is about to burst through, much the same as Spring. A skyline that reflects mathematical magic and so bears testimony to the cradle of scholarship that is Cairo. And in harmony with the masterly shapes that rise upwards from the earth, soft female forms command the sky. The Mediterranean melting-pot is home to a thousand minarets and a thousand fragrant gems. Damascan Rose is macerated in an abundance of woods and spices. An ornate and sumptuous composition that echos with saffron and incense, per fumum, the perfume of the gods. Patchouli and vanilla sign the base with the familiar reassurance of dusk.
top: Head notes: SaffronMiddle notes: Cypriol, RoseBase notes: Agarwood, Labdanum, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vanilla

title: Penhaligon’S, Halfeti Edp 100Ml U Gift Set

title: PENHALIGON’S, LEGACY OF PETRA EDP 100ML U
description: Legacy of Petra is an Eau de Parfum from the English niche brand Penhaligon’s. It is part of the Trade Routes collection, a luxurious journey around the world to discover the finest 19th century ingredients.
top: They stood like this, their legs dangling to touch the void, above a channel dug into the amber rock. In front of them, a hint of dawn dyed their faces and a fresh and spicy wind cradled them. Their words full of promise in a place, Petra, which had been imbued with it for centuries.
middle: Legacy of Petra is an intensely warm, opulent, mysterious fragrance. An alternation of fresh and warm, spicy and oriental notes in which the note of licorice and myrrh colors the skin like the sun at dawn. A tribute to the ancient city of Petra and its fascinating mysteries.
base: Head Notes

title: PENHALIGON’S, SOLARIS EDP 100ML U
description: Sensational. Generous. Warming. An ode to the sun, reaching through time and space. A Zenith-like, lively citrus beams down to blend with powerful blackcurrant. Cedar, sandalwood and vanilla creates an eau de parfum with uplifting strength and celestial grace.

title: Phil & Phill, Date Downtown Edp 100Ml U
description: She visited this town the first time. It was already late in the afternoon and the sun melted the street into honeydew colors. She took her seat in the sidewalk café where he had directed her to come to. She was excited. They had exchanged mails over the weeks, but now it was time to leave the virtual world and get the fruity taste of real life.

title: PROFUMUM ROMA, ACQUA VIVA EDP 100ML U
description: Many people consider Profumum Roma’s Acqua Viva to be one of the world’s best citrus scents. Beautiful Citrus from Amalfi blends with Cypress, Genista and Virginia Cedar. This is a woody aromatic fragrance that suits both men and women.
top: Bright and sparkling, Acqua Viva is a fresh fragrance that finds its intensity and flavor in its top note, the lemon of Amilfi. Surrounded by cedar and an incredible bouquet of Sicilian flowers, travel aboard your sailboat on the Mediterranean Sea and breathe the fresh air of Acqua Viva by Profumum Roma
middle: Top notes :
base: Lemon of Amilfi

title: Profumum Roma, Dulcis In Fundo Profumo Edp 100Ml U
description: A memory of Rome on a day in October. We stroll through the colorful streets and suddenly we are surrounded by the scent of fresh sweet bread. Our reaction is spontaneous: the water in our mouths converges and we can hardly resist. DULCIS IN FUNDO reminds us that sometimes the most beautiful luxury can also be found in the little things.
top: “A hint of vanilla creates passion and seduction and we remain indulging in the delicious ocean of the senses…”
middle: Desires of the heart evolve with a trail of intoxicating scent. Passion and seduction are inspired by a flare of vanilla.
base: Why we’re addicted: �An irresistible unisex blend of vanilla and bright, tangy citrus that recalls memories of Sicily.

title: Profumum Roma, Sorriso Profumo Edp 100Ml U
description: Sorriso is a delicious and sophisticated gourmand scent built on the delicious combination of chocolate and orange. The bitter orange opening is bright and sharp and does not fade away, but melds beautifully with the intense and luscious chocolate note that dominates the scent. The notes list bitter chocolate, but it does not have the aggressive bite of unsweetened baker’s squares. Instead it reminds us of fine, European bittersweet cocoa powder – like Valrhona or Callebaut – rich and dark, with just a hint of sweetness.
top: Dusted over fresh orange and velvety woods with a touch of vanilla, this is a luxurious, grown-up cocoa with no marshmallows in sight. Sorriso is one of the most elegant chocolate scents. It is smooth and balanced, earning its sophistication by embracing the bitter elements of chocolate, as well as the sweet, and by using soft, soothing wood as an anchor. Sorriso means smile and this fragrance will surely evoke many of them.
middle: Directly from Rome we bring you Profumum Roma, a family owned niche perfume brand that make their scent in oil base. The story begins with Celestino and Lucia Durante who after the Second World War decided to move from a small town called Sant’Elena Sannita to Rome. Coming from a family with a long artisan tradition, they used their skills to open a tiny storefront selling interesting fragrances, hand made soaps and other beauty products. From these humble beginnings the business grew into a chain of shops that quickly became a reference point for luxury personal care in the city.
base: The skill and craftsmanship were passed on through the generations of the Durante family and in 1996 Celestino and Lucia’s grandchildren expanded the business by creating a line of exclusive fragrances. The Profumum Roma scents are exquisitely crafted to evoke the emotions and memories of their beloved Italy. Inspiration has come from an eclectic mix of Italian motifs including stories of Rome, iconic vacation islands and even a delicious local pastry shop. The resultant scents though seductively layered, are wonderfully simple at heart.

title: RAMON MOLVIZER, PURE WHITE GOLDSKIN EDP 75ML U
description: White gold immersed in a perfume with a regal character for people who leave their mark. All the freshness of the Mediterranean with the thrilling warmth of the noblest materials. It is a perfume and a jewel combined on a journey to the senses.
top: Pyramid Notes
middle: Top notesOrange Blossom – Fresh- Ozone – Osmanthus
base: Middle notesAmber – Vanilla – Rose Berries

title: Ramon Monegal, Flamenco Edp 100Ml U
description: Flamenco is a dance centered on a series of expressive, intense gestures, marked by the rhythmic, pulsating sound of foot stomping. It is accompanied by a hypnotic guitar melody, which can often sound dramatic and slightly threatening. Ramon Monegal’s new perfume, Flamenco, honors its origin inspiration by way of a rhythmic interplay between shiny pink, syrup-slicked fruits and the brooding, forested gloom of the Andalusian hinterland.
top: Bright raspberries and apples, bursting with juice and almost candied sweetness, tumble exuberantly over a gentle floral base, which in turn is grounded by dark green forest notes of pine, cypress, and tree resin. Want to go berry picking in Andalusia? Oh yes, with pleasure! There is a youthful, frenetic energy to this scent that makes us want to dance and click our fingers. This scent has rhythm, and for a while at least it can convince us that we do, too.
middle: Notes: orange blossom, raspberry, violet, apple, jasmine, rose, iris, cedar, amber, pine, cypress

Robert Piguet, V Edition Or Edp 100Ml U
description: V Gold eau de parfum was first concocted in the late 1940s, when travel and discovering new seas were the order of the day. This olfactory experience will transport you to far-flung lands thanks to strong notes of Oud – derived from the tropical agar tree found in the Middle East. The tree releases the fragrant resin to protect itself from predators; however, Robert Piguet’s iteration of the aroma is sure to draw people in.

title: ROBERTO CAVALLI, DIVINE OUD INTENSE EDP 100ML U
ROJA, A MID SUMMER DREAM EDP 100ML U
description: A rich and heady summer fragrance which perfectly captures the sensation of being in a fever-dream, A Midsummer Dream merges the worlds of the Chypré and Ambrée palettes to create an Ambrée accord draped in the riches of Mother Nature. A distinctly juicy zing of Grapefruit introduces the elegant sweetness of the Rose, both of which lie upon a complex and unusual base centred around Spices and Mosses, underscored by the creamy, dreamy sensations of Vanilla and Benzoin.

title: ROJA, APEX EDP 100ML U
description: Celebrating the natural wonders of the world and all who roam it, APEX is fresh, fruity Chypré accord with spiritual and sensual undertones. A zesty Citrus blast opens the APEX experience with a breath of fresh air as the sunny sensation of Mandarin and juicy Pineapple lead the pack, encouraging a positive state of mind and inspiring us to achieve our goals. Grounding our energy to the earth, a natural Chypré base surrounds Patchouli and Fir Balsam with the green tones of Galbanum, Cypress and Oakmoss to create a truly outdoors environment, as the sacred materials of Sandalwood and Frankincense pay homage to the ancient ingredients the earth has given us. Connecting us to our primal energies, the animalic effects of Leather, Ambergris and Musk lay in the shadows, bringing their sensual impulse to this highly-addictive new fragrance.

title: Rosendo Mateu, Fresh Oud Edp 100Ml U
description: The precious agarwood essence Oud – rarely before has it been shown from a fresher side than in this fragrance composition!
top: Right from the beginning, Fresh Oud lives up to its name: a wonderful thunderstorm of freshness pours down with invigorating bergamot and grapefruit notes. In the background, fine and spicy facets of cardamom, saffron and cinnamon flash up.
middle: After this refreshing shower, the fragrance reveals a magnificent flower garden with blossoms of jasmine, Bulgarian rose and powdery, creamy iris. A bright sun rises soon: it is the warmth of a powerful oud note – enveloped in sensual aromas of vanilla, patchouli, amber, musk and exotic precious woods.

title: Rosendo Mateu, Incense Wood Edp 100Ml U
description: A heavenly woody harmony – enriched by fine spices, oriental notes and incense.

The olfactory journey of No.2 begins with the spicy green citric notes of Calabrian Bergamot and lemon. The spiciness is followed by the sweetness of a floral heart of rose and geranium. Finally, the fragrance envelops us with its comforting woody base of intense suede leather mixed with sandalwood and patchouli. A trail whose power holds the skin.

Surrounded by the tangy freshness of Mediterranean citrus fruits and the beguiling sweetness of strawberries, red berries and passion fruits, they unfold their sensual charms – on a basis of cedar and sandalwood, sensual musk and delicious vanilla.

description: Storie di seta is the new line of fragrances inspired by the imaginary worlds of Salvatore Ferragamo’s silk creations. A refined collection of four universal and fresh perfumes, each unique fragrance is bound by an exclusive mix.
top: Giardini di Seta is Salvatore Ferragamo’s new olfactory chapter inspired by hidden gardens. A vibrant and luminous eau de parfum, this elegant perfume reveals a fascinating, oneiric world between the petals of an artistic olfactory bouquet adorned by refined birds and exquisite flowers.
middle: Linked by an exclusive single accord, the four eau de parfums in the collection lend themselves to experimenting and layering. Designed to be combined in endless ways, without rules, in a playful ritual that creates personalized, inimitable fragrances.

title: Salvatore Ferragamo, Giungle Di Seta Edp 100Ml U
description: Storie di seta is the new line of fragrances inspired by the imaginary worlds of Salvatore Ferragamo’s silk creations. A refined collection of four universal and fresh perfumes, each unique fragrance is bound by an exclusive mix.
top: A rich, exotic flora and green olfactory notes unveil Giungle di Seta, an eau de parfum inspired by mysterious, remote landscapes. A fresh and energetic perfume, Salvatore Ferragamo’s new olfactory chapter opens a tear on the overwhelming atmospheres of wild jungles.
middle: Linked by an exclusive single accord, the four eau de parfums in the collection lend themselves to experimenting and layering. Designed to be combined in endless ways, without rules, in a playful ritual that creates personalized, inimitable fragrances.

description: Trailing gunpowder over a sweeter accord of sweets and spike, Bapteme Du Feu is a sweet, oriental fragrance blending together delicious gingerbread and tangerine with accents of osmanthus, castoreum and a smattering of woody, powdery notes.

title: SERGE LUTENS, CHERGUI EDP 100ML U
description: Chergui is an intoxicating blend of rich tobacco, delicate iris, and smoky incense, creating a harmonious symphony of scents that will envelop you in an aura of mystery. The heart notes of sweet honey and romantic rose add a touch of sensuality, while the base notes of warm amber, earthy oakmoss, and creamy sandalwood provide depth and longevity to the fragrance.With its unique combination of notes, Chergui is the perfect fragrance for any occasion. Whether you’re attending a formal event or simply want to feel your best every day, Chergui will enhance your presence and leave a lasting impression.
top: Unleash your senses and embark on a sensory journey with Chergui Eau De Parfum by Serge Lutens. Elevate your fragrance collection and experience the captivating allure of Chergui today.
middle: Top Notes: Tobacco, Iris, IncenseMiddle Notes: Honey, RoseBase Notes: Amber, Oakmoss, Sandalwood

title: SERGE LUTENS, CLAIR DE MUSC EDP 100ML U
description: A pure scent, all in transparency born from the clear and soft reflection of the moon. A fragrance in clarity where musk leaves its animal aspect to take on its vegetal habit.
top: Notes of iris and neroli flow through the scent, establishing an understated sweetness. Hints of bergamot add a vibrant feeling, while the softest touches of musk glide across your skin, leaving a hint of warmth in their wake.

title: SERGE LUTENS, GRIS CLAIR EDP 100ML U
description: From Serge Lutens’ Politesse Collection comes the Gris Clair eau de parfum.
top: Constructed with notes of lavender, rosemary and given an imitable sweetness with tonka bean, the scent blossoms into a fresh flowery sensory experience.

title: Serge Lutens, La Couche Du Diable Edp 100Ml U
description: Be mysterious with Serge Lutens La Couche du Diable Eau de Parfum Spray, a woody chypre fragrance with warm amber and resin facets that will leave an intense and memorable trail wherever you go.Serge Lutens is back with another exceptional fragrance creation. One of his most intense scents yet; powerful and heated, La Couche du Diable will ensure that you always leave a strong first impression. This unforgettable infusion takes your senses on olfactory journey, inviting you to find the delicately sweet rose note hidden amongst its fiery aroma.La Couche du Diable has an intensely dark composition. This intriguing Eau de Parfum has a strong woody incense-like quality which reminds us of deep Arabian nights. Alongside the honeyed blend of cistus jam, a fruity complex and rose give this scent a softer edge and more-ish quality. As it warms on the skin it reveals a soft and sensual dry down, unveiling a distinct oud accord that comfortably lingers.
top: Top Notes:Chord Oud
middle: Heart Notes:Cistus jam, fruit Complex
base: Base Notes:Rose

title: Serge Lutens, La Vierge De Fer Edp 100Ml U
description: Serge Lutens presents us with an image of the mystical iron maiden and invites us to dig deep into our inner soul to find the lily hidden behind the thorns.
top: “The religion of iron needed a Virgin, and the Virgin, a lily. “Have you smelt it?” “Yes, I have.” “And how is it?” “As striking as the fleur-de-lis seal on the arm of a criminal.” “Never?!” “And deep down, as itchy as a hair shirt on the skin. In fact, a sublime torture!” – Serge Lutens
middle: Offering key notes of green and white florals, lily, pear and sandalwood, the gentle fragrance and juxtaposing name reflects the intense thought and deliberation behind each one of Serge Lutens’ creations.
base: Fragrance Family: FloralFragrance Notes: Lily, Pear, Sandalwood

title: Sospiro Perfumes, Dolce Melodia Edp 100Ml U
description: An irresistible combination of luscious fruit and floral notes with a sweet touch. The debut of sparkling Mandarin, tasty Saffron and juicy orange hints at something more mysterious. In the dreamy heart, where Rose creates a fresh and willing invitation to creamy white notes of Jasmine and Gardenia, a delicious Blackcurrant weaves its way out of the shadows. It induces the sensuality of Sandalwood and Vanilla into a siren’s song, while whispers of White Musk dance around to create a deep base which enables the sweetness to resonate softly throughout the day.

A burst of Ginger and Powdery notes balanced with a dewy and fresh herbal accent to add a smooth and mellow aroma. title: St Dupont, Perfect Tobacco Edp 100Ml U
description: This perfume is the perfect choice if you want to add a touch of beauty to your life and fill it with cinnamon-infused ginger and the distinctive tobacco smell. This unique fragrance is filled with delicate vanilla, which is specially added to the oud so that you would enjoy the feeling of splendor and refreshment all the time.

title: STEPHANE HUMBERT LUCAS, 777 GOD OF FIRE EDP 50ML U
description: God of Fire is inspired from the legend of Xiuhtecuhtli, God of fire, day and light in the Aztec mythology.
top: Creator of all life, he is the mother and father of all Gods. He is the personification of light in the darkness, warmth in coldness and life in death.
middle: As a patron of kings and warriors, he is shown carrying a turquoise serpent around him and wearing a crown and ornaments made of a Turquoise blue stones.
base: Inspiration

title: Stephane Humbert Lucas, 777 Khol De Bahrein Edp 50Ml U
description: A sensation of makeup’Khôl de Bahreïn is a glamourous fragrance that refers to the Khôl, an ancient cosmetic eyeused by the Egyptian pharaos and queens and still worn by the women in Middle East.It’s a seductive perfume, with warm notes of amber and unctuous nougat.A tribute to the elegance underlined by the powdery notes of the violet and thesplendid iris from Florence.
top: Top notesViolet – Nougat – Gums
middle: Mid notesIris Powder – Sandalwood – Mixture of benzene amber
base: BaseMusky Balsamic notes

title: Stephane Humbert Lucas, 777 Manteuse Edp 50Ml U
description: A play on words combining the deadly praying mantis with the french word for “deceiver, ” Manteuse is quite clearly not meant to be a gentle fragrance. Instead, this bold new floral from Stephane Humbert Lucas is a swaggering, sensuous throwback to the unapologetic musky florals of the 1990s, strong, warm, and utterly mesmerizing. Opening with a rich, vivid blast of bergamot and bright white florals, Manteuse stuns its prey before injecting its poison, a deeply narcotic, languorous blend of sweet honey and rich, resin-flushed iris. As the deeply powdery, smoothly seductive base of woodsy musks takes hold, we find ourselves utterly paralyzed, gripped with uncontrollable pleasure, defenseless against the gorgeous power of the scent. For those who still long for bold, sexy fragrances meant to unapologetically turn heads, Manteuse is bound to be your newest obsession.
top: Manteuse Notes
middle: Bergamot, white flowers, leather

title: Stephane Humbert Lucas, 777 Oumma Edp 50Ml U
description: Stephane Humbert Lucas wants to express here the communion between people and uses an ancestral formula blending this precious ingredient also called Agarwood with Rose.
top: Highly subtle and delicate, this perfume is refined, almost powdery.
middle: A deep and sincere woody and smoky fragrance exquisitely finished with three types of roses : rose from Morocco, Grasse and Bulgaria.
base: A fragrance for the Oud lovers.

title: Stephane Humbert Lucas, 777 Taklamakan Edp 50Ml U
description: Taklamakan is named after one of the biggest desert in the world on the Silk Road.Like the shifting sands that compose it, Taklamakan is hot and dry.The perfume is a journey where the patchouli from india meets the smoky vanilla, the resins and the incense on the ancient Spice Route.It eventually falls in love with the Cedar from China in this deep and powerful fragrance.
top: Top notesCalabrian bergamot touch – Rose filigrane – Santalwood – Iris – Osmanthus – Neroli.
middle: Heart notesChinese cedar & ‘Patchouli coeur’.

title: Stephane Humbert Lucas, 777 Wish Come True Edp 50Ml U
description: Like a fairy-tailored magic potion, WISH come TRUE was brewed for you to be-live in your most beautiful dreams and aspirations, with a twist of supernatural. A lucky star. It combines a supernatural tuberose, both fresh and voluptuous, to a subtle infusion of amber gris. Feminity meets the enchanting.
top: Top Notes: Tangerine, Bergamot
middle: Mid notes: Tuberose, Jasmine, Héliotrope
base: Base notes: Sandalwood, Amber Gris, Oud du Laos

title: STEPHANE HUMBERT LUCAS, PINK BOA EDP 50ML U
description: Pink Boa is a tangy pink swirl where a fragrant snake will embrace you with its powdery trail, bringing with it the aromas of summer.
top: This gourmand snake is made of blackcurrant and rosemary, it’s sweet and delicate taste of raspberry is combined with an extremely cold vodka accord.
middle: Eventually, its trail gives way to addictive notes of musk with warm and sensual sandalwood.
base: FulguranceRosemary, Bergamot, Blackcurrant

title: STEPHANE HUMBERT LUCAS, VENOM INCARNAT EDP 50ML U
description: Venom Incarnat is a love potion to make you irresistible. Dressed in a bottle with a hypnotizing snake, this creation revolves around the color red.
top: This sensual and luscious Eau de Parfum is a subtle blend of strawberry and blackberry in the top notes. Then, in the heart of this fragrance, raspberry is revealed in an intimate and seductive way and the warmth of cinnamon bewitches us intensely. Later, notes of virginia cedar and balsam fir come to the surface to bewitch us until we lose our minds.
middle: Notes
base: Top notes: blackberry, strawberry

title: Strangelove Nyc, Love Melt My Heart Edp 100Ml U
description: surrender your love…meltmyheart
top: meltmyheart inspires romance and indulgence for devoted lovers.
middle: This sumptuous oriental contains pure orris butter, a sought-after delicacy in perfumery for which there is no substitute. Like the warmth of true love, orris butter is irreplaceable. Our sensual blend is deepened by the sultriness of beloved oud and sandalwood, soothing ylang ylang combines with a hint of white magnolia and French sage to boost spirits. With their irresistible influence, purified ginger, stimulating mandarin, and luscious dark chocolate complete this enthralling creation.
base: Tender and poetic, meltmyheart embodies an eternal bond between kindred spirits.

title: Swiss Arabian, Casablanca Edp 100Ml U
description: It was inspired by the breath-taking city that rises from the desert sands of its heritage. When you wear Casablanca, you become a part of it. Its beauty is undeniable. Its elegance is assured. The legend is eternal. Casablanca opens with a tempting array of ripe fruits, beckoning you into this scented world. Apples and grapes offer color, juice and sweetness. You follow their beguiling scent towards intense patchouli and precious iris root. The fragrance surrounds you like the splendor of the city that inspired it: abundance, richness and grandeur combined. This intense heartbeat quickens until it is a steady, golden drum of sensual musk, deep, sweet balsams and a golden sunset of amber.Casablanca is a unisex fragrance. It is ideally suited to cooler seasons. Discover Mystique.
top: Top Note :Apple, Grapes
middle: Middle Note :Patchouli, Orris
base: Base Note :Amber, Balsam, Musk, Vanilla

title: Swiss Arabian, Gharaam Edp 50Ml U
description: Means infatuation. It’s an ambry, aromatic, woody fragrance inspired by the first thrilling steps of love’s journey when eyes dance and hearts glow. Gharaam tempts you down an irresistible path with the narcotic aroma of precious jasmine petals, coupled with saffron, the rarest of all spices. A golden heart of amber embraces you. It sheathes you in gold and leads you, with an ever-quickening heartbeat into the thrilling forest territory of this new love, ready to be explored and cherished forever. The scent of cedar and pine fragrances your journey as you step into midnight with nothing to lose but your heart. Gharaam is a premium unisex fragrance which is especially suited to cooler seasons. Pure infatuation.
top: Top Note :Jasmine, Saffron
middle: Middle Note :Amber
base: Base Note :Resins, Cedarwood

title: Swiss Arabian, Rose 01 Edp 50Ml U
description: Rose 01 is a floral fantasy that transports you to a mythical garden fit for a Goddess. Invigorating bergamot and sweet pink pepper berries tempt you closer to mouth-watering lychee. Majestic roses mingle with pink peonies to form a crown of romantic flowers that dazzle the senses. An embrace of golden vanilla and sensual musk brings a velvet cloak of cashmere woods to elegant shoulders.
top: Top Note :Lychee, Bergamot, Pink Pepper
middle: Middle Note :Bulgarian Rose, Peony, Nutmeg
base: Base Note :Vanilla, Musk, Cashmere Wood

title: Swiss Arabian, Shaghaf Edp 100Ml M

Bursting with an explosive bouquet of tagetes flowers, calamansi fruit, tolu balsam, cinnamon, sage, black amber and rosewood, Shaghaf Men EDP is a force of nature that will just keep going.
top: Base Notes: Amber, Ebony Wood, Palisandr Rosewood, Patchouli, Praline, & Tolu BalmMiddle Notes: Cardamom, Cinnamon, Nagarmotha (Cypriol), Sage, & Sea NotesTop Notes: Lavender, Lemon, & Orange

title: Swiss Arabian, Shaghaf Oud Ahmar Parfum 75Ml U
description: Shaghaf Oud Ahmar is a warm amber gourmand fragrance that silently speaks of luxury and opulence.
top: Make a sparkling entrance with bergamot and dawn-fresh green notes. A mouth-watering heart of melon, apple and pineapple is ripe with carefree abundance. Your lingering signature is a sumptuous breeze of golden vanilla, exquisite woods and gentle powdery musks as Shaghaf Oud Ahmar leaves the unique memory of you in its wake.

title: SWISS ARABIAN, SHAGHAF OUD EDP 75ML U
description: This is the moment. This is passion. This is the fragrance. The Swiss Arabian Shaghaf Oud Eau de Parfum, created by Arabian perfumers, is an oriental fragrance with a sweet, oriental composition, with oud being the main ingredient. It is perfect for both men and women.
top: Are you ready for an unbelievable sensory experience?
middle: a sweet, oriental fragrancea unisex fragrance for both men and womenideal for colder days
base: Composition of the fragranceAt first you’ll be able to recognise oriental oud with notes of precious saffron, which is also rightfully referred to as red gold. As the top notes fade, the scent of delicious pralines and roses becomes more prominent. The aroma of oud brings the entire composition together. The base notes, which linger on the skin for the longest amount of time, are led by nothing else but oud, this time complemented by vanilla.

title: SWISS ARABIAN, SHAGHAF OUD TONKA EDP 75ML U
description: Step into a world of captivating elegance with Shaghaf Oud Tonka, a fragrance that unveils a mesmerizing blend of scents.
top: The journey begins with the invigorating top note of almond, setting the stage for an enchanting experience. Feel the captivating embrace of cinnamon bark.
middle: Tunisian orange flower, and Turkish rose in the heart, as they intertwine to create a symphony of sensuality and allure.
base: The base notes of tonka, vanilla, and amberwood add depth and richness, leaving a trail of captivating elegance. Tonka provides a warm and addictive embrace, while vanilla adds a touch of sweetness. Amberwood brings an earthy and woody allure, completing the captivating composition.

title: TAUER PERFUMES, 02 L’AIR DU DESERT MAROCAIN EDT 50ML U
description: “I imagined myself relaxing in a hotel room in Marrakesh after a day in the desert. I’m lying on my bed exhausted from the desert heat. The moon slowly rises in the endless sky above the sand dunes. Through the open window, dry, warm air flows into the room, smelling of the nearby desert and mixing with the scents of spices from the busy street in front of the house.
top: It’s the aroma of the desert and sweet cookies from a nearby bakery, accompanied by a hint of the sensual scent of a blooming jasmine bush on the street corner,” says Andy about his scent, which has also received a successful rating from perfume critics.
middle: Ingredients
base: Head: coriander, cumin, orange essential oil

title: Thameen, Blue Heart Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: The over 30 carat brilliant cut Blue Heart is the largest heart shaped diamond in the world.
top: This Extrait de Parfum is inspired by the joie de vivre lifestyle of the various socialite owners of the Blue Heart Diamond. To re-imagine the vibrancy and exoticism of their glamorous lives, we use vanilla as the core of the composition interplaying with saffron and white coconut.
middle: Top Notes: Saffron, CoconutHeart Notes: Vanilla, Orris Root, Tonka BeansBase Notes: Amber, White Musk, Nagarmotha

title: THAMEEN, BRAVI COLOGNE ELIXIR 100ML U
description: Bravi’s adventure begins at the opera house, which is the most iconic building in Covent Garden. A place where love and passion for the opera ignites friendships.
top: Perfumer Bruno Jovanovic re-creates the scent of the Queen of the Night flower. During the olfactory exploration of the Queen of the Night, we take the path of sensuality, but in a dramatic and over-the-top sensational way.Intoxicating tuberose is spiced up with an overdose of ginger and dramatized with a novel walnut milk accord. The notes are blended in a way that accents the tension between them. Perfect for an opulent evening.
middle: Top Notes: Bergamot, Bitter Orange, GingerHeart Notes: Tuberose, Saffron, HoneyBase Notes: Walnut Milk Accord, Vanilla, Tobacco

title: Thameen, Carved Oud Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Based on a sixteen-stage ritual for Indian Royalty, Carved Oud changes perceptions of what oud fragrances can be. A rare and exclusive oud has been blended to perfection, striking the right balance between earthy, floral, woody and sweet notes.
top: Top Notes: Guatemalan cardamom, pink pepper, cypriol, cypress oil.
middle: Heart Notes: Cedar wood super, patchouli heart, iris, oud.
base: Base Notes: Haitian vetiver, amber, musk, sandalwood, vanilla.

title: THAMEEN, CULLINAN DAIMOND EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML U
description: The largest clear cut diamond in the world, The Cullinan Diamond is both magnificent and regal just as the fragrance it inspires. With the mysterious combination of black pepper, vanilla, rose and musk, Cullinan Diamond recreates the warmth and dazzling brilliance of the Crown Jewels it adorns. Orris, Rose and Cashmere Musk are used to express the regal warmth of this legendary diamond.
top: Key Fragrance Notes
middle: TOP: Black PepperMIDDLE: Vanilla Absolute, Orris, RoseBASE: Cashmere Musk, Cedarwood, Amber

title: Thameen, Patiala Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Inspired by the mysterious Patiala necklace of India, this fragrance has been created to elate and energise those who wear it.
top: Like the necklace, Patiala is a manifestation of true craftsmanship and a mark of true sophistication.
middle: Top Notes: Citrus, aldehyde

description: Named after the most valuable pearl in the world, this mysterious and seductive scent oozes royalty, stardom and sensuality.
