middle: Heart Notes: Vanilla, caramel, myrrh, ylang ylang
base: Base Notes: White musk, amber, poudre

title: Thameen, Peregrina Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Named after the most valuable pearl in the world, this mysterious and seductive scent oozes royalty, stardom and sensuality.
top: Top Notes: Rose Damascene, lily of the valley, gardenia, jasmine
middle: Heart Notes: Vanilla, caramel, myrrh, ylang ylang
base: Base Notes: White musk, amber, poudre

title: Thameen, Riviera Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: A Rivière is a classic necklace comprised of gemstones that are of identical size or seamlessly graduated.
top: Top Notes: Indian Black Pepper, Ceylan, Cinnamon, Persian Saffron, Lemon Blossom Accord
middle: Heart Notes: Russian Clary Sage Absolute, Turkish Rose, Carnation Accord, Indonesian Patchouli
base: Base Notes: Oud Accord, Indian Cypriol, Sun Drenched Leather, Amber Accord

title: Thameen, The Cora Extrait De Parfum 50Ml U
description: Inspired by the rare gemstone, The Cora is a bright, golden, multi-faceted spectrum of rare and beautiful ingredients as mesmerising and timeless as its namesake.
top: Top Notes: Bulgarian rose, jasmine, wisteria, magnolia
middle: Heart Notes: Carnation, vanilla, lily of the valley, benzoin
base: Base Notes: Patchouli, white musk, amber accord

title: The House Of Oud, Just Before Edp 75Ml U
description: The moment within the moment: before. Before it happens. Before desire blossoms into reality. Just before.
top: Just Before is the gathering mist of expectation. It stretches out in yearning and aspires. A projection of unfettered imagination that acquires body and becomes passion, it contains the quiver of excitement, desire that’s shaped by imagination as one thought chases another.
middle: Just Before captures the instant before a kiss, the skin you caress, your breath that mingles. It is that moment when we are enveloped in creative energy, when endless possibilities come together in a single arrow aimed at the bullseye. And before that moment strikes, it duplicates our heartbeats, dissolves our thoughts and mixes our emotions.
base: Just Before is the urge to achieve the desires we strain to reach every time, but never quite arrive at completely.

title: The House Of Oud, Live In Colors Edp 75Ml U
description: Full of fun, explosive and contagious, this fragrance opens with a declaration of intent from Lemon, Grapefruit and Red Fruits that play and chase each other until they reach the heart. Here, the stimulating sensations of Ginger and Pink Pepper tease your sense of smell and invite your emotions to float to the surface.
top: The finale is worth remembering, notes of amber and musk set the scene for Hinoki, the surprising Japanese wood whose aroma is dry, fresh and sometimes mystical. Chosen here to represent a miracle, the moment when a creative verve first sees the light of day.
middle: Head notes: Lemon, Grapefruit, Red fruits
base: Heart notes: Ginger, Pink pepper

title: The House Of Oud, Ruby Red Edp 75Ml U
description: The House Of Oud, Ruby Red Edp 75Ml U

title: THE MERCHANT OF VENICE, ANDALUSIAN SOUL EDP 100ML U
description: Immerse your senses in the sensuality of The Merchant Of Venice Andalusian Soul Eau de Parfum Spray, a bold fragrance for women.
top: An audacious fragrance made for those who love to make a sophisticated statement, Andalusian Soul Eau de Parfum opens with refined acacia, amber and rum. Heart notes of cistus labdanum enhanced by smoky and balsamic accords create an earthy warmth, before a dry-down of vanilla, amber and sage allow for a refined and elegant sillage.
middle: A feminine scent, this Eau de Parfum recalls the warmth and the mystery of the sunny lands from which it comes, and is an olfactory expression of the maritime trading route connected to the Venetian Republic and the raw materials and savoury herbs transported within it.
base: Why We Love It

title: The Merchant Of Venice, Arabesque Edp 100Ml  U
description: The Merchant of Venice Arabesque perfume for men and women
top: The beautiful flacon of Arabesque gets inspiration from the Ca’ d’oro Palace in Venice. It is made in typical venetian blue and gold colours, and reinterpretes the most classic shape of Murano glass design. The arabic pattern, rich in fine details, blends gold and blue with a stunning final effect that could not describe better the fragrance enclosed. An opulent design that expresses the richness of a city that use to trade with precious and rare materials for centuries. It is further embellished with a golden cup that shows the wind rose, and a golden metal label hanging from the neck.
middle: The beauty of the dream-like world of Arabesque is embodied in the nobility of the blue and gold bottle of this fragrance, an aromatic creation of a thousand facets. The overwhelming combination of tobacco leaves, sweet notes of plum, and frizzy ginger make the fragrance attractive at the very first hint of its head note. The heart note discloses a warm accord of cinnamon and cedarwod, both exalted by vetiver in the base note and further softened by a delicate musk

title: The Merchant Of Venice, Mandarin Carnival Edp 100Ml  U
description: Sicily has the power to enchant you with its colours: its deep blue sea and sky, ï¬elds of green, and rainbows of rich and aromatic ï¬‚owers. It is like being present at a costumed-ball. Mandarin carnival embodies these colours with its bursts of the citrus freshness of the finest native mandarins and also, through the sweetness of tamarind, it brings to mind the aura and mystique of exotic lands.
top: The fragrance Mandarin Carnival is enclosed in a vibrant playful flacon coloured in a fresh blue with a murrina design. It recalls the ancient decoration technique of Murano glassmakers.
middle: Mandarin Carnival is inspired by the Muda del Trafego.
base: The Muda del Trafego was headed towards Tunis and, following Africa as far as Alexandria, ending in Beirut. Many citrus fruits were imported via this route, as well as valuable raw materials such as citrus sandalwood, oregano, myrtle, mastic and black mustard.

title: The Merchant Of Venice, Red Potion Edp 100Ml  U
description: A journey that starts from the North Africa coasts leaving heady scents of Orange Blossom and Rosemary along the Mediterranean Sea then reaching the enchanting Venice releasing beautiful notes of Sandalwood and precious Immortelle. A noble and refined fragrance a harmonious and sophisticated intertwining.
top: Top notes: Immortelle, Orange
middle: Heart notes: Honeysuckle, Orange FlowersRosmarine
base: Base Notes: Lichen Accord,Sandalwood,Tonka Bean

title: THE MERCHANT OF VENICE, ROCOCO EDP 100ML  U
description: The perfume Rococo is confined in a sophisticated flacon made in typical venetian blue and gold colours. It reinterprets the most classic shape of Murano glass design showing a characteristic pattern inspired in the artistic style in interior design, from which Venice is the greatest representative of Italy. The style is reinterpreted with golden lines that create a light airy impression on the surface of the flacon. Delicate and poetic like daydreaming. It is further embellished with a golden cup that shows the wind rose and a golden metal label showing the name of the fragrance, that hangs from the neck.
top: Intimate and embracing, this fragrance is the perfect symbol of a harmony of opposites. The unexpected combination of the dark and mysterious notes of incense with the luminous and soft Tonka bean, is the ideal frame to embellish this olfactory structure, which is expertly formulated around a valuable raw material, cocoa. With its slight poudrè character, the cocoa is subsequently embraced by delicate notes of Jasmine and Citrus touches of Bergamot.

title: THE WOODS COLLECTION, SECRET SOURCE EDP 100ML U
description: An elegant oriental woody fragrance for both Men & Women that was released in 2016
top: With notes of vetiver, vanilla and orchid
middle: Feel happier and healthier with good fragrances.
base: The perfect scent for every occasion

title: The Woods Collection, Secret Source Edp 100Ml U
description: The Woods Collection, Secret Source Edp 100Ml U

title: Theodoros Kalotinis, Coffee Addict Edp 50Ml U
description: Theodoros Kalotinis, Coffee Addict Edp 50Ml U

title: THEODOROS KALOTINIS, COFFEE ADDICT EDP 50ML U
description: Coffee Addict is a unisex, long-lasting perfume that consists of the Coffee Roasted essential oil of the Coffea Arabica plant. The sensual touch of vanilla in combination with cocoa, gives the perfume an unprecedented sweetness that makes it irresistible. Who is not addicted to the incomparable smell of freshly roasted coffee? A harmonious, aromatic agreement that awakens the senses and … makes heads turn!

title: Thomas Kosmala, No. 4 Arpes L’amour Edp 100ml U
description: This nuanced, multi-layered scent captures the erotic energy and languorous mood of skin meeting skin. Bitter orange and lemon zest add zip to the top notes before cooling down to a base of wood, musk and amber.

title: THOMAS KOSMALA, NO. 7 LE SEL DE LA TERRE EDP 100ML U
description: Salty and lemony on top, woody and musk notes below: Le Sel de la Terre invigorates without overpowering the senses. Agua and floral notes strike a perfect balance between the fruity and earthy highlights, making for an elegant scent that can be worn anytime, anywhere.
top: TOP NOTES: Bergamot, Italian Lemon, Fresh Marine.
middle: MIDDLE NOTES: Agua, Fresh Floral.
base: BASE NOTES: Fresh Wood, Musk.

title: THOMAS KOSMALA, NO.4 NEON EDP 100ML U
description: Neon Eau de Parfum by Thomas Kosmala is a Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance Thomas Kosmala’s No. 4 Neon is fun, and fresh.
top: Top Notes: Yuzu, MandarinHeart Notes: Melon, Galbanum, MangoBase Notes: Ozonic Notes, Aldehydes, Solar Notes

title: THOMAS KOSMALA, NO.4 SPORT EDP 100ML U
description: Thomas Kosmala No 4 Sport is a refreshing fruity-citrus scent with a touch of marine notes, released in 2023 by the French niche perfume brand Thomas Kosmala. The aroma conveys the energy and mood of the skin when playing sports.
top: The aromatic composition begins with the sparkling freshness of lemon, bergamot and grapefruit. They are replaced in the heart chord by fruity notes of pineapple and melon with hints of juicy agave leaves. The sound of the Thomas Kosmala No 4 Sport perfume is completed by bitter-salty shades of sea notes, unexpected for the final chord.
middle: Top notesLemon, Bergamot, Grapefruit.
base: Middle notesPineapple, Agave, Melon.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Andromeda Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: We met Andromeda for the first time, wrapped in His infinite beauty, thanks to a trail of bright, fascinating stars, while trekking on the Sibillini Mountains.
top: Every year it is in the hands of the seasonal weather and you have to know how to look for it because not everyone can find our scent.The species of flowers that dye the Pian Grande (great plain) and Pian Perduto (lost plain) in this period are countless. Walking along the paths you can find: gentianellas, daffodils, violets, poppies, buttercups, daffodils, purple eugeniae, clovers, shamrocks and many more.
middle: During this walk along the paths of the Pian Perduto, in respectful silence for the lush nature surrounding you, you are intoxicated with scents and colours that fill not only the eyes but also the heart and soul. During summer nights, at the spartan bivouac by a crackling campfire, your gaze sweeps through the red embers of the fire, and with it the soul begins to fly up into the big sky full of twinkling stars. A bouquet of citrus and fresh scents emits effervescent scents counterpointed by ylang ylang and jasminewater.
base: A delicate freshness that surrounds you and is with you all day. A scent with a reserved, but at the same time firm, personality, ignited by the memory of pear nectar and white heliotrope, wrapped by the sweetness of icing sugar, cocoa and milk. The power of the places is contained in this precious ampoule of nectar making you relive the dream every time you wear it.

title: TIZIANA TERENZI, CASANOVA EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: The most romantic stop on this wonderful journey is Venice, where the fire of seduction still burns in the chimneys of the beautiful buildings of the 18th century, mysterious villas of charm, frequented by the famous Casanova whose presence can still be felt if you pay the proper attention. pay attention to small signs.
top: TOP NOTES:Bergamot, Orchid, Jasmine, Leaf of Eden, Powder
middle: HEART NOTES:Ambergris, Pink pepper, Vanilla, Cardamom, Guaic Wood, Myrrh, Leather
base: BASE NOTES:Amber, Musk, Cedarwood, Oakmos, Guaiac Wood, Tonka Bean, Cedarwood, Vetyver

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Cassiopea Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: The holiday of childhood in a small village in the Marche region at the foot of Monte Catria. The castle from the previous ownership of the Dukes of Urbino was once a place to overlook the Adriatic coast to San Marino – a place perfect to conjure up the fairy tales and legends of knights and princesses, to roam magic forests full of elves and fairies and to experience the constellation of Cassiopeia for the first time on the deep blue of a summer nights sky. The composition of the Extrait de Parfum “Cassiopea” by Tiziana Terenzi is radiant, fresh and delicate at the same time. The composition will lead you through childish fantasies in the most dazzling colors of your memory. The fragrance tells about the warmth from the foundations and their timeless validity.
top: Head NotesPassion Fruit, Zitrische Notes, Cassis, Green Notes
middle: Heart NotesCarnation, Lily, Rose
base: Base NotesSandalwood, Tonka Bean, Musk

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Chiron Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Renowned for its hypnotic fragrances, Italian brand Tiziana Terenzi presents the Chiron extrait de parfum. The name is inspired by the brightest comet in the solar system, resulting in a mesmerising scent that features Haitian vanilla flower laced with notes of Indian sandalwood fused with rich layers of musk and tobacco.
top: Base notes: Madagascar vanilla bean, Indian sandalwood, White oudh, Brasilian palo santo.
middle: Middle notes: Ambergris, Kentucky tobacco, Virginia tobacco.
base: Top notes: Haitian vanilla flower, Musk, Tonka bean

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Delox Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: This creation is inspired by the journey by sailing boat around the Cyclades islands of the Greek archipelago and its bouquet contains all the colours and flavours of the most genuine and southernmost Mediterranean.
top: The essence of summer, without a care in the world, and full of inebriating scents blown into the area by the “Meltemi” (typical wind of these latitudes), with its warm, sensual embrace, is magically contained in this fragrance inspired by the unspoiled, ancestral beauty of the Mediterranean.
middle: The strong aroma of coffee, made in an ancient “moka” (typical coffee-making machine) floats through the crisp morning air, penetrated by the iridescent light reflected in the sea. The gaze immediately hurtles towards that infinite blue, framed by plants and flowers with a strong scent, made even sweeter and more mellow by the faraway reverberation of scents of honey and sweet amber resin.
base: Precious essences jealously guarded in ultra-fine glass bottles, which recall the ancient splendours of the island, still there in the form of its famous ruins of the temples of Apollo where Ulysses landed during his epic adventures.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Dionisio Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Inspired by the city of Rome, Taziana Terenzi Dionisio is a floral unisex fragrance released in 2018.
top: It begins with strong top notes of ambergris and musk, creating a mysterious and intriguing opening. Ambergris persists into the middle layer and is joined by sweet and floral heart notes of jasmine, Tahitian vanilla and lily of the valley. Madagascan vanilla and black oud complete the fragrance.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Draco Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: The story of this fragrance starts around Lake Como. A magic and a rapid effluvium immersed in an enveloping scent of earth and roots, refreshed by the smell of water. From this emotion comes a severe, but at the same time reassuring, extract like the hand that sustains you along the an arduous path. A strength and a warmth that never let you down.
top: Top notes:Nutmeg, elemi, dried fruits and rum.
middle: Middle notes:
base: Patchouli, olibanum, incense, tobacco and vetiver.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Gumin Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Tiziana Terenzi, Gumin Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Hale Bopp Extrait De Parfum 120Ml U
description: Montabaco is a perfume to capture the essence of Latin America: leather, suede, wood and tobacco leaf repeated over and over again creating a suggestive sensuality and Latino temperament. It sits above the rich floral presence of magnolia, jasmine and rose. It is all unashamedly seductive yet profoundly simpatico.
top: Top notes
middle: Air note, Orange Absolute, Bergamot, Juniper, Clary Sage, Cardamom
base: Mid notes

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Halley Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: The Halley comet is the most famous and brightest of the known periodic comets. In the collective consciousness of human beings it is the celestial body that most clearly influences our earthly life. As is the composition to which he so kindly gives his name. The fragrance opens with a magical and graceful bouquet, but also with a hint of hypnotic doom. Once in the nose, it’s impossible not to smell him. The head captivates with precious fruits and flowers. Among the many echoes is the Brazilian passion fruit paired with lemon sorrant and black currant from Provence. These fruity notes are accentuated when the seductive effect of Bulgarian rose petals comes to the fore. Such a rich and elegant head needs an even more intense and generous heart to underline the variety of nuances it contains. Among the numerous flowers we can see the decisive scent of Florentine iris combined with the finesse of Tuscan hyacinth and the precious white Mexican tuberose. These precious flowers embrace the freshness of petitgrain and Hawaiian hibiscus, steamed by the softness of peach and alpine raspberry and seasoned with Sri Lanka cinnamon. The strong base combines the majestic power of Laotian oud and Cuban cedar with the typical “magic potion” of the Terenzi family consisting of ambergris and musk. HALLEY is a fragrance of irresistible and seductive power that radiates a brilliant, luminous tail, just like the famous comet that passes by our sky.
top: Head NotesPassion Fruit, Zitrische Notes, Cassis
middle: Heart NotesIris, Hyacinth, Tuberose, Neroli (Orange Blossom), Hibiscus, Peach, Cinnamon
base: Base NotesVanilla, Oud, Cedar, Musk, Musk

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Kirke Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: An enchanting place is found just south of Rome. Today it is a Natural Park, but it is still characterised by a landscape so rich it takes the traveller’s breath away. This place is fixed in memories and has thousands of facets. It is immersed among the enormous sand dunes that face the sea and uninhabited mountains that are surrounded by opulent forests and woods.
top: Framing the area is the most flourishing Mediterranean scrub ever seen that holds traces of the great men and women who lived here in the past. Walking along the ancient paths means being immersed in the sinuous scents and resounding recollections in memory, like a mermaid’s song or the melody that the goddess Circe used to attract her victims, which we learned about in the Odyssey by Ulysses.
middle: We too have been enraptured by these persuasive perfumes, so much so that we have captured them in a sensual and warm fragrance that can transport the soul to the beauties of the senses.
base: This is a magical and sensual perfume that is like the goddess that inspired it. It is characterised by a lush bouquet of sweet fruit including Passion Fruit, Peaches and Pears, mixed through skilful alchemy with Raspberries and Cassis.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Leo Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: As a major sign of the zodiac of the northern hemisphere, Leo is distinguished by its distinctive form perceived as powerful and elegant. Characteristics that can also be seen in astrological horoscopes influenced by this constellation, and which the Terenzi siblings take up in their fragrance dedicated to Paolo’s zodiac sign and personality! A temperament marked by discipline and passion, impulsive and optimistic, with a tendency to sometimes exuberant qualities, yet loyal, honest and full of confidence – the Leo’s nature is as complex as it is furious. He is said to have leadership and generosity, as well as a sense of aesthetics and a sometimes fatal tendency towards perfectionism, but also great seductiveness. Leo celebrates the characteristic traits of the lion with all its strengths and weaknesses.
top: The fragrance:With a fascinatingly elegant opening of an accord of citrus sounds, Leo beguiles the senses. Orange and kumquat, surrounded by bergamot and mandarin, unfold to luminous splendor before losing themselves in the center of the creation. Seductively, Indian jasmine and Bulgarian rose bed down in hypnotic union on sensual violet leaves and delicate magnolia. The mysterious sounds of ambergris and myrrh flank their complex tone. Powerful woods and attractive musk, contrasted by benzoin and sensual soft tonka bean, underline Leo as a fragrance that exudes timeless elegance and unconditional seductiveness. Its sounds take hearts by storm with their natural, delicate and stormy persuasiveness!

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Libra Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: The majestic beauty of the constellation Libra as Tiziana’s zodiac sign inspired the Terenzi siblings to create their fragrance Libra. As a composition dedicated to the lively intelligence, harmonious, sociable and balanced nature and the pursuit of inner and outer beauty as well as to the special sense of Libra-born for art and aesthetics, its fragrance fascinates with precious sounds and sensitive elegance.
top: The fragrance:Sophisticated and graceful, Libra presents itself with a euphoric opening of effervescent citrus notes. Lemon bergamot and grapefruit resound brightly over the floral cascades of tuberose and Bulgarian rose, before the harmonious heart of the composition unfolds its beguiling sounds of cedarwood and sweet orris, surrounded by amber and jasmine flowers. Paolo and Tiziana Terenzi bed Libra on an energizing base of patchouli wood and musk united with vetiver, benzoin and oakmoss. Together they carry the sweetly flattering sounds of delicate vanilla flowers and shape Libra into a sound of beauty and harmony.
middle: TOP NOTES:Sorrento Lemon, Bergamot of Reggio Calabria, Sicialian Grapefruit, Tuberose & Bulgarian Rose
base: HEART NOTES:Cedar from Atlas, Italian Tuscany Orris, Ambergris & Indian Sambac Jasmine

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Maremma Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: This wondeful journey speaks of Tuscany, of its hills and valleys of Maremma, of Butteri and horses. The strenght of these landscapes exudes from this perfume, filled with fruity and floral notes, but with strong leather and wood notes at the same time which make it incredibly long lasting.
top: TOP NOTES:Bitter Bergamot, Ylang-Ylang, Grasse Jasmine, Black Currant, Holm Oak Acorn
middle: HEART NOTES:Angelica, Orris Root, Agarwood, Lotus, Lotus Wood, Cumin, Honey
base: BASE NOTES:Patchouli, Cocoa Powder, Sandalwood, Cistus Labdanum, Amber Crystals, Rosewood, Opoponax

title: TIZIANA TERENZI, MIRACH DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: Named after one of the most famous stars of the Andromeda constellation, Mirach Extrait de Parfumby Tiziana Terenzi is a unisex fragrance that will dance on the skin with a fluctuating rhythm. Formulated by perfumer Paolo Terenzi, it is basedaround a heart of precious oud and sprinkled with saffron and nutmeg for a bittersweet finish.
top: TOP NOTES:Neroli, Damask Rose, Saffron & Nutmeg
middle: HEART NOTES:Musk Rose, Damask Rose, Patchouli, White Oud, Davana, Gray Amber & Warm Sand
base: BASE NOTES:Vanilla Berries, Styrax Benzoin, Sandalwood & Oud

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Orion Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Orion is a result of that faraway echo. It is a spicy, intense perfume, strong yet delicate at the same time. The bouquet of citrus makes it effervescent, in contrast to the sweetness of the pineapple and the roundedness of the apple, all of which lead to its brilliant wake of spicy balance composed of thyme and oregano. A cool breeze swirls past when it is worn, and a reminder of the select wood accompanies us on a dreamlike voyage towards the Infinite.
top: TOP NOTES: Cool Breezes with hints of Bergamot, Red Currant, Apple, Pineapple.
middle: MIDDLE NOTES: Spicy tones of Patchouli, Birch, Jasmine, Thyme.
base: BASE NOTES: Incense, Amber, Agarwood (Oud), Musk, Cedar.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Orza Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: “Orzare” means “to luff” in Italian. To luff is a term from the seaman’s language. When luffing, the bow of a sailboat is moved in the direction of the wind so that the side from which the wind blows changes.
top: In the perfume Orza, this change of course and perspective stands for a new point of view that arouses astonishment – and brings new challenges with it.
middle: Orza starts with a rich explosion of fruits: Green apples, Calabrian mandarins, red plums from Romagna, coconuts and wild berries from the Dolomites are caressed by Mexican magnolias and the intensely sensual scent of an enchanting Himalayan orchid. When “luffing” the heart note, flowers of Indian jasmine, Bulgarian rose and lily of the valley appear.
base: After this trip into a sea of flowers, the perfume “luffs” again – and sets course for Australian sandalwood, amber, benzoin, … and a deliciously sweet blend of white musk, caramel and Madagascar vanilla.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Poggia Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Poggia comes from the Italian verb for to rest. A term used in sailing and maritime circles, it means to bear away, to voluntarily move the bow of the boat away from the direction in which the wind blows, giving the boat itself a greater thrust and stronger acceleration. Poggia embodies the spirit of this acceleration, enhancing the subtle sensuality of the hot summer wind to diffuse the generous and persistent fragrance. The creation opens with a sparkling citrus bouquet, where the reverberations of the Calabrian Bergamot are caressed by fragrant Sorrento Lemon, while strong echoes of SyracusianBlood Orange are combined with the sparkling sweetness of Yellow Peach from Romagna. With acrobatic acceleration, the head plunges into a complex heart, almost an abyss of emotions related to velocity. Pungent Rosemary is calmed by the persuasive embrace of Polynesian Ylang Ylang, a powerful aphrodisiac emphasized by the charm of Turkish Rose and the sweetness of Green Apple and Passion Fruit.  The entire creation is pushed to maximum speed by an innovative and revolutionary base, emphasizing the facets of the entire pyramid. An artistic construction of stylistic research which nevertheless respects classic traditions. Unlike normal, there are in fact no woods to support the pyramid. Instead a series of natural ingredients impart persistence and velocity giving an incredible diffusion over time. The seductive power of Musk is combined with the sweetness of Madagascan Vanilla and the aphrodisiac power of Ambergris from the Mediterranean. Poggia embodies the spirit of refined seduction, for those who love to be chased but remain elusive. Those who know they are unique and as fast as the wind.  Fragrance Notes:  Top: Bergamot of Calabria, Lemon of Sorrento, Blood Orange of Siracusa & Yellow Peach  Heart: Rosemary, Plynesian Ylang-Ylang, Turkish Rose, Green Apple & Passion Fruit  Base: Musk, Vanilla & Madagascar.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Ursa Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: The story of this fragrance starts around Lake Como. A magic and a rapid effluvium immersed in an enveloping scent of earth and roots, refreshed by the smell of water. From this emotion comes a severe, but at the same time reassuring, extract like the hand that sustains you along the an arduous path. A strength and a warmth that never let you down.
top: Top notes:Nutmeg, elemi, dried fruits and rum.
middle: Middle notes:
base: Patchouli, olibanum, incense, tobacco and vetiver.

title: Tiziana Terenzi, Vele Extrait De Parfum Edp 100Ml U
description: Vele Perfume by Tiziana Terenzi, is a floral-fruity women’s fragrance, launched in Vele Perfume by Tiziana Terenzi, Vele, a floral-fruity women’s fragrance.
top: Inspired by the beauty of a sparkling, starry sky, this enchanting aroma blends together a refreshing bouquet of luscious and exotic accords to create a delicious scent that wears well throughout the year. Long-lasting with a moderate sillage, apply this beautiful aroma whenever you want to show off your inspiring feminine side when you enter a room.
middle: The joyful top notes include red currant, passionfruit, mango, green leaves and fir. The decadent heart notes feature rose, hyacinth, ylang-ylang, jasmine, heliotrope and umbu-cajá | taperebá. The aromatic base notes are vanilla, musk, amber, princess tree or paulownia, papaya and allspice. Paolo Terenzi is the nose behind this sweet aroma.

title: Tomford, Azure Lime Edp 50Ml U
description: Azure Lime is a chypre hesperidic fragrance with a relaxed elegance that evolves with deft sophistication. “There’s a captivating sense of warmth and luminosity, balanced by mustique’s own old-world charm,” Says Tom Ford.
top: The scent evokes a relaxed yet refined style with a lime water infusion accord, green aromas and sensual sandalwood. Azure Lime captures the easy style and laid-back glamour of mustique, a private island nestled in the eastern Caribbean.
middle: The Azure Lime fragrance is contained in the emblematic bottle of the private blend. The luxurious 50 ml bottle has the architectural appearance of a chess piece. Created with consummate craftsmanship,fragrance family:
base: Fragrance type: fresh citrus

title: Tomford, Beau De Jour Edp 100Ml U
description: Beau de Jour by Tom Ford is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. Beau de Jour was launched in 2019.
top: Top notes are Lavender and Lavender Extract;
middle: middle notes are Oakmoss, Rosemary, Mint, Basil and Geranium;
base: base notes are Patchouli and Amber.

title: Tomford, Black Orchid Edp 100Ml U
description: A luxurious and sensual unisex fragrance of rich, dark accords and an alluring potion of black orchids and spice, Tom Ford Black Orchid is both modern and timeless. Bottled in fluted, black glass, Black Orchid makes an unforgettable statement of iconic style and worldly glamour.
top: Top notesVetiver, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Incense, Amber, Chocolate, Vanilla
middle: Heart notesOrchid, Spicy Notes, Fruity Notes, Lotus.
base: Base notesVetiver, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Incense, Amber, Chocolate, Vanilla.

title: TOMFORD, BLACK ORCHID PARFUM EDP 100ML U
description: The most potent version of Black Orchid ever made, Black Orchid Parfum amplifies the iconic sensuality of the original. Its effect elevates the most elusive and darkest of flowers to powerfully seductive new heights – revealing a magnified signature of potent ylang-ylang flowers dipped in golden rum.
top: Created exclusively for Tom Ford, the Tom Ford black orchid was born of his quest for “the perfect flower – luxurious, elegant, pure and sophisticated.”
middle: New Black Orchid Parfum offers an amplified presence of the precious essential oil – revealing new olfactive dimensions where hypnotic black orchid and ylang-ylang are heightened, and luscious black plum becomes even more pronounced. Celebrating the impact of the seductive innovation, the Parfum is presented with an all-over gold flacon, from plaque to cap.
base: Striking since its inception, the fragrance continues to envelop all genders in a world of its own.

title: TOMFORD, CHERRY SMOKE EDP 50ML U
description: An experienced hedonist, CHERRY SMOKE plays with fire, bursting with the scent of dark cherry, ignited by seductive osmanthus and smoldering, smoked woods.
top: Key Fragrance Notes:
middle: Dark Cherry Flavor, Osmanthus Absolute China, Cyproil India
base: CHERRY SMOKE opens with the exquisite scent of Dark Cherry flavour ScentTrek, enhanced by exotic saffron notes. The fragrant white flowers of osmanthus exude facets of apricot, olive and leather – while a precious smoked wood accord tantalizes with heated vibrancy and a simmering, blazing pull.

title: TOMFORD, COSTA AZZURA EDP 100ML U GIFT SET
TOMFORD, COSTA AZZURRA EDP 100ML U
description: The exhilarating aroma of sea air, fresh aromatic notes, evergreens, and citrus set the scene and mingle with deeper woody scents—a crisp medley of cypress, oaks, and aromatics. The cologne captures the easy sensuality of a purely uninhibited escape.
top: Key Notes: Cypress, Lemon, Oakwood

title: Tomford, Ebene Fume Edp 50Ml U
description: ÉBÈNE FUMÉ merges the purifying powers of Palo Santo with seductive African ebony wood, arousing exquisite calm and heightened spiritual luxury. This Eau de Parfum conjures transcendent spiritual calm through the mystical powers of Palo Santo smoke — stoked by the warm elegance of cistus absolute, roses, and seductive African ebony wood, captured in sleek, sublime notes of leather
top: Top Notes: Incense, Palo Santo, Black Pepper, Violet Leaf.
middle: Middle Notes: Leather, Papyrus, Labdanum, Cade Oil, Rose.
base: Base Notes: Resins, Ebony Tree, Guaiac Wood

title: Tomford, Fucking Fabulous Edp 50Ml U
description: The explicit name of this scent says it all, and there’s no denying Tom Ford knows what’s fabulous—and this decadent amber fragrance is just that. Spritz on this decadent array of notes and savour the collision of clary sage and fresh lavender, which command attention with a little aromatic foreplay before delectable bitter almond and vanilla inflections infuse the air with richness. Rounding out the mix, orris root, tonka bean, leather and amber undertones add warmth to this sensual cocktail.
top: Top notes: Clary Sage and Lavender
middle: Middle notes: Bitter Almond, Leather, Vanilla and Orris
base: Base notes: Leather, Tonka Bean, Cashmeran, White Woods and Amber

title: TOMFORD, GREY VETIVER PARFUM 100ML M
description: Inspired by Tom Ford’s impeccable tailoring and styling, Grey Vetiver Parfum elicits the essence of debonair masculinity. Sunlit vetiver exudes intense radiance as fresh orange blossom gives way to saffron, the world’s most expensive spice, adding a nuanced luster. Made in Switzerland.
top: NOTESOrange flowerHaitian vetiverSaffron

title: TOMFORD, LOST CHERRY EDP 50ML U
description: “Tom Ford Lost Cherry is a full-bodied journey into the once-forbidden; a contrasting scent that reveals a tempting dichotomy of playful, candy-like gleam on the outside and luscious flesh on the inside.
top: Innocence intersects indulgence with an opening that captures the classic perfection of the exotic cherry fruit–Black Cherry’s ripe flesh dripping in cherry liqueur glistens with a teasing touch of Bitter Almond.
middle: The heart bursts forth in cherry waves of sweet and tart. Griotte Syrup expresses the textured maceration of voluptuous fruits while breathtaking florals Turkish Rose and Jasmine Sambac penetrate the senses and soul.
base: Peru Balsam and Roasted Tonka at the drydown suggest a new portrait of an iconic symbol. When blended with an unexpected melange of sandalwood, vetiver and cedar, the finish reaches fantasy-inspiring levels of insatiability.”

title: Tomford, Mandarino Di Amalfi Edp 50Ml U
description: EFFERVESCENT. TEXTURED. LUMINOUS.
top: A serene perspective of the Amalfi cliffsides, with its citrus fruits and calm idyll, captures the bright tranquillity of the day. At dusk, the air, scented with mint, thyme and wildflowers, mingles with a warm breeze of night-blooming flowers.
middle: “Mandarino di Amalfi Acqua invites you to experience a sparkling expression of the Italian coastal paradise from a new point of view.” – TOM FORD
base: Fragrance Notes:

title: Tomford, Noir De Noir Edp 100Ml U
description: Noir de Noir is a floral fragrance that is Tom Ford’s compellingly dark portrait of feminine-masculine duality.
top: Feminine florals collide with the masculine earthiness of black truffle, vanilla, patchouli and oud wood. The warm and sensual gourmand fragrance is the essence of yin’s dance with yang.
middle: Notes:
base: Black rose, black truffle, patchouli.

title: Tomford, Noir De Noir Edp 50Ml U
description: Noir de Noir is a floral fragrance that is Tom Ford’s compellingly dark portrait of feminine-masculine duality.
top: Feminine florals collide with the masculine earthiness of black truffle, vanilla, patchouli and oud wood. The warm and sensual gourmand fragrance is the essence of yin’s dance with yang.
middle: Notes:
base: Black rose, black truffle, patchouli.

title: TOMFORD, OMBRE LEATHER EDP 100ML U
description: A surge of animalistic power, unchained desert heat inspiring an expedition into deep leather fragrance. Spicy cardamom commands the opening notes of the scent, following into a roaring heart of leather and accents of jasmine. The base uses amber alongside moss and patchouli.

title: TOMFORD, OMBRE LEATHER EDP 100ML U GIFT SET
description: A surge of animalistic power, unchained desert heat inspiring an expedition into deep leather fragrance. Spicy cardamom commands the opening notes of the scent, following into a roaring heart of leather and accents of jasmine. The base uses amber alongside moss and patchouli.
top: Set includes:
middle: – Tom Ford Ombre Leather Eau de Parfum Spray 100ml
base: – Tom Ford Ombre Leather Body Spray 150ml–

title: TOMFORD, OMBRE LEATHER PARFUM 100ML U
description: A distinct floral leather, Ombre Leather Parfum intensifies the original scent, fusing heated leather florals with woods. This perfume merges black leather with powerful violet leaf and sensual cedarwood laced with a hint of green tobacco—capturing the unbridled sensuality of the American west.
top: Key Notes
middle: Black Leather
base: Violet Flower

title: TOMFORD, OUD MINERALE EDP 100ML U
Tomford, Oud Wood Edp 50Ml U
description: A composition of exotic, smoky woods including rare oud, sandalwood, rosewood, eastern spices, and sensual amber—revealing oud‘s rich and compelling power.
top: Key Notes: Rare Oud Wood, Sandalwood, Chinese Pepper

title: Tomford, Rose Prick Edp 50Ml U
description: Flesh. Petals. Thorns.Inspired by Tom Ford’s private rose garden, Rose Prick is a wild bouquet of beautiful breeds of rose – Rose de Mai, Turkish and Bulgarian.Sharp and pristine, the piercing prickles of the stems hook onto each other, bonding their blooms in pink perfection. A rose by any other name, wouldn’t be Tom Ford.

title: Tomford, Sole Di Positano Edp 100Ml U
description: Introducing Sole di Positano, a bright new dimension bursting with a luxurious mélange of sun-drenched citrus.
top: The delectable new scent from the Neroli Portofino Collection evokes the dream-like brilliance of the Italian coast with succulent bite.
middle: A masterful blend of Italian bergamot, petitgrain bigarade, lemon and mandarin gleams with the sharp contrast of shiso leaf, reflecting the sunlit vibrancy that evokes the coastal paradise.
base: A fragrance for men and women.

title: Tomford, Soleil Blanc Edp 100Ml U
description: Tom Ford’s Soleil Blanc is an addictive solar floral amber and coco de mer-infused perfume. Alive with seductive cardamom and refreshingly decadent ylang ylang, Tom Ford’s Soleil Blanc unapologetically exudes the endless pursuit of sun and luxury. Soleil Blanc is contained in the iconic white Private Blend bottle. Capped with a gold-tone metal inset, the 50mL and 100mL flacon have the architectural look of a chess piece, adding monumental beauty to any vanity. Made in USA.
top: “Soleil Blanc is unexpected, sultry and addictive. It is a solar, floral amber that unapologetically exudes the pursuit of sun and luxury that defines Soleil.” – TOM FORD
middle: NOTESCoco de MerYlang Ylang Comores IslandsCardamom

title: TOMFORD, TOBACCO VANILLE EDP 100ML U
description: This iconic Tom Ford scent was inspired by London, and the spice and cognac-laden aromas of a classic private gentleman’s club, only reinvented and reimagined for modern day. By adding creamy tonka bean, vanilla, cocoa, dry fruit accords and sweet wood sap, Tom Ford has turned a traditional fragrance genre on its head and created an opulent, indulgent scent.
top: Fragrance notes:Tobacco leaf, ginger, spice notes, tonka bean, cocoa, fruit accord.

title: Tomford, Tobacco Vanille Edp 50Ml U
description: This iconic Tom Ford scent was inspired by London, and the spice and cognac-laden aromas of a classic private gentleman’s club, only reinvented and reimagined for modern day. By adding creamy tonka bean, vanilla, cocoa, dry fruit accords and sweet wood sap, Tom Ford has turned a traditional fragrance genre on its head and created an opulent, indulgent scent.
top: Fragrance notes:Tobacco leaf, ginger, spice notes, tonka bean, cocoa, fruit accord.

title: TOMFORD, TUSCAN LEATHER EDP 50ML U
description: Tuscan Leather merges primal leather with night-blooming jasmine and black suede for a distinctive spin: a perfume that is raw yet refined, sensual yet sophisticated.
top: Top notes are Raspberry, Saffron and Thyme;
middle: Middle notes are Olibanum and Jasmine;
base: Base notes are Leather, Suede, Woody Notes and Amber

title: TOMFORD, VANILLA SEX EDP 50ML U
description: Anything but ordinary—and far from innocent. A captivating interplay of deep and bright vanilla notes star in VANILLA SEX. Addictive by nature, glamorous by design, the amber fragrance features a Vanilla Tincture India note designed specifically for TOM FORD.
top: Vanilla Tincture India, an ingredient created specifically for Vanilla Sex, exudes a soft sensuality. Vanilla reveals a pristine glamour, warmed by mysterious florals and bitter almond essence. A timeless sandalwood quality mingles with enticing tonka absolute and an exquisite Ultravanil molecule.

title: TOMFORD, VANILLE FATALE EDP 50ML U
Tomford, Vanille Fatale Edp 50Ml U
description: The Vanille Fatale is a perfume with a glamorous and smoky aroma that is ideal for igniting all your senses. It has notes of saffron, myrrh, and coriander that mixed with the notes of narcissus and coffee give it that unique touch. This fragrance has base notes of vanilla, mahogany, and suede that make it smell and radiant and delicate.

title: Tomford, White Patchouli Absolu Edp 100Ml U
description: Tomford, White Patchouli Absolu Edp 100Ml U

title: Tomford, White Patchouli Edp 100Ml U
description: An alluring women’s scent from TOM FORD, originally released in 2008. The attention is captured by sparkling notes of Bergamot and delicate White Peony accented with spicy Coriander.
top: The alluring, modern heart unfold in sequence with rich Rose Absolute, carnal Night Blooming Jasmine and stimulating Ambrette Seed. The signature is the exotic depth of Patchouli Orpur, a prized ingredient that emits the aroma of freshly crushed Patchouli leaves and which perfumers give the reserve status of a Grand Cru.
middle: The sensuality of the fragrance is enhanced by a medley of Blonde Woods and the soft eastern aroma of Incense.
base: Top Notes: Bergamot, Peony, White Flowers, Coriander.

title: Tomford, White Suede Edp 50Ml W
description: A warm and spicy eau de parfum that channels the addictive pull of leather and suede through an elegant musk-derived composition.
top: Fragrance story:
middle: Musk’s primal intensity is harmonized with saffron and thyme, heightened with velvety rose and warm amber. Warm, supple and sensual, it is a perfume with an irresistible expression of raw desired.
base: Style: Warm, spicy.

title: Unique’E Luxury, Akdeniz Edp 100Ml U
description: Indulge in the epitome of luxury with this captivating aquatic niche scent.
top: The salty sea air entwined with fruity and subtle woody and leathery accords, evoke a sense of opulence and adventure.
middle: A perfect companion for summertime soirees, this fragrance exudes a bright and zesty citrusy opening, followed by a refreshing oceanic breeze. As it settles, the aroma transforms into a more aromatic and sophisticated scent.
base: The great silage and longevity of this fragrance will leave an indelible mark wherever you go.

title: UNIQUE’E LUXURY, APHRODISIAC TOUCH EXTRAIT 100ML U
description: Indulge your senses in this captivating fragrance that blends the perfect balance of floral, powdery, amber, and woody notes.
top: The initial sweetness is almost reminiscent of a delectable gourmand treat, but quickly transforms into a refreshing and invigorating scent.
middle: As it evolves, the fragrance becomes more powdery and woody, creating an alluring and mysterious aroma that is sure to turn heads.
base: Be prepared to receive compliments and inquiries about your irresistible scent. This fragrance is not just a perfume, it’s an experience.

title: UNIQUE’E LUXURY, CRUSH ON ME EDP 100ML U
Unique’E Luxury, Hidden Accords Edp 100Ml U
description: Indulge in a luxurious unisex fragrance that exudes both warmth and sensuality.
top: This fragrance is perfect for a night out or a romantic date.
middle: As it settles, you’ll be enchanted by its rich, woody base, complemented by a subtle sweetness that adds an irresistible touch of elegance.
base: Also perfect for any occasion, this scent is particularly well-suited for the spring and summer months.

title: Unique’E Luxury, Izmir Edp 100Ml U
description: Experience the magic of Izmir with this one-of-a-kind fragrance!
top: A perfect balance of zesty citrus, delicate rose, and earthy oakmoss and sandalwood come together to create a scent that’s truly unforgettable.
middle: This is not your average fresh fragrance – it’s a unique and exciting blend that you won’t find anywhere else. If you love fresh but niche fragrances, you simply must try this one.
base: Izmir is pure magic in a bottle – fresh, vibrant, and totally addictive!

title: UNIQUE’E LUXURY, KUTAY EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 100ML U
description: Step into a world of pure luxury and indulgence with “Kutay,” a fragrance that is sure to leave you speechless. This exquisite fragrance is a true masterpiece, expertly crafted to deliver a sensory experience that is unparalleled in its uniqueness, performance, and the compliments it will garner.
top: Prepare to be swept away by the stunning and explosive aroma of this nuclear fragrance that is eternal on skin and clothes. “Kutay” is the epitome of sophistication and elegance, perfectly blending the rich and complex scents of caramel, vanilla, and whiskey with the captivating aroma of oud and smoky woods.
middle: As the fragrance evolves on your skin, the intoxicating notes of whiskey dominate, perfectly balanced by the richness of oud and vanilla. The woody and slightly smoky dry down will transport you to another realm of opulence and indulgence.
base: The performance and longevity of this fragrance are nothing short of insane. You’ll enjoy the sweet and intoxicating scent of whiskey throughout the day, gradually giving way to notes of caramel, tobacco, and oud, making every moment an unforgettable and fantastic experience.

title: V CANTO, CICUTA EDP 100ML U
V Canto, Mea Culpa Extrait De Parfum 100Ml U
description: Mea Culpa means ‘my fault’. Maybe the most complex of the fragrances in the whole collection because of its deep meaning enclosed in itself and in the verses that inspired it. The power of its admission, of the ones aware of having made a decision without being scared by the consequences, going ahead never trembling through the rebirth of its own presence. Strong, determined, harsh and stinging like only the most precious red patchouli can be, structured in light incense and vanilla notes that amplify the vibrations and the presence. An extract that in one way or the other will stand out. A pungent and sharp aroma, it gives a strong personality and creates an aura of positive energy to live your day as an “Indomitable, haunting and conquering spirit”.
top: TOP NOTES:Incense, Red Sand, Chest of Memories.
middle: HEART NOTES:Patchouli, Cedar Wood, Birch, Slate Powder.
base: BASE NOTES:Musk, Vanilla, Benzoin Resinoids.

title: V Canto, Mirabile Edp 100Ml U
description: Mirabile means worthy to be admired because wonderful, marvelous.
top: In this verse of the poem is told exactly that moment, the spark before the wonderful kiss and the birth of that immortal and eternal love. What moment can be happier and admirable except that which generates love?
middle: Here, an explosion of joy burst by the force of vanilla beans, amplifying the lapping of its flowers, and then it throws in an acrobatic balance of notes composed by rum and absolute rose. The inebriation that continues to echo until the evening while you are exhausted and happy of this incredible joy of living.
base: A reassuring and relaxing perfume like the loving caress of a mother. It has magical powers to ward off the influence of “evil spirits”.

title: V Canto, Stramonio Edp 100Ml U
description: Stramonium, the common or white thorn apple, has been known since ancient times. Stramonium is not only a powerful poison, but also a powerful hallucinogen and an extraordinary aphrodisiac. Wisely used, it could give endless pleasure to lovers and rule their hearts. Lucrezia, who naturally knew about the magical properties of stramonium, used it to seduce her victims.
top: Like the powerful potion Lucrezia prepared with Stramonium, this fragrance begins with a lovely bouquet of flowers with hypnotic and convincing power that reveals itself immediately. The soothing seduction of jasmine swings with the opulence of carnation and the delicious, royal touch of orchid and saffron in a love dance. In contrast, the heart reveals its penetrating and incisive intensity, enhanced by grey amber and soothed by the sweetness of vanilla and the temperament of musk rose. The fragrance has an intertwined base of precious woods, red patchouli and African ebony, interwoven with finest oak moss and aphrodisiac Musk. The essence of seduction in a drop of ominous perfume.
middle: Top note: jasmine, clove, saffron.
base: Heart note: Musk, Vaille, Ambergris

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, 45Ml 3Pcs U Gift Set
description: Van Cleef & Van Cleef Ambre Imperial | Orchid Leather | Moonlight Patchouli | 3 x 45ML Set
top: This trio of scents, including the popular Van Cleef & Arpels Ambre Imperial, moonlight patchouli and orchid leather will capture your imagination and makes you become a part of their world. Each fragrance is a unique blend of pure, natural essences. The result is an elegant, long-lasting composition that reflects your personal style and taste.Arpels, 45Ml 3Pcs U Gift Set

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Bois D’Amande Edp 75Ml U
description: Since its creation, the Collection Extraordinaire has drawn its focus to exceptional woods…For the Maison, ‘Wood’ has always been a precious material full of nobility and beauty.
top: For its new tale…The Collection tells us about the sweetness of a wood by evoking the almond tree. The emblematic Cedarwood is at the heart of the fragrance, its warm and sweet aromas remind us of a tender almond.
middle: A warm woody accord wrapped in an almond sweetness. At the heart of the fragrance, the emblematic Cedarwood. Thanks to its soothing scent, it reveals itself and extends in the background its milky effect in combination with the Musk and Vanilla.

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Bois Dore Edp 75Ml U
description: Bois Doré Eau de Parfum is an olfactive interpretation of a luminous golden wood that warms the skin. This sensual & addictive woody scent is enveloped in a delicate golden veil of Musks, Brazilian Tonka Bean and sparkles of Pepper.

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Moonlight Patchouli Edp 75Ml U
description: Van Cleef & Arpels‘ Moonlight Patchouli has been specially concocted to entice the senses of both men and women alike. Evoking the beauty of the moon as it illuminate the night sky, this entrancing composition contrasts between both light and dark. Built around the elegant patchouli flower, it’s complemented with a bouquet of Bulgarian rose and iris to deliver unforgettable depth.
top: Top notes: Patchouli, cocoa, woods
middle: Heart notes: Bulgarian rose, iris
base: Base notes: Suede, leather, fruit

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Reve D’Encens Edp 125Ml U
description: Van Cleef & Arpels’ Collection Extraordinaire Rêve d’Encens is housed in an artfully textured bottle that echoes the striking contrasts of the eau de parfum within. Infused with incense – a symbolic, precious blend of matter and essence – a romantic bouquet of jasmine and frangipani flowers defines the heart, finally given warmth and depth with a sensual vanilla base.

title: Van Cleef & Arpels, Santal Blanc Edp 75Ml U
description: The House of Van Cleef & Arpel’s couture perfumery collection ‘Collection Extraordinaire’ is an exquisite collection of rare and luxurious fragrances. The beauty of nature, which is always a major source of inspiration for Van Cleef & Arpels High Jewellery, is elementary to these compositions.
top: Symbolising purity, softness, and perfect balance, White is a truly inspiring theme for the Collection, whose values are based on minimalism and olfactory excellence.This approach gives rise to the new fragrance: Santal Blanc.
middle: A velvety texture for a marvellous Sandalwood. Combined with a note of fig milk and a delicate powdery musk, its trail reveals a tender addiction…

title: Vertus, Auramber Edp 100Ml U
description: Discover a fragrance that doesn’t neatly fit into a box and instead brings out your individuality. Vertus Auramber unisex Eau de Parfum is the right choice when you want to show off your uniqueness.
top: unique fragrance for a unique personality
middle: Top notesvanilla absolute, Amber, Animal Notes, Smoky Notes
base: Middle notesAmber, Dry Wood Accord

title: Vilhelm Parfumerie, 125Th & Bloom Edp 100Ml U
description: A true getaway in the heart of Manhattan’s Harlem neighborhood, this fragrance pays homage to the damask roses that climb up and dress the high façades of New York buildings. It opens with the spices of saffron and the green notes of angelica seeds at the top, giving way to the contrasting softness of violet and rose, which blends with ebony wood and leather at the base for a majestic result, like a flower. The tumultuous blend of spicy, floral and woody notes shakes us up and illustrates the hectic New York life as we can imagine it.
top: Notes
middle: Head notes : angelica, saffron.
base: Heart notes : damascus rose, violet.

title: VILHELM PARFUMERIE, LUCKY YELLOW EDP 3*10ML U
description: Go adventurous and explore our best sellers. No rule to follow but your instincts. Their name: Lucky Yellow. They pull the strings, slide from one dream to another – and keep pushing the snooze button. Take the chance where you get it – right at your fingertips.
top: Lucky Yellow contains: Morning Chess eau de parfum 10ml, Dear Polly eau de parfum 10ml and Mango Skin eau de parfum 10ml
middle: Dear Polly fragrance notes: Bergamot, Apple, Ceylon Black Tea, Oakmoss, Musk, Black Amber.
base: Morning Chess fragrance notes: Bergamot, Tuscan Leather, Galbanum, Patchouli, Black Amber.

title: Vilhelm Parfumerie, Mango Skin Edp 100Ml U
description: With a single bite, you can feel the mango in your veins. Wild colors, endless skies and untamed happiness: breathtaking South Africa becomes the backdrop for this expressionist burst of blackberries, mango and black pepper. A ripe fruit that reveals its complex flavors — a cocktail of wild orris, black lotus and jasmine that leaves behind patchouli, vanilla and a hint of pink sugar.
top: Top notes: Blackberries, Mango, Black Pepper
middle: Heart notes: Wild Orris, Black Lotus, Jasmin
base: Base notes: Patchouli, Vanilla, Pink Sugar

title: VILHELM PARFUMERIE, MORNING CHESS EDP 100ML U
description: Bright endless mornings in a cottage, minds battling in wit over a chessboard: the memories of Jan’s summers shared with his grandfather. The ripe, green lushness of summer on the Swedish coast, where grassy notes are light enough to hint at the evergreen sharpness of the distant winter air.
top: Top notes: Bergamot
middle: Heart notes: Tuscan Leather, Galbanum
base: Base notes: Patchouli, Black Amber

title: VILHELM PARFUMERIE, SMOKE SHOW EDP 100ML W
description: Vibrant spotlights, smoky rooms, the brassy notes of a saxophone: an evocative cocktail brings alive the energetic soul of a musical genre that broke boundaries and hearts. Leather and rose take center stage with bass notes of Agarwood, Vetiver and Saffron.
top: Top notes: Pink pepper, Saffron.Heart notes: Rose oil, Leather.Base notes: Vetiver, Cedarwood, Agarwood.

title: Vilhelm Parfumerie, Stockholm 1978 Edp 100Ml U
description: The right place at the right time, that summer in the Swedish capital: a serene and intoxicating time in a city that was to become a place of congregation and celebration. Crisp lemon, warm almond, an uplifting spray of geranium with the tang of patchouli and a drift of faraway green fields floating on a summer breeze – the ABBA era.
top: Top notes: Black Pepper, Lemon, Almond .
middle: Heart notes: Geranium, Rosemary.
base: Base notes: Patchouli, Black Amber, Moss.

title: Vilhelm Parfumerie, The Oud Affair Edp 100Ml U
description: Ava Gardner and Luis Miguel Dominguin: the actress and the bullfighter, a tempestuous and passionate love a air with the heat of a thousand suns for an intoxicating scent blending wild honey, ginger butter and tobacco leaves with the warmth of agar wood and black vanilla bean.
top: Top notes: Wild Honey, Ginger Butter.
middle: Middle notes: Tobacco Leaves.
base: Base notes: Agarwood, Black Vanilla Bean.

title: Xerjoff, 1861 Zefiro Edp 100Ml U
description: Get lost in the mystery of Zefiro, our homage to Rome and its rich Baroque history. Spicy and oriental in character, this intense perfume opens with top notes of bergamot, davana and elemi.The nose is enticed in deeper with a complex heart of cardamom, carnation and iris that leads to a traditional base of oud and amber. Inspired by the glamour of our home country, Zefiro by Xerjoff pays homage to the inspiring heritage and unrivalled creativity of Italy.OLFACTORY NOTES
top: Top notes: Wine Must, Elemi, Davana, Bergamot
middle: Mid notes: Iris, Cinnamon, Carnation, Cardamom
base: Base notes: Incense, Honey Of The Gods, Amber, Oud

title: Xerjoff, 40 Knots Edp 100Ml U
description: Life suspended in time.The feeling of freedom in a sailboat allows you to think about theMediterranean from an unusualperspective, temporal and olfactory.An undefined time, guided onlyby the wake of aromas that this extraordinary sea highlights and makes powerful in a jubilation ofcolour, light and mystery.The Mediterranean brush becomes a palette declined into a thousandcolours that the sun brings out inan emotional and highly effectiveabstract.
top: Going nearer the coast, the natural landscape seems to bemore and more defined and reveals the communities, the rave fishermen’s villages, whose daily cadence is a multitude of smells, clearly delineated by their sex, going from morning coffee to laundry soap to the waves offlotsam that only local fishermen can recognise with their incredible sense of smell. Only in the most remote, hardto find corners, where it’s hardto orient yourself, protected by impervious vegetation that is full of wild flowers at sunset, can you find the hidden abbeys in their contemplative splendour. Here, in the heavy silence of prayer, the perfume assumes aspiritually elevated significance.

title: Xerjoff, Accento Edp 100Ml U
description: Indulge in the romance of Accento, a fruity scent with undeniably elegant flair. Opening with top notes of fresh pineapple and hyacinth, this refined perfume has a classic heart of jasmine, iris and pink pepper. A warm base of patchouli, amber and musk offers a classic undertone.Soft and intense, each scent of Accento is evocative of pure luxury.
top: OLFACTORY NOTESPineapple & HyacinthJasmine, Iris & Pink PepperPatchouli, Musk & Vanilla, Amber, Vetiver

title: Xerjoff, Accento Edp 50Ml U
description: Indulge in the romance of Accento, a fruity scent with undeniably elegant flair. Opening with top notes of fresh pineapple and hyacinth, this refined perfume has a classic heart of jasmine, iris and pink pepper. A warm base of patchouli, amber and musk offers a classic undertone.Soft and intense, each scent of Accento is evocative of pure luxury.
top: OLFACTORY NOTESPineapple & HyacinthJasmine, Iris & Pink PepperPatchouli, Musk & Vanilla, Amber, Vetiver

title: Xerjoff, Accento Overdose Edp 100Ml U
description: ACCENTO OVERDOSE represents a new achievement in the field of a perfumery research aimed at making us feel always new sensations. Indeed, for the creation of this essence, it was used a molecule that amplifies the olfactory notes enhancing the fruity character of the original composition with a mix of green and balsamic notes. Also, the Jasmine Sambac, the Bulgarian rose and the lily of the valley enhance its romantic character. The magic of this perfume, charming for its aromatic intensity, is enclosed in a precious golden bottle of dazzling beauty.
top: Top Note: Fruity Notes, Green Notes.
middle: Heart Note: Eucalyptus, Stone pine.
base: Base Note: Bulgarian rose, Egyptian Jasmine, Lily-of-the-valley.

title: XERJOFF, ALEXANDRIA 2 PARFUM 100ML U
description: Alexandria II by Xerjoff, is a perfume with an opulent soul that seduces the mind and skin of the wearer.
top: Alexandria II opens with an appetizing note of tasty and juicy apple, sprinkled with precious cinnamon and contrasted by a touch of sophisticated lavender. A heart of lush Bulgarian rose screams with passion, softened and pampered by an elegant touch of lily of the valley, whose poisonous nature conceals a hint of danger. The extravagantly rich base combines comforting and dangerous heart, as a beautiful elegant vanilla and amber meets a manly blend of fairly ripe Oud from Laos and Thailand.
middle: Robust, complex and positively enchanting, Alexandria II is a striking evocation of one of humanity’s greatest achievements.
base: Top Notes: Apple, Cinnamon, Rosewood, Lavender.

title: XERJOFF, ALEXANDRIA 2 PARFUM 50ML U
description: Alexandria II by Xerjoff, is a perfume with an opulent soul that seduces the mind and skin of the wearer.
top: Alexandria II opens with an appetizing note of tasty and juicy apple, sprinkled with precious cinnamon and contrasted by a touch of sophisticated lavender. A heart of lush Bulgarian rose screams with passion, softened and pampered by an elegant touch of lily of the valley, whose poisonous nature conceals a hint of danger. middle: Robust, complex and positively enchanting, Alexandria II is a striking evocation of one of humanity’s greatest achievements.

title: XERJOFF, ALEXANDRIA 3 PARFUM 50ML U
description: Discover Xerjoff Alexandria III; a heady journey across the Orient, created in collaboration with Kostas, Xerjoff’s Brand Ambassador.
top: Rare Laotian oud and Bulgarian rose blend with woody top notes of cinnamon, rosewood and lavender for an irresistibly indulgent scent. The rarest and most desirable ingredient, intoxicating Laotian Oud evokes the most exotic lands, captivating and enchanting with every wear.
middle: Alexandria III Xerjoff is part of the Oud Stars Collection, a tribute to traditional Arab perfumery created from pure oud distillation.
base: OLFACTORY NOTES

title: Xerjoff, Apollonia Parfum 50Ml U
description: Apollonia is a truly unforgettable experience inspired by the enchanting night sky.Evoking the charm and mystery of deep space, it exudes the beauty of a dark sky illuminated by a sea of shining stars.Delicately floral in character, Apollonia opens to top notes of white flowers, leading to a fragrant heart of iris butter and closing with a classic white musk base.A rare and precious Xerjoff perfume that comes to life on the skin.This perfume is enthroned in a luxurious case embedded with a certified fragment of the meteorite.
top: NOTES
middle: White FlowersIris ButterWhite Musk

title: XERJOFF, CEYLON PARFUM 50ML U
description: The wind dries on the rosy cheeks a drop of honey extract, while a cool breeze caresses a drop of bergamot.A hurricane in whose eye
top: whirlpools of black tea from Ceylon, Malaysian oud and Indian sandalwood swirl, wiping away the pillars of good intentions. The scents of Vanilla and Amber make his chin raise.
middle: Please note that: This perfume can stain, if sprayed directly on clothes and delicate tissues.
base: Top notes: Bergamot, Reggio Calabria & Jasmine, Sambac India, Honey, Oil CO2 Extract,

title: XERJOFF, CRUZ DEL SUR II PARFUM 50ML U
XERJOFF, DISCOVERY SET 3*15ML PARFUM U
description: Always with elegance.
top: Multi-faceted Xerjoff complex blends that uninhibitedly combines quality and heritage with a modern twist.
middle: Perfume selection to collect magic moments, no things. .
base: Thanks to the new Xerjoff Discovery Sets, each one composed of three 15ml bottles, you can discover a selection of our Universe, but above all, thanks to the innovative pocket size, you can always take them with you!

description: Xerjoff Erba Gold With a fresh new look on the outside and the same exquisite contents on the inside, Erba Gold opens to citrusy top notes of lemon from Amalfi, Brazilian orange and ginger, specked with a spicy heart of cardamom from Guatemala and cinnamon which makes way for an enticingly warm base of white musk, amber and Madagascan vanilla.
top: Erba Gold is presented with a unique silk neck scarf designed by Xerjoff and produced by famous silk manufacturers in Lake Como.

base: Mid notes: Green Apple , Melon, Pear, Cloves, Guatemalan

title: Xerjoff, Erba Pura Edp 100Ml U
description: Erba Pura is an enticing elixir that captivates and charms.Fresh, fruity and thoroughly contemporary in spirit, it blends top notes of Sicilian orange and lemon with a Mediterranean fruit basket at the heart.White musk, amber and Madagascar vanilla beans sit at the base and reveal themselves slowly as time goes by.Erba Pura is presented with a unique silk neck scarf designed by Xerjoff and produced by famous silk manufacturers in Lake Como.
top: OLFACTORY NOTES
middle: Orange And Lemon From Sicily, Calabrian BergamotFruity Basket From The MediterraneanAmber And Vanilla Beans From Madagascar, White Musk

title: XERJOFF, GOLDEN GREEN PARFUM 50ML U
