title: XERJOFF, IVORY ROUTE EDP 50ML U
description: The Xerjoff Join The Club collection represents a series of exclusive clubs, from art and poetry to yachting and golf.
top: In keeping with the rare nature of these Xerjoff perfumes, ingredients are kept a closely guarded secret, instead inviting the wearer to immerse themselves in the imagined world.Explorers unite with Ivory Route, Xerjoff’s tribute to the world of travel.
middle: Evoking adventure and mystery with every turn, this enticing scent imagines a world of opportunity and endless discovery.

title: XERJOFF, JOIN THE CLUB 400 EDP 50ML U
description: 400 JTC is now available in the new 50 ML version. The JTC 400 perfume seeks to entice, exhilarate and excite, much like the unique shopping experience that this perfume takes its inspiration from Oxford street is the world’s biggest high street and offers over a mile of unrivalled shopping, and this perfume takes its inspiration from one of the most celebrated retail stores in the world, located in Oxford Street, 400, London.
top: The philosophy of the Join the Club Collection is to keep each perfume’s ingredients secret, instead its olfactory links are to be discovered and devoured.
middle: Join the Club brings a sense of pure luxury from members-only clubs and exclusive lifestyles that allows the wearer to indulge in the world they carry in their hearts.
base: Passionate poets, serious sportsmen and fiercely fashionable individuals can revel in the formula that is encased inside each carefully crafted flacon in this collection each time the gold plated stopper is lifted.

title: XERJOFF, KEMI EDP 50ML W
description: Taking its name from the ancient word for Egypt, Kemi is inspired by the same country.
top: Home to the most legendary sorcerers, ancient Egypt is at the heart of this scent.
middle: Enigmatic in spirit with a gourmand character, this rich and magical fragrance blends soft caramel and cedar wood with rare Laotian oud and vanilla.
base: Kemi is a collection of perfumes created from natural raw elements using innovative distillation techniques.

title: XERJOFF, MAMLUK PARFUM 50ML U
description: Mamluk Eau de Parfum celebrates traditional Arab perfumery. A richly spiritual scent, facets of pure honey and caramel create warm and creamy top notes, while a floral journey of jasmine and osmanthus fuse with vanilla, oud, musk and rich amber to create a sensual down.
top: Top notes: Musk, Osmanthus, Jasmine
middle: Middle notes: Amber, Benzoin, Vanilla
base: Base notes: Agarwood, Bergamot, Caramel

title: Xerjoff, More Than Words Edp 100Ml U
description: More than a Word by Xerjoff JTCis the all-you-need intellectual perfume, in a context of Bohemian creativity, free from boundaries, that loves playing on words and creating verses in a contemporary lyricism.
top: Modern and classical poetry describing universal sentiments that colour our lives, written in artistic style that is interpreted in a fusion of visual, artistic and literarystimuli.
middle: This is More than a Word’s new frontier, an original, urbane Club of people who think outside the box, charmingly dishevelled, brilliantlyeloquent, with unstoppable prose.The lively Club spirit deliberately plays in contrast to its surroundings that don’t give up their slightly decadent atmosphere.
base: The nostalgic scene that you breathe draws on the darkest Gothic novels, relocated to a Belle Epoque flat in Paris that jealously collects the best of Russian literature.

title: XERJOFF, MORE THAN WORDS EDP 50ML U
description: More than a Word by Xerjoff JTCis the all-you-need intellectual perfume, in a context of Bohemian creativity, free from boundaries, that loves playing on words and creating verses in a contemporary lyricism.
top: Modern and classical poetry describing universal sentiments that colour our lives, written in artistic style that is interpreted in a fusion of visual, artistic and literarystimuli.
middle: This is More than a Word’s new frontier, an original, urbane Club of people who think outside the box, charmingly dishevelled, brilliantlyeloquent, with unstoppable prose.The lively Club spirit deliberately plays in contrast to its surroundings that don’t give up their slightly decadent atmosphere.
base: The nostalgic scene that you breathe draws on the darkest Gothic novels, relocated to a Belle Epoque flat in Paris that jealously collects the best of Russian literature.

title: Xerjoff, Muse Edp  100Ml U
description: Escape from the norm and enter a world of romantic freedom and bold regality any time you’re wearing the elusive Xerjoff Muse. This tantalizing men’s fragrance combines fruity, herbal, floral and aromatic accords for a deliciously chic and seductive aroma that’s bound to provoke attention from across any room.
top: Elements of white flowers, plum and leather open the elixir with a wonderfully rich and sensual ambience that instantly catches the olfactory senses. Adding to these are middle notes of jasmine, labdanum and davana, creating an earthy and refreshing mix that balances the earlier sweetness. Finally, a powerful foundation of benzoin, raspberry, amber and patchouli forms an unforgettable base that’s both heady and soothing at the same time.

title: XERJOFF, OUD STAR ALEXANDRIA ORIENTALE PARFUM 100ML U
description: Originally created exclusively for the United Arab Emirates, Alexandria Orientale is an Arabic treasure that pays homage to the most complex and alluring ingredient of all, oud.Oriental in character, this unique scent opens to top notes of green apple, basil and incense from Oman.Now available worldwide, Alexandria Orientale is rare and precious with every turn, a lush heart of Italian orris, Bulgarian rose and coriander lead the nose to a warm, earthy base of Indian sandalwood, tobacco leaves and oud.
top: OLFACTORY NOTESApple, Cinnamon, Rose Wood & LavenderCedar Wood, Lily Of The Valley & Bulgarian RoseAmber, Sandalwood, Musks, Vanilla, Laotian Ouds

title: Xerjoff, Ouverture Edp 100Ml U
description: Few scents have the romantic charm of Ouverture. Floral and fruity, this irresistible scent is a rare and precious journey that sets the senses alight. Classic magnolia and fruity fig leaves open and lead the way for a heart of Bulgarian rose and ylang-ylang.The nose is invited to experience a warm, luxurious base of cashmere, vanilla and sandalwood that feels sensual and seductive. Rich and mysterious, the V collection by Xerjoff celebrates the tactile beauty of velvet. Soft and intense, each scent is evocative of pure luxury.
top: OLFACTORY NOTES
middle: Top Notes: Orange, Magnolia, Fig Leaves.
base: Middle notes: Ylang-Ylang, Indian Jasmine, Bulgarian Rose & Cinnamon

title: Xerjoff, P.33 Sketchbook Parfum 100Ml U
description: Delve into the depths of Sergio Momo’s designs and become the beholder of the first creation from the Sketchbook collection that has been taken from paper to parfum with Page 33.
top: Exquisite and exclusive, each Tuscan hand crafted flacon has been masterfully made using only the finest quality materials.
middle: Floral and fruity, P.33 opens with fresh hits of bergamot, grapefruit, apple and baie rose, which leads to an elegant heart of iris, cinnamon and cypress.At the base, cedarwood, musk and amber round up the authentic character of P.33.
base: OLFACTORY NOTES

title: Xerjoff, Purple Accento Edp 100Ml U
description: Xerjoff’s V collection presents Purple Accento, the much loved fresh and fruity oriental scent.This perfume is beautifully dressed in extravagant purple crystals, the perfect appearance to introduce the blend guarded within.The fragrance opens with Mediterranean fruits and citrus notes that helps to revel the elegance of the first impact.
top: The well orchestrated opera of naturally distilled flowers firmly stands out after a few seconds from the first spray, conveying to the skin an intense and rich style reminiscent of glorious times. The base notes proudly support the whole pyramid with amber, musk, vanilla and oud for a long lasting exclusive dream.
middle: OLFACTORY NOTES
base: Bergamot – Mandarin – Hyacinth & PineappleLoganberry – Orris – Jasmine & Pink PepperAmber – Musk – Sandalwood – Vanilla & Oud

title: Xerjoff, Renaissance  Edp 100Ml U
description: At perfume exhibition in Milan – Esxence 2015, Xerjoff presented for the first time his collection of three perfumes dedicated to 150th anniversary of unification of Italy and is inspired by wealth, beauty and heritage that this country possesses.
top: The collection of XJ 1861 encompasses three fragrances XJ 1861 Renaissance, XJ 1861 Zefiro and XJ 1861 Naxos each of which provides a part of beautiful Italy: Renaissance celebrates this period in Italy, Naxos Sicily, while Zefiro celebrates eternal Rome!
middle: Top notes: Bergamont, Mandarin, Lime.
base: Heart notes: Petitgrain, Rose, Lily of the Valley.

title: XERJOFF, RICHWOOD PARFUM 100ML U
description: Xerjoff 17/17 Stone Collection is a very limited edition of fragrances. Each bottle is unique with a piece of hand polished gemstone on the front. The scents are a marriage between art and nature.
top: Richwood – A fresh halo of bergamot and sandalwood from Mysore crowning this elegant masculine fragrance. Patchouli, black currants and rose opens up the heart notes like a earthy vintage wine. Richwood is a complex aroma that develops during the day and requires patience and time to reach their full potential.

title: XERJOFF, SHOOTING STARS LA CAPITALE PARFUM 50ML  U
description: La Capitale, dedicated to the city of Moscow and more in general to Russia, is a refined perfume capable of enshrining the charm of this boundless country rich in art, history and culture.And at the same time to celebrate the modernity and romanticism of Moscow, a metropolis made of thousands of different districts that all together create that picture of a rich and fascinating city many times celebrated by the words of the great Russian poets, from Ivan Bunin to Aleksandr Blok up to Aleksandr Sergeevic Pukin.
top: Top Notes: Strawberry, PeachHert Notes: Rose, Amber, GingerBase Notes: Vanilla

title: Xerjoff, Soprano  Edp 100Ml U
description: Soprano takes the ancestral lore of perfumery to a new dimension. Oriental and floral in character, it features Calabrian bergamot and freesia top notes with an extraordinary heart of Bulgarian rose and osmanthus. Agarwood and patchouli at the base entice the nose in deeper.Rich and mysterious, the V collection by Xerjoff celebrates the supreme beauty of velvet. Soft and intense, each scent is evocative of pure luxury.
top: OLFACTORY NOTES
middle: Litchi, Fruity Accord, Fresia, Calabrian Bergamot
base: Osmanthus, Milky Accord, Egyptian Jasmine, Bulgarian Rose

title: XERJOFF, STARLIGHT PARFUM 50ML U
description: Starlight is the ignition that sparks a seductive and sensual olfactory experience that is difficult to forget. With top notes of citrus bergamot and fresh cardamom, this fragrance from the Spotlight Collection travels to a comforting heart of almond, cinnamon and clove for an irresistibly alluring warmth.The enticing base of cedar wood and amber features balsamic accords that set the senses alight. Warming spices and sensual accords linger on the skin, hugging the wearer and charming those around them.
top: OLFACTORY NOTES
middle: Top notes: Cardamom, Bergamot
base: Middle notes: Cinnamon, Almond

title: Xerjoff, Tony Lommi Monkey Special Edp 50Ml U
description: This Xerjoff Blends Rock Edition sees Black Sabbath’s legendary guitarist, Tony Iommi, unify his monolithic riffs with Xerjoff’s esteemed expertise to create the first multisensorial interaction primarily between music and perfume in an unexpected and unique olfactory venture. The Tony Iommi Monkey Special by Xerjoff Blends is what rock ‘n’ roll in the late ’60s was for Iommi.
top: Xerjoff pays homage to Tony’s Italian roots with tantalizing top notes of bergamot from Reggio Calabria, rum, Bulgarian Geranium, and passion fruit, opening to cinnamon, Bulgarian rose, and patchouli at the heart. Australian sandalwood, ambergris, vanilla, Tonka bean, caramel, and musk are at the base, rounding off this olfactory journey in a luxuriously sleek and gothic bottle, available online and in selected retails.
middle: OLFACTORY NOTES
base: Bergamot, Rhum, Bulgarian Geranium, & Passion FruitCinnamon, Patchouli From Singapore & LeatherSandalwood, Vanilla, Caramel, Labdanum & Musk

title: XERJOFF, TORINO 21 EDP 50ML U
description: As an internationally celebrated event, the ATP tennis finals make sporting history every year. Where top athletes duel each other at the highest level and the audience is captivated by their favourites, the dynamic, thrilling flair of top-class competitions is created. Xerjoff dedicates itself to the event, which is held for four consecutive years in its home city of Turin, in a special way. The fragrance manufacturer not only comes into force as a sponsor, but also creates its own fragrance in reference to a furious final from which the German Alexander “Sascha” Zverev emerged victorious in 2021. The creation of Torino 21, shines as a lively, sporty, light perfume – and marks the start of a special edition from Xerjoff planned for every other ATP tennis final held in Turin.
top: Top Notes: Mint, Lemon, Basil and Thyme.
middle: Middle Notes: Lavender, Black Currant, Rosemary and Jasmine
base: Base Notes: Lemon Verbena and Musk.

title: XERJOFF, VIA CAVOUR I PARFUM 50ML U
Xerjoff, Xxy Edp 100Ml U
description: XXY reminds us that perfume, as is true of any art, is also an occasion for delight. XXY’s beauty is joyful–one whiff of this extravagant, fruity potion and your mouth widens into a smile.
top: Beyond the tart bergamot and juicy peach of its opening is a summer’s garden of jasmine, iris, and ylang ylang given an edge by pepper. Chocolatey patchouli, sweet sandalwood, and vanilla anchor the composition, making it irresistibly delicious.
middle: Can happiness be bottled? XXY says yes.
base: TOP: Bergamot, Grapefruit, Peach.

title: Ysl, 24 Rue De L’Universite Edp 125Ml U
description: Ysl, 24 Rue De L’Universite Edp 125Ml U

title: Ysl, 37 Rue De Bellechasse Edp 125Ml U
description: The former Abbey de Penthemont at the 37 RUE DE BELLECHASSE is now the headquarters of SAINT LAURENT. The fragrance pays tribute to this simultaneously sacred and sacrilegious atmosphere, where the High Mass of fashion has replaced religious services. Oud, incense and benzoin give body to this not so wholesome spirit. Mysticism is never far away in these sacrilegious yet nuanced accords. The iris notes ensure a mellow effect completed by the sensuality of musk.
top: Top Notes: Black Pepper, Juniper Essence, Nagarmotha
middle: Heart Notes: Iris Absolute, Incense, Oud
base: Base Notes: Patchouli, Benzoin, Musk

title: Ysl, 6 Place Saint Sulpice Edp 125Ml U
description: In the heart of the historical district of the brand, 6 Place Saint Sulpice is home to one of its oldest boutiques of Saint Laurent. The fragrance embodies the strong graphic identity of the place, dressed in black and white sharp tones. The spotlight is given to woody notes and a leather accord. The smoky effect of labdanum with its hazelnut woody aroma coils around a mellow, velvety and sensual leather evoking the sofas of the boutique, like the skin effect of ultra-fine clothes. From this dense darkness emerges the gentle brightness of saffron discreetly blended with bergamot and lavender, whilst a Tonka bean provides an enveloping note, comfortable in a composition that makes you want to try on clothes to feel the effect on your own skin.
top: Key notes:
middle: LabdanumLeatherBergamotTonka bean

title: Ysl, Atlas Garden Edp  125Ml U
description: Atlas Garden is a refreshing floriental fragrance. This Eau de Parfum encapsulates the essence of a Moroccan garden, a source of endless inspiration for Mr. Saint Laurent. Fresh notes of bergamot and floral notes of neroli envelop the sweetness of date accord, whilst being grounded by a refined tonka bean absolute.
top: Notes:Bergamot Neroli Date Accord Tonka Bean.

title: Ysl, Babycat Edp 125Ml U
description: An iconic feline pattern, reimagined in a wild, woody ambery scent. The velvety warmth of suede combines with the sensual creamy facets of vanilla, for an enveloping, sophisticated unisex fragrance.
top: A COUTURE ICON
middle: Inn 1964, Yves Saint Laurent’s first leopard print coat mixed wild punk-rock edge with subtle sophistication, and the iconic Babycat pattern is still ever-present on the runways of today. The bold and timeless pattern, known for its seduction, is encapsulated in Babycat Eau de Parfum; the velvety warmth of suede accord envelops the scent at the base, combining with cedarwood from Virginia, crafted exclusively for YSL. This is met with the balmy and intense notes of Madagascan vanilla bourbon, also crafted exclusively for YSL and sustainably sourced, lending a creamy subtlety and refinement to the fragrance. Wear this fragrance like you would wear a leopard print coat: to feel bold, sophisticated, and a little bit wild.
base: LE VESTIAIRE DES PARFUMS SIGNATURE COLLECTION

title: Ysl, Blouse Edp 125Ml U
description: LE VESTIAIRE DES PARFUMS – BLOUSE:
top: A sensual and flowing piece where silk & chiffon envelop the skin with a mysterious, smoky effect. In the 1960’s, Monsieur Saint Laurent turned the simple, masculine farmer’s smock “blouse” into a transparent stunning couture design. Through the collections, this piece came to represent the allure and freedom of the women who devoted themselves to Yves Saint Laurent.
middle: BLOUSE reveals its refinement in an architectural bottle of sheer, square-cut glass. The ornamental jewel cap mirrors the “grain de poudre” texture of Monsieur Saint Laurent’s beloved tuxedo fabric.
base: BLOUSE Eau de Parfum transforms the flowing notes of silk and chiffon with the use of a star ingredient in perfumery, Damask rose. Its petals are combined with notes of galbanum and pink peppercorn, which awaken this delicate flower, revealing its greener and more vibrant side – a nod to the sheer take on the Blouse. Angelica seeds and white musk give roundness and comfortable sweetness to evoke the silky effect of a couture Blouse on naked skin.

title: Ysl, Cuir Edp 125Ml U
description: Yves Saint Laurent Cuir was created by Ilias Ermenidis and is the scent of smoked leather blended with guaiac wood and spicy saffron. It features top notes of rum, ginger and saffron absolute; middle notes of osmanthus, black tea and pipe tobacco; and base notes of guaiac wood, oud and leather.
top: Top notes: pipe tobacco, rhum concentrate, saffron accord.
middle: Heart notes: osmanthus absolut, cinnamon tree leaves, vetiver essence.
base: Base notes: vanilla, leather accord, agarwood.

title: Ysl, L’Homme Edt 100Ml M Gift Set
description: A three-piece men’s fragrance gift set featuring the classic and sophisticated L’Homme Eau de Toilette.
top: This gift set contains a
middle: L’Homme Eau de Toilette 100ml,
base: L’Homme Eau de Toilette 10ml travel spray,

title: Ysl, Lavalliere Edp 125Ml U
description: Introducing Lavallière, the new fruity floral fragrance with notes of rose and fig. Lavallière is that YSL union between masculine & feminine in a fragrance.
top: A silky touch of luscious, delicate notes of creamy fig and sparkling blackcurrant are enhanced by radiant rose, signing this composition with a green floral twist. Taking its name from a woman – the duchess of La Valliere – but originally inspired by men’s accessories, the Lavallière is, by its very nature, gender neutral.
middle: Throughout time, Saint Laurent twisted the Lavallière into the most YSL accessory of all. In Lavallière, the floral family becomes a fragrant tribute to the most flowing accessory, inspiring the most fluid attitude.

title: YSL, ROUGE VELOURS EDP 125ML U
description: For the passionate and audacious. Velvety patchouli meets carnal rose, resulting in a rich floral fragrance.
top: From the sumptuous jet-embroidered bolero of the “Ballets Russes” collection, to today’s sharp-cut blazers worn on bare skin, red velvet has always embodied Saint Laurent’s flair for audacity and transgression. Rouge Velours Eau de Parfum manifests the rich sensuality of velvet with intensely romantic, carnal rose. A decadent patchouli base adds silky depth to this floral chypre fragrance, making for a unisex scent that exudes passion and ‘joie de vivre’.
middle: Top notes: white tea accord, pink pepper
base: Heart notes: rose, jasmine, orris

title: Ysl, Saharienne Neroli Musc Blancs Edp 125Ml U
description: With its cotton fabric and signature sandy hue, the “saharienne”, also known as the safari jacket, is a symbol of exploration and aspiration. Mr. Saint Laurent transformed this iconic piece of desert clothing into a quintessentially urban garment for men and women who share an unquenchable thirst for adventure. Saharienne Eau de Parfum conjures that feeling of the hot sun on salty skin, through the citrus, floral qualities of neroli radiating through the heart notes. This luminosity is met with the earthy, powdery notes of white musks, reminiscent of strong cotton fabric shielding from the blazing heat, to create a unisex fragrance that is at once citrus and woody.

title: Ysl, Sleek Suede Edp 75Ml U
description: Inspired by Mr Yves Saint Laurent’s retreats in Morocco, Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Collection Orientale is the essence of his fascination with oriental textures and patterns.
top: Sleek Suede perfume is a captivating scent, with warm Cocoa and strong Black Oud, inspired by Yves Saint Laurent’s garments created from the finest suede. Wrap yourself in a fragrance exuding softness.

title: Ysl, Splendid Wood Edp 80Ml U
description: Inspired by Mr Yves Saint Laurent’s retreats in Morocco, Le Vestiaire Des Parfums Collection Orientale is the essence of his fascination with oriental textures and patterns. Splendid Wood perfume was inspired by Yves Saint Laurent’s exotic wooden dresses and accessories, the woody notes warm and tantalise the senses, while Cardamom structures the fragrance with a woody pattern and Cedarwood essences enhance a brown oriental palette of colours.

title: Ysl, Trench Edp 125Ml U
description: A citrus scent featuring dry cedarwood and white musk to create a solid and comforting base. Hints of bergamot and tangerine sparkle on top like drops of rain. Elegant iris belts the fragrance with its structured and refined silhouette, affirming a strong yet understated presence. The trench coat travels through time without ever altering its original qualities. TRENCH embodies the piece’s iconic elegance, provoking a discreetly sophisticated attitude and conveying a sense of relaxed authority. Notes: Citrus, Iris, Dry Cedarwood, White Musk
